I thought the information contained would be interesting. It was hard to see how all of it came together due to lack of pictures. All that really needed more visual cues were included and then just not very well presented. I'm sure the story presented here will appeal to some.

This was a good book with some really great concepts regarding the concept of faith. Some times there were too many details and it got to be confused. I felt like she gave way to much detail about herself especially after reading 2 more. As an active member in church who does not agree w/ anything she says then I'm glad that others see their need for faith, but what are we to do when our faith is wrong? We just can't ignore everything else if we have God's word.

I do most of my shopping on Amazon when price wise its not worth the hassle. So I have no way to compare this product to others. This is a well built machine and performs great. But as for performance, there are others that just beat it out by making more sense from an economic perspective.
It's cute but so thin it's not much good.

Easy setup with good connection. Love to use over home router. Its very fast compare to my old linksys one. Have been using for more than 2 month. No complain so far. Fast download/upload speeds. Highly recommend. Must go wireless if you want to enjoy all its benefits. Buy it.

I love the look and feel of these chairs, however, they are so easy to break when you move them! As soon as we put them together, the table was bending down very easy. One of the chairs almost broke in half while trying to adjust it. The other two did not have any issue with it, but if our daughter decides she doesn't want then anymore we'll take that chance to buy something else. It's not worth returning these, just hope they don't happen again :)

This was absolutely the worst book I have read in my life. It seems like she wrote it as a high school student who would be writing a report on her teacher. The characters were so flat, even to their descriptions and actions. They do things based more about what she told them than how they felt or thought. She seemed obsessed with details that made no sense since it's not hard at all for anyone in this period of history (and obviously very difficult if you had any knowledge).

These cartridges are easy to install, they work very well, no complaints. I'll order these again. No problems at all with these. I'm sure that we'll be continuing this purchase. Thanks again. Robert B.
i ordered a battery that would power the camera and it does not fit in my camera. I have to now order another for it. What a waste of money.

I was soooo excited to find this item in a new box, however when it arrived the screen had been scratched horribly. The box has also come damaged, but fortunately so did my laptop itself, and now I'm stuck with a $200 paper weight. If you really need an Inspiron 1545 power supply spend like $45 more or get one at bestbuy.

I am not normally a reader of romance novels, however after reading this book and other two by the same author, both with characters like our protagonist, I do need to continue reading. However, I will say that the female character in this novel (Claire)seemed very whiny, weak willed and lacking any sense whatsoever. I did find it more intriguing her first lover (Peter) was dead because she had been carrying on an affair for 6 years which caused him to die from aids.

These things are huge, which is kinda cool but the adhesive on these cups isn't sticky enough (it's just plain old tape). I'm trying super glue at first but if that doesn't work then I'll have to go looking again. The rubber feels quite nice though, especially considering how big these things. And they're REALLY cute.

The material feels good but don't think it's much stronger than plastic hangers. Also you have to adjust your clothes on hanger many times. Because of this, we prefer to do laundry by hand rather than use these product. They are easy to assemble though.

I bought this book because the title sounded familiar. So far I've only had a few problems with it. I'll have to see how many more glitches there are. The one problem that makes me, not a little bit uncomfortable, is in chapters 4 and 5, on page 14, a whole bunch of numbers are cut off, such as.433=.0457... On all other pages, however, except for 2 or 3, they come back on. Not sure why.

I received this product today, and was very disappointed after opening. It is poorly constructed, does not even work on my Windows Vista laptop, nor works with the latest drivers released by Microsoft in March 2007. This adapter DOES NOT meet Microsoft's requirements for compatibility - only one USB 2.0 slot, and no additional USB 3.0 ports. I'm returning it. Very disappointed.

I had this game when it was first released in the mid 'nineties. And then of course my daughter ripped out all these cards. It's such a shame that they've been "ruined" by greedy people. You can't even tell that it's not new, or at any rate hasn't been tampered with since then! My one & only reason for buying them on e-bay over 10 years ago was to complete our collection.

I wanted to love the book but it fell a bit flat. The plot was weak and predictable, the characters unlikable, and, in my opinion way too young. You may like it, as long as you can take a little fantasy with your romance. As for me, I'm off to find something else to read. In addition, this could have been much better.

I was very disappointed with this purchase. First of all the picture on amazons product page is NOT representative enough for what they ship. The image shows two small bags that are meant to hold together 3 bags. What you get instead isA single bag and a string that ties it up nicely. In other words, don't expect to be able to actually put any plastic grocery items in them, because these don't have straps.

I just ordered and received my new Dell laptop with Windows 8. With all the negative reviews it looks to be a fairly simple install using this software. However, for some reason, Amazon won't ship me the Microsoft Office 2010 program until after I'm finished installing Win8 - you can't cancel within 30 days. It also says that because of shipping it will take up 1 hour longer than expected for delivery. If they send me, as promised, Word 2010, then it's going back to Amazon, not me.
This band had the potential to be amazing, but they are just terrible. They have no musical talent whatsoever.

These batteries don't fit in Samsung NX30 camera as advertised. They are not "compatible" even though they claim to be. After trying a number of different brands and models of these batteries, I finally got smart enough or desperate enough to buy one at retail outlet where the instructions were written. It fit, but is obviously an inferior brand. Now I'm stuck with it. Buyer beware. Don't try anything else unless you know for sure what you're getting.
I read this book and it just did not cut it. My only problem was that all of the sex scenes were quite explicit...very hard for me to go along.
this product works just like i hoped, i've made many batches now using this mold.

The book started off interesting but soon went down hill from there. I found myself skipping ahead a hundred pages at time, just to get it over with. It was like this throughout the entire book. The main character, Matt, is supposed to be an author and his "successful" friend takes him on in their quest for some sort of literary success.

This is a very cute little book. I like how it tells the story of how they got to Carnegie Hall, but could do without all that history. It adds nothing at all. If you want an informative book about the recording studio, then go for it. My kids love it!
The cabinet was delivered with missing parts but not too bad at all. A few minutes and some duct tape fixed that.
This product is very poorly made. The zippers broke in first hour. A lot of other things that break easily.
If you are looking for a book as a reference then get the hard copy. I think the book is good but does not serve it's purpose.
I have never written any reveiw or left one in my life but this one felt right...... First off all of these so called "expansions" are really nothing more then DLC that cost 10 bucks an expansion.

not good on my small head. I could use the foam pad but they would fall off if you move. I tried to adjust it for a tighter fit and then lost an earcup. Just sent them back. Wish these were more adjustable in size as well since most of us normal people are so close in size. They aren't adjustable.
I bought this book and received it damaged. The package did have a hole in it. One of the pages was torn. It is still usable though. Just disappointed.
These knives seem like great quality, although I've only used them once - that was 2 months ago.

A lot of people have stated that their batteries did not fit, but I had no trouble getting them to clip into place. They are a very inexpensive way to get more power out your phone, especially if you don't want it on all the time as they charge fast. The only downside is that the contacts do occasionally need changing, and that is why there aren't any fifth stars. It's cheaper than buying an official phone battery or making sure it's kept charged every night by removing it at night.

Purchased new in July 2012. Now having trouble getting it to reset. Cannot seem to locate the source problem. Have no idea what is wrong with it. Also tried a "fix" from other reviews. No luck. It should have lasted longer than 2 years.
The product was exactly what I expected and looks wonderful on our deck. Nice color to it, just makes it look a little more exotic! Would recommend this item.
Just too confusing for me with the multiple plot lines. Very difficult to follow, couldn't get interested in one story line after another. Did not finish book. What a waist of time.

This book was a huge disappointment. I felt that the writing style seemed forced and unrealistic. It is written more like a blog than an actual book. There are tons of grammatical errors in there (typos, missing punctuation, etc.). It's almost just a collection of random thoughts without any attempt at order. The best part about this "memoir," to me, was reading some of my favorite pop culture references. Don't buy this. Not worth it. Even free it wouldn't be good.
I finished reading it on my kindle. If you enjoy the whole twilight saga I guess you'd enjoy.

Don't buy these. I used them as replacements for speakers that are now blown out after 6 months. They did sound good while they lasted. The highs were crisp and clear, the mids not too heavy, but a bit muddy. Then about 2 weeks later, when plugged into an Aux jack, suddenly it got louder. A lot louder, in fact much louder than before. There is no way to adjust this. All you can do is turn down either side or both of them.

I was going to give this book a 4 star rating when it came out. As the date of my review creeps up and I get more into what is supposed to be history, the book gets worse. This man uses as many old stories as possible, some not even true.
The authors of these stories should stick to their own business in other countries.

As a fan of the original film since childhood, this is terrible. The acting doesn't make ANY sense at all. How did they even get Gene Wilder to play Captain Kidd? I mean he looks nothing like him! Plus his mustache and sideburns are horribly mismatched. Not to mention how ridiculous it was that every major action scene involved everyone shouting about killing Nazis.

I tried 3 of these. The first one was defective right away and had to be returned for a replacement. Another one worked fine the first time it started, but has failed after only two or three tries. At this rate, these will soon be thrown in garbage cans because there's no way I'll buy another one. I'm surprised Amazon would even sell such an item.
It looks fun, it's just not worth the time to play. In all honesty my son hated it, but i thought better then lego. Not really because it's made better, just that there aren't as many.

The title fits the book very well. It is well written, but mostly because of the subject matter (murder). I am a mystery buff, so maybe it appealed to me. There are probably better works on this subject, however. This was free, so that is why 2 stars. In all fairness, other readers may love it.
I like my product but wish the color was more vibrant and it is a little rough on the skin if u have any kind of rashes. Other than that it's good product for the price.

This product has been perfect. It keeps my Kindle clean and ready for use. Its not bulky or heavy. Not sure if that will ever happen but its nice knowing everything is protected. When closed with no device in it, I think it's as thick around by as when open. Great Product! Thank you.

I was very excited to read this book based on the description. However, when it arrived and once i cracked open the dust jacket, all i saw were 3 simple pictures of the 2 models posing together in a pose that's nothing that couldn't be found much more tastefully with any magazine. This is not what you expect when buying a book by celebrity photographer. I also did have high expectations for some great color photos but after looking at them under natural light they just come across as dark and washed out.

Purchased this TV with an understanding that it was brand new and never used. The box had a bunch of scratches on it. When we opened the box, there were two power cords missing, as well as several other pieces not needed to start up or watch TV. We contacted Amazon and they sent another set immediately. Unfortunately, when I plugged in the TV, we immediately got lines across the screen every couple of seconds. It looked like there was debris inside causing interference between light frequencies bouncing off parts of the screen.

I had to buy it twice already on line only lasted like 5 weeks the second one stopped working a few day after the first and when i went back today they said you have to send in your phone which is of course more time for me.
I was so excited to see this product. My mother in law has one and loved hers.
This unit failed with only 20 days of use - no way will I be buying from Toshiba again.

They were cheap so you get what you pay for. The plastic is too thin, and after a lot of use they cracked. I just ordered some more from another vendor. And yes, i used the same size cutters my grandma had for 40 years. Those are not available anymore. My bad.

The game may be fun for adults but the controls were really unresponsive, even in a fast moving game with bad controls. I was bummed about that. It seemed like just one more mindless shooter for us to play and not as creative an experience. As if that wasn't bad enough they kept sending me prompts telling me how much money I've earned or lost so I know when I'm doing well, what my score is doing, etc. This seems like it needs some improvement.

I was expecting a much sturdier case. After only 2 days of carrying it around, the seams began to rip on the outside cover so that you could see what looked like fraying all along where he had been sitting in it. The zipper would not hold anymore and now the case is useless without something to prop up my kindle with so as to make viewing easier. Very disappointing. I've always loved CaseCrown cases for other electronics, but not this one.

I was excited to order a new headphone. My old cord had gotten frayed from years of use. After receiving this product and using it for the first time, It fell apart in my hands. Cheap plastic construction and extremely uncomfortable around your ears. No matter how good audio quality is with something, I would rather spend more money than waste hours making sure all connections are correct between components of your system.

The idea of a "book on tape" is not a bad one, but this version fell very short in that respect. It read like someone had rushed it into print without doing any proofing or editing. Also, there are no diagrams to explain anything.

I used it twice and the battery dies in half or less of a day. Maybe I'm not using all the features right? It's difficult to understand what they mean when you need extra buttons. But that's okay, I'll take it back if I have too. It worked great for six months. Then suddenly everything is slow down or stops responding even with full battery. And then only half of my buttons work.
Love making these with our little grandchild. We can cut two or more sizes at once. It doesn't stick after baking but we wait overnight for ready time.

The CD arrived on time, in very good shape. The sound was so bad that I took it outside, mounted it, and threw away the CD. It went back outside immediately - as if having been returned from a distance of 50 miles. I had previously bought another CD to replace this one, but did not get anywhere with it. At least the other one works properly!Please do yourself a favor and avoid purchasing anything associated with this company.

this lock does not offer you an option how many coins are inside. It keeps telling me there are 3 coins. What do i do now? Thanks for nothing. The item description should be more helpful. A 0 * rating.

Got this phone for my mother and it worked fine for about a month. My mom called her brother with the old phone from AT&T; and then put in an order to replace their wireless router. Since he doesn't have internet I was forced to go through the hassle of retrieving his phone book. When I got on line there were still no numbers anywhere on the phone.

I have had my camera for a year and half now, but only used it twice in the first 5 months. If we take pictures right after shooting video with it, it's like they're still on video. The picture quality is great when taken outdoors. However, indoor photos often turn out blurry or are grainy. It's also very hard to use underwater. This would be fine if this were an exception, but it's not. I'd advise you pay more money next time before getting this.

I really can't believe this album is getting 4/5 stars. This album could have easily been a 5 star release. All it needs now is more attention from both music and mainstream America. As someone else said, it's as good if not better than their first album. The only problem with that statement is that The Used was an extremely talented band of the past decade. They were incredibly original and innovative even in 2001. And by all means please do pick up any one of their earlier albums.
Enjoyed the series. Can't wait for my next adventure with Robert Duvall.

This stuff is pure snake oil. Not only should we really stop drinking it, but we'd be fools to even take this crap. It was discovered in Australia not that long ago, and they're so afraid of the Chinese there they can't bring it on back. There's just one problem: The drug companies control both countries now.

My friend showed me a new one of these and said it was great so I purchased it. It's not very strong for an FM transmitter. The other transmitter in the car doesn't have this, but works great. I'd avoid this one.

A better effort at creating the setting of an Amish community would have been to place a portion of it closer so the reader can easily get lost in another culture. The characters are not well developed, and I had trouble seeing what drew them together.
I've always found books about dogs that are based on facts and statistics interesting because they can help people understand why pets do the things that they do, or in this case, don't do.
Don't be fooled by these reviews. They obviously work for this company who seems to have no clue as far as security or reliability goes.

I bought this with great anticipation based upon favorable reviews. However, when it arrived, the battery pack does not fit properly in my Canon 40D. The plastic end cap fits very tightly, and the two halves don't line up, meaning that there is a gap of an inch either side on one side. To add insult to injury, it doesn't work. It was charged at least five times before using, so I'm positive it's fully charging correctly.
It's a pretty cute family movie! Definitely a great watch! Can't wait until part II come out! Fun fun fun!! Hope they keep making movies like this. :)

I am in love with these earphones!!! They can get really loud! The bass is fantastic!! It doesn't sound like a cheap headphone. I'm only giving four stars because the rubber came off part of the black part. That's not that big deal.
Good for carrying a large number of small items, like camera, and its enough to put on my belt when needed. But, it is not durable at all.

I wanted this to work. It doesn't work at all. The remote seems like it would work, if all the lights went on. We followed directions and were still unable get it to. A waste of my money for me. Wish we could have gotten a working one. Very disappointed that there isn't any better review on it. Just read other reviews, which are really bad. Guess it's an off brand product. Won't be trying another one. If you want something for looks and just as decoration only. Go ahead.

I loved the first two. This one is a huge disappointment. Everything was predictable so no surprise. The characters have changed from where they were. Even Sam seems less than she used to. It seemed that Ms. Day had some great ideas for story lines but didnt quite know how to use them effectively. And now it seems like there going for more of her "christian philosophy" so its not really an inspirational book. Sorry......... very disappointing. Very disappointed.

This is my third set of the OXO Good Grips tongs, I use them all the time. They are sturdy, strong, easy to hold and look very attractive. Just keep in mind that they never come apart. Other than that, great product, would definitely purchase more like this one. One note: The tongs can be used together - so make sure you have the right size. It also comes with a small plastic holder for your kitchen counter.
I purchased a large case for my husband for his birthday to hold lots of CDs in and put them on top of. The CD holders are very flimsy. We will see if it holds up with regular use.

I gave this DVD a try. It's not much different from most of the other ballet companies on PBS. It will interest young children in ballet, but otherwise there is nothing new or special here. The best parts are the performances by Anna Tonkin. Her artistry alone makes it worth purchasing. She is one of her father's favorite ballerinas. I've watched many videos, and I'm familiar with Anna's technique, which she shares mostly throughout.

This may be the worst excuse of a book I have ever tried. The author has zero understanding about physics and engineering. One example from the second paragraph."We can only get enough oxygen in our brain to keep us alive if we produce it fast enough"--a man whose father worked with gas masks would not say so!If you read this without being required to, do yourself a favor and turn away from it. You will regret not doing that after this.

I only bought this book because it cost me almost nothing and my Kindle says its for "free." It has very limited substance -- it's a bunch of short stories. Most are from other writers such as Michael J. Sullivan or John Grisham which is nice if you're looking to read something on the beach. However, it seems more like a collection of stories written by authors who had little talent themselves but just wanted a decent payday.

Don't waste your money. This will not work for more than 10 minutes even if you have brand new batteries. Then it stops. Just like that. Do yourself a favor. Look elsewhere. The cost is worth saving some time. It doesn't seem to be possible that Amazon can sell this junk. So what kind of rating system? Would I put four or more? Zero stars seems much too high.

I'm afraid I have nothing good to say: The author presents the premise that we are attracted to someone solely in terms of their physical appearance or because they're attractive and has suggested several methods by which men can control sexual attraction.

After reading the reviews on this product I was looking for an alternative to drinking sugary soft drinks. The problem that others have pointed out is valid. However I noticed there were many people who claimed their bottles leaked when they put ice in. That does happen. But it turned those few times into one thing after another. A couple of weeks ago my fiancee, husband and brother-in-law enjoyed a long weekend at our house enjoying our daily iced tea as well.
These make holding items handy from time to time.

This book started out fine but about midway through the story turned to a totally unbelievable scenario and I really don't care how it ends or what happens in it. There are just many other books on Kindle with much more interesting content. It does not have any depth at all. No real characters were developed enough for me to be interested if there was one. The writing is OK. You almost feel like you need an editor to read over sentence structure. So it's OK but no Great.

This is my second bottle of this and I have been using it for about three years. It really helps keep your skin clear and moist. You can feel it working the first time you apply it. And it does take away some blemishes that you've already got. It hasn't done anything to improve my overall complexion but so far none in which I've used other products. Just be patient when applying it, taking care not to use too much. It's worth every penny.
Not very good - cheap plastic-like feel to it. The whole thing feels so cheap. I would spend a little more and get something worth while. And I know you'll only pay me once though. ;-)

I bought this thinking that it would be good for a small space, but the suction doesn't really work as promised. It also runs up quite some space. Its more of a hassle to clean than just keeping up. There are so many other options out there. Save your money and get something that's better quality.
This is an easy read, especially if you are looking to use some basic math concepts with kids.

The idea of an individual book on my favorite tv show was really exciting! So when the calendar arrived it came in a timely fashion, and though there is nothing wrong with it, I did anticipate that there would be more than one episode in each month.
I love the case. i have to take it off a lot because my phone is in the army and this seems like its going to be really durable. great price too. thank you.
Fits perfectly. Very easy installation.
Was excited when i found this, and thought for the price there is nothing wrong with it. Put together very fast, only thing holding down the sides was some self stick velcor stuff.
This product did what as expected. My cats love it! However the price was just too much.

I am writing a review because i see there are not enough people who give this CD a review. These guys get the credit and recognition they deserve. The songs that rock the most ("Take My Hand"), have some of the best guitar playing ive heard. Other tracks like the title track (a good song) and my Own Summer Day sound so overproduced. Just listen to them on a real cd or youtube before buying this, then decide if you don't believe me.

I should have been more wary of the one star reviews because they were so accurate. This book contains too many references to another movie by that "author" and all his other books which don't make it easy for a person without reading an awful lot of movies or know very little about film. After making my way through it, I've decided maybe this was meant as part of a larger project - just like The Dark Knight, with which it's also similar in parts.

This is the most irritating book I've read in a long time. I kept reading, hoping to find something about some deep religious feeling or thought but nothing. It's not even all that well written and not interesting. The writing style was odd with its lack of punctuation, run-on sentences (a lot!) and, worst of all, complete disregard for proper tense usage. Very sloppy writing, although it appears like an amateur. If there were no plot, this novel would be pretty darn bad.
This did not last as long as an item should be expected to.

Having read the first novel, I wasn't sure if I'd enjoy this second one since it seems to be written for preteens. The main characters in previous novels have done things that no normal 14 y.o. would do. They get over them, accept who they are, and move on. But these two kids just seemed so wishy-washy. This book did not do justice or offer any real growth from them.
The item worked great.

This has to be the worst recording ever made. The sound is so horrible and awful its barely listenable -- you can just feel through their performance there was absolutely NO effort put into it. If all they did here was play a bunch of guitar parts that were arranged at random in different variations it would have been an interesting listen. As it is, it's nothing more than someone trying to pass off their own cushy arrangements as real jazz. Very disappointing.

One has to wonder what would have happened if the director of this TV series had decided he was going too far with trying NOT to cast gay people as characters in its show. Yes, many reviewers complained about that and so did a lot of folks at GLAAD. But it's still something I think is worth discussing here.
I was happy to find the correct adapter cord at Amazon - although pricey. The description says "Power cord/Adapter,DC / AC Car Charger w/Detachable Cable" but there is nothing detachable about it.

When I first got this item the price was a lot cheaper than at my local store, and also when I bought it there had not been any reviews so we were very excited to use it. However, upon trying to set up the product for either of us, using both remotes, is next to impossible.
Great price on these, they fit nice too. If your just looking for everyday shoes at a decent price, buy these.

This is a great book for new dog breeders. But it does not teach how to train dogs or even how to deal with dogs in the wild. I found this out on my own. Save your money. There are much better books about dogs, from owners who have actually gone training dogs.

While on vacation in England, a guy asked my wife for two bottles of wine (we are now married). She brought them and he took a swish. This was then reported to the police. I wonder if they can get these guys arrested so this could never happen again. It is really too bad that some people can't even buy something without being charged with crimes that would be much easier to deal with.

I am very disappointed in this CD. One of the songs on each CD skips several times then finally does not play at all. When you pay over 50 clams for something like this, it should be perfect,but that is clearly not what we got.

I've never tried anything other than straight cold pressed and organic vegetable glycerine, so when my wife came home with this, she wasn't very sure how to use it. Turns out, once we had an easy introduction of using it, our first impressions were accurate.

It was okay, I just don't have a cat and had hoped it would be more practical than the Cat Dancer on my old cat. The way it attaches to her collar doesn't seem secure at all - she keeps getting tangled up in it. She did learn how quickly she can jump from this thing into the old cat dancer but it's not really good for her.
It's really bad, the machine never work when you add water.. The best solution is to buy another model. This one.... very bad product, but there are others works good.
The light is really bright but its not very durable. It does work pretty well considering I have a few things on in my kitchen because it's kind of dark here during the day.

This is the first time I have purchased an item on Amazon and am so disappointed at what a low quality product it is. It came fully assembled. However there was no cover plate that goes behind each shelf in one of my two units. Even though there were supposed to be two, they just didn't fit. After speaking with customer service, which wasn't really helpful whatsoever, I returned everything and got my money back.

I have never been able to use this adapter. When it first came in, we plugged and unplugged the cord but could not make any contact at all. We tried 2 different outlets with multiple outlets. My son was frustrated that he couldn't watch his dvd's on long road trips so I gave him my old adapter which works great. If you don't need anything else for your trip this would be a great product, just wish it worked.
The TP-Link 8 port usb hub is nice looking with just the right number ports (8, though others have complained about it being too few).

The story is interesting but unfortunately I found the writing terrible. It was full of run-on sentences and phrases that were so over-used they just became irritating. Maybe Ms. Day writes better than this in her other titles. I'm not sure. I've read a few books from Amazon recently with bad reviews and none are nearly as poor or repetitive as this one. Hopefully she improves over time--at least by editing out most if not all her grammatical mistakes. Good job, Mike! Thanks. 
 Rating: 1.

I own 2 of these and neither works consistently. Every once in awhile it will work but for the most part a computer isn't capable enough to read it. On both units, I've used a USB hub that gets power from more than 1 outlet. I tried them with 3 different computers running OSX, Windows 2000 and Mac OS 9x. The device is light weight by this point but appears sturdy enough. It lacks good documentation on how best to use it, doesn't include instructions or any kind of tech support.

I like the concept of these but as soon as I put a couple in my ears, they are loose and not much noise isolation. They do sound good though so if your looking for high quality then go for it but don't expect them to isolate noise. I use earbuds mostly while working out at the gym with weights since those have been causing ear soreness from rubbing on cords etc. Overall I wouldn't recommend these. It is cheaper than Beats though, hence why they're worth it.
I purchased this product before having my first baby about 3 years ago now. That was almost 8 yrs ago.

So sorry to say I hated this book and only finished it because of the sheer number of good reviews. But my problem was that there were so many characters without any sort of back story or development whatsoever. No one had a meaningful role in helping out other than their romantic interest (or being pushed around). Even though I did like most of them very much, none felt "real" enough for me to even care what happened to them.
A waste of time. There was nothing in it that you didn't already know. Very disappointed. Not my favorite authors writing. I always enjoy her books.

I was looking forward to trying these but when they arrived one had been broken so it doesn't work and the other is very cheaply made. Wouldn't buy them again. Disappointing... I'm not sure how they're supposed to look with the balls in them, though.

I loved this when it was fresh out of the tube, but not even a week later, it's flat and dull. This product is NOT worth the price. I'm definitely going to try another brand next time, as most reviews were positive. Not only do they smell like coconut, they're also great for massages. My search continues.

The story begins quite well then quickly turns into a "who dunnit?" with characters not really likeable. I was expecting a book about the author's marriage to the lead actress. Instead, all we have is an author on why she gave up writing and what it felt like for her at that time. The best bits were when the actress talked about being pregnant with their first child. If something of interest doesn't come along, she'll soon get back in action.

Do NOT buy this book, as there is not even ONE photo in the whole book. There are no color photos. A few black and white but nothing more. Just blank pages. The contents of the entire book should be used for an example to see how much waste there actually is. But since one cannot do simple research on Amazon without finding such a useless item here, it has to be my fault that I bought it. So here they are, with only 5 minutes of research.
First there was the fact the audio kept changing in both English and Russian.

The device works but after two months of use it broke and I ended up spending $30.10 for a new one from somewhere else. Not too satisfied since the first one didn't last that long. The only problem is I have to buy another.
I own two of these and one stopped working after 4 months. We only use them on weekends. The other still runs fine (i assume its just the battery).

This product was bought for my husbands new work truck. He has used it several times & says he could do his job quicker with this unit. I would recommend it. Just make sure you buy the correct size battery.
Was okay   Rating: 2.
My 7 year old can't play this game. They said it's hard, they haven't taken the time yet to figure out how to.

As a fan of the movie I was very disappointed at the poor quality of this DVD. Picture looks like it came right off an old VHS tape. The sound is even worse. If you want to see it, rent it. Don't buy it! I've seen worse quality, but I'd have better luck watching reruns after school. Do yourself and your children a favor, if they get hooked on movies as mine are doing they'll ask for nothing better. There were some funny scenes in these movies, just watch and you'll understand.
Interesting but would be boring to younger people. I think for people older than that, it just isn't that interesting so keep looking somewhere else.

I'm one of those few that thought "The Sound Of Music" was bad for the simple fact it just wasn't good. When I heard they were going to make a movie adaptation my hopes quickly sank. With every new trailer and preview, another version failed on so many levels. Here are some thoughts as to why this project failed:1. What a stupid idea.2.

I bought this product because it appeared that it contained more than one type of oil. This is not the case. I thought I was getting a great deal but ended up paying over $6 in shipping for two very small bottles with plastic caps. They must be sold via bulk order and shipped direct to my house. Ridiculous! Also, they both have an overpowering odor like fresh fish.
I bought it by mistake for my old camera, but since it's cheap you can only try once, so just forget it. It's a piece of garbage, don't waste your money.

This book was a big disappointment. It lacks depth, has no new information, and is not entertaining - in fact, I'm embarrassed to tell my friends I own it. The only thing it accomplished for me was, ironically, making my job more difficult. As it turns out there are many "self-help" books about finding your true passion that offer much more, as well as numerous websites devoted to this subject.
Just what i needed. Perfect condition. This is the second one I've purchased. It's easy to use and great looking. Great value!

Do not buy this. The only thing it has going for it, is the fact that you can record directly from a camcorder to this device. So even though it's less than $1 an Mbit, there are 2 reasons why I give it 1 star and they both make me wonder if it would be more expensive to get better quality. The price was cheap, however everything on it just about sucked. You cannot control where your recording is.
The film was a fun movie. We enjoyed it. I would recommend the movie to any one who likes sci-fi and monsters movies.
Works great!! Takes about 2 - 3 hours (depending on how much water/shampoo). Make sure there are no dirty spots before beginning.
My mom read this series and we both have enjoyed them. Can't wait for more. Love the characters. Worth reading. Enjoy

I bought this because it is suppose to keep odors from transferring into food. Well, it doesn't. It just gets smelly and looks dirty very quickly. It's a waste ofmoney even if it's on sale, but not worth buying.
Bought a 2TB from this manufacturer recently. Tried using on 2 mac books i have, both crashed within 10 mins of starting up, when accessing over network. Returned for refund.

This product is so poorly made it fell apart when I tried to put the two pieces together and one of these has an aluminum bar through which you have to thread a string. What they did not tell us until we opened was that if your little boy wants anything more then three toys in such thing as this one, his fingers will slip right into them. You get what you're paying for I guess. In saying that, my son enjoyed playing with this.

I got this camera from costco almost immediately after my old olympus digital camera bit the dust. Unfortunately, mine was returned within three days. I had no issues shooting photos, but when playing video on it (at 1920x1080i) it is not worth it. First thing to go wrong with any compact dSLR is image stabilization, and in its defense, I did get a few very blurry.

I liked the idea of being able to take them off when they aren't in use. But it only lasted a couple days and then one by one the "fingers" fell off. The magnets were also not strong enough even though there was extra glue provided for attaching them. You can go spend more for ones with better construction if that's important but I'm just an average home owner who didn't run around with my hands full all day. Too expensive for what you get.
This is a well executed wallet but, after only 2 months, it's falling apart at the seams.
These storage containers are great. I am using them in my microwave, which often has small things (like corn meals) tossed into the pan directly from freezer.

I did not rate this product 5 stars, because the quality and quantity of the bags appear to be equal to other premium brands. The price, however, is by no means cheap, so if these are indeed better value than others, then they may deserve more stars!

Did not work. I had to spend over $60 for the genuine HP printer and refill kit that works well after spending much of my time trying unsuccessfully and then buying this non-OEM cartridge as a last ditch attempt at saving $$. Lesson learned-- do your homework! This product is junk and if you see "HP4200XL' on it's label in any way, don't make me call tech support.... there are MUCH better options out there.
This is just what i was looking for. Good price,good quality, quick delivery,perfect fit. What more do u want.
After trying this product, it does not work. My MacAir didn't detect it, and the LED on it's charger doesn't light. Disappointed.

Not worth the money. I can get a better shave at work. It hurts to use. No real instructions. If you are looking for something really comfortable try going with another brand of shaver. Very disappointed.
This would not fit through belt loops or any other fastening system. I had already placed an order that didn't fit. Not impressed.

I have tried these before and this batch has a taste of plastic no matter how much you try to cut back. You cannot take them apart to see what is left after each sip. This was the first time ever that i had this problem with an Amazon purchase so it must be some issue. Will not buy these again. Too bad. They were great for about 1 or 2 weeks. Not at all like before. Maybe we are used to. Good Luck!
I liked all 3 books, but have found this author has begun writing about same story, over different characters. In fact, only few have been different, which is frustrating.

Not a bad book. The author does do very well in telling the story and is definitely going for a fun read. I can easily see someone making this into an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000.I'd buy it. It's free, right? Well... I'm buying it anyway, because as I said, it's not terrible, has humor and, well, just about everything that you expect from MST3K. If that's your cup of tea, then get on in.

They broke on me and when I put the headphones back together it was too tight inside of them and they would not seal again. Very dissapointing!!! Had to waste a lot of time trying to fix it so I could send back. You can imagine what kind of hassle that is. No way in hell this should ever happen! Do NOT Buy! DO NOT!!!! BUYING...

I bought this book because it said that the CD was included. Mine came with a cassette but only 1 page of information. If you go to the author's web site, you'll see lots and tons more information including downloads for all aspects of Photoshop 10 and the new Windows Phone 7. No where does it say in writing anywhere that there is no CD. So, if you're like me who wanted answers right out of the box, forget buying this. Save your money unless you don't care about it.

I received this item, which was well packaged to prevent any damage. My original adapter gave out and the tip of it broke off. So after searching for a good replacement in Amazon.com, came across this. It looked very like my old one even though the brand tag was missing. It does not work with Nikon D7000 Camera....The camera is new model, it just says battery error!Waste of money...

I was excited to get the kindle edition of this book, as my first language isn't English. The publisher is clearly selling a poorly done translation from another, non-english author. Even with reading in English several pages before, and following some links at once, the book did not work for me. It said that part 2 would be available, so after looking them up on amazon, it seems that if you want chapter one and two combined, then it's all one book. No thanks guys! 
 Rating: 1.

I have owned several WD external drives, the largest one being My Book. After losing all of my data that could not be recovered through recovery software--the worst part is their guarantee does NOT cover backups. At least they still sell them at Best Buy. I've tried a 3rd party backup program and it doesn't work with those either. If you're looking for reliable back-up this drive isn't it. Look elsewhere.

I was very disappointed to find out that this book is poorly written. The writing style seems amateurish and contrived. While the information itself seems interesting, its delivery leaves a lot to be desired. Overall, I'm only giving it 1 star because Amazon does not allow zero stars. My recommendation is skip this book. You can get more info on various sites for free. I will probably never do business with amazon.com ever again.

This is not one of my favorite books; it really missed the mark in my opinion. A couple starts off liking each other but by the end they are both too happy to spend any pages together. They also didn't go out very often.

I was disappointed with this book because of all the spelling and grammatical errors in it. It has caused me to question if anything at all is really a true story. One good thing is that there are stories written from other people's perspective. I'm sure it wasn't easy or flattering for the author but someone just starting out wouldn't have the mental discipline required to do any better. A little guidance would be a definite help.

The cable and connector are good quality but the cable itself is not as pictured. I got what i paid for so don't expect too much from this one. If you like the length of these cables than its all good. If want USB 3.0 then just go to walmart or radio shack and get a long 6 foot cable. You'll be fine with that. For this reason I will now have to return it instead of exchange my order. You get used to knowing what's on your end.
Cheap product, does not hold Ipad up. Very unstable.

I purchased this set as a replacement for my existing T-Fal griddle that got damaged or lost during my move from California to Montana. While it was cheaper then the local stores and seemed like an identical model, once using it, one could tell the difference between them except one. The new model has thicker stainless steel pans which you must be careful not to ruin by putting on burner hot after using.

As a long time lover of the series, I was deeply saddened by this book. It felt like nothing new had been added. While all fans knew there would be major changes, most have hoped for only minor details. Maybe because they were told so many times that the characters got back their memories, it's quite obvious in some ways they're not living up to that. If you're looking to see what's next for Sookie, then read this, but if you've already started reading these books, you could do without it.

I was using an old one with only 2gb of space that gave up after a few year because then it started acting strange and not being recognized. When I upgraded to this new one, in addition to the added capacity, my camera has worked so great, it's much better, clearer than before.
When this book came out years ago -- no longer than 10 pages or so at BEST --- we gave away copies when visiting friends during the holidays.

These were okay, but did not last very long. I had them on my iPhone 5 for about two months, when one got scratched. It was easy enough to remove from the phone, though. And they aren't overly expensive.

This is a beautiful kettle and it boils water super fast. My problem with this appliance is that the base cracked after 2 months of use. I would not have expected to crack any part if you handle a teakettle too lightly but having dropped it on to my countertop once (I live alone, so it's certainly an awkward feature) was probably over-doing it. And now the enamel has chipped off in several places. The inside coating looks fine. :-( I'll fix it, though.

The product came nicely packaged and undamaged. I was disappointed to find that the top portion of the canister is not metal but plastic. It didn't even fit into my vacuum as a standard can. There were no instructions at all in English, just pictures of what you can't see. Very disappointing. I'm looking for replacement canister(s) now. :(
The sound was bad, even at highest volume. The base could hardly be felt. I'm actually embarrassed to display these.
The kindle won't stand up anymore. This isn't good so it's going straight back.

Wonderful flavors - not too sweet. Would definitely recommend to everyone who uses protein powder. I've tried almost all the products from BulkSupplement, they provide an amazing variety of healthy natural products... well worth their cost. They give samples in their stores too...

The product description states the following: "This book does not contain any of Ms. Kleypas' previously released titles - this is a reprint with no changes, but most importantly it has none except for an additional page at Chapter One and one sentence or phrase change in all 50 chapters - that's it. Even though they are titled separately, these short stories appear as separate books so buyer beware!" It should be more precise. If you have collected many Linda Lael Miller books, don't buy this.
i feel like it was more a diary than anything.the book lacked flow and there were no real conclusions for me to take home.

This is an excellent product when you use in the oven. It makes it possible to cook casseroles and other dishes that take a long time to bake. And my favorite baked bean recipe turns out even more delicious using this pan. I put some water in each cup just before adding baking soda, which eliminates clumping, and then add my batter. It bakes up perfectly all around - no big globs of liquid left over. The pan heats evenly also, without getting hot spots anywhere.

The material seems to be a decent quality..But the sizing is off! I ordered my normal size and it was soooo tight that i didn't even bother trying it. If you need spanx for your bust this isn't it! Even if you have small chests! I'm not happy with it. Just sad because i love my other amazon items.... So dont just trust me!!! This item may fit someone differently :(

This was too long. I'm glad it is a series of books. I didn't feel the story kept me interested enough to continue it. There were parts that I skimmed over, which could be seen as positive. As opposed what some others have said where there will only a half or less book. For instance, it's over 400 pages until the end and you still don't know what happens to them. So in this way it keeps your interest throughout all four stories.
The book was not what I thought it could be. It was a good price if we didn't have so many other books to choose from. Not my first choice of books.

I enjoyed this book. It was a fun easy read and the characters were funny. And it is an original plot that had me entertained. My only complaint about this book would be it needs more background information on what the title means. Not so much in detail either, just enough. Other than that, it's really good. Just like all of his other books. If you want something to light up your day pick up The Devil Wears Prada. It's hilarious, cute and quick read. 
 Rating: 4.

No it does not. Its just a generic cheap knockoff. I purchased these for the low price so did not bother to return. However one of each ear bud came with no rubber cover at all. Very disappointing and false advertising. And after only 3 weeks use they are shot. Not worth returning. So basically its more hassle than it's worth. It took almost 5 days for delivery. A good thing that those reviews that say it works for them were correct. The one earphone on two separate sets didn't work.
There's enough great live songs online for free.

I am so glad Amazon has the new version of these. It's only a matter of time before they make more and less available. I've bought two packages in case something happens to my old sets. The packaging is great for shipping them as well; no breakage...

I would highly recommend not purchasing the Kindle version, or at least wait until more editions become available. The content is good except for what everyone else has said, which about sums up this work quite well. On pages 5-6, it states that "reading time in most parts of the world today can be measured by a single hour!" That should have been my first red flag and resulted me to never purchase (or pay for) the book.

My wife asked me to order this replacement phone for our Panasonic phones, and the price was great compared with other listings. The product arrived on time in an OEM box inside a large cardboard box, but unfortunately it didn't include an AC adapter. It turns out that most folks don't want extra wire hanging everywhere, especially if its going into a wall. So we bought one locally at the auto parts store so she could get started.
This is another one of those books that doesn't go on long enough to draw me in.

If you only want the song "I'm Gonna Find You," fine. This is not a very good collection of songs, all with different versions from various artists and some have the same title as another version. Not worth it. They need to just list which version they are singing. It's misleading. Very disappointed! I listened for awhile, looking for at least some variety. Don't waste your time or money. Better in stores where they actually play the songs.

i love the story line but it wasn't as good compared to other books I have read from this author. i was excited when my book came sooner than expected and that is why it got two stars instead of one. I still recomment amazons books though. I always get a great deal. Amazon never disappoints me!

I purchased this book to help me prepare for an upcoming test. The information is outdated, incomplete, and incomplete. Some of the materials are simply wrong. It often contradicts common sense when it comes to drug testing procedures. This book does not measure up to it's reputation. Save your money.

I have been a fan of the show for the past 4 years and this movie is so bad it borders on being unwatchable. If you are looking to buy this flick then i recommend. If not stay as far away from it as possible. It does give some brief tid bits about what life was like when they were all at Hogwarts, but otherwise has nothing else going for. Don't listen to any hype by people who just don't get it.

I was a big fan of the first book in this trilogy, but not so much with Book Two. Like most books there are many twists and turns that keep you reading to see where it may lead or how it all might end. Unfortunately like some readers, by my third chapter i thought "this is going to be one of those books" well I am here to tell you, if you're still struggling then just stop reading.

I bought these hoping to get a good audio quality but was very disappointed. For an earbud of this price one would expect the sound at least not be bad. And even for my $8 Sony headphones they are way better. I do like that it's adjustable. But over all very disappointing. I'm going back with the iPod regular ear buds.

Bought this to replace a 5 year old Seagate 2TB WD My Book which died on me. First off let me say the box it comes in is well designed and attractive. It feels sturdy, but has very minimal protection around it. The first thing I did was pop some pictures from my cameras onto it, tried backing them up wirelessly via USB.That went well. After that though, things didn't go right at all.

I love having the option of either setting this item up on my dashboard or hanging it from a window. The suction is strong enough to hold for even days without adjustment. Very easy and convenient. My first set also came with an extra mounting pad so I'm happy that we won't have to buy one as often. Definitely recommended over many others I've tried!
this is a sweet song, I love her voice, will use it as my ringtone. i recommend the song for those who enjoy smooth voice.
This was exactly what i wanted, perfect size.
Great product. Very well made. Well insulated & very useful. I wish it was a bit larger - just the right size.

I purchased this book after reading other reviews. For a person who has been studying the Bible for over 15 years, it was an okay book, but did not help to "convert" me. Most of what she said in the book(s) is just common sense like "Be patient with God". There didn't seem to me much scripture or scriptural basis from which we can learn anything about doing anything we need to, as far as how we are supposed to.

The characters were flat and uninteresting. I never became attached to them or cared about what happened next. And it had too many scenes that bordered on unbelievable. This book has nothing interesting enough for you as an adult read other books with the same premise. You'll have fun, though. It's a great beach read. Enjoy!If you're looking for a good read, this book definitely isn't it!
I ordered 2 of them and both had bubbles in them. Both were very disappointed! But the service was good on their part, so i would not hesitate to order from this company.

I have to agree with the other reviewers that this novel is not up to the standards. If it is a sequel for some reason or if there was only one book written then why are characters introduced from previous books mentioned when they didn't even exist in previous books so it's pointless and annoying. If you liked the first two novels and want more then don't read this.
I'm a fan of the original movie as well if not better. This was just like I remembered watching it when i was younger. Cute movie... and it's nice to share with my younger daughter.

The item arrived promptly. It is not the color advertised nor does it look like picuture. Very disappointed at this purchase, should have ordered a diffferent one. I sent an email asking to return it. Hope i will be notified of my options. Disappointed. And it cost too much for these type things. Wish they would give you credit with only half return. Don't remember if I even received the refund, as I sent them by email.

Not a great book. I didn't think the book was as well written or good enough to have won awards. It's ok. One of those feel good, fluff reads that you're just glad you finished it. Don't expect anything great. And definitely don't use as your main source. The facts weren't all correct, but at least they were in context and interesting. It doesn't really help me solve my homework problems though. ;) But that's not what this book's about. Worth reading, especially if you're looking for something easy.

I wish it was a real book, not just a picture book. Just pictures does make you feel closer to the characters. And my kids liked it. They read every few days or so, but they are 4 and 7 so perhaps it's better for older kids. My daughter likes most of her books but she didn't really like this one. It did keep them occupied while we were waiting at the doctors office, though. She's still asking "when is part 2?"   Rating: 2.

This book was just ok. There were a couple points that I had to look up on the internet as this information is not available in English on the internet. Also, the whole thing about you having multiple partners all at once and having sex in a shower with your boyfriends friend if he sleeps around also seems really far fetched. Overall, maybe it's okay to read when you're depressed but otherwise don't waste ur money or time. You might be pleasantly surprised...

So I love books based in the Caribbean or on a tropical island like Jamaica but not this one. The storyline is weak and boring. We have heard that women are often abused by their partners as well. But even being so many years after these events, there's little point to it at all. The characters seem flat -- too much of them are just there for filler.

Just like everything else with Amazon, I am amazed how much i can get in one shipment. I always seem to need a few of these things since they are so handy... The price is great especially compared to Wal-Mart. They last about as long as the other ones I've been buying. I'm very happy with my purchase!

The book is about an 18 year old woman who after getting out her college job decides its time to get back in and leave California for Chicago. She has no home experience or connections, just enough money to buy a house from a couple she meets at the airport. Then there's some drama thrown in.

Had to replace the batteries before even using it. Don't think this will get any longer than it does because of this. I'm just thankful I didn't lose a lot when something did happen! Would not recommend buying this! Going to try and find one that stays on without batteries? You would have done better for your money paying extra and maybe getting 2 or 3 good use out of it!

This product has been great for me I really love it! But when the price got so high and then just after a month started to crash down like crazy it was horrible. It went from being half of what I payed that time to nothing. Very disappointed! Never again! Only good thing about is the shipping though. Everything else goes out with that! :( Hope this review helps somebody too! Good luck! :)

I bought 2 of these cables. One stopped working after only a couple weeks on the first one. It didn't really matter to me that it was more fragile as in cheaper. The second one has begun sporadically and intermittently failing. Its not just me, my friends are having trouble with them too.

Like most people here, I read this book at the end of a very stressful week of trying to get our daughter on some meds. The first couple chapters really make you want to cry. That should not be what we are aiming for. But then, just as you're thinking that if it's going to happen, do something different (like move from Florida - but with your husband and dogs) or start doing something new, he takes off again into new ground.

I am very dissapointed to say this, but I had to give this book just one star because of the excellent photos! The recipes themselves are not that great. My son really wants me to try these, so I'm going to do my best and make them. But it will likely take many different amounts because he hates sweets.

These don't work, they fall off and get lost easily. They are very cute - BUT I regret buying them. A waste of money. Unless you're only using them for one day, don't buy! For regular use, find something better!

I bought a set of these at Wal Mart and they broke in the very first wash. There is nothing to hook onto your faucet so you have two pieces that come apart making them useless. Waste of money! You could get something about the same value even with one piece missing. Do not buy if it will come apart! Very disappointed with these products.

the title made me think, this is about how to be a woman. The author was on drugs in her mind when she wrote this book. If you're feeling that way and you just need some ideas of how to live better with yourself read this. It's not worth buying.

This was the first book by this author i have read. It had a good storyline but did'nt draw me in like his others. I hope he continues to write many more books of these types. He should take out all those sex words and replace them with good conversations.

It didn't work and we tried to charge it over night. Nothing happened. I can't tell you much about it. Maybe if the power goes out we'll have more luck. We'll see. I loved Season 1 and was excited to get season 2 but this one is horrible. It almost seems like each episode starts with the theme music of the episodes played over again. This disc contains episodes 10 (Family Ties), 13 (The Beginning! Part II)and 14 (Ringing For Helen).
Read reviews - it looks perfect as a basic multimedia player. Unfortunately, after installing the software, Windows won't recognize it's installed.

This product is completely useless. It has no power at all and doesn't clean well at all. Even if it worked for my room I wouldn't use it. I wish I'd returned it. I'll go with a different brand next time. If you want to get the best one, you'll need one that actually works better. That way, it's worth buying in the end.

No reason to buy this except that you want all of the other movies because you like them too. It would have been better if they included a digital copy at least. This case is so incredibly large that it took a very smart and determined man to put his iPad in. He actually had to get help getting the ipad in there. I would not encourage anyone buying this one. You have been warned.

I love the way it looks, but it just doesn't protect anything in my backpack. It is too small and has sharp edges. I've had this for 2 months now and today I finally took off the top to wash it. The snap just flew apart and not a drop stayed inside of it, so I'm returning mine. A waste of money! :( bummer. I'd rather give $15 more on something that feels better... And also wouldn't you know it, I went ahead bought two more cases.

I bought a package of these. About one in five cartridges leaked ink during installation. The other ones seem to work but have lots of issues with the black toner. Some colors are fine after cleaning but for some reason they always leak ink. These will be going into the trash. Do not buy.

I received this unit via Amazon today, and upon turning it on, the right speaker is blown. This shouldn't happen in what should be a good quality product. As of now, I'm currently trying to contact Yamaha support. Hopefully we can resolve the problem, but it's not looking good. I wish I'd read reviews before buying this stereo. There seems to be some serious design flaws with this...and unfortunately I'll have to start researching an alternative.

Well, if you have not seen this film please watch it. I like watching bad films and in most places my standards are pretty low. But since the movie is so bad, it deserves nothing better. It was hard to imagine a worse character playing him. The plot stinks as well, very predictable. Even what little good writing there is goes over the top by having scenes with blood being splattered everywhere.

This is the best version of Alice in Wonderland. I love this play but it can be a little corny so it's good for people with really low standards because it keeps you entertained. The music isn't that great and some actors are pretty lame especially Michael Crawford as Alice. There's not much else to say about it. It's like being stuck on an airplane listening to someone talk at you. Some songs make me want to jump up & dance.
Love This Stuff! Especially when you don't have time to cook and this is really fast!!!!

The first few days that I got it and used it, this product was great. It charged my iPhone as fast or faster than the original apple charger. Then after a month of moderate use over 3-4 months, all it would do is maintain charge. It's worthless now.

You guys are doing yourselves a big disservice. I love this movie and read the book like 4 times. And if you think someone who made such a film deserves to receive all of your $. The book jacket promises that the stories will come from "the horse's mouth and with the authenticity of an old friend reminiscing," and, more accurately, a dog who has been told to take notes by its owner over 20 years ago. Some stories.....all very predictable. There were many situations in which I kept asking myself, where would these two meet next, how could they possibly get together, etc.? Not particularly believable, nor interesting.
They are much smaller, and not as nice. I got these for my son in his party bag and they were way too small to use anywhere but a tea party. So this is my opinion, the picture is very decieving.

It is okay for a little gift. Would get again if price wasn't so good.

Don't waste your time. There is nothing in this book to help you. If you have ever used a computer you'll find it ridiculous. I just received this. I'm not impressed at all. It is actually larger then it looks in the photo. The top will take a very long time to heat and be able to cool down by itself with out cooling from outside. And finally what do you say when someone wants hot dog for lunch. You don't need this. It's not warm enough. If your going to buy one, get big so u can put alot of buns on it. Just like an over priced toaster.

This is a very confusing book. It's about four characters and I found it hard to even keep everyone straight because of the lack of character building. Then there was almost no romance. The sex scenes were ok, but they weren't really all that steamy. It got too depressing after awhile, so I'm not sure we'll be continuing with this series. There was one scene in which she just lets go of her feelings for him, yet he still decides to sleep with someone else.

This was my second purchase of this product. I love it. The best part is that it does not take up much space. It also fits perfectly in the cabinet door. For quick and easy breakfast you cannot beat this. I would highly recommend purchasing one to replace an old one. We had a Sunbeam for years which just plain died. Hopefully this will make at least 10 years!

My husband and I purchased this as a Christmas present. It worked for about four days then broke. The screen will not turn on when it's plugged into the computer. We contacted Sony tech support who told us that it would cost $140 to get warranty work, because we had been outside of their 90-day free "1 year manufacturing" policy. I feel like I've gotten exactly what they promised - nothing. A complete waste of money. Do yourself a favor -- don't buy this.

This item did not work. I wanted to return it but the time had pass and I tried connecting a new computer. It kept giving me problems trying to install it. I ended up just using my old USB 1 hub. Don't waste your money. If you have an IOGear product they are great. But this is a very cheap made product. I don't recommend buying any of their products. Spend another $20 for something decent. In fact if there were no negative reviews I'd give Amazon 10 stars in reviews.

This book wasn't even readable - I had to go back and re-read some of the previous ones as a refresher or an idea for new plot lines not found in this one (like, how does he manage these people when every couple hundred pages his girlfriend cheats on him). It was so bad that I'm done with him. But I can't be mad at him all because I've enjoyed most other books. At least it doesn't cost much.

They were too long, so when worn, the bottom left hand side of my foot hit and rubbed against a metal plate on my shoe. I was extremely disappointed! Will never buy them again. Going to try getting rid of it. Would not recommend unless you have tall feet.

As other reviewers mentioned, this item is a great idea that doesn't work. It just plain does not work, and Amazon wouldn't take it back because it's in China. I would have given it zero stars, but you can't do that. If you're looking for anything to fix your iPad's charging problem, buy this. Otherwise, steer clear like the plague.
These are extremely cheap quality, nothing like they appear. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY buying these bed sheets, just go to walmart and by some decent sheets!
Item worked well. Price good. Fit as it should. It will take some time for the rain season to start here in Ohio.
I couldn't put this down...love all things "Irish Spring.

I was disappointed with this book. It covers a lot for just one person in order to provide easy to follow directions. There is almost no information how to.the tools that she uses. If you have a professional photographer of whom you are teaching then I would highly recommend her books. Not really helpful if you're trying to understand the "how-to."

For the price, these work fine and are pretty good quality. I can't really say there is nothing wrong with them because of the low price but, you can expect all kinds of breakage as mine did. There were two main issues. First, when using these, the plastic tab to close one end that covers it just pops out easily even though it's a tight fit. You have no idea if it's still closed or not after you're done.

The first one I received would not allow the iPad to wake from sleep. It could sense that it was on but wouldn't turn on. But Amazon quickly sent out a replacement. After about 4 months, with light use, my 3rd Targus failed. I'm done. I've switched brands now - Anker has worked for several weeks and is working well.
This came as advertised.
For the price it's more than worth it. I've needed one like this, so glad I bought a new one. Thanks amazon!!

The plot starts out okay, but from there on out, it is pretty bad. I cannot see how this book was published. It would have to be some sort of joke. Please don't spend the money for this. You will only wish you could.

Not only do this things look great and sound great, the bass is amazing!!! they are very comfortable to wear, but after about 30 days I got a short in them where they connect into your iphone or ipod. Don't waste you money on these

These were great speakers until the power button stopped working. We tried to use it with batteries but that wasn't going well either. Now it's just a blue flash light and that's about it. I am very dissapointed in this product especially since my kids are so excited when we pulled out their new earbuds. I'm returning mine, even though there isn't any kind of warranty on it. DON'T BUY THIS ITEM!!!

The book is an excellent reference. However, the kindle version of it sucks. There are no maps or a way to turn text into pictures without taking you back to first page. I can look up info on maps by myself - but there's gotta be something. What good does this add for me if I can't refer to?? Not very happy.
Ordered an 11.5 Wide. When they arrived this shoe did not fit. They were returned. Very disappointed. Had high hopes for these, but sadly disappointed with them and didn't make it out in public :-/

I got this for my son at college. It wasn't as exciting like other games. It's very easy to play. Only one type of game that has a lot to do with the game. Most games are not fun or have too many steps. He prefers some more action. I'd say it's an OK game, but maybe there was alot going on I didn't see. Good buy if you need it in the college library. There were not any issues with shipping. Shipped fast. Thanks Amazon.

I got this hoping to use it in my car but there is no way to adjust the volume of both speakers together. The sub woofer puts out a low hum on any sound except bass and when listening to music its even worse. As soon as you power down or switch inputs, the audio goes completely dead. You must unplug all sources simultaneously just for these two speakers. Just to be clear, we turned off every other device using my computer while turning those off.

If you're going to create a novel based off of this great story, do it right. My daughter and I have seen the animated movies several times. They're fantastic. It's easy enough for adults to like them on their own merit. However, Disney went far beyond what was shown in these films. This is not an accurate telling at all.
These are by far the best quality and most durable dog toy I've found. I don't feel like they should be $25, but that's just me.
Great product great customer service.
I purchased this book as we are currently on a trip to Rome. It is beautiful and well written.

I bought this book back in 2005 after finding it used and new at a secondhand store. The author is to be commended for doing research into the history of music from its creation to the present day. And his analysis of what works are or aren't best known as part of an artist's whole oeuvre adds some interesting points relative to music by composers who did not live during the 19th century. But that's where the compliment ends.

I had the same experience when we first bought it. It only plays about an hour before having to be restarted. The remote was fine but it's not much fun if it freezes like that. For a $140 player you do expect more. If any other reviews are good then they must have been written by people who work for Sony. Very disappointing sony! Buy something else.
Another great role for Ford.

Our kids play in the pond to cool off all summer long. We had been putting it off, looking for something better looking. These work great! They are lightweight enough so they don't damage delicate water lilies, but strong enough not too bend very well.
Great grinder. Good quality. Makes excellent coffee.

I bought it for a trip to South Africa and Africa. It worked well but could be made much better with more rigid material or maybe some kind of strap. The zipper tab broke on the second day when packing it. It's really cheap plastic. This was my first (and only) camera bag, so don't expect anything that will last. If you want something rugged and dependable, I'd spend a couple extra bucks at Best Buy. Otherwise, this one works.

I've tried using it on multiple surfaces both wet and dry, with various liquids. I have also poured directly into the cup. It doesn't work. I really wanted to like this case, because even though it's listed as a case for the T2P, it looks great in pictures. Once you get it, though, you'll quickly understand why not. No matter what you do this protector will create bubbles that won't go away. After placing all 3 sheets as instructed nothing works on any part of screen. The company has tried to help over phone but doesn't seem to work. Do yourself a favor and pay $23 for an Invisible Shield instead.

Excellent product. Easy install. Great sound,no buzzing at all, would highly recommend. My girlfriend loved it, she loves me much more now. Highly recommended. Works well with both our guitars.

The product arrived very quickly and was in excellent condition. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good quality case for their Nook.
