I really like the colors of this case, but it is not very protective for your phone, just as a cover.

Great product! I was initially concerned about the sound quality but everything sounds fine. The mic works fine and it paired with our android phones nicely. We have not tested out the NFC or anything else as I'm still in need of a new battery since this puppy has been on for over 1 week. It's very comfortable to wear even when it's around my neck. Very satisfied. Thank you Amazon!!
This movie was done almost perfectly for me. Not my typical type movie, which made the acting exceptional.
The product did not match up to other filters we ordered at the same time.
A very quick read which left me somewhat bored. Did not live up to the hype of a good book. The ending was no surprise.

The product was not the original version even though it said new. I bought a new one at Wal-Mart. Not to happy with this. If you're giving me this used like new, then just ask for the original. It's going back. There were other reviews that told what happened on mine so there is no way I'm keeping it. My kids are still laughing all about it! Thank you. No need to waste my time. Merry Christmas! &# 9825; sorry to say, but it's what happens. 
 Rating: 2.

Not quite as I hoped it would be - the fabric wrinkles terribly and doesn't look well at all... don't recommend for anythign but decoration in an office or bedroom. You definitely can't count on this being even usable. In addition, while all of the buttons are very soft to touch, there's a little edge that you feel every time when typing or pressing them. A very poor design. If you're looking for real protection against anything harder than dirt, water, etc., not worth it.
It's just a simple cover. But it fits perfectly and makes the screen less scratched. Worth it's price, especially for kids. I recommend this.

i wanted a good read after reading a lot of reviews I went ahead and purchased this book. The plot was fine but the book seemed to drag on too long. Every time I would get in trouble an argument or something else that could happen, my kindle kept resetting. And sometimes there were typos throughout. Overall it wasn't that well written. Could barely finish it.

These lenses suck they should let people know when buying the lens that it is made out of plastic not glass, so in my opinion, dont waste ur money. if anyone has contacts do NOT use them with these lens.

I had this book for a short while. If you are looking to get involved in the Catholic Worker movement, look somewhere else. This reads like someone's very long rant about their experience and it leaves out so much detail it's not even worth reading. For instance, chapter 9 on "Leadership from the Inside" does not say anything helpful at all. Just quotes of other people's comments, with no references. The only references I found were by the guy who's first name starts with "D" or "E.
Love them.

I agree with another reviewer's concerns regarding the use of this product. These gloves are listed as 'non-toxic,' yet they contain a heavy amount of formaldehyde, which is carcinogenic to children. The smell from these can and will harm your child even if unintentionally. I'm in contact directly with the manufacturer, but haven't heard back, yet. Perhaps it was some kind of misunderstanding? Regardless, when purchasing these, please research the potential effects on children and then consider using them appropriately.

I'm not impressed. There were no instructions. The quality appears cheap but for $5 what should. It doesn't seem as loud as some other reviewers. Overall, for a $15 item, don't expect too much. It's only $12 so go ahead if you like music that sounds really tinny.

This is my 2nd one of these. The first lasted 10 yrs for our lab mix, so we went again. Our other dog was smaller (about 30 lbs) but he kept tipping the bowls. I'm pleased also because this is made pretty well (none have broken, chipped or broken yet) and looks nice.

This is my first tablet and it worked ok for a couple of weeks before i started to have problems with it. The wifi only works in specific spots such as the corner near by or on different levels depending how you place it, which basically means its useless!!!And this happens just over 1 month from purchase, and im returning it tomorrow. Also the screen freezes often during operation, even after changing some settings. I regret buying two tablets within about 3 months of each other.

I picked this product up at another store, but I'm writing a review here because it is so horrible that Amazon makes you give them credit cards. For the record, my husband and I have been using various kinds of litter boxes for years, without any particular complaint. We love our Litter Robot -- and I've never had problems with odor, although if you've given one as a gift like we did, it's very likely they are accustomed to how certain chemicals work in those boxes.

This review is based on the original version, which was published by another publisher. I don't know who decided to publish this, since it's more like a pamphlet than any kind of actual book, but be sure you check your copy that you've received before you order this one. The contents are completely unoriginal. These kinds of suggestions - try drinking some red wine, get in touch with your inner writer - have appeared previously and probably better, from far superior authors such as Dr.

The only reason I gave this book one star is because of the author's extensive research on military and other weapons. There were several times when I'm fairly certain that he was basing his "fact" incorrectly. For example: He states that an average person would die every 10 minutes, based on information that an internet search will show. Yet during the Gulf War in 1991, according to a report for CNN, there were roughly 200 deaths per day.

First and formost, I have owned two of these. The first one lasted 4 years, it was getting a bit fuzzy so we decided to buy another for my mother. Unfortunately after using my own wireless mouse, the unit itself suddenly started doing funny things (scrolling down, or in other words not clicking at all - as if something is missing).
My cats took a few minutes eating this, then went right back to their regular food. Don't know if they hated it or not. A total waste of money.

I don't know why, but this thing is a nightmare to use. First you have to load it with water, then put in the beans, and finally you pour them into your brew mug just as you're supposed to. It's awkward & messy. The coffee isn't bad though. It might be cheaper at the market than buying this, but I'm sure it's better. And you can get something comparable that will last longer for cheaper. This one broke while brewing our first cup. All I'll say is this: good luck.
This protector works exactly as advertised. Just what we needed in the office where tablets are used all day with multiple programs running. And its less than half price!
This little radio works very well for listening in on weather reports while out camping.
The product is very good but the delivery was a bit slow. I hope this is because of our location.
An extremely short story with very few pages.

This piece of crap doesn't work at all.... i put the battery with a proper amount charge, connect it to my iPad2 and nothing... waste of my time buying this,... stay away from it! If amazon will take this back,.they have no choice,..now i know why I love doing business w/ amazon.com
Like some other reviewers, I discovered that these things could be really bad for you.
Bought it for my daughter as she is trying different kind of bread making. She likes it's ease use & convenience. Glad we came across it.
If you need one, this is exactly what you want. Nothing more needs to be said. And it's made here in America.

This book had a couple of pretty funny moments, but overall, if you are trying to decide whether or not you should get the book, DON'T GET IT. It might be okay, but... Just so much swearing? That was really unnecessary. The fact that he keeps referring back and saying things like, "yeah, they were all kinda hot for me actually" about every character is just plain annoying. I mean he's basically telling you what it's going to be.

I was looking for a book like this one, The Ultimate Guide to Natural Healing and how you can incorporate elements in life that align with healing principles, etc. That said, Dr. Weil is highly respected in natural medicine field so it took me awhile but the title made me hopeful since I thought perhaps other authors would have more than just one or two chapters on each subject. Nope, not the case here. In fact most concepts are repeated over many pages.

It only worked the first time. The sound quality did not come through. I think that is because all of those speakers were mounted inside cabinets,so at least one was blocked by a cabinet when put in. Also very disappointed with Amazon customer service.

These are lightweight little drills but they don't feel cheap. I would say that for under $20 each, this is pretty good quality tool. My son uses it alot to fix things. He is 13 years old now and he has no complaints.
I ordered two (2) of these bookshelves for my daughters bedrooms. They took some time to assemble. This requires an additional person and many tools.

There was never a doubt for me that this would be a bad movie. I thought there were few original ideas but the execution of those ideas are terrible. The acting is bad, plot and dialogue poor, sound effects horrific, special FX's awful. One can only imagine the movie cost what it did to make, because even if you got rid of most everything wrong, some bits you'd leave in place, you've lost 90% of your budget.

Don't buy this item, its junk. It's cheaply made and I should have seen that the price was to good to. Mine didn't even work. Save you money and buy a better one. If it sounds too good to be true it's definitely not

As per my order history:1 - Received the battery as ordered2 - Plugged in charger plugged into an outlet3 - Turned on camera and immediately it said that "charging is not supported for this item." The charge status didn't change.4 - Changed batteries back to original Panasonic battery/charger5 - Placed new batter pack in6 -Took a picture with flash ON & OFF while pressing the shutter button.

I like the sound that it makes when it's plugged in, but have to keep messing with its position in order for me to hear the actual sound... and I'm not sure if that's just my unit or the product. It's a nice little machine, though. Don't regret buying it. Great price... would recommend it!
It's good stuff at an excellent price. The packaging and service were perfect. If you like coconut ice cream, you'll love this.

I bought this game for my 12 year old daughter. Her first comment when attempting to play is that she likes it much more than the other games we own (Like Zoo Tycoon and Farm Hero). She was actually looking forward to playing it. We are glad she's interested in playing, but I wasn't happy with how hard or difficult it is. Even on normal mode it's very slow going even if you make just a dozen of the animal pictures.

I bought this for my son who used to play drums in his younger days before he was married. He really liked the look of it and couldn't wait until we could take a day trip down south so he could set it up outside. When they were ready he took pictures and sent them out using the motion sensor. After about 2 months later when you turn on both cameras its super easy to setup, connect and, then share it. This is worth every penny that we purchased it.

The game will try to load and then just hang up the game. I have tried everything to resolve this problem. Sometimes you can get it loaded but sometimes not. This is a great computer game, however, if all of the parts are faulty how do they expect people using computers with high specs to play it. There seems no way that this game was tested on an older PC before releasing for purchase. At least it didn't work when I tried.

After being excited for some time about this new book, I finally received an early copy. When the book started to come out, I had to get it sooner rather than later. So, before we went on our trip from California to Michigan, my wife and I drove together through Minnesota to Buffalo at a cost of $500. We came back by car later in the month to Minnesota, where there was almost no traffic because many were going their way.
The print was too small and I didn't finish the first chapter. After that, it was hard going. Probably would have liked it. Thanks anyway. Good luck.

I just received the phone today and all was good until i went to put a sim card in it and realized that my model is not listed as the one recommended but then i notice another problem with it...when you turn off your computer its defaulted back into factory settings and this makes trying and putting Sim cards very difficult which is what we want so if anyone can recommend me on removing the default settings for us please. The first couple of chapters did a great job describing certain points but after that it went downhill from there. I am very disappointed with this product. It never kept a charge for even an hour. The manual says to go through several cycles and leave it plugged in. But at least one battery can't be recharged without the other?! There goes my money :(

I was very excited to receive this set as it matches our stainless steel appliances. However, they are made in China, don't hold heat or cold very well, and can be difficult to clean. It would be better if they were manufactured here, because all items seem to have "China" stamped on them. Too bad, because, otherwise, the size is fine, color matches most appliances, and the shape looks good. As of now, I'm still looking for a non-breakable dishwasher, which is what I've ended up with.
Love this little thing. Now all my stuff is more organized and I can organize myself a lot better. Will probably buy another in the near future!

As a fan of Robert B Parker, I have read just about every one of Parker's books published before his death. There are some books that you have to buy and put aside for years but this is not one among them. The first third or so was the worst I've ever read. It dragged on painfully as Parker seems incapable of finishing anything he starts.
The plastic covers don't fit well causing multiple air pockets resulting in poor signal at best.

I actually had to have one and so got it, but it came in very nice condition just had a little scratch on the back. This is probably due to poor handling when it shipped. Very happy though. Would make this purchase again. Thanks Amazon for making my holidays memorable. And thank you Crate n Barrel great prices and fast shipping. Thank you! Keep up your good work. Love it! Only drawback: there are no shelves or drawers included. Everything else about the bed was fantastic.

this isn't rocket science to follow the directions for assembly. The product itself seems OK, but i had some trouble getting a solid connection, and i don't feel confident that it will hold up if anything goes wrong. I'm not going to use it, it's too unstable when the door is closed.

Well, to begin with, this is NOT a movie worth paying your hard earned ticket money for. Having heard of it for many, many years, I finally managed to see "The Village," starring Sam Neill (who really surprised me), Paul Newman (great), and James Caviezel (a great surprise as well, seeing him play such an odd character), but the rest was just ho-hum not scary. Some parts were pretty cool, if you like watching people walk on ice, pick up strange objects, etc etc.....

I've owned this for a month now and I know most people rate it very highly, but my experience is very different.1) It looks good2) Takes good pictures3) Has lots of controls4) Great zoom5) Small size makes easy to bring anywhere6) Fast shutter response even when subjects are not moving7) Good low light quality8) Low price - under $200 with all these features and more9. Zoom works well10) Uses flash well if you don't use the flash11.

I was very disappointed as there were no extras included and the quality of this version is terrible. It looks like an almost VHS copy from back in the early 90s. Not sure if it will play or not. My wife wants to toss it, but we can't get rid with it. Wish they made DVD versions. Don't waste your money here. Buy a cassette instead. Sorry folks... just being honest.

I have a very small head so I was really glad to find something adjustable as my husband is getting bald patches on scalp which don't affect his hair. However, it did not fit snugly like one would expect of the "Flexcare Men's Scalp Support. The top comes past where you are supposed to, and in trying it both ways, there just aren't enough holes for proper compression across that area.
Enjoyed it! If you like true history you'll enjoy this, but it's also pretty entertaining.
Good product, no problems at all. Easy to put on.

This product is supposed to be "compatible with all Toshiba laptops" which includes a computer running Windows 7. After numerous e-mails and phone calls, no solutions were given. I bought this card for my Toshiba Qosmio X505-Q805, and it would not work from the get-go. The manufacturer has also refused even to admit that there was problem when asking for help. The web site does NOT list this laptop on their compatibility list. They say it's compatible.
This is a really handy product.
This lamp does work. A little tricky on installation, but...works. Unfortunately it's not as bright as you would hope. Not a terrible light.
I bought this to use with my tablet and it was horrible. Too big for the usb port that came on it, but only about 3/4 of an inch in width. What a waste of money.

I just finished watching the film but what is going on with the subtitles?. There was a total of four languages being used, English one would assume. For example at 00:22:00,there will appear an announcer who says about 1 hour 13 minutes,he goes to say this, then comes down another voice explaining that in 15 years time we will be flying around our solar system. What does it tell me...

The product was supposed to be made in Germany. Not made here. I threw it out thinking that it is not worth sending back. It didn't work! This isn't Amazons fault, but my fault for assuming. I'm disappointed and will buy at a store from now on so if the item turns out, then I don't have such high expectations.
The movie is excellent - I've seen all 3 parts at least 10 times.

I'm not going to bother with a summary as most of the reviewers did. First let me state that it has always bothered me, when reading books about WWII or WWII, if there are any factual errors, it's hard for the reader to believe this happened in real life unless you're an expert (like the author's mother).

This book is kind of funny, a bit dark, but still funny. Some chapters have been left out. So you don't know what happened at the end, and some are just not there. And there are a lot of typographical errors in it, too. But otherwise, it was good.

The item pictured (green and yellow striped cover) is not at all what arrived. Very disappointed. They may as well call it yellow. I don't think they even make the same cover in two different colors. Other than that, it's fine. It does NOT fit snugly like my original Dell battery does. If you are looking for a cheap replacement battery, this would work ok. But if you're wanting something that really works, keep looking.

In my opinion, it should be illegal to sell a product as is until the government actually issues you with a license or license in writing that clearly states all of its ingredients. I don't recommend this product. Please save your money for an all-natural, proven cure and alternative medicine instead - which has helped us all. This did absolutely nothing other than make me feel worse about trying one more time after already having attempted it. Take 2 capsules twice daily at night like instructed on bottle. Don't waste your money.

I ordered these thinking they would be a great little replacement for the typical earphones that are too big to fit into my ears. What arrived was a nice package with 3 sets of various sizes. When attempting the smallest plastic pieces (for left and right buds) popped off on each one. The sound seemed ok, but not what I expected from Koss. All this effort because none came close to fitting in any part of my ear. I can't imagine how anyone could use these. Perhaps I'm just weird.

After watching the movie on TV and enjoying it, I purchased this DVD to see how it played in my Blu-ray player. The disc freezes up about 3/4 of the way through, and then all you hear is a sound coming through your surround system. You can't even skip past it; when you're lucky enough not to, you'll go back and watch the whole thing again. What I've watched so far has been good.

The book doesn't really give you what it says on the cover - "10 quick tricks to make your dog eat like a dog." There aren't any great tips here at all. In short, if you're looking for some useful information from this book, don't bother. But if not, I still wouldn't buy it. It probably isn't worth the money being paid here. Just my opinion. :)

I have had my iPod nano 2nd generation for three days and am not happy with the purchase. I'm really looking forward to using it mainly for exercise but as others have stated about short battery life, it's too early in using it (I think just got it) before seeing any improvement over other mp3 players.

I thought it was just me until my son brought home another package and showed me. How much are these, which I've ordered every year, cost? They're about $2/bag. Amazon seems to have them all over the place, don't you think? I'll find out soon, 'cause it's not that easy. My grandson LOVES them, but we can't possibly afford so many of them. And he's almost 4.

This product is a good value for your money. However, there are numerous problems with it. They have two different version which should be used in parallel or on opposite sides of an electrical outlet.

I had such high expectations when it came to this headset, unfortunately it's not working as expected. The mic does work sometimes but mostly the sound coming from my speaker doesn't come through very clearly. All in all, I'm a little disappointed. It was supposed "to be" a replacement for Turtle Beach X12 and I will probably just have an old headset around next time.

This book is an interesting look at the relationship between President Kennedy and his attorney general. When it was written this was, of course, very controversial because of their respective attitudes regarding Communism. That being said, I have to say that while interesting, there were too many references from books on JFK that could not be found in this book.

As a fan of historical romance I was disappointed by this book. There wasn't much to the characters; just didn't get lost in them. The setting is interesting though and overall it could have been really good. Too bad...the book never reached that level.

I bought this after reading a lot of the reviews. While I did have some problems with it at first (poor customer service), everything has worked out great. I've owned this TV for about five years. After four years, I'm ready to toss it. One day -- literally one day, like so many others that I remember from my childhood -- while watching television (on cable) and turned on the TV, there was an unusual electrical buzzing sound emanating from the back half of the TV.

These gloves were recommended to me by a woman in the hospital that I work for. She gave some good advice and after much trial and error these are definitely what she recommended. Not sure why you would ever do well with them!! You can't really feel anything through them. Also they don't stick very well. Your hand will sweat, which creates an extra layer of "frosting" between your skin and the glove. This defeats their purpose. So not a great product.

It's really boring for an adult, but my daughter enjoyed it...I bought this book, expecting to get the one pictured here with 2 pictures that looked sort of like that. What you will actually receive is only just over 50 pages. It's still pretty cool. But not what I thought I'd be purchasing.
I did not enjoy this movie. It was a bit too far out there for me. We also didn't appreciate the heavy use of cuss words when no other language is used. It would have been better without all the.

I purchased a set of these in April 2013 for three different locations. They all seem to be defective and cannot charge the batteries after two weeks use. The first unit was good because it had instructions on how to work it. However, when the second failed within six months, not much more than one month from purchase, the next units that worked began with battery issues right away, although sometimes charging properly or not. When you go through several failures before they are replaced with another new set, this is not acceptable quality.
This was very disturbing reading. Nothing like the authors other novels so far. Not sure what she was thinking? Don't recommend at all.
The title says it all. Not a big fan of it. I think this would be better done for kids. For older teens maybe. It was okay but not my cup of tea. Sorry.

I would give this product zero stars if possible. This is not a toy at all. My 5 year old was so upset to open the package and find out it is supposed to be water soluble candy. There were no warnings on any of the outside packaging about it. We had some from our previous tub before we bought more new ones, but these are NOT good for kids. They have NO flavor whatsoever.

I bought this because of it ability to connect and also my wifi extender. It works. I have not had a chance to try the usb yet as my computer is hooked up over wifi. The only problem that I've found with this item it's very difficult for one person in two different households to configure it. Even when configured by myself without problems at all but if your network has multiple computers or just two users you will be frustrated
Didn't work at all for me! Tried several times to use this with an electrical drill, and found that after 10 minutes I had only got minimal amounts of paint on, not enough to really do much with.

The only thing that is good about this product is the price. That was my reason for ordering it. Now I've gotta get to work and find something else. After 2 days of use in which i used minimal functions, it's already junk. Waste or money since they don't cost very much at all.

There are some helpful things in this book. For example, you can use the phrase "eat your cereal," when referring to small quantities of vegetables. Unfortunately, there is also a problem with this. It has something to do with the fact that many vegetables contain enough protein and calcium--probably too much calcium for most people (including children)--to be dangerous under most circumstances. So, I wouldn't really suggest trying these.

I ordered and received this product without any problems. About 10 days after applying the protector it began to peel off. Also if you are used to a full body screen protector, keep in mind that this is for an HTC EVO 4G. There are 2 layers on it. On one of them there will be "X" cutouts which means you must place it where its supposed to. The other half sticks at random parts around the phone.

The book was great with the exception of an overabundance in foul language and sexually explicit content. I kept thinking would he get it out on this or that subject, but then found myself skipping ahead to see what kind of behavior occurred next. This makes me wonder why I'm supposed to. A major character was beaten very badly by her husband and has never gotten over it. They have 3 children together. She spends too much time thinking about how she'll beat him.
This was a Christmas GIF for my brother and I don't believe he read it because when I did get him to open it, it didn't make any sense. Waste of money. Now he's asking for it. Just sayin....
A few months after buyng the tool i start using it....

Well as title says it didn't fit. The plastic is cheap and doesn't fit the tablet. It's just loose on the tablet. Waste of money don't waste yours if you get this case like mine :P But it's nice color wish i could exchange it.

I bought this based on a description of it as having enough ports for my laptop. It is NOT compatible with HP Probook 4530... and they don't even have any drivers available from HP. After hours trying to get the drive recognized, I sent it back because none worked. For more info about what the instructions don't tell you, read on:This hub will only accept power plugged directly into its own port.

We bought 3 sets of these last fall because we were so impressed with our older set that came from a store in NY. What is up with the new quality control?? The lids don't stay on when you try to close them -- they pop right off while attempting to open them. Also for some strange reason, even though there are no ridges inside the bottom of each container, food gets stuck between the lid and body of the container.
I've bought two of these.

This has so many problems. the screen scratches super easily, I think its one of those plastic screens that gets scratched when you put something on it, but it was just like that. The back comes off..really easy and then it's not a good design. It had more problems than i can count after 3 days of owning it. So in conclusion. BUY A KINDLE FIRE WITH BETTER PRODUCT.

Very nice and very useful. My only criticism is that I wish the top was wider. We use them every day for lunch and love them. They save you a ton of food compared to reusable containers, too. Would definitely buy again. If they were larger though, then I'd give it 5 stars. Highly recommended. I'm ordering two more because we are using ours so often.

I bought this for a christmas present so I don't know how it will hold up if the reciever enjoys it, but I think he is going to love it!! Fast shipping......... Can't wait to see him. Great product. It came when expected and in good condition. Would recommend this seller. Great price. A win win!!! Thank you. :-) :)

What the title says this is a novel that was written in part about an author who had issues with writing. It just seemed like it didn't know what genre to call itself. I guess you have to be into chick lit and romance books but there are so many others out there. The story moved way too slowly. Then towards half of book 2 we got very little action. And lastly after finishing it, I was left wondering how all those scenes could develop into one big love scene.
After two days had to return it. They stopped working out after that. It is cheap junk just like its price says. You still get what you pay for. Not even worth it in case they did work.

My cat absolutely loves this toy. He destroys anything we buy him, but he has not managed to destroy this.. yet. I've seen him play for an hour with it each time I put the ball in his hand. So far so good, have only used it once, very useful tool for trimming up plants and other objects in close quarters.
the story line is lame and they have no redeeming qualities. it was just a bunch of kids being loud in school. i read this book before my son could appreciate life at all. he did not get it.

I bought this for my daughter and it barely fits her phone. Its cute though, that's the only reason why I'm not completely disappointed. My daughter had to take ours out of it's packaging in order to try it, she couldn't even get it on. So don't waste your money!!! Plus delivery was terrible. It took forever because they didn't send us a tracking number, although we have prime so no big deal right? Never again will I buy from them. Very disappointed :(
I had to return these due it not being a true fit, they felt like too small. However, the color and stitching are very nice. Too bad they don't fit.

This was well written and I did enjoy reading it, but it only got 2 stars because the story line was so unbelievable. Why would we expect anyone to go on a trip just for money in their 20's? A good plot should have some surprises thrown in. If the author were trying to write an emotional book with believable characters she failed. Instead this is such an unbelievable story. If everyone traveled around like they do then there wouldn't need to be anything special.

I was disappointed in this book. It didn't seem as informative nor did any of the recipes include ingredients to make. In my opinion, it was too expensive. It's a waste of money, unfortunately. I've tried several different dishes with success - not sure why these recipes didn'twork either. The photos were lovely. Not one I'd share or buy again. My opinion doesn't necessarily reflect on Amazon or the book itself. Thank you. Mary Lou Anderson

I have been using these for 3 weeks now, and the quality is still good, however today when i went to reorder them today, they suddenly jumped up in price by 20 dollars. Amazon was having a special on these, but it seems now nobody else has them. The sound is good like always... if you're just looking for headphones that look cool, go ahead. As far as comfort, this thing digs itself into your head when you wear them, it's awful. But its not so bad wearing earbuds.
this is a very useful tool. it works exactly as advertised. i now have extra space for storing my garden tools. its easy to use. thanks much!
My son loved watching this on my ipad while we were traveling. It was a good price. The characters where just right. No problems..
So far nothing but praise. Good value for the price. Highly recommended. Easy to carry and light weight. Great product that does what it suppose to.

Just read the short synopsis and realized that I've seen this story way too often. Didn't need to spend my time reading her description of other peoples' lives or descriptions. It went on forever. At one point I skipped over several pages because it stopped being interesting. I'm not sure why it's so popular, but definitely didn't find it any better than A Thousand Splendid Suns. That was a huge mistake by me...The first thing we learned is that even if you get free shipping with Prime. Amazon has these things shipped in from China by way of Hong Kong or wherever it's being manufactured. And no, Amazon's service people don't know anything about it at all.

There was not enough in this book to give it 3 stars. It has some good basics for getting started though. If you have never done much home canning before, get this- lots and lots of different recipes and tips. You'll find out where your pantry stuff needs improvement-it's an easy reference guide.
I ordered this for my daughter and she likes it. She is very pleased with the quality, price anddesign of the product. Very nice colors at a reasonable price. Highly recommned.

I got this drive because of the price, but it has been nothing buts a nightmare. At first it took several weeks to get my documents off it. Then after many tries with reinstalls, etc I gave up. Now if you don't mind spending hours trying and downloading data from different sites onto the drive, then by all means, buy one for $20-25.00. I'm only giving a single star because of how difficult they make these things. The company however deserves zero stars.

I had this for several months and it made great coffee until one day the motor refused to start. Had it serviced in August - that has fixed it. But now when we make 3 cups of coffee, its only half full as is doesn't really fill the pot at all with the water used during brewing, so by the time you finish it, your cup is not even warm.

First off, they look like the ones in the picture. Very sharp looking. My son took a bite and found them to be too big for his teeth. A little disappointing. I tried using these at first as well, but not feeling comfortable with my child sucking on something that was plastic. I'm sure it is a good product if you have very small children. We all know, kids can taste things their parents don't know about....

This was not good. Too many plot holes and too little character development. Also a lot of grammar errors such as missing words or wrong word usage. I finished it but only cause I just wanted to see if they ever found the girl that got away. If there's another book in this series I'll read it. There were enough questions left unresolved at this point so perhaps more will be revealed. All in all, an ok read. It does have potential... maybe it'll get better as time goes on.

All the pieces were there, but there was not enough material for one adult to use. Also some parts of the chair and table have sharp edges that could cut someone. The screws weren't long enough, they didn't line up very well, so we had trouble assembling it. I wouldn't recommend it unless maybe you can borrow a few replacement screws. If so, that's what we'll do. We did keep it, because my son got good use out of, however I'm concerned now about safety. It's more suited to children than adults.

This book is not well written to my liking at all. The author assumes that everyone knows the names of things and there are no pictures or illustrations with a sentence description so it doesn't help much if you don't know some of them yourself. I ended up throwing it away. At least others might be able to figure out what they are talking about. Not an easy read!

I gave it away to someone else. Will not come in the mail any more as did mine last year. Have no clue how these people get anything good on line that is priced that much or more. Thanks anyways for taking mine! :-( Don't let them steal your money from you either!!!!

It's not the best, but it's pretty good. The writing is great and some songs are really awesome. The movie isn't nearly as good though. But all in all, its decent. I would reccomend it if your a fan of twilight.

My son loves to read..even enjoyed the Thomas The Train books as a child and it was hard finding new adventures for him. He loved this...until he tried it out on his own...and the book fell apart.. Poorly made book. A few pages came off. Very disappointed. I am sure this won't last long. It's definitely not worth $24. We returned it. What we like about it- small book, pictures of trains & firemen.
This novel was my first Jack Vance reading. It is an enjoyable read.

I really thought the book would be a fun read as other reviews were. But after finishing it, i think this may well have been one of those cases where the author was just writing to "fill pages", and she got in trouble for that.
Really cheap sheets. The fitted sheet is so small, will never make it on my mattress.

I recently purchased this product to replace an old HP all-in-one printer. I've had a very good relationship with HP printers over the years......But I've been thoroughly disappointed by this one. It was extremely slow and clunky to use. And it never printed more than 50 pages before running out of ink. Not only that, but each page that came out, would curl on it's own while in transit from my computer to my print head - making for a wrinkled, almost ruined paper.
Good but not what I expected. A more substantial piece perhaps would be better but it is good for the price.

I bought this book along with the "The Secret Formula for Getting What You Want." After reading it, it turned out that this woman is just another egoist, and no one can do magic to get things they want. She does make statements such as, if you try hard enough, it's possible. But she doesn't say how hard, or even what effort you have to make.

The main thing I got out of this book was to take note of the difference between a'market' and what an artist thinks a market could be. While the writing is fairly competent, it can not be taken as completely self-serving. It seems to suggest that if you give them enough money they'll keep coming, but they won't. There are some interesting ideas there, but they're scattered amongst the clunky writing.

I purchased these at an airport store as a replacement for the earbud headsets. This product was advertised to be compatible with bluetooth devices, and since it came as pictured (dual speakers) I thought I'd give them a shot. They worked well after initially connecting using iTunes, but then stopped working completely about 30 days later. There were no instructions included. I'll keep searching - I've heard that in this day of cheap products you usually get what you pay for.

Do not buy it unless you have a very small TV or dvd player. It's like those "portable" DVD players for kids. Very bad sound and video (blurry). Poor remote too. If I can't return it, I'll put on the goodwill pile right away. You shouldn't waste your money.

I got this book just to get more and better ideas. It was okay, but not as good or informative as the other books I've read by these authors. That being said, there are some ideas in it that have proven useful on short term projects that haven't required a major expenditure. For instance, I'm trying out a "green roofing" project using recycled shipping boxes, my brother is buying local materials for it, so hopefully he'll use one of their tips.

Had the same problem with the second one I received from Amazon. Did some reading online, no more issues for me. If you have any problems just contact the manufacturer and get it replaced. There is an official warranty if purchasing through Amazon though! They also sell replacement covers on their own site too. Great product. Have had them 2 months now. Very happy overall so far :) 
 Rating: 5.0 
 The battery life is amazing. I can use my HTC One all day without recharging it.

This book is very difficult to read. It's basically the same thing in a different language. Not helpful. Don't buy it. You're better off buying another book. One of those will be easier to understand, or at least more logical. What I really have trouble with are all typos or errors. The authors must not know much. I've had numerous problems communicating my meaning after using this book, because one sentence makes no sense.

I was looking forward to the arrival of these sheets for years and finally broke down 2 months ago at a local retailer because they had been on display all summer. They were only $30.00! If your thinking about ordering these, be sure to go with something else. After many washings we now have patches where threads are ripped off every piece. They're coming apart in several places. Some pieces don't fit well. At this point, we've gone through 6 sets.

My wife purchased my husband the first Kindle Fire for Christmas in 2012. This tablet was never fully charged or used much and failed to start on day three. In March 2013, as we were watching TV with our children, there was a loud bang sound. He turned it off, waited about 45 seconds, then put it back on. That seemed odd. When you hit play on your tablet, no matter what app, that page is displayed. But if I press any other icon - like home button, calendar, search function, etc....
After taking for less than 2 weeks, was sick with chest pains. This is my 1st week so hope everything turns around.

We thought it looked nice and we had a high foot board, but after only seven months of use the wood has splintered in several places, making us afraid to put anything on it. If you don't have people or family that are really big and weigh around 140 pounds then this bed would probably last for years. If your wife is small at 5 feet tall you're going to need a new mattress every 7 months.

I'm amazed at the number of positive reviews for this novel. First off, let me say that I am a student and as such work full time with very little free time. In no way have I ever picked up books on my own. And if that's what I had done to gain an education, I'd still be in my twenties today. But it wasn't always like that. Some people are shocked (or angry...but come on...

These pencils write smoothly, have a nice feel in the hand, and don't bleed through thin paper. I am very disapointed with them, however. When we recieved them (Feb 2013), my son immediately noticed they were "yellow", even though it was stated on box. Even after several sharpening attempts, still no change. After reading reviews online here, apparently these are made of some kind of pigment used to lighten color- seems like an afterthought by Finis.
When the cover came, there was glue all over it. After one week, some color started fading on top edge and edges.

The good news is that the book and author are quite prolific on Amazon. If you can wade through page after page of poorly written nonsense about writing books, this might be a suitable text for you. The bad news (for me, more than anything else) is that, in my experience, only people who don't need or care to know how to write books will want to read this. To me this isn't interesting at all since no one really needs an instruction manual like that.

I have read a few of this author's prior and in my view her other books are better than this one. The main female character is annoying, the plot line doesn't move forward, it's like watching someone's daytime soap opera. It's about as well written or compelling as an episode or two from the original Sex In the House. Save your money on these type books. Read Ann Rule's books! A much more engaging, fun read. My recommendation would be buy the series instead but don't waste too many dollars.
Awesome product, very detailed, nice size pieces, sturdy box. Exactly what we were looking for.
This works just fine.

The product was broken in numerous places when it arrived and the lid for holding ice cubes snapped in two. I think even though there is a sticker on the front that says it will hold 24 ounces, it would only really serve 1 pint. But then again, 16 oz. makes enough drink to last you throughout the morning so I'm not surprised by what happened. The container came out of its packaging with cracks all over it.

They are not at all what you would expect. I thought they were an adhesive and sticky back, but it's just a sticker. The color description is also misleading as the pic has a more neon color, when in reality it is much darker. You cannot even tell they're on your phone. Worst part about this product, however, is that there was two air bubbles left after we put them on. We could actually see some imperfections between them.

i am a fan of Michael Connelly and have read every single novel he has ever written. I loved Mystic River, The Black Box, The Poet, A Painted House, etc. I was looking forward to this book as someone who does not care for the detective genre would find it very good. This is one author that will remain on my list from now on, however, if an early first person narration about crime doesn't sound interesting I'll pass. If it's too much gore or violence in his writing, then I'm out.
Bought for kids because it's cute. The sound quality isn't great, very little bass, and you don't have much control if they want music or not.

I got this coffee pot for the price of $20.00 and it is well worth what its paid. Makes great tasting coffee, makes a good cup in about 10 minutes or less. On my old one (which still works) it would take up to an hour on both sides as i heated water. It was time consuming but at least after 10 hours there were no drips from any type of leaking.
This is THE best weeding gadget! It really works.

My wife purchased this DVD the day that it came out, we just couldn't wait to get it. We were disapointed on so many levels. First of all, it's not even a full concert. It's merely 6 songs, 3 songs each from the same song session. The second problem is in several places the camera was zooming out and taking pictures of the backdrop. If you want people dancing behind their musicians, then don't film them at all.

This would be the greatest thing if only it didn't leak. We have used these for years without problem, so we assumed there must not be a defective batch. WRONG! The first time I ordered these, they leaked badly. I've had to make sure that all 6 bottles are upright when filled so as to avoid leaking. There is no way I'd put anything but water in them -- even using two tops. That was why I bought them, and they don't really work well from this angle.

For the price of $20, it is worth playing, even with some flaws, however there isn't anything that makes my first play through. The story line was good and made me care what happened next, but I found myself just clicking through much faster than should have been necessary.

My husband and I are avid readers, but this was terrible. The book read like a bad romance novel with the names changed. There is no character development between the characters, nor was there any sexual attraction. It made very little sense. Would not recommend at all. If you want good romance, check out the Lords of The Underworld series by Diana Gabaldon or even Patricia Briggs if she isn't your favorite author. At least then it feels real :)
This product looks expensive but works perfectly! Great price compared to other products.

This is not a bad book. But, there was no reason for me to buy it, or even open it. I would have loved some photos of the actual buildings. That said, this book will be useful just as my other architectural reference books I've bought in the past. In fact, these are all from the same publisher. There is, however, another way to view what should otherwise appear like a very poor photo book, namely by looking at it through an artist's eye.

The product is good but the company and amazon did not send it to me in the time period they said i would. It's like taking my time waiting for a delivery window that comes and goes because of some kind of government shutdown. I can't believe this could happen. A better system would have been shipped by now. Amazon has been known to ship crap or damaged merchandise so why should I trust them? I'll stick with walmart.

I did not read the size of it when i bought it. I guess you really just pay for what ever they think will sell better than nothing. But a lot of things are not that big. If there is anything to it, then don't waste your money on this one.....

To the point, this book reads like a middle school kid put it together. I bought this based on the description given in Amazon, and am disappointed to say that I've read better books off of Amazon. However, when he begins talking about how all his friends were doing it, etc., well, some high schools might actually have those issues. Just reading through my own history as well as what I know as an adult, it's just not very exciting or exciting.

The product is a total crap. i was in hope of using it for both my Nikon D70 and Sony Alpha SLT. But when plugged into the camera it failed to recognize either camera. I tried everything that were described on webpages but did not work. One good thing came out of it. It cost about $45 total.

I have the older version of this model and it works great. Unfortunately its battery would die far too fast so we upgraded to this, which is not better. Battery life barely lasts 1 hour. And when you go from AC (plug) power into battery, forget about it. Even worse in warmer weather, you lose power. Maybe I got a defective unit but my guess is that these all seem like poor quality units without any testing at all.

For the price, this is a very nice item. The only problem I had was that it does not fit into an apple USB wall plug adaptor. That makes me consider returning it. If you plan to use one with your Apple product, make sure it's compatible before ordering! ( It's worth trying out in case yours isn't) Also, if you're using it as pictured on Amazon (which I'm assuming, since there are two photos of it- but they are completely different), be extremely careful while removing from box.

I love the look of these glasses, however one day while using them was walking out to get something and all three fell off my bed onto a hard wood floor. One literally broke in half. And the plastic is much thinner than they seem on here. They have been glued back together twice now but not sure once it hits those pieces how well they'll stay on. Very disappointed. I'm going spend more $$ for glasses that are higher quality. Not happy at all.
It blocks my wifes signal as well so she isn't able to use her cell phone. This was a total waste. Do not get this.

I had high hopes for this book, and was looking forward to learning how women have gotten their start in the industry. While it gave a few good examples of successful, "no-nonsense" business women, as well as, ones who failed, they tended to focus on their successes without addressing all the struggles necessary to get there. This would be great if you're running your own small company, but really no help at all.

A very big disappointment. I have seen the movie in VHS & DVD and loved all of them. The book was not written with much thought to accuracy or even keeping characters from film history as possible. It's a pity that this has happened because there were so many more movies based on actual historical events. What really upsets me is that you are going sell books at such astronomical pricing when you're telling story behind movies.

I like it but as a single dad the weight and space is important to me, this does hold most of what i need for my work commute and weekend warrior needs. if you have lots of stuff to bring with then get another bag. However I do highly recommend having a good backpack instead of lugging around all your bags....plus its more pleasant on ya back ;) Great price too!

I am so disappointed with this product. This is a new item for me, and as far as cleaning all of the floors in my house on one tank fills up much to fast which means when you use it that tanks empty. It takes me about 5 mins just to clean 10 sq. ft. My Bissell steam cleaner does better job cleaners. Very dissapointed. Next time I'm going back Bissell. Never again will i buy one.

I was happy when the book got to my house however after a couple of pages in two or three tears had already appeared on each page. There were also smudges and indentations so it's hard for my child to read because he can't see what he's supposed to. This product is not worth it.

I bought the set and have been happy with it. However, it now displays an error message that says no disc. The player will not eject a DVD or CD, even when trying to play music CDs in them. This has happened both on a new system installed about 6 months ago by a different brand as well asseveral other discs. Very disappointed since Philips used to be one of my favorite brands. They are going down hill!
Okay game. You gotta beat all the enemies for a good ending. Otherwise I would have thrown it out my window.
Had purchased two other printers before this one.

If that's the best she can do, I don't think that means much for her fans. It's nice to see a new spin on an old story...I really didn't notice that it was written like one of her other books and probably wouldn't be too familiar with most of these stories but it's fine if you appreciate how she's put her mind into them rather than just writing. The story moves fast, doesn't bog down, or even seem as though it's overly preachy.

This book has some good ideas but falls short on getting right to the point. Too many pages spent explaining something that could have been put in a paragraph. For example, what is "energy balance analysis?" That was simply introduced and left hanging. I didn't really notice any change from one page to the next. Also, it wasn't clear when the author covered several different types of exercises; only part of each exercise would be included.
This has work perfectly so far. It does exactly what it says it does. Very easy setup and worked first time.

The book is great for begining learning the fundamentals of web design but its not really helpful at all if you're just starting out. Most books go into more detail and give you some nice tutorials in HTML or CSS using the Web as well which this book doesn't do. Its also very outdated since they've changed their focus to HTML5 and CSS3. They say they released it several months after Adobe published a beta version though so who knows...
The filter system was extremely difficult for me to install, but once installed, it worked as advertised. My water tastes great after three weeks.

The story grabs your interest right from the first page. I love how each character has their own unique personality and takes turns adding that little extra touch to keep it fresh while also keeping you wanting more. The only complaint is that it's too short.
Bought this adapter because our car's AUX output did not have an Aux input jack. This does work as advertised. We use in daily at home with Samsung Galaxy S3 phone, Android Tab 10.1.

I found this movie to be very boring. It was hard to identify with any of the characters. The whole series had no character development. Very little action. There is a reason why it came up as "must see." Don't waste your time unless you are looking for some mindless fluff.
I got this for my son, who doesn't always carry his lunch to school. He has yet to use it - but so far (today) it's just fine. Seems sturdy. Only time will tell. :)
My laptop works great with this battery.
I really like this product. Bought one for myself two years ago - still works great. I've given several as gifts. It has always been in my purse or pocket, so it must be pretty durable.

I have one in our kitchen, we are cooking about 20 meals a week. It's my second cooker of this style. The first lasted 15 years, I can't wait to find another and put it into service somewhere else. We love all the features just turn on for what you want & when done. It takes less time than using an oven....so no more waiting. Great product - if you like slow cooking then buy one!

I bought this to take with me in my purse especially after reading the reviews saying that it was too big and clunky. Well, like everything else now days it's a "design" not what people want but if something is meant for you they do have to design it. It has lots of pockets however only two really are usable one inner pocket on both sides. I need more room so I added some velcro tabs to organize them (velco dots & zippers together).
Not happy at all no longer work after two years :(. Waste of money. They need to stick to sound products.

this game is one of those you have to pass around as there very few that are worth playing. it has some great themes on it, but like any other review says, the story is.. lacking. I played through 3 times just for random things, and did not enjoy them much. In my opinion, its best buy was a copy of the real game, which costs more then twice as much but comes with at least 20 hours worth. If i really had to, this game would be no wort.
Awesome animation just like all Pixar movies. No problem with playability or streaming on amazon. My kiddos loved it! Highly recommend :) And great price too. Would definateitely watch again.

When I received item it turned out was defective. I am attempting to resolve issue with them however and I will give you update once resolved. Please inform me how I'm being taken care of. Thank you,Richard C. Moore

I am still not totally happy with this product. In the past it has been difficult to install but there was no such issue as in 2011. The screen protector is now slightly smaller (maybe 1/3) so when you put that side in, a corner will fall off due to small size and fit of screen. This should get better over time because its pretty hard to fix this.

I love the design and functionality of this product as all you do is connect to your device via bluetooth every now and then. The trouble is it doesn't work consistently with my phone when using skype, only works at most 10 out of 12 times..I've called customer support. They say they are "looking into it" but so far nothing has been resolved. Very frustrating. It's possible because there was not a good manual in packaging, might be different for non-iphone, just sayin.

You see this album on Amazon, click buy now, wait until you receive it to review it. You'll realize that the single Amazon reviewer did not like. Here's what he wrote: "I am writing in regard to the MP3 version of this album.

What a great way to wake up in the morning. It definitely wakes you up. I always slept during the night now I get full rest of the day. You feel relaxed and peaceful when it's on. The sound also works fine just as long as there are no background noises. It's so easy to use. Highly recommend it!!

This book was advertised to be in condition like new but it came with a huge dent on the front and back cover....no one told me this before i purchased it. There wasn't any notes inside either. The cover is all bent up too... not impressed at all! :(

It was recommended to me as a resource for teaching college freshman students. The authors of this book are more interested in making money off the university system than doing their job at helping students succeed academically. Some problems and solutions are given but you have spend another 100 pages looking them up on Google. If you just want an encyclopedia with interesting topics, look elsewhere. This is not worth 99 cents. And I wish Amazon had posted my review so others don't waste their money. Buy something else. 
 Rating: 1.

This product only worked for a couple of weeks, and then stopped working at my apartment in Philadelphia. The adapter is rated up to 100 amps, which means most home appliances would probably be fine, but it did not work fine with mine. When I plug these into the wall,it started off as a trickle charge, almost like plugging something in. Then even though that was happening, It wouldn't stop charging my cell, ipad, or ipod until all three items were fully recharged. Very disappointed.

I was very disappointed to find that not only is this movie in French but it's also a language other than English. It needs subtitles so you can understand what is being said. Amazon sent me an email after purchasing, asking if I'd like the DVD dubbed in English as well. So be aware of that. In spite of this, my 6-year old son loves these movies!

This book gets off and on with no real point or purpose from the beginning, if you pay attention when reading, its ok. The characters are completely shallow cardboard cutouts, they talk like your local high school kids while reading it.

This book was a complete waste of time for me! I thought it would be good, but what happened? When you consider that it's just like every other romance novel, the only reason why you'd still want to bother reading this is if you're into all these things. But I'm pretty sure you'll find better things in your fantasy novels, and those will leave you much happier.

I was excited to try this but ended up throwing it in the trash. It's easy enough with a blender but its very thick and messy. It made my mouth burn and still doesnt dissolve all that well even when i run hot water over it. Would not recommend. You get what you pay for though as other have said. Try a different flavor.

We needed a replacement power cord for our Emerson DV-960R. This does the job but is not as long a cord as original. My only complaint is that it's very hard to push through some holes while unplugging. So far we've been pleased with it.

This was a huge let-down. I bought it as an accompaniment to the book and found they were no match for its prose. Skip this novel and buy one of his others. I've read several over time but think this falls into the forgettable zone quickly. The end made me feel like I'd been bludgeoned, like most everything had happened exactly when you'd expect. Too many people with such similar personalities whose motives are unclear, including one supporting character.
I've been using digital cameras for 5 years, and never once did we ever take camera underwater or use snorkeling without our camera.

I bought this item as a gift. They said they liked it very much. It fits the Kindle well. The color is perfect for them. This was also one of their favorite Christmas gifts and received. That makes me feel sure you won't be disappointed. Thanks! Linda R. Harris, Florida in Florida!!

I could not get into this book at all. As a mother of 2 teenagers who are being taken away from me, this story was too slow going. What happened in the life of every character? Who knew what was going on? Not enough details or description. After reading half way through I couldn't even remember any characters! The book ended with no closure and left me feeling very disappointed.

This album is not worth buying in my opinion. There are so many good albums that it almost makes purchasing this one completely unnecessary. He sings like a robot with lyrics like "I'm never going to give you up" and he actually plays the piano really well..which i have no problem with! But if your into just boring music then by all means spend [money] on this!

I tried and failed several time to install this software. Every time after installation when trying to open the program it pops up in another window. I'm thinking of either removing all programs or just uninstalling it. The only reason I did not give one star is because you can copy files from disk very quickly with Windows Media Player. If anyone has a solution for me I'd appreciate it. Thanks.
The item came without the proper screws and I ended up drilling my own. They are too short to stay in place. Not happy with product at all.

My husband and I needed a way to protect our new mattress. We wanted something that would be waterproof without feeling overly heavy or bulky (that's another story). This mattress protector is exactly what we needed. It's lightweight but protective; you could even say it's like sleeping on air. The price was extremely reasonable for the quality of this cover. There are cheaper ones out there at local stores such as Ross, Petsmart, etc.

The box of the headphones was not sealed and was missing a set of earpads. There should be several more pairs in this box. I hope to find at least one set. As far as sound quality, they are great, but if it is already used, you need to mention that fact. Thanks. James J Smith
I'm an 80's fan & every song from all time will be played. Thanks for such an excellent album through out the past few days I've been listening over to it.

We gave this as a gift to our son for Christmas. He said it was great, but when he opened the package, two filters were broken in each pack. They were both within one bag, so that means they are broken.

I have to agree with some of the other reviewers. The print is small, and there are MANY typos that a spell check won't catch. It's hard work, especially if you want to read anything above your level on this one subject. However, it IS thorough, and the price was low enough for me not feel really ripped off. Edit: Also, all of those little questions in parentheses seem like they were just thrown in, because it's been more than two months since I bought it.

I don't know what the other reviewers were listening to, but this band is awful. You get to one of their songs on youtube and you realize that it sounds like someone tried way too hard at making a "metal" song. It's nothing like old music from bands like Judas Priest, Iron Maiden or Metallica. And it's nowhere near as heavy sounding as anything else I've ever heard by them either. My favorite song off this terrible album would be Track 1.

I purchased this to replace a different pair of earplugs, but they did not fit any better. So far only one side works. They have good sound if you need the volume up high, there is no reduction to outside noise. Maybe someone will invent better, lighter ones soon. Don't bother with these, they're terrible. Sorry!

While looking for a set of headphones, I heard how comfortable these headphones are, and thought it would be nice to try them. They definitely felt more comfortable, but the mic on this model seemed bad from the start.

At first glance, this book and its contents make you eager to begin reading. But unfortunately this is not true in real life as the reader will find out. The premise of the novel seems intriguing but I found out quickly that it didn't deliver. The main characters, Jack Morgan and Nick Stone were shallow at best and unbelievable at worst. Both were supposedly "professional" assassins even though they spent practically all their time hunting down criminals.

I have been using this mouse for a few weeks now and am still very satisfied with it despite it's slight flaws. PROS:-The wheel has quite large resistance which helps you to control all scrolling tasks well without having trouble while in full screen application.
They don't stick to my windows the slightest bit. I bought them as a Christmas gift but had to go out and pick something else, big disappointment! Waste of money.

This is not made of good material. In fact there are only like two or three small metal "plates", one for each side. I do get a little radio station and am about fifteen miles from the TV tower, but all my local channels come in with this antenna. I've wasted four weeks buying antennae to no avail. Will call them today when they return so we can send it back and buy something that works. Oh well. Lesson learned. Wish you luck if its your choice.
As far as I've been able to tell- even cooked in lower temps- these pan are great quality pans.

I'm not sure why so many "reviewers" of this book have written positive reviews, but I was sadly disappointed with it. This title is misleadingly titled. The word "Ecotopia" isn't defined in the glossary and some definitions given are confusing. In fact, there seems to be no good definition at the top of the page that does any thing for me as a beginner. You start by having your first piece completed. Then you make another one.
This would be adorable if all eight balls stayed in place; however, one keeps popping open.

I returned this as soon as it arrived to my house. Not worth the money. The material is flimsy and feels cheap. It would be fine for some but not me. It's cheap plasticky material. And it was a little off size. But overall you get what you paid for. I'm sending mine back. Don't waste your money on this one. Buy something else. Good luck.

This novel was well written and kept my interest. I've read books by both Kate Morton and Helen Macgregor, so I expect nothing less from them both. There are things about this work which were just confusing to me. Perhaps they needed more explanation than I could give them.

I had purchased a new electric smoker grill from Wal-Mart and decided to purchase some more of these grills as gifts for family members. They are smaller than my old ones but they work great. Can't wait until summer so we can use them outside! Thank you!!!
I don't think this product worked that well. My hair kept falling out after a few uses, would not reorder.
The content is good but I'm still in shock on how it's packed. It comes packaged with no inner plastic wrap so my book had gotten damaged pretty easily due to this.

This product is not even close as good or nearly the same quality. Don't waste your money. I would only recommend this product to a very young child who enjoys playing dress up! Total waste. Nothing like the original. It looks and feels cheap! Not happy.

In the description of these "books" which should be described as "short stories," it does state that "the story is only a few pages" and yet charges $7.89 for them? At least if they weren't already selling them on Amazon this would have to cost even less than that. I'm very shocked since my son has such great taste. He usually reads every book we buy. And he has read numerous other books before this.

We gave this book to my 3 children ages 12 to 7 and they loved it. It was very funny with little lessons in each page. They really like how the pictures have a color theme. Very creative! It's definitely worth buying!
I love OtterBox. Love it. My wife loved her iPhone 4S.
We haven't tried this recipe yet, but the price of a gallon or two at our store was pretty high! Our little one loved it, and it was convenient to order in large quantities! Thanks.

I have a HP ProBook 1260t & installed this on Oct 4, 2013. From day one, the fans are louder than my laptop. If there is any sort of vibration at all, it will make these loud noises that almost hurt to hear. There was also about an inch line (1/2 inch) when you looked directly into the screen, which got significantly worse within 2 weeks. When you're looking straight onto it, just slightly above where your shoulder sits, it's like having a bad sunburn.
Too much filler & not enough plot...kept reading but just wanted something over all and then finally got it..no thanks,didn't enjoy it.

It's an open book design which is good and bad. Good for those like me, who want to be able to view it at their leisure while commuting. Bad in two ways: First, if you don't have headphones already attached, then you will hear the page turning. This makes a huge difference when reading long passages. It also means you'll miss all of what's being said because your earbuds cut out very frequently.

This is a really nice looking case, but when you place the kindle fire HD 8.9" in the case and close it, there is very little room for anything else as well. So if you're wanting your tablet to just stay put without being bulky, while having all its ports, camera, etc visible, then this isn't going happen. In addition, my screen cover won't go around the whole side of it. So, if I want complete protection, I'll have to get some that actually covers that.
Exactly as shown and arrived fast. Holds up well, great quality. Good value given the price. Easy install with simple instructions. A couple holes needed.

What an awesome product! It's easy to install and does exactly what it says its for....makes your speakers more clear! I would have given 5 stars but I'm sure they could add a little vibration function so you can adjust the balance of the sound. If thats something you prefer then pay attention because these aren't designed for full range like my other Bose speaker systems.

Do not spend money on this product. Although I have used the first of two cartridges, my printer does not recognize it as a new cartridge. It keeps telling me to replace the cartridge, even after replacing it. This is such an inferior product and no where near being worth what they're asking. Buyer beware.... You are better off paying more for one from Canon. Even though it's less expensive, you will save tons in gas by purchasing your cartridges directly from them.

This is the cutest, sweetest story. My three year old loved it more than any of her other presents. If you're looking for a good, sweet, clean story this book would be right up your alley. I'm always concerned buying books too early. But after reading all these great reviews I thought I'd take my chance. A wonderful surprise! Thank you reviewers who told us to buy it. :) Can't wait so get it. We love it!!! And our kids too! : )
How can anyone spend $99 plus shipping when it could have been included free on the boxed set.

The story was so full of cliches and unrealistic that I couldn't help thinking about another book that takes itself seriously but just gets silly. Don't waste your time with this one. There's a new one out every month? How does all these great authors put them out? One reviewer talked about the cover being a poor reproduction on a large scale. If that's what you think you'll get, it's not as good on an actual Kindle or tablet because in landscape mode it covers almost half the screen.

What a complete rip off! I bought it in the store and returned it. On a side note, what kind of moronic marketing idea does this have? The only reason to buy this is if you're into mindless action movie violence with a bunch of half-naked chicks beating each other up.

The premise could have been interesting if fleshed out better. There was no back ground given. You never understand where the characters come from. Why are they on that island for all these years? What happens to them? There is a constant thread of horror going on with them so I found it confusing. It seemed like half way in or less before their encounter and rescue by an unknown person. They don't know who he/she really is, but some events follow up later on. All this information feels forced.
My husband LOVES it. He made some spaghetti sauce in it. It's quick, easy, easy clean up. Great purchase.

Just received this item and was so impressed with the build quality. The metal construction alone would make it worth it. When I plugged it in all that changed, I can not use this. I could at least put a fan right beside the laptop, but no such luck. I have checked every single detail on this model to determine if it's just my laptop or not. It's been over two weeks now since I've had it installed and I'm still waiting for a response.
the quality of the product is great but be aware that if your dog likes getting up on them you will have to buy a separate training collar.

This book was the worst one I have ever read. It should be required reading for anybody in politics. Do not support this trash book. He calls people who don't agree with him liars and racists. That's just gross. If we really care about other people, why are there lies that would take away from people's rights. He's the definition of a politician. The only person he has is himself to blame if he's so stupid to believe these stories. He seems like an intelligent, kind man.

What is going on with these books? As far as writing goes, the author shows talent. The plot was okay, but there wasn't enough mystery to keep you reading. Also, at first, like all of her romances, she uses lots of foul language. Now, no one talks or writes in such language, especially women.

it was good at first for what I wanted but broke after less then a month of use. not to mention the case that come with this is very tight and will break if you have even slightest chance of trying hard enough

Not sure if this was a used product or not but the one I received had no packing in package and looked dusty. The battery only charged about 85% then went dead. Was able to charge two phone batteries by switching it out so that did work. Also when charging two phones they took almost as long to give full power. Disappointing. Would have returned item except seller would have cost me more than buying brand new one.

The colors are bright and cheerful to look at. It definitely adds more cheer for my baby girl who sleeps a lot on it. But it is quite small - maybe not as big as we really wanted it to be. Our room has large windows, which makes the canopy part hang out of our little ones face. So she can't even see out. I think if these were about an inch longer they'd be perfect. However, they seem sturdy enough so we'll go ahead with them until we get bigger.
Don't be fooled by the sleek look of this, as someone said, it's more plastic then glass.
After doing extensive research and reading reviews on numerous products, I decided to buy this particular wireless system. I'm very happy with it.

I was so excited to read that Amazon would sell this old classic Christmas story because I'm trying toteach my grandkids about Jesus. The description of A Visit from St. Nicholas sounded awesome.
