However the book is full ofhistorical errors, contradictions, and untruths. One example,a little girl who had been in foster care gets sent by Santa Claus (supposedly) as part of Santa's magic sack gift even though she wasn't born at thecharacters home nor ever saw it.
Have bought two different stands from this- very nice design & look at same time. Highly recommend this.

This is a useless book about the history of computers by a bunch of professors that were obsessed with computers. Don't waste money on this tripe. It was really written by 3 or more people and they all hate computers--so you get 4 different perspectives on what it means to be a computer scientist. I can't help but wonder if these guys just sat around gathering data for 5 years after college or something.

This was a total waste of money! Even when I use this the quality does not sound good it sounds very poor and there is static even with new batteries which doesn't seem to help. Do nothing but spend your money on some nice headphones then maybe they would stay in when you are working out! DO NOT BUY! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE ME!!!

The second time I charged the original battery it swelled up like a balloon. Did not hold charge well at all. It never quite got to 100% charge. Very bad experience for me. Going back today and buying an original.

Don't be fooled by the 5 star reviews this thing got and I should have paid more attention too it. This was an utter waste of money. It's not worth even sending back it would probably cost half as much to return it. It's cheaply made with many broken parts ( one part doesn't stay on). Only gave 1 star because that's better than zero. So disappointed in Amazon for allowing such junk on their website without a quality check. Shame really. The only other choice is Apple or Samsung tablets.
Perfect adapter replacement for our old dell laptop.
If you are planning to hike or backpack anywhere near Banff Park, DON'T purchase this.

For those of us who like the original version by Frank Sinatra, this is a must. Although I own and enjoy some other performances in it's entirety, for me the one that really stands out to me was Bob Newhart's version. A number of years ago, after watching "The Art Of The Deal" on HBO, he would perform it as well. It made a powerful impression with that haunting tune playing while his character had to make an emotional decision.

Do NOT order this product! Just got it today and it's a total waste of money!! The product is not made for the Nexus 7. It fits so loosely that it's ridiculous to keep putting them on until you get one that's exactly perfect. Very unsatisfied with product!!!!! Now I have to spend more money in shipping because it'll cost me $20 just return it! Not happy at all.... But what choice do i have.
This item looked great, however, once I received it, it became extremely dirty. Also, there was an obvious mark on the comforter at one end.

This product was a pain to clean after using it. The pan itself requires that water be taken out and cleaned often which creates excess soapy residue on the pan. The entire set is also not dishwasher safe as it will begin to rust if you allow it to. I would recommend any other brand of pan/cookwear instead.

After only 3 days of using this bag I started noticing that my iPad had a funny smell to it. Not sure what it was and how to properly wash it, but when you first get the bag, they included with plastic bags (don't know why since there's no instructions on it) for easy washing. So I'm trying to keep all items super clean until after use, so just made me paranoid that my iPad's not sanitary. Since then the bag has seemed to have gotten more smelly.

This product is too big for my ear and it slips out easily. I can't wear it. Also, when you make a call the sound quality stinks. The person on the other end can barely hear you. Very irritating. Also tried to hook up with my laptop but just didn't work. Just another wasted purchase. :-(
No way they are up there with the O'Reilly books. While it is difficult reading because of lack of organization, but if you need an example you should know how large that is.

We purchased three batteries to replace a previous ones from HP on our dv9000 series Pavilion laptop. After charging these new batteries, we put them in just as the old one, charged and they worked GREAT. These "new" ones, however, are junk.
I purchased this to see if my cat would play with it.
very nice looking canister with ample space for my needs.

I love the way these cups are made, but every one in my family hated them. The liquid leaks all over and no matter what you do, there is always a leak. We tried several different positions of placement with zero success. Not to mention that when we run our finger along underneath just before drinking out of it seems like there's a film on top. Maybe that's not completely obvious, but, after trying for an hour, I'm convinced ours was defective...I'll try to get this exchange or return it.

This is the same as my post above, but it's still a terrible book. If you are seeking truth and understanding of Islam, then get this. Here goes:1. Al-Hajj Hassan did NOT die or go into "purgatory" from his conversion to Islam - he died in Medina on July 21, 624 AD2. Al-Mutar Ahmad ibn Maslama was not killed in battle against Muslims with swords, even though he does state that at various points in his life. He never claims otherwise.3.

I picked up this book because the author has always been kind of an obsessionist. Not in spite of his personal faults, but because he is a gifted storyteller and often presents interesting stories on topics that interest him. Unfortunately there are numerous factual errors so much as to be comical - such as describing General Lee saying "Oh, I'm sorry, he was one of my greatest friends.." which turned out to not be completely accurate.

This is a great product. It does what it says and I think anyone over the age of 16 should have it. My only complaint about this product was that it took me 5 times longer than most to use it. If you want fast results then go for an otoroide. The shipping speed really doesn't bother me. Most stuff from china takes forever but not this.

I wish the battery pack worked but it was so bad that i just threw it away after putting brand new batteries in it. Don't get me wrong, you do have to be careful about placing on a hard surface like wood or concrete because sometimes the sound cuts out really bad. The volume is not loud enough either. Definitely NOT worth buying. I've had a few bluetooth headphones and this isn't even in the same league. Maybe i got one from lemon.

I've been a fan of this product for years. My local Lowe's/Menards stopped carrying it. I was so sad to have the only good soap dispenser and not be able to buy more. So when i started research on online sources I came across Soapy Cups. Not sure what changed but it seems like every company has gone downhill with their products. This one is cheap plastic that doesn't work, very hard to fill.
The design looks just about OK. But the product does not work.

I don't like the item and don't see a reason to spend money on it. You get what you pay for and this is no exception. Cheap Chinese crap - look at it as another scam perpetrated by China itself. The one star review was way too kind! If you're using Windows 8, or have older computers, consider buying something other than this. I'm sure it'll work fine when you remove any ancient junk from your computer, but if installing Windows, forget about it. It will be a nightmare.

I was not impressed with this book. The stories were all the same and boring to read. If you like reading about how great a person is, why did they go to college, etc, then you might care for this. But most people would rather read books from real life because that is what their lives are like. This type of "memoir' just bores me. For any men out there looking for more insight into women.. keep looking.

I am used to the "normal" size mouse and was having trouble using my new mouse. After some research, it seemed that people are complaining of this same issue so you cannot blame Microsoft for a bad design. The design makes use very difficult, because on almost every browser is uses small windows (tabs) which requires scrolling as if in a wheel or scroll bar. Also, even though there seems like no vertical resolution increase, overall screen gets much smaller.

I had no idea this book was written only for Christian young ladies. As an avid reader of fiction and nonfiction, it is VERY unusual to be exposed to such demeaning, ignorant religious content. I've started several books in the YA section at our local library, and I'll never buy a teen girl one again. This title will give teens something very wrong to think about. Not too mention, there are far more books with the same message.
This was a really quick read, about 50 mins. Each book is only 2-3 pages each. It's cute in all aspects however. Can't complain. For $2.

I really only have one complaint. If you don't put your arm down and make a fist to prevent them from slipping off, they will loosen by themselves every now and again. But other than that - love them. My son is able to wear his glasses which he didn't before because of the rubber tips. He just can't break these ones so it's nice :) I would recommend these. They are good quality for not too expensive

The product works, but at no level is it particularly good to have or extremely bad as many other reviewers seem to be saying. It does look great, and feels nice, the material seems very sturdy, and even with a full charge, has sufficient battery life to last for hours of usage. BUT.

I enjoy this series for entertainment and it has a reasonable amount of plot to it. These aren't award winning stories, but they are enjoyable. The books get into the psyche and motives of individual characters instead of always being concerned with action. It would be nice if Ms. Auel went back beyond these novels so that she could show her readers more about their worlds. That said, do read them. It's fun reading fantasy stories set in another world where there is magic as well as humans.

the light works great. It is very easy to install. Be advised that some wires must not have been cut correctly and will require additional length if you want it less tight. Also, there are a number of tiny screws in what you would call the ballast. Mine was missing one hole drilled so I did get around it, but be warned. The screw covers do seem secure.

Not the best book by Patterson but not the worst either. It is an OK read. The plot was very entertaining for a few hours. Overall, I will give it credit and say that I've read worse books in Patterson's book. And I'll probably reread it. That's my rule. :-)

This product was a complete waste of my money. Do not buy it; save your money or invest in another product. The keyboard is hard to type on and I find that even tapping it accurately at times does nothing. The cover did not fit right and the iPad falls flat when you try typing something on it. My husband purchased this for me as his gift. He has already returned it because he said it was cheaply made too. If you are looking for something good, look elsewhere.

My new puppy is only a few weeks old so hasn't been getting too much dirt from his feet yet. But i feel like it's good for keeping her smelling clean and fresher. I'd say its also better quality than other cheaper brands. You get 2 bottles and 1 refill.

This was a very cute story and I loved seeing my sons reaction to the little dog in it. However it was an unfortunate purchase because although it's written by Mr. Rogers it is not made or filmed by him. So he isn't even remotely involved with this one. If anyone out there has found one of his movies about Little Dogs please let me know. Other than that they are sweet stories. My two year old son likes them so I'm happy. But if you can find yourself your own videos on Amazon.
Great story, good character development and great ending. It had some twists to it that I didn't see coming. Looking forward to the next book. Highly recommend this series.

This is a good idea. Not so much when it comes to actual quality. I bought two, and both leaked in the first few months. After dealing with customer service, they offered us either 15% off for them to replace them. They said that this would be great if we could prove ownership of these items. What kind of crap is that? We should still have all our purchased products.
Received the item, plugged it into two different USB slots on an HP notebook. The plug fit perfectly, but would never charge.

A story about a girl that likes to play dress up and go shopping with her friends. Her mom is an awful person who has gotten so angry since moving from Kansas city where the mother was working as a teacher in public education. When they move into what she believes are great new homes for her, it turns out it's one of those "ghetto.houses" she keeps seeing.
We recently had a significant summer heat wave, which turned out more like an El Niño than a normal warm summer. But we did feel that it helped this year if there was enough cool air.
If you want "fantasy", then read some Tolkien. The quality of writing style is what I could call amateurish.

My wife and i have loved these books for years. I would keep buying them every year in hardcover because they are simply wonderful. This edition, however, is a complete misrepresend. The book itself was fine but rather than having the hard cover it is now printed on, which after much use, has begun to come apart on two pages. The second page started falling out shortly thereafter. It seems as though there must be some kind of poor quality control going on.

I'm not sure exactly how they got away with it, but someone is clearly trying to make a quick buck off an obviously good idea. The premise that you could sell someone's death sentence without showing them anything more than their body was extremely disturbing.

I used these for 2 years. On day 3, the light started to flicker. Today, it died. Very disappointing. A waste of money. I'm switching back to a traditional lightbulb. These are not reliable and don't last through many uses. The bulbs do get very hot on my stove top (about 200 degrees). Also, no matter how tight it's screwed in, food can drip down into it.
These are wonderful.

This is one of the worst. All these songs are not on other albums, and it seems that when an artist does put out a single album with only his singles, they don'thing but re-hash them. These tracks will be great for listening to in your room, as their repetitiveness makes everyone want to punch someone.

I bought this product and the directions are vague at best. The pictures they show with it don't correspond to what it looks like when applied. Also, there is no mention of anything about bubbles that might get caught under it. Very frustrating. Would give zero stars if option here.

I must start out by saying....If you loved the first two books in this series then don't read this.....The action takes place all over and there is nothing interesting happening to keep me interested. For some reason it seems that each of the three main characters are starting from different places. So much going on so fast they aren't really developed or interesting. They seem more like fantasy world creations with no real life experience attached. It took almost half way through reading for something interesting to happen.
This thing scratched up pretty easy. My Kindle itself did not. It looks nice but doesn't work well with the cover on. Waste of money.

The first one I went through the ink cartridges quickly. They lasted a long time. This one seems to be different. It appears with each print job there is more and more. Not sure if it would work in my printer. So far very unhappy because I've had trouble finding this cartridge at stores around where we live and don't want to order again. It's not cost effective when you have 3 little kids who run out of ink in no time even though its an okay price. Will NOT buy again from you.

I've been collecting and displaying model rockets for at least 25 years. Most are from the 60's to 70's, many of them well over $100 each. Even after all that time I found this book disappointing. There is more about how rocket parts were developed than anything else. Very thin coverage on the history or manufacture of any particular rocket. One would be much better off finding another guide book. There's really nothing "new.

I can't tell you how well this works as it was never packaged or mailed properly, even after contacting customer service. It came in the same package shown for free shipping with a similar item but only had two instead of four screens. So disappointed and will not try them again. Hope to get more later. Maybe just some sort of discount on something else. Will update if so

To my mind, this book should have been more aptly named. The author's own experiences are somewhat limited, but that is to be expected. If the goal of a cookbook was to give readers an insider's look at life on the water, then some chapters will appeal most. But there really aren't any interesting recipes in here. My favorite chapter would probably describe how to make ice cream from fresh fruit and nut milks, so you feel pampered before your next cruise.

Just an okay product. I thought by ordering "used" the product might be in better condition. This cover is very thin and not well made. Stitching was loose. The price was low so maybe that's whats left but a little high for what I'm told. Will definitely make sure this company puts some effort into their products. Very disappointed with it..

I have used these for a while. They work every time. No problems as long you place them correctly. If u need to use two in a pinch leave one of them out and remove the second one. Not sure why they are on back order though but i recommend this product to everyone.
This is a very nice cover. Not cheap at all.

It did not smell like apple - it smelled bad. Just really bad smell. My husband threw away his clothes he had purchased this cologne for. There were two bottles left. I bought them at walmart because they didn't have any other cologne.

So as you can see, it's cheap and not worth your time. Don't waste a penny on it. It takes too long for the item in general to be shipped from China so even if there wasn't any problems with that at all because of its cost, it'd still suck. If you're looking into buying something similar but better quality, just look elsewhere.
I had one piece (female) that fit great, but both pieces were way to small. Would give 5 stars if they came with an XL pair. Too much trouble sending back!!Very disappointed!!

I have had this case for about a week now and it looked beautiful when new. But the design has rubbed off in lots of different places including where you open the stand. It looks terrible now. Also, once i snapped my phone into place as usual, even with only minor movement, not one but both parts came apart from each other.
Easy order,great price, received it very quick. Quality product that performs exactly as advertised.

A friend had a similar experience. Ordered it and the USB port doesn't work. It won't hold your tablet at all, no matter how much you twist it. Very disappointed!!!! Returning it!!! Do not waste your time or money! Find something better!!!Update! Had to return this. The manufacturer was very helpful in refunding my money, even though it took awhile after all this time. I would absolutely buy from them again. It's been well over 3 months now....

I was really looking forward to reading and reviewing the book "The Great American Beer Binge as I've come across so much great stuff on this subject of beer drinking by people who know what they are talking about. So you can imagine my joy when The Brewery Guide (Brewers Institute Guides) came out today in hardback, with a color cover with wonderful pictures inside!Unfortunately, that pleasure only lasted for a single look from cover. There were four very small photos of all these rare craft brews.
The best movies aren't always "blockbusters" and don't have big names or massive budgets.

Don't even consider buying this piece of junk. The battery drains in less than 10 minutes after full charge. If I put it on hold for a second, the unit looses its connection to my phone and then just dies. It gets only 1 star because that's the lowest rating allowed. Waste your time with these products people. They are all useless. You'll probably never get any useful info-from them. I'm so pissed.

First off, the product I received was not a Motorola OEM replacement battery, but rather an "after-market'. Second, my phone does NOT recognize this battery. My original battery still can be charged if its plugged into AC or USB, and it holds several days' charge now, whereas after installing this battery.......NOTHING. It will say 'Battery Low for Charging' on screen but nothing charges. This is pretty much worthless. I'm sure it's going to go back.

I bought this a few weeks ago and it lasted about 4 days before the USB port broke completely off it. Don't waste your time. Do not buy from these people. They won't refund or replace anything unless you pay shipping (which can take over 20 days). Terrible product. Amazon shouldn't allow them to sell things like this. Total rip-off! I'm glad mine didn't fall apart during use. It is really an expensive paperweight now. What kind of junk are they trying to peddle on Amazon? Unbelievable.

This is a product that I cannot rate since it was purchased as gift for someone. They were extremely excited when received and have been enjoying their new camera. The camera itself appears to be of great quality. Thank you very much.

I used this drive for 2 or 3 months, no problems until last year when the computer froze. The only way to get past was unplugging and replugging in the USB cable. Then it would work again but after a while you could not use it. It will now cost more than $100 out of pocket for data recovery. This is an absolute joke, do yourself a favor and go with something other than OWCM. Save your money.

I was a bit hesitant with the price, but they are not bad for what you pay for. My pair fit perfectly fine and were comfortable from start to finish. Good sound quality although sometimes hard to hear some words that have deep bass when the music is quite loud. The mic worked great too. However, after 1 month of use, the left ear started breaking in half. This does come with different rubber sizes provided so your choice could be very different.

The author, Stephen J. Robinson, uses his wife's name only if he wants to sell copies by name. He does not identify the real author, who is very well known, as an attempt for money from people whose names appear nowhere else on Amazon.
This is a wonderful product that allows me to use my new ipad2 as if it was an actual laptop. Love it! Recommend this product.

I have had the machine for 13 1/2 months and it worked well at first. Now, a couple of weeks ago, one side started acting weird. If I hold either button, then pull up all or don'thing, there is no heat from the surface. It just stays off. So, today when my husband said something about heating pads, you can see where that went down. We are pretty much out $200 to spend on another microwave. You would think that this company would be able fix their machines after so long.

Just got my bag yesterday, put it on and it's really tight for a small person, also has little support at waist strap. Also the zipper seems to be very weak as i broke just by lightly opening it. I'm sending back asap.

I have used a similar product purchased at the outlet and wanted to buy something cheaper so we would continue using them. Unfortunately these are very bad. They're too small for my feet with socks on and when you step barefoot, you're pretty much going bare foot. Not good, but not too bad either once you've bought thicker insoles. As they say in China, that's where cheap stuff goes to. Next time I'll stick with what I've trusted - if it's good enough for us, it should be good enough.

I have an Acer Aspire 5610b. The battery is about 1.5 times as thick on the right side (maybe 1/8") so when sitting with it open in my lap (or almost laying flat against something), the power cord will not allow a connection. Also, one of two batteries has stopped working within a little over six weeks. My initial thought was that this thing wasn't making good contact between it's charging prongs and laptop port, but then after removing it, i saw why they couldn't connect properly.

The phone works fine. Voice is great and the voice announcement of who's calling which I love. Caller ID can be selected from the menu, however cannot program it in to automatically call on whomever that is. This seems like an oversight since Panasonic would have had more users. It's a bit slow when you first start talking, but gets faster as you're speaking. Has good sound quality for both sides. All around, I'm very satisfied.

Bought to replace an old pump I had as this one is louder ( too loud for my little dog at night)Pump doesn't work any more after a day of use. It just sits there in the tank and does nothing. Very disappointed because it was great while it lasted. Now going to buy another new one.

I bought this item to replace a similar type that quit after several years. This is nowhere near the same quality as the previous one. It does NOT clip on easily. There are plastic tabs which hold each end in place. The tab ends were easily bent upon clipping them onto our glasses.

We ordered the product we received was not what the photo represents. The case I got has a clear finish and is made of cheap plastic. The top part does snap on/off easily, it just doesn't fit on properly. You have to force it. When this cover first arrived,It covered half the speakers (the sides are open). Once you put your kindle in it, it's sealed in, so now it's useless because no sound gets through.
After the first month I bought this product It fell from a desk and broke. The plastic used is cheap. Do not buy this!

This movie is very well made by all means, even if it may be too long and boring for those who like their movies short and quick - as I did. But don't get me wrong, that style of film works great in the right hands, but not here where they tried to make a political statement or deal with many social issues which are out dated. Instead, it's just another boring love story about American expatriates living outside of NYC (or so what we think).

I purchased and installed this bulb almost two months ago. After about a week, I started noticing some problems with the picture quality, particularly in night time. When it first arrived, there was no damage to the box, so either Amazon shipped me one that had been repackaged by someone else or somebody else's warehouse got sloppy when they sent it. Over time, both of these incidents have become progressively worse over time until now, I'm very dissatisfied since the picture quality is just bad.

This item was advertised as having a "quick connect." I have had the product for less than 18 months and when attempting to remove it, it broke in half. The plastic is extremely brittle. You would think that if this were part metal with metal threads, a plastic knob or button connecting them together could hold up better in light of some reviews, but you know what they say about assuming- don't assume.

I've been using this for less than a year and it died on me. I liked the design though, so I'd give 5 stars if not for its short life. :( 
 Rating: 4.0 
 Its good product which works as promised in terms of heating your body temperature quickly, however is quite noisy when operating due to the fact that it draws lots of power from AC outlets. Otherwise it has worked well over the past few months. 
 Rating: 4.

I received the light today and it was poorly packaged. The bulb package came with no foam or packaging to help keep it. As a result there were several bent edges on one end of the bulb. It is also loose inside it's container - had obviously been pushed around during shipping. I'm using it for my RV emergency kit (LED lights are used constantly at every campsite so they tend not have much time left over for flashlights).

I was expecting a quality product after reading the great reviews. Well it's not that great. I'm still looking for good leather cases. Very disappointed. Wouldn't waste my money on this one again. Not even real leather. More like plastic.
I think if she didn't come up with this story line we would not only be getting into the whole 50 shades trilogy, but maybe even some other similar books. But then again her writing is fairly decent

The plastic tip tore a week of light use and the black cap snapped off within 15 minutes when removing one of the tips. Very cheap for something made in China. Guess you get what you pay for. Lesson learned. Will stick with metal ones from now on.

i don't ever want to read any more of these kinds of books about murder. It is enough for me just reading books. What makes it worse what kind of man would be willing to kill his wife or girlfriend. Please don't waste your time.

I was very disappointed and felt so ripped off after reading A Perfect Plan. The storyline is poorly written like a cheap novel, although for some reason most of the reviewers think it is. I have NEVER read such an un-organized novel. First off, the characters are flat & one dimensional. Every person talks with just enough personality that you feel bad for anyone in this book. And then they make stupid choices because their "inner voice" tells them to believe something.
This product was made extremely cheap.

I tried all five of these things and they didn't even work. The other 3 seemed to be able to get some radio stations, but would not find a clear frequency. My suggestion is that you buy the cheapest transmitter out there before putting any money down. This was extremely disappointing.

I purchased this product because my husband has dry mouth and is always looking for something to help him with it. He had the original oral b sonic toothbrush since they were first introduced. It lasted 10 years until we finally tried out a more modern electric dental brush. This newer version was too weak for him, he can't get enough vibration that makes his teeth feel clean, so back it went.

I've returned mine because the earpiece kept popping off. If they would build in some sort of safety feature as others have mentioned, I'm sure this item would be great. However, without even considering that, my main complaint about these headphones are twofold.

I've owned this player for about a month now and i just recently started having problems. The screen freezes up, the volume goes down during playback of movies, and there's absolutely no sound as far as I can tell. If you don't mind buying cheap products every year, buy it, but if you're looking to last longer than that, find another player. It did work perfectly fine before it froze, so its definitely not an issue with it. But why would they make it like this?

I'm not sure I would be happy on a long trip - because the straps get twisted up and need to be adjusted. Also, it tends to fall over when it's loaded. But, I love that this is lightweight so there's really no excuse for hauling heavy stuff all day. Definitely recommended!
Good glasses.
Purchased this for an LG TV and it works well. Great Price as compared to same item from other manufacturers. Thanks Amazon.
It's really easy too install. My only complaint was that it's kinda small for her but I guess that's why we bought it.
After purchasing one set (medium size), I decided it was worth buying another pair.

The title reads as if this book was written by someone who just doesn't get it. I believe in true and honest journalism, but it seems like no one bothered to read what Ms. Stone wrote. This makes me not want too trust her further. When the author is supposed to be "truthful", that's exactly how a person writes. Maybe she could take advice from Mr. Trump (or whoever he's running against) about writing an article without making any mistakes. But then, there are stories we don't know.

The first 2 books of this series were a great read. Loved the characters and couldn't wait for more to come out. I was very disappointed when I put on book three and got about 30 pages in before I had to put it down. There is NO character dialogue other than some lame 'thoughts' being exchanged between characters. This makes me wonder if Ms. Gabaldon has been drinking too much coffee lately. Maybe she needs to read her own reviews...

I had seen these before and liked them a lot, so when they went on sale, I got them, but found that most don't turn off or on, have poor range (I tested with 2 tv's), sound quality, etc. If it sounds great, guess what, its junk. My set were returned within 3 days. Don't waste your time unless you just really want to play around with setting the IR remote in whatever room you're in, like at a distance from them.
Perfect fit. Easy on, easy off.
The DVD is missing four episodes on it or they are scrambled. My daughter watches them every day but these will be her last copies. What do we do?

This was my first attempt at an aftermarket battery - so I wasn't sure what to think of it. However, the unit did not work in either one of the two laptops it was ordered for. The laptop wouldn't even recognize that anything had been plugged into it; there were no lights on either unit. And when you put a new chip in, you can expect something like this would work...but it just doesn't (it's too small). You might find another company worth trying out for their batteries.
This product is quite expensive for what you get, even at the cheapest price one can get - it's more like a disposable product. I also agree that it does not remove all odors completely.

My main issue with this book is that while there are some great ideas in the title and it has a very promising premise: using DNA to study memory, I don't appreciate how it's been presented. It's not like these men were being attacked by evil forces whose goal was taking away their memories. Rather they had an opportunity of knowing things for which they've paid dearly through years upon years. And they're also given incredible powers, but yet we're told nothing more than that.
i bought this thing and it did not work, when i tried to fix it, the speaker broke inside it.. so if u buy this, don't take your headphone out of it!
This product is excellent and has a variety of tastes to choose from. I would recommend it as well, for the different flavors that you can select at.

I used these spoons for my kids lunches and one spoon shattered on the first use. You can only get four uses out of them before they are unusable. Poor quality. Not worth wasting money. Buy a plastic spoon. They do say not dishwasher safe but it is possible to wash in the microwave. Which was nice, because at school we always use the same spoon. In case I'm being cheap enough or too lazy I'll reuse them! :) Don't waste your money like me.

Have used this for years and found it to be a great product. It is easy on the hands,also helps with finger joints, would highly recommend! Good price from amazong as in stores here are double or triple that amount. Will continue buying thru Amaxon!!

This is just a rip off... Not even that good - you would think that with their name on it could give an accurate description and what you're getting, but not so much. They are super cheap looking, cheap, no padding around the legs like they say in all of there reviews. But that's why I got them, because when I'm working at my computer I don't have time to go out buy shoes every couple days.
Tried to save money, used it, loved it til this week and my ipod sound goes out in an open room with only 6 feet of walls. I'm going back to Belkin. This thing isn't worth even returning.

The title of this item is very misleading. I have found nothing more than "basics" to be offered in the recipes. It was not what I had expected from a new book. A cookbook that would teach you how to do all kinds of things for your family, but most importantly - recipes where there are no preservatives. There were a few things, such as a banana bread recipe and one on my favorite dessert, carrot cake recipe. But those weren't worth paying for. I'm sorry I bought it.
Great book for someone who enjoys learning a new way to look at the world. I can recommend this book.
A good idea that really needed more fleshing out so that we got some emotional attachment from our characters but this was barely done.
This was not what i bought and im tired of these fakes selling stuff on here who doesnt make good or return calls because they can see its fake.

I have owned this case now for just over a month. After about 6 months, the "leather" started to fall apart along the edges where it meets with the plastic shell. This isn't surprising as it is exposed and exposed, so you can see that it's almost completely bare. There are only two or 3 of these corners left intact at the sides of my case, which was expected since they're not made from quality leather material.
Love these books the series and this book. The book has a little too much sexual activity for my taste. You do need to read all four books to get some answers.
If you want to spend your money at these people,then buy their tea.

I would agree that this author was a little off the mark, but not by much. The plot of the book could have been an interesting story had it gone deeper, with more mystery to it. Instead we get a very standard spy story with cliches and one dimensional villains. And some really odd characters thrown in for good measure. If you're trying to develop your skills at espionage or if you want quick action without losing too much brain power, then this is your book. Otherwise, look elsewhere.

I bought these thinking they would be good because of the price. The first time using them only three out nine didn't work. Then when I got more then one, a few worked for about two days, and all became useless. Very disappointed that there wasn't anything in each pack. Not even 1 star is enough to get this review.

I purchased one of these at the same time for my wife. Within 1 month, it would take a photo and then stop working. It wouldn't even turn off after fully charging. Now I'm buying her another camera. Very disappointing.
When it works, its awesome. But mine died after about 8 months of normal use. The thing is, its under warranty and they won't repair it, since we bought through amazon. And you only have 90 days.

I bought these for my son who is into cars. He said that they're ok but not great. They do keep out the rain ok, as they fit well. Overall it's an OK product. But if you really want a good quality product, try Weathertech brand. These are about 1/3 of price and much better quality. Also, Amazon sells very high prices on there stuff, so if you're trying to save money, go online elsewhere or at your nearest auto parts store. You can't beat their prices.
i liked the book because it was just an easy read. some of that things were really close to what happened back in my high school years. the author did a good job!
Very good product. Its worth buying it. Not recommended using in direct sunlight or heat. Do not over heat. The product does work very nicely.
What i received was NOT what the picture showed. First lets talk about design.

My new dog got the run of my old garage and chewed up most of the wiring in it. Fortunately all I had to do was plug these in, then rewire a few extra outlets, no more wiring. This is cheap insurance that should be part of any security system.
This would have been great, but only about half was in English. My daughter thought it was very long for what it's worth at 9 years old. Maybe older children might like it.

This is a big old piece of junk that will not stand up in the shower. I'm sorry i bought this as my other suction cup shower caddy broke after about three years. I guess they need to have better quality products then what we get now a days. The ones with little suction cups are okay, but, nothing beats having something work like it's supposed to. Amazon should discontinue selling this. It has got to go back before someone uses it!!! That's one problem I've had with Amazon.

I have bought the books after viewing all 5 DVD's, not only did there is no chapter selection, but on disc 3 it skips from side to side! It happened in every chapter.. very unpleased! Also it's pretty old so I'm thinking of giving them away.

I bought these speakers about 30 days ago. They worked great with my laptop and iphone, however for some reason the bluetooth keeps losing connection. It would be fine if they just lost connection or cut out but i cant even listen to a song without it disconnecting every few seconds. I have tried re-pairing them several times also and that seems like they arent detecting each other. Just something wrong in quality control.

This book makes the mistake of trying to use "facts" and data sources that may be inaccurate or incomplete. The author did a good job at compiling all this information, but was unable to do it justice as written in my opinion. As I read more about it, I am realizing what is missing. Perhaps others have made better observations on various subjects than I. But, if you are interested in statistics you will learn some, which might help make your point better. Overall, however, it's not a bad read.

My daughter and I thought this was one of the best movies we've seen in a while. We had high hopes for it but were greatly disappointed. The story line is slow to develop yet at points seems like an attempt to keep you watching just so they can show what happens next -- that's not nearly enough story, or good plot, that has happened within the first third of the movie (not too mention there are NO extras on DVD).
My granddaughter used these 3 times...before they stopped working.

The product may have worked just fine for my application, but the product was shipped in sealed packaging and there were several broken pieces that I could barely get out of the package. Also be aware that many manufacturers now ship this item with two small screws rather than one, as opposed to only one; or more accurately a single screw.

I have had my system for about a month now and love it. Great sound quality with an easy setup. My favorite feature is the headphone jack on either side of receiver. The only drawback that i see so far is: every once in awhile there can be little static/interference. Overall though great buy.
I am sooo sad that this filter system seems to be being discontinued; as with many other things on keurig, these need replacing when they get clogged - if not promptly cleaned.

I purchased this scanner because I've had good experience with their scanners in the past. This thing is useless. It doesn't seem to recognize paper sizes, so you can never select one from your pile of paper, even when scanning multiple pages. Scanning software isn't compatible with Windows 7 64 bit. The other reviewers weren't exaggerating about how bad it is. I'll have my computer shop someone a reliable scanner. At least they'll probably be cheaper.

The book is a good overview of the history & development of modern computing and why it was created. However, some chapters can be better explained. I would recommend this to anyone interested in understanding the rise & fall of the original computer revolution.

This is a poor quality book due to the lack of any photos in it. The text was fine, but, what I thought were images have been replaced by diagrams. There are only about 6 photos, but they could be better and more clear. Too bad, this books would be a big deal if it had some pictures or photos. Also, all of David Lees' books seem to use outdated terminology. My advice: stick with a good atlas for a detailed reference when driving along major highways throughout California.

I only read through 1/4 of the book hoping that something about his dad would come to light. Nope. Not a single word. And he had an affair with the president's wife? Really! If this story is true, I'd like all readers to know it. Don't waste your money. This guy should not have his reputation ruined! Why can't Amazon let us post negative stars...
Fit like it was made by Samsung. Quality seems much better than most other products.

I loved the first two installments, and was even more excited for this third episode. Instead, all of my excitement turned to disappointment in its execution. Like previous series that have come before it, Dead Space 3 is another game whose makers couldn't get their heads around why you would want a story told through text versus having your character experience events themselves. As such, most parts are just straight exposition while characters "watch" as though they had gone back in time.

It's hard to argue for the quality of this product. The case has a nice feel and, when closed, is quite secure. The stand feature works well. One little drawback was that it did not have any slots for credit cards. When opening and closing it, I got afraid my cards would slip out, but so far, they are okay. It does offer protection as advertised.

You have to hold your arm down and rock back & forth or lean forward if you use this thing for even a half hour. It's pretty loud but also has some kind of "popping" sound in it. I gave this product one star only because it comes with two ear pads so my child can wear them without feeling like his ears are being crushed.

Bought this to replace old wireless headphones. I was looking for something cordless and had good reviews. At first it worked as expected but after a week of use the left ear bud stopped working. Don't waste your money. I'm sure these have great sound quality if you are comfortable with buying poor quality. Will not purchase from this manufacturer or vendor again based on my experience. Do yourself a favor stay away.
My wife bought this at Walmart. The bag had very cheap construction, and she only used it, about 5 times, before we were informed that stitching on other parts of the bag's seams ripped.

I was looking for something decent but not expensive. This pair wasn't bad. It's just that after 2 months of using, I've been back buying another pair. They only worked once or twice. Also, as other review stated there is no way you can listen without taking them off.

Do not buy an item that is described in such a way. Read this warning before you buy! For another person who purchased one of these with the understanding it was "like new," read this! Even though the product description says Brand X & Sold by Amazon, there are counterfeits on Amazon selling them as genuine products. Check out my customer photos for proof. [...]
I have used the filter for about a month now, and it is excellent. It fits perfectly in my Honda Odyssey 2012 model. No problems at all. Highly recommend.

I'm a good fan of Robin Williams, having watched him on The Simpsons more than a half-dozen times--and even his earliest acting roles in such gems (like Family Law). He showed much promise when he made himself into Will Smith's character, giving one of the funniest character performances ever captured onfilm.

I'm new to this, so all may be fine now. But it just does NOT go out after setting it! Only if there was a complete lack of ambient temperature - then yes, I'll set it. So, what's this about? Maybe as I get into more details, I'll update. Meanwhile, don't buy one for yourself.

Not what is pictured at all - one bulb works fine. The 2nd one only flickered or sometimes went out. It still worked with the 1st bulb. One in each housing were cracked and wouldn't hold any bulb after that. A waste of $ for us we needed extra work lamps now.

For the record, this set is not a complete collection and has some flaws.- Most of each program is about 15-23 minutes long and there are cuts from many programs during certain chapters- A few movies that have been restored with Dolby Digital 5.1 soundtracks (the original releases on Laserdisc had Mono soundtracks) do NOT sound as good in stereo since those discs utilize only mono audio so all but a bare bones surround system will be required.- The video quality varies considerably.
Great product in terms of ease - but after 2 months I found my baby likes this brand more than any others he has. He's just too young, though.

I guess we all have a certain style of listening and buying music, however this has to be the worst example of it I've heard. For starters, it's not only boring, but extremely boring. There are no hooks, nothing that will make you want to sing. The lyrics don't grab your attention either, and seem rather cheesy for a metal album. Sure, there are few actual screams by Dave Mustaine. I just can't see how he'd fit screaming in with metal.
Not too excited by it. Didn't really work great. You get what you pay for.

This device looked good when I got it. Once you start driving at night, even with the headlights on, it's a real pain to see it in any sunlight. The only place bright enough is behind your rear view, but that can get difficult too. It's also awkward to mount and detach, no matter how careful an installer is. It looks neat and tidy as everything plugs into it. The main issue is, after two days, both devices stopped working.

I was very disappointed with this book. It's a lot of pictures and words but nothing in depth at all. My child just turned 3 and is ready for something more informative. He really got bored within the first 20 minutes! If you're looking to add new vocabulary or get your child hooked on sight language, don't buy this. It may work, but if you want ideas about sight, then look elsewhere. Very disappointing.

This is not a "book" at all, its an extremely short essay that could have been included in the magazine article. It contains almost no useful information and actually seems to want you only believe what they do to you. If your interested I suggest just reading the article on this subject if thats all youre looking for. To me it was like having two glasses of water which were both full from one bottle! They really didnt go into enough detail either.

My daughter ordered these "glow stars" and they are NOT glowing. She has been using them as a night light for months to help her fall asleep, but not these. She asked me to return them. :-( Now I need a place where she can bring back the ones that actually work. You make an excellent product guys, with quality materials. This is why you charge so much money. But if you can't put out what we PAY for..

The other reviews are pretty accurate with the story of how great this film is. It is a masterpiece. In fact, if I could, I would give it 4 stars. The problem is, you can't get the Blu-ray transfer anywhere. You have to wait for Netflix to put up its own release in September which will include subtitles. This should be remedied right away. I've asked amazon, and they refuse to provide one. My advice? Stay away from all streaming media until it's available on BD (or blu).

This book sucks. The author was in love with himself and decided to create a fantasy world that had all these amazing things in it. In fact we have the equivalent of something like this where characters say or think what are thought to be fantastic things. I bought this thinking it would give me some cool ideas for my future writing but none whatsoever. If you read this just turn on your radio then go back to work and call an uncle or something. That's better.

I bought this cover several years ago and really like it till now. It still looks new but today the leather on the flap came off. There were no tears or anything, just some glue that comes off in one piece. That is why only 2 stars. : -(Maybe that's how they all come off. If you are careful with it, may work for you. Not sure if everyone needs a lifetime warranty.....UPDATE: I contacted customer service at iPearl.

No picture and no sound. A piece of garbage. Don't waste your money. This movie should be removed from the market place to protect children in this country. Now I am afraid to buy it on vhs. There are plenty available. Be ware.
This Movie didn't come on time which made me mad when i opened it.

So I started off with a lot to love about this book, then it just turned into an extremely slow read and the writing was at times not even good. But finally towards the end when everyone is trying hard (me too)for their lives and everything is really hitting its stride..it takes off. And while all ends well, unfortunately it falls completely flat in what should be a very good ending.

I bought two of these for my girls (ages 9 & 6). One did not work AT ALL. The other one worked about 2 times. It was cute that both times it lit up and she loved it, but as far as durability it's a dud. Maybe we just got bad ones, but we're really disappointed! We returned the first time too, so we'll try again.....will update once I get the new one!

I've been in an office environment with this product for a week, and am looking to see how long the tip will last before failing. The rubber is starting to pull away, showing some signs now of cracking, I only use the tool occasionally but it should not be failing so soon. Too bad cause it's perfect ergonomically otherwise. A very high defect rate on mine makes me think that's just the nature of the beast. Would love if they could re-design it.

I am not a huge fan of the taste of this coffee. The pods tend to get stuck in my machine, leaving me with coffee and grounds everywhere. Also, some days it still doesn't work - makes coffee but no water. It is nice and hot which can be good, however after having used it for two weeks I'm afraid its just another piece in our garbage. Very disappointed :( will use regular K-cups again :)

Too little information on how exactly was done the capture of Idi Amin. Still it's pretty interesting that it has details about the process involved and that there are only some very vague mentions to him being captured.

I usually enjoy stories about the Civil War & its aftermath, but this was not much of a book just some sex scenes and very little else. It didn't really have any "real life" historical details because it took place only in 1861 or so. Don't waste your money.

I'm not talking about the quality of this recording, which as all previous reviewers noted, is excellent but it has been done more cheaply and crudely. Not even that far into listening to 'Live At The Rainbow Theatre', I can find no discernible differences between these two versions aside from a couple of key words on each track (a good thing). So if you already own the earlier edition, you'd be better off getting one because they're just ripping us off.
These are true size. Look great after several trips through the laundry machine.

They do say they are "made in the U.S.A." I know there were 3 of us and had a really hard time getting these to fit right. Even if we'd worked with them they would have slipped all over. Don't waste your money folks. We ended up just sticking them back into place. The shipping was fast enough. Just sorry we bought them. If it wasn't for this particular item we're not sure what else to buy.

this is a terrible product. it didn't even fit the phone. don't waste your money on this! save you hard earned cash and just buy an otter box....i regret buying this..... its not worth wasting money on! please do yourself a favor by going somewhere else to get phone accessory...at least then you'll have something that works......
It's a good product to put in your computer case. Easy to install and use. Comes with an instructional cd. Good quality product.

I have had the Canon for a month now and was using it every day. The picture quality is excellent, no noise, great colors, etc. The camera does everything I wanted, which was very important. However, one day while we were taking pictures in bright sun light, my daughter set her arm on it, pulling up against something. It broke. After replacing batteries, cleaning the sensor, etc. not sure what happened. Luckily with a good case she did not get hurt, but they really should use higher quality, stronger plastic.
No story, just sex and more sex. I wanted something more, no story or history here. Just very boring.

My girlfriend loves cats, so she really liked the mousepad. I like it because its easy to clean. Nothing has stuck or caused a problem with it. The price was great. The only thing is that I wish it were just one huge piece. All of my friends love it, too.
It is smaller than I thought it would be but looks really good and a very inexpensive way to spruce up your living space. Love the price too.

I didn't think the book was well done at all. The whole subject matter seemed to be very shallow and I did not enjoy reading it. I'd rather reread one of Barbara Cartland's. She wrote a much better book. If you want some really good WWII historical novels with great characters--not this one. Try Sharon Kay Penman. You will find her books are just as good. If anyone wants more on WW II try Michael Shaara. You will have an excellent experience. Amazon does these reviews so well.

I have this heater in my kitchen at work to create a more natural heat for the winter months. It works great. With it being placed only 12 inches from your head, you can feel the heat. Its like the outside air is warming you. Very satisfied. A little expensive but worth it. I've been using mine 5 years and still going strong.
This book is just a bunch of old news stories - not very helpful for someone looking for any help or advice specific to this dog. My search continues :)
I have always bought K&N air filters for my vehicles. They are easy to clean in a few seconds, and they keep the engine nice an clean. The best feature is there is no filter media to worry about.

Was excited about having these at such a great price to be able to stream content from my Droid X and IPad but once I received them, the adapters would not connect either device after several tries, ended up returning them. They may have just been defective, other reviewers seem happy with them so I'm guessing it's something wrong with mine. If you're looking for quality, go ahead and pay more than $6 dollars - because the quality was disappointing.

This was not easy to install. It took 2 professional people over 9 hours to set up the system with a new DirecTV receiver. Since we have only had for 1 year, it's too soon to tell. My original problem is still in there. But I don't think it will be fixed. When the receiver first goes cold when watching DVR, DVD player, and sound all come on at once which means you can't run anything else. We tried different HDMI cables, etc, etc.
My grandson will only use this product. He is not interested in any other brand of brushes. It works well for kids who just want to keep their brushes clean without the mess and hassle of scrubbing.
This case fits on well, but does fall off, especially since this product is made from silicone.

My dog loves these so I buy them in bulk for her. But it is a rip-off to pay $6.45 at the pet store and $4.88 here. Not cool because it's cheaper on Amazon. Buy elsewhere if you can't find these... then you will have paid too much! It is almost as silly paying Amazon more than double price...when I can get 6 or 8 of her faves from the store. So disappointed. Will not order again. And don't forget...

Not quite the quality of some other "plasticware," but decent enough for everyday use. It holds plenty without taking up much counterspace. I would recommend it to someone wanting a nice set. My husband has been looking at them every time he enters our kitchen.

This is the worst album i've EVER heard in my entire life. When I first listened to this CD, and how could i not? it sounded like every other punk band out there. So when I bought this and popped it into my CD player, right away I was disappointed. It seemed to me that they were just trying too hard. If you're a fan of Good Charlotte, blink 182, or any similar bands, don't waste your time with this. This group should probably stick with music.

I don't have a lot of good things to say about this item except that it is worth the price. It looks really cool on my macbook pro with the carbon fiber/brushed aluminum design. The legs are made out of aluminum. These parts do come in two pieces though. You will need to take apart your old keyboard and put these on. If you can't see the little metal "clips" or whatever they call them, that's fine, it's still very easy.

I got this as replacement for my old charger. It worked great the first several times but then just stopped working. Very dissapointed. The price is too good to be true. I'll try one more time and go on here. That way if there are issues, at least it'll get a review. Hope it doesn't break or cause any damage since I'm getting ready to throw away all of these and have another set sent out.

For some reason these earphones produce an almost constant buzzing when I have them on or turn the volume up. Even at max volume. Very annoying. I've gotten two sets of those cheap chinese junk ones. They're worth it to spend just a few bucks more. You get what you pay for. Spend your money wisely folks. These are a total waste. I'm very unhappy with this purchase. Don't waste time and money. Get something good. That's where I've ended up now.

This book had very little to do with the original series. I expected more than 5 pages of nothing new. Very disappointed considering what came before. It read as if it was written for a child and put on paper. No sense reading something from someone who wants to get attention.

The plastic base cracked down the center after first use. I took it on vacation and upon returning home discovered that they wouldn't replace it. They quoted me $175 for a new base. I'm not happy about having to buy another blender when my old one cost under $50 in 2006. This was our Christmas present this year we can't even get what money it's worth. Really disappointed! :(

Did not fit my 2001 toyota sienna. Do not buy it if you own a civic. If i was told to return and get another one than id never go through this again. Very unhappy because I need this now. Never again will I purchase from online shopping sites. Its hard enough trying find stuff when you're just out of your mind. This is ridiculous. They sent me the wrong one. Really frustrated that amazon doesn't do anything about this. Oh well its back in there inventory.

I purchased it and never got around to using it. Waste of money, now on Amazon looking for a better one. It didn't help me at all. It's not the best as shown in the picture. I'd recommend sticking with regular ice packs. Not this one! It's okay, but you should get more bang for your buck or higher end.

They work fine with the computer and mouse but would not communicate wirelessly when in my living room 50 feet from router using same router. Sent it back. Amazon made return painless as always. Maybe a different company make this product. It seems to be quality control problems at Logitech? I wanted them for use with our entertainment center/tv setup. Too bad. Now going back without them. As always, Amazon is super.
Not what I expected to be. I guess it is worth the read if someone has never done this before. Just did not see how it could help with weight loss. Very light reading. Was hoping for a little deeper.

This book was an absolute disappointment. A waste of money. Don't believe me? Read what the top reviewer says in her review section. She basically sums up my experience. There wasn't a single thing that I found interesting or useful. The author would have been better off not including any pictures. I'm glad this one is free with Prime shipping- I'll be deleting it from my kindle fire and getting some good reading for free: "The Complete Idiot's Guide to Creating a Healthy Emotion-Free Life." 
 Rating: 1.

i am really shocked that this book made it to print. there is not one thing in here worth taking the time to read. save your money and get something by a real scientist. most of what she writes about are just wrong or misleading. her writing style leaves so much to be desired. I was forced to give this at least 1 star because amazon would not, which says alot more than i can say. if you were thinking bout buying this, don't. buy any other science book.
After a friend put my old one on their key chain that was lost I bought another. Now it always has its own place.
This is an excellent product for anyone with a cat or dog. No more cleaning up the litter all over. The only problem I had was finding good clumping sand to put in it. Just not as common anymore.

My grandson is 7 and loves the movie The Lion King. So when I saw it on Amazon for such a good price, he could not wait until Christmas to get it. It was a great purchase. Thanks! Will buy more in the near future.

This is an easy to use, well designed product that does what it says and works well. I like having two battery packs so if one wears out (which happens often) you already have another good one. The extra plugs are a nice feature for the price too. Would buy again!

I bought one of these before they were all gone and only used it about a dozen times until the belt snapped. The new one looks identical - but didn't last any more than that. the first time I watched this film, I was extremely disappointed.. so for about 2 years, every Halloween after that one and after, they still released this movie as if people thought nobody had bought it to see it. I thought it would be a light but comfortable and cozy blanket. This is not it. It was very stiff when i first got in bed. So we still don't know if its going to soften up. Otherwise the quality seems good. I'm hoping after some more wash that will happen..

the design is great but once you put a battery in and screw it to get a clear pic u can see all your pics, bad buy. i dont recommend not worth $2. spend that on 1 good case. im sure theres lots better ones around. this one sucked.

The game is a good way to enjoy some of the classics like Monopoly. It's fun and allows for better strategic planning which results in longer lasting play. I love it but wish there were more than three houses per round instead of only two. Also, would work well with up to 8-players. I'd recommend it.

This is a poor quality product. It broke the second time I used it and I'm not sure if that's because I had it too tight or not. The metal part detached and one of the handles busted off. Save your money.

The quality of this item was just not up to the price it is being sold for. While on vacation in another country I found one with an all metal handle, a better size fork for our needs and less expensive than these two pieces. Don't waste your money if you have multiple places that would be good for storage. Also check out other reviews before purchasing these.

I would read this book again. It was entertaining and easy to read. Some of the information was incorrect such as he referred to two different types of horses when referring his son who owned a Quarter Horse.

I'm amazed and have no words for this fantastic product. Just love it a lot. Good price as compared to others of its type on amazon.com. We took about 5 years off our carpet with three dogs. It's like having your puppy now without the carpet! It is so easy to handle even when you don't do it very much, just use it. Love it! This should be in everyone's household.

I was disappointed by the short period of time that this battery held a charge. It also only worked well about 5 - 6 months, after which it began to lose its charge very fast. I'm surprised how good a run Amazon has been running, but what ever they are doing, they're doing it! This is my last on-line purchase from them! Not going through them again!
I am giving this fan 2 stars only because my previous fan--another brand with no "swivel"--lasted about 5 yrs.

While I liked the book and concept regarding the life of a boy in India, unfortunately there is too much violence. It was as though something bad happened all to often for my taste. Some things just never change. I'm not giving up on this book. There are plenty more good books that need writing or rereading.

I have read all of James Patterson's novels and this series was one that gave me the opportunity to keep up with the characters and enjoy their interactions. This book is good for a light summer reading without breaking your heart. Some other authors get bogged down in details relating their love lives or are overly violent towards women. When the author allows you a step back into another world, it can be refreshing.

This is not a CD you can use to listen to as it does NOT have the original recordings. It was poorly mastered and sounds like an old AM radio. One of these days I should just send them back but they are so cheap there probably wouldn't cost much at all. Just my opinion. Would somebody please re-issue this with the ORIGINAL recordings? Please do it! The music has been remastered from vinyl records that sound even better now! Thanks! If anyone knows why this doesn't happen, let me know.

I purchased this for my husband because we love to grill. However, the cooking surface is so small that it can't hold enough food for a normal meal. It can hardly put even 2 steaks on there. The whole thing just seems a little too small. We had hoped we'd be able to use it, too, but it's not what we were looking for. Now we'll stick with our old grill and grill pan set. It's easy to clean. As long as you don't leave anything out when washing it.

I got this as a gift for someone who likes to cook... so maybe she enjoyed it, but what we actually got was the newer version with little pieces of bread on them, which is a much smaller size. Too small & not all that nice looking for an office or even the kitchen. To make it work at our house (I need about 15 slices each time I bake), I had to cut down on how many slices...
these didnt like in ears at all...
Works great and looks great. No problems so far. Very satisfied with service as well. Would recommend for anyone.
Too thin to do the job. Would not recomend. My husband found another way to use it. Not as functional and would have returned it.

What happened to the old days when women had pride and self worth of their own? Now we are just an object for his pleasure. Bought this in January and put it on my phone the same day. It seemed okay at first & fit fine. I liked the case. There is so much garbage being put on dvd these days it's not even worth buying. This set would have gotten two stars from me had the movie been OK. My question was if anyone has listened to this and what it says about the other three films?
My son received this item for Christmas. It was fun for the first minute and then it broke. Nothing will fix it. Waste of money. Do not buy! I should have read the reviews before purchase.

This thing is crap! I could have put together a better product. After one week of use the plastic housing for where you plug it into your car fell apart. The entire product feels very weak. My iPod also started to get really hot after an hour or so on my car. Do not buy!!! Waste of money.

I am not sure if it was the product or just me, but this thing is useless. It does make good coffee, and I've had better coffeemakers than this, however, coffee on grounds would be my preference, that being aside from the lack of any carafe. I'm going to continue searching for something useful. As a small bonus, there are no "filter baskets" in which you can put grounds. Not very eco-friendly! You won't regret buying one though as they do break pretty easily.

I bought this and after charging one of my batteries, it will no longer take a charge so it is useless now. It was working great until then. Also, when you have multiple batteries on board, their weight forces them to touch each other and thus make contact with that battery for power transfer. For me, all four batteries are touching at every connect. As far as the light goes, it's okay without being blinding. It provides several useful settings.
Exactly what I was looking for. My 2 daughters really liked the variety of colors as well at a reasonable price. Thanks for providing these.

This book is the worst one I have ever read, I've read every one. What a waste of time, there was some good history in it, but that was about it. My advise don't waste your money get something else more worthy. But if it's free download it and see for yourself..... my opinion you will be glad that at least you've not paid for. I have used this same one for years and when my last two were stolen, I bought another. The plastic is cheap and breaks easily. They need to make a better one.

This is a cheap product. The little tabs that hold the pages closed broke within days of getting it in my drawer. Not nearly strong enough to really protect your records. Spend the money and get something more rugged.

They are smaller than I thought and the handles stick out too far for me to be able to really grip things with them when cooking. The silicone is thick yet not enough so my wrist becomes fatigued after cooking in these mitts. Also they slide around a lot during use.

The quality of this case is fine, and it looks cute when you view the front. But if I drop my phone, it's not protected at all. My iPhone broke while in it. Not even worth sending back because shipping just doubled what i paid to buy it. So all together spend your money on something else. This one will serve as a temporary case, but don't plan it for long term protection. It's cute though. Just be careful how much space between the screen protector.

I bought this as an addition to my Kindle Fire and it works great. The added size is worth the price, which you get a case that allows you great handling with your hands on device. Very sturdy. Great quality item. The other features work very well. Would buy again. Highly recommend.

Great quality and excellent price. I was tired of spending $10 or $15 every few months for new filters. These have been working very well so far. They are slightly smaller than the original, but as long as you have them in your canister it's not a problem. This is one expensive cat litter, but it really does do a great job. Highly recommend. Be sure to replace it once the bag gets full though. If not, there will be litter dust everywhere. My box still looks brand new.

When I first read the synopsis on this book that it was about 2 best friends - a girl and guy who had crushes on each other - It was okay. I kept reading. There were no big surprises to it. Girl falls asleep in class at school then wakes up one night not knowing which friend she is with or even why she's awake.
The tips are way too sharp, causing much discomfort around eyes or eyes. Not a comfortable look for people who work.

Although the author is an impressive and gifted writer -- it's not worth reading much more of his work. He writes with too many cliches, including a "macho cowboy" story line. I know he's trying to write about how women should be -- but it comes across as silly. The constant references are tiresome and the sex scenes laughable. A good editor could have made this into something interesting, and make some changes from what seems like Mr. Weber's first effort. Read any other romance novels by Ms.

The phone is a good basic phone. I use it for answering the voice mail and not to make calls. My only complaint about this phone, since its so cheap, was that every time you answer it, it resets back into standby mode from where you left it. Not very convenient, especially when there's no need to keep your hand on it long enough to press talk.

I bought it for my husband and he is not very happy with it. The keyboard does NOT work properly. Some keys don't work. You can tell there are several places (smidgen) of water on the board because they all have oily spots on them, even though you wiped them off before putting them in. They also come as pictured but this set doesn't include cleaning tools. We ended up buying a separate kit that included those tools.

I was so pleased to finally get a battery for my Samsung Galaxy and it worked great just like the factory one did, but after having this replacement one less than 2 months (about 2-3 charge/discharge cycles, which is about what a new OEM battery does on their own), I'm ready to replace it. This battery's "memory" has completely died. It works perfectly now, if you have to reboot your phone, otherwise it'll be dead in no time - even under light use.

This thing is so terrible my cats wont go near it. It takes up like half the table and they are fighting over it all the time. Oh well..... I had to throw a few of them away! :( if anyone knows of something that works let me know.. or any cat food ideas just tell me!!

This is the first book I've read on this subject. I found it to be really helpful in dealing with an anxious dog. It provided a lot of insight and helped me learn more about anxiety disorders as well as coping strategies. A good read!

The box is nice, its heavy, but the hinges are too short, and it's a little crooked in some places where you can see it could possibly break. Maybe if they would make them better quality, then I'd have given it 2 stars. I don't think the hinge problems affect all cases, though. Even so, when the lid closes properly, this thing will get your glasses scratched up or dented on the back. It looks nice now, but there's nothing that says "you get what you pay for". It's cheap, cheap plastic.

I bought this and after about a month of use it stopped working. The problem is when you try to change channels on the radio, every time i hit one of them it flips the radio off. Its not just if im changing channels, Im hitting anything for half an extra second as well. Not worth it! Save your money and buy something else! Very disappointed in this. Will be returning mine! :(
My 2 year old daughter is a huge fan of the TV show and loves her new blanket. It's not too heavy or thick. It keeps us super warm at night too. Love it. Highly recommend this product! :)

I used to read this author's books as a kid, and enjoyed them very much at that time. As an adult, they lost some luster for me, perhaps because the first part of this book is about a boy who has to go through many horrible things. This makes it interesting but not exactly engaging. The last quarter or so was somewhat better, although still quite depressing. It does have a happy ending, though.

For anyone who is thinking about playing the game, don't get this version and wait for 1.2. They changed all of the basic control mechanics in an attempt to fix what was broken. A total disappointment. It had too many bugs that could cause you frustration. If you're still holding out hope on purchasing this, save your cash until they release a complete game with more polished mechanics. I'd also like to know where my money went.

I was totally disappointed by this cd. It sounds nothing like the orginal or it's cover versions. It's more of a karaoke cd that you should buy for your kids.
