I'm not sure if the product is as good or worse than a lot of others. I did get this free with an order so I have no complaints. It's kind of weird though. The package doesn't say who makes it and there are no reviews anywhere. If you look at some other stuff like this, it's usually either on Amazon selling for $30-50 depending on how old they are. I will keep taking it. Like most things, when results do come, I'll update this. For now...three stars.

I love this product! It's great on the dogs and cats too! Its smell isn't too strong or overwhelming. My only complaint is that I'd really like to find it in a bigger container, but other than that its great! :)

This thing is nothing more than a cheaply made waste of money. No way around it. The software doesn't even work with this adapter unless you run the program on CD or something like that. It comes straight from China and will not install if you don't have Windows 2000. I tried to contact customer service for help getting it to work, got no response.
it was not what I thought or ordered but ok for the money.........
This is my first digital camera. It really does take very nice pictures. Easy to use. I just haven't had enough time to try all settings.
We bought the Cannon A540 about 6 years ago to replace our old Kodak camera, that we loved. This is easy to use in every way! Highly recommend it.

It is exactly as described and at a great price too. I bought this to hold my daughters laptop in her backpack. She loves it!! The item came quickly and was nicely packaged. Thank you so much for your wonderful products! We are very happy customers!!!
Great filter system... I don't know it the pump is louder than many pool filters...this model came witha little hose that holds up to 300 cubic feet.

The film has been unavailable here in Australia while there are copies available at our local video stores. But apparently Warner Bros thinks we Americans don't care about what we're missing, so no need to worry Americans.

The product did not seem to perform as described. I used it once and am still unable to get my screen clean. There is always something stuck in the corners of it from being removed so many times. For me there were better options with cleaning cloth included. These were only about $2 each. Do not buy!

This is junk. You get what you pay for. The metal base with the rubber bottom has fallen apart within first 5 min i had it!!!! Will return as this thing cost me more than original price. Dont buy!!! Waste of money.... :(

this is the same as a few others. nothing wrong with it, but its still cheap. not much out there like that anymore. thanks
Excellent product at a much better price then from the Harley dealer's. Easy to install and great quality. Much cheaper than buying whole new set of pipes which cost $200.00 or more. Amazon ROCKS!!!

There have been hundreds of better Zelda games out there such as, A Link Between Worlds, The Wind Waker HD, Skyward Sword, Twilight Princess, Link's Awakening, Ocarina Of Time, Majora's Mask.....But only one of those are really worth it.

This book really didn't help me in the least since you have to go through a whole series of questions first. It would be fine if it were all one question, but unfortunately that is NOT it. I felt extremely confused and frustrated trying to answer this question correctly. It's a very easy book. The only way for someone with even some experience or basic computer knowledge at all could do well on this. I think it's quite an awful book, don't waste your money unless you're getting it free.

This poster would have been great had it looked as good on a computer screen as my monitor does. It's kind of ugly to look at but if you display it somewhere where they won't see it, then it's fine. However, for a poster, I'm disappointed by how small this one is.

This is the worst book on personal finance that I have ever read. I would recommend this book to those with no economics background! Nothing new here. Buy Michael Lewis' books instead. The advice given by Mr. Kiyosaki are similar in nature but much superior.
Nice looking and works great. It was a gift for my wife, not mine, so I dont know how it works. The only problem is that is made in china. We have nothing good to say about China!!

The batteries are not good as Sony brand. They don't hold charge long enough to even use them after fully charging. If you just want cheap replacements then they may work for you. Just know there were times when I had to use the regular OEM batteries.
The song itself really expresses how wonderful life is. It's been such an amazing thing watching these kids grow up with incredible talents. They will go far!!!
Movie takes you on an exciting ride where little girls are trying to save her life during zombie apocalypse! Definitely was entertaining.
My son wanted this game.
I found these fables just plain awful - none of them were particularly frightening or scary.

This has to be the worst printer I have ever owned. If you print color there is no way of getting it right. The cartridges are so expensive that I'm out all my ink. You can not use other paper with this printer. It won't allow it. It prints very well when new but if one cartridge runs low it's useless for anything or just says wrong part number. This is by far the worse investment I've made on Amazon.

While this book is well written, and the story will stick with you, I wouldn't recommend it to someone who doesn't like strong characters or sex scenes. The other main problem in my opinion was that while there are a few really strong moments, most of it felt completely out of character from both hero and heroine. For example: After their first sexual encounter, they're supposed to be in heaven. At least they say that. They don't actually have sex, or even kiss.
Well It did not fit our phone very well. The charger will fall out if bumped or dropped. The case was too thin for an adult. Would do good to protect a kid but don't drop your phone.

Bought this as something decorative around our fireplace. It's nice but really doesn't bring any sparkle to the place. Very dull. Nothing particularly special about it. But the price is right! Also, arrived very quickly. If you like your fireplace all bright yellow, buy it!

I have tried to use this but it has not worked. If the product is connected to power there are lines on screen no matter what resolution we get through an adapter. The only way I can keep a signal and see any detail is if you don't connect or disconnect your HDMI cable from the source every couple minutes. This happened at first until I figured out the problem was with this product. Not impressed and sending back. Bought another brand for same price that works. 
 Rating: 1.
Scale worked well but must have had some dirt inside. But I think it could not work correctly without dirt. It does what its supposed to.

I have a couple of dozen CDs and several thousands songs in my music library. Since getting this player, I've had it for about 5 months. The FM tuner is great, but the MP3 player has become very hard to listen to. It skips tracks every second, even when playing at lower volume. The first few times that happened were from turning random on or off. The screen works fine except you can't watch videos off it. This problem also happens with some songs, so that's annoying.

I saw a review on here about you can use these as mouse pads and it does not even work. The texture is too rough for the mice feet to rest on, so that would be pointless unless you want them at least temporarily removed from your computer before using them. So you're just wasting your money here. If you have very soft or slick plastic feet, perhaps these will work well enough. But if not, beware. Very disappointed!

I'm very disappointed. I had bought the first book in this series and was captivated by it because of it. But to know there is no fourth book. After reading other reviews about how sad people are. I don't recommend it at all. Its quality is only one of a kind and when my camera broke because the case would stick in it. I can't believe that this product cost more than $10. If you're ready to put more money into good protection, choose something else, even if you have to spend more. Just don't buy this. Even though I'm talking about Nikon cameras, there are lots and tons similar cases. It's worth your time.

This is a review of the Audio Fidelity CD that Amazon sent me. They are not really known as very good audio engineers - so I guess they were too lazy to find and listen carefully enough between track #2 and #3 for their mistake. What they have done here is, in effect, changed track #3. Now you may think that tracks 3 & 4 are identical or the same song. It's not. They're two different songs; one has been shortened by an entire measure while the other appears unchanged.

I have been a fan of Anne Rice for many years. However, this series lacks the passion that is her great gift. You may notice by my rating that I'm not giving it five stars -- well, they get one anyway. I do wish she would return to more creative and original writing. This wasn't bad, but it didn't rise above two stars, either. It's just lacking soul. The characters are shallow stereotypes. No real insight into who or what these people are, nor do any of them seem likeable at all.

The quality of music is outstanding, but it doesn't start playing the next track until it's half way through a track. There must be some type of glitch with that. It's not like I'm missing something or my computer can handle it. It just won't finish what it started doing, and I had to restart every time for it. I've listened to dozens if not hundreds of CD's in 2 months, and this one was certainly the worst. I'd recommend passing on this:(
These did not fit. They kept poking up. I gave them to my daughter who loves them. She was very disappointed.
These have helped me tremendously with my circulation problems. It also helps when you need more air around you. Love it!! It has really help out :)

I have not finished reading this. All it is, is a book rehash of everything found all along at the Internet. It tells you how to build your own website but does not tell what that means. You can look up tons and more web sites on line free of charge. Save yourself some money and time, dont buy it, borrow if from someone like the library. After reading the reviews I was aware that it may not work for me, but still bought it. Bad idea. I'm giving two stars only because is actually can protect my laptop. If you're looking for something to protect any electronics from scratches or damage, go another route.

I don't understand why all the 5 star reviews for this book. The characters were underdeveloped and most of them seemed to have no character at all. For example, the supposed hero, a half angel, kept referring to an angel in his own blood as "that old boy down there..." He would seem to know nothing about angels, let alone their mission in life.
This is my second Wii. I wish they would not take sooooo long putting games out because these things are really fun (and cheap).
Did he have a problem with the fact that his wife went first and then me? And no thanks Mr. Gough. I just thought your writing style wasn't for me.

Not much information or recipes for real meat substitutes, maybe they are just veggie based. If not, not what I'm looking for. A waste of my money...which sucks! They say if it looks too good to be true, then it's probably not. Sorry.
Good for dogs and cats. No stomach upsets like some other products I've tried from another manufacturer. We highly recommend.

I got this router last year and just about the first time I used it with my HP laptop, in the middle of an online lecture, it went into a reboot loop. My internet connection would go bad again for awhile after that but wouldn't actually restart. About 5 minutes later when connected to the other router, everything is fine again. This weekend was just like every other weekend, which makes it frustrating because if you bought it, then return it. The warranty says 1 year, but you're on your own.

The product works great but there are two things that bothered me with this product. First the screen protector gets scratched really easily I had my on for just a day and it already has scratches to it. Second is while taking pics or video it's hard due to the reflection of your phone's screen. It would be ok in certain situations such as outdoors or when you're not trying too take pictures it may work well. Not saying anything negative about the protection part only the picture quality.
The story line was good. It flowed well.
I read this book to the end and it never really ended. What a disappointment!Very easy to put down... Not enjoyable at all. Save your money.

We have owned two of these units at different times and both are not reliable. Some unit go on the blink as if to charge but don't even show full charge. The other has failed in less than three months, without warning, with only a year warranty. These were fairly expensive units for such poor reliability. I will continue my search for another brand that works.

Like most others here, thought these dolls were "cute," but they are very poorly made. Our 6 yo granddaughter was crying tears as soon as we opened them up. What had to be 15 seconds worth of fabric tore when she attempted to put them together. They're going back.
Our two little dogs, Sadie and Bella, are enjoying these.

Although it looks like a nice little product, I could do without the loud motor noise that is emitted. The unit would work fine if you didn't need to listen for it. It also is not very loud. I did test the suction power though by using my hand vacuum cleaner with which I got good results. All in all, I'd say its worth $17 as long as you don't mind being aware of sound when vacuuming.

For a book that got tons of star review from Amazon, I'm surprised? This one is pretty disappointing for me. I've read through enough books about parenting my two children over many years to understand what makes them who they are.

I purchased this item for my son and its not the right charger for his computer because it uses two prongs, instead of one prong. I have to return it. Now that I am writing this, i will be out a lot in shipping, so why bother. Amazon should review their vendors better. This was either false advertising or incorrect product description. The cost vs. value isn't worth spending the extra money, especially when you buy something through mail order anyway.

This movie is slow and boring to a point, not bad acting, though. Not really worth buying or even renting. One good scene towards the end. Worth saving for last. Definitely my least favorite of them all. No special features either. Not worth what I paid at Best Buy after seeing it there first. If you enjoy long slow, drawn out movies, maybe you'll like this one. Me, not so much. Too much blood and guts and way too many unnessary details. Also some weird thing going on.

This product was not the one I ordered. It did fit into my camera, but it will not activate either in sleep or on off. As soon as you put a battery in, none of these functioned. Save your money and buy something else. At least if it's expensive, it probably takes some getting used to for a replacement. For me, this is junk.
Easy install! Have always used and am going back to them as always...the quality is just right for my needs! Thanks
If you love reading about his family as if they weren't real. Boring story line. No action at all.
The TV is ok but they advertise "No Motion Blurr" with 1080P.

What you see is what you'll get. I'm not complaining and it's worth it for the low price that I paid; a whole lot less than one cable in most stores. This same cord was going to cost over $20! At this point - It's perfect. A little tight out of packaging. Once removed from packaging -Perfect. You have been warned. Do check your HDMI port. One thing - my device doesn't detect that its plugged in. Not sure if there's other cables like this. No problem.
When i plugged in on first time, sparks appeared from it, as soon after connecting, some electric shocks came out. The charger seems ok but obviously this is not designed for Lenovo Vostro 1520.
Bought a couple of the first size and one broke within 10 minutes at work when the plastic hinge was snapped right off on my belt. I will be sending back for credit or exchange.
This was great out of one ear, but stopped working after six months.

This phone was advertised as new, and at a better price than what I actually paid. However, the phones were opened (not packed or wrapped) and, worst of all, there is no power cord. No where in this site of other items did it say that these items would be shipped without all pieces listed to use it. So buyer beware and don't just blindly order whatever you see if comes with everything, when they are not.

Don't know how this product can be rated 5 stars..it doesn't work! We are so disappointed in Amazon. Our daughter was very excited to play her new games for Christmas. Guess what....none of them were playable! Tried downloading again today - still didn't work.

I bought this in hopes of not hearing the cliche'd messages on my answering machine. But every single time someone answers, it plays their messages. Waste of money if you don't care about what message they're going to hear. What a waste of money!! Not worth it. So much for "saving money, and peace of mind."

Bought this product to use with my Blackberry in conjunction with the Samsung Galaxy S3 phone as a GPS-only application. I had hoped that it would work just fine for me without any gliches. It does, and then some. There were no issues getting device pairs up with both devices or navigating within settings - they seemed more seamless using BT than through Bluetooth. However, when driving down I-5, there will be times where GPS navigation won't work.

I bought this book hoping it would help me start a new blog, but it's hard to find the information you need. There isn't nearly as much info in here about blogging from start-ups-to-self-pubs; instead of covering specific kinds blogs and topics like social media, or even general information, it's just "blogs, get blogging". I've been working on an e-reader blog for 5 years now.

This is a very strange movie. If you're just into the supernatural and love to read about ghosts then this movie may be enjoyable for you. I was hoping it would explain how spirits can communicate with living people though. Instead of saying "They come in your dreams you know when they do" it says basically that everything happens according to plan. This movie talks more about how demons inhabit our world now than ever. And yeah, it's all real but not very scary.

It was not what I thought of it when reading the book in an on-line magazine. They wanted a minimum rating so they used my name. The first few times you read this, you'll understand why. In any event. After about 10 pages of his whining and ranting, it really did make me wonder "what kind of moron would publish this?" That got lost by page 100. A very disappointing work which is now sitting at Goodwill waiting for someone to pick it up.
Cheap doesn't work real good. Keeps falling off just keep looking cause you'll think you got something better soon. You need to try harder.
It's great product. Fits well. I've had this for several months now.
The concept is nice but don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
It's a fun movie, love those characters, have read most of the books. Will buy it when it comes out, wish they had picked someone less famous. But maybe there were no known alternatives to cast.

I find that the first few minutes of each movie can be really irritating, but after seeing them all through, you may just prefer some over others. I have to admit I am a HUGE fan of this movie, and would love it if we could've had commentary tracks from any cast members, especially Christopher Lloyd, which is very important in the movies. The only thing annoying was at times Peter Sellers seemed too nervous as he spoke (and laughed) during several scenes.
One of the lenses was not as advertised. Lens is good though. Still working on resolving all problem. I have had trouble with a couple that were sent to me.

This is a very cute toy, but our cat loves it no more than the day we got it, not only does he pull himself up to sit on top of it, I find him chewing holes in it. He still likes when my daughter plays with him, and has tried several times at opening his own little zippers, which are all chewed up. We don't know why, maybe they were too hard for him...

There are lots of good reviews on these earphones so I'm just going to go ahead and add a couple things. 1st - the sound quality IS decent, but don't expect top notch sound. 2nd - if I could rate this thing with zero stars I would! The ear pieces came apart, one after another, in less than 2 months. One side is now completely detached from the headphone cord at exactly the exact same place it was attached when they started coming apart.
It's a great product. Good quality and looks great. It fits the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 8.0 perfectly. Love it...

I love the look of this mug, although when you push a button to drink from it and hear that plastic popping noise like an ice cube in your drink, it's quite jarring. Unfortunately, that's about all these mugs are good for if you're drinking coffee. Mine popped open while trying out the trick where when I'm driving with my car door open, there is some movement going forward, it just kinda pops.

I was hoping for a nice small book to use around the house, this is in no way that. There are many errors such as "where you go,has been renamed just once after the author left it and his family changed it. If something looks too good, it usually is. So I'm disappointed with this. Save your dough folks, pay someone else or buy it used.

I bought this to use for my new iMac 15", which has a DVD drive (usb) but no card slot. When the product arrived, it was smaller than expected, about half of its size. However, after trying it in two drives from different manufacturers and several DVD-RW discs, I'm satisfied enough with it. It's not fast, nor is it quiet; It operates much more quietly (and less noisily) then my USB optical drive. If you just want something that's portable and cheap, try this.

I bought this book thinking it would fill a niche between the great scholarly works of Dr. David Bentley Hart on Christianity and other writers who like to tell stories for the sake of telling stories, but with little attention given to making any point and certainly not attempting to be anything more than an entertaining, sometimes funny story teller. That is exactly what Mr. James has done in this short, light read that is more concerned about engaging your mind then convincing you.
A nice case, well made from good material, fit perfect first day.

This was not worth the money. I guess your really take for nothing what you just buy. Very cheap feeling. Not at all as shown and I could have easily created a better one by hand. Please spend my money on something else!

Excellent price and service. The product is exactly as described when purchased with Amazon prime shipping. I would recommend this to anyone who needs an inexpensive power cord. It works perfectly for my Acer computer.
I gave this product 2 starts instead of one because it's cheaper than buying the OEM replacement... but then you have to buy a new battery as well.
The author does not know what he is talking about, but his information about this topic might help someone that doesn't understand quantum physics.
works great i have 2 kids ages 6 & 3. it makes life easier..the only problem is...

It is a very strange movie. For those who liked this film and are curious why people did so please read the books instead of watching it. First off lets start with the good parts: When i first saw the movie trailers I thought it had some interesting points to make. Unfortunately for me when I actually tried watch this film, it was not about that at all. You could see all along how big Hollywood producers wanted to show that they knew what their target audience wanted.

It was easy to install and I loved the idea how all three of them worked. That is, my cats played with it. But this toy lasted 1 day before one of the ends stopped working. One more thing we have found that is not made in the US anymore. And even the name is an import. Go for a Kong toy! 
 Rating: 3.0 
 Our cat loves tennis balls so she likes it but unfortunately they don't last long.

Works very well for a low price. We use them on our boat during the winter season when I need to run an additional plug in. I've been using for several months now and haven't had any issues. You get what you pay for.

I used the device four times before it stopped working. This occurred just days after my warranty expired when a large piece of plastic that holds the motor cover in place cracked near where the two halves come together. Needless to say, I'm very disappointed with this purchase and certainly cannot recommend it. I've had several other electric kettles over the years (cheap ones) which never developed any issues. I'll switch back to those now - it's worth spending more.

I never received my purchase. Amazon said that it was "delayed by the mail." My grandson loved this. He loves cars and anything John Deere. When we contacted Amazon.com they kept saying they were refunding our money, when nothing is refund. It's been almost 2 months. My grandson's birthday isn't for two weeks yet but we're having to come up with what to do without a gift this Christmas. So disappointed! This seller doesn't seem trustworthy.

This product does not do what it says - which has to be some kind of scam... I would return it, but it's too late. Do NOT waste your money on this product! If you are looking for something that ACTUALLY WORKS; go with a Dr. Scholl product. They work great!!

This book goes against every principle of sound finance and economic theory. The author does not even attempt to provide sound statistical information. Her "corrects" are based on a highly questionable statistical analysis from her own previous work with the IRS. If you want basic financial history, there might be something in this book. Otherwise, pass it up. It's a shame that many people will buy into this. I'm an attorney practicing real estate law, but I would rather use my time studying the principles she outlines.
The first disc I ever ordered would not play whatsoever. So much for Amazon "prime". This one is going back!

The material is good and looks great. However, I bought an extra-large thinking it would be roomy. It isn't, although they advertise that it's the size of a large. Very disappointed because this is my son's favorite T-shirt. Not so much for what he actually got to wear out on campus. Bummer. You need more information about your sizes/sizes.

This is great for carrying groceries and other everyday stuff. The zipper has broken after about 3 months, but I do like how easily it fits back in the trunk when it's empty. Also, it's made very well so I am not afraid to use it! Would definitely recommend this item!
Purchased this cover with a Dell Inspirion 15" Laptop last August, It has lasted for 6 months until recently when by accident one strap ripped open.
My husband liked it very much. We added sand over top as soon as we put it up there. We have no regrets with our purchase!

My boyfriend and I are very happy with this tv, the only reason i gave it 4 stars is because we havent use much of that feature yet. The price was great, and shipping very fast from Amazon. A couple things to mention: if you have a bluray player or game system that does not support HDMI then dont count on using it. There are two hdmi outs which will come in handy.
My dog absolutely loves Greenies.

This item worked fine when we first got it. It doesn't hold a charge more than 15 minutes now and I am having to constantly remove it from the laptop in order for it not to keep dropping out of charge. Total waste.

I was looking very forward to reading this book. Although it started off rather promising, the lack of proof reading, grammar, and punctuation quickly led me not only to a book that is less than satisfying but one which leaves much room for improvement before its publication. With so many errors in grammar and spelling, as well as numerous typos throughout, I gave up after several chapters. This book, according to various reviews posted on Amazon by other readers, may be even more poorly edited than my own writing.

this is probably the worst game i've been playing for the ps3...it lacks so many good things about a great game. there are only 14 levels (i feel you should be allowed to build larger buildings and more places to run around in such as skyline) and no bosses except a couple tiny enemies. most of all they cut out some of my favorite features that made up my last video games for me including being able to switch between your characters through any menu screen.

It didn't work. Won't download on Windows 7 Ultimate. It's also really slow at getting graphics and sound running (it's supposed to).This is an older game, so I'm guessing something else has changed with them. It looks as though other people have used other versions of this, but for me it's garbage.

These lasted all of two days. One one ear fell off, after less than half an hour we had lost both. My daughter was very disappointed in these. Cheap plastic, poor quality, not well made. Would never purchase from this seller again.

This isn't worth the money.. The plastic screen doesn't adhere to either of my iPads... I would be very embarrassed to give these as gifts. They're not even good enough for a kid. Not worth it at all!!!! DO NOT BUY!

I don't like the shape of it. It is not comfortable to hold it, as well I hate it that you have to charge battery for every time that need a recharge. So now I got another phone, which was in good condition and also came with charger, so everything will be fine.

This product did not last long at all. Not what I expected for the price. It worked fine but then in less than a year no longer charged batteries. Only works with rechargeable battery. If anyone wants to try this and can get it for under $10,I have two of them on hand. They are great!! Hope you do too. By Ray B

I have a very active little dog (Havanese/German Shepard mix) whose favorite thing is to destroy anything that comes his way. He destroyed this in less than half an hour. The seams tore within the hour so he was able to get at whatever it was. Very disappointed and cannot recommend purchasing it. It might interest kids who are destructive or dogs with strong teeth but not for aggressive chewers. :(
I bought this product about 6 months ago off amazon.

I was really excited for this book. At the end of Book Three, things were getting pretty intense. We were finally finding out some answers. There are a few more interesting points to make in these books. For instance, we learned that Rose had some kind of... mental illness, I'm not sure if that's meant literally. She wasn't just acting crazy; she seemed like her whole personality changed. All in all, it was an improvement over. But then came book four...Now it's so much better. So much.
This was ok. It's kind long and tedious. There are some interesting stories, which add to an understanding of one man's life experience, but really there's no new information.

Not the book I was looking for but there wasn't one to help me with my project. Guess I'm not sure what you want unless you're a serious woodworker. As someone who wants to learn more about wood working - this isn't it. If you'd like help in getting your project done, check out Doug and Mel Bay's book. You'll enjoy these guys even better.

The color is nice and matches my decor, but there was a split down the middle/end of it. I would not recommend this product. Not worth even the cheap price. It should have cost less. Very disappointed.

It says it fits the Kindle 3g but when we got it, there was no hole for any part of our Kindle. This thing will be sent back. Very disappointed, I guess that's what happens when you don't listen to reviews....ugh!
My kids love this movie. This is the perfect thing to watch when you have a snowy winter in your house. Definitely recommend.

The screen protector was just a cheap piece of plastic; not even worth $1. I would buy from another company and pay more! In addition, it was creased on the side so there is no way to smooth out the crease as your smoothing bubbles out. Just awful!! Don't waste money on this item, or I'll have you arrested for wasting my taxes!!!!! Not happy! They can't get worse than this!!! Thank goodness it's only $2. What a waste! :-( 
 Rating: 1.

After a year of this machine, the steam button stopped working. I've also replaced my tank with another one and it still doesn't work. I used distilled water when cleaning as some revies suggested. A lot better product out there.

I was initially disappointed in this game, because the sound quality is horrible on my computer and it doesn't seem like it's anywhere near a hi-def experience. As soon as EA learned that people were looking to buy this, they lowered it, but didn't take too much away from it. The game itself seems fun once you get used to. There will be players who have little experience with other sports games (like me), so don't try playing against them unless you've played hockey before.

This is nothing you need unless you're doing light duty to start with. It's all cheap plastic and I don't even know if it's strong enough for that. The key chain is also pretty cheap. It won't make me happy when it breaks just getting in it. I'll be buying a bigger one, something that's better made this time, at some point.

the book was great and gave very useful information that I needed to learn things about chickens and care them better. It also made me realize there are so many types of chickens some more well known than others when it comes to care, feed etc. This is the second one in my house being read which tells us they all vary a bit as far if it's worth getting another book.

So much for the good idea of a stainless steel can with no plastic! I was disappointed to learn that after being in use less than ten times, this plastic had begun showing and chipping on every can. It wasn't an issue before, but now it's getting worse at the seams between top handle and lid handle. Looks very bad under use. A friend told me about rubber bands used as handles. I'm glad Amazon has them because replacing it is cost prohibitive.

I just finished listening to this whole album. All you have left is to sit back and say what an outstanding album it is, and feel better about yourself in the process. At two hours long (which for me, means one heck of alot), you're going to forget very quickly that every song on here could easily fit onto a single cd. And no, I don't want any more music from these guys but all their other albums.

This was actually a gift for my husband. He really likes it. I am so glad it came quick and in such great shape! Thanks again Amazon. It is well packaged too. We will be buying more products very soon. Keep up the good work! Thank you again! Karen P
This item worked exactly as described and I think it will help greatly with the storage of all my garden supplies. Very good product. Easy to use.

I bought this DVD thinking it would be like all the others where there was a live concert/interview in between each song. It is NOT!!! Only one camera and you can barely make out what she or he says!!!Waste of money DO NOT BUY until they get rid if that stupid feature. Very Disappointed!!

This camera was fine for the first couple of months, but then it started doing this. Once you turn off a camera, and before turning back on, if one is plugged in, after only 10-20 seconds or less that computer will disconnect (and go silent since USB-3 port isn't working, like usb ports on computers) - sometimes it'll stay this way until it's unplugged. That's not good when I'm working late at night and need to switch between cameras.

We purchased this camera and the matching camcorder for our family trip to San Juan Island last year, and while it took a little tweaking of settings until we were in a good location, we love how crisp and clear all three videos turned out. There is one small downside to these cameras, however: you can't view them straight on your computer. You either have to hook the camera's USB cable up to the computer or use their included software download tool.
This is a poorly written book. The author repeats the same ideas over and over, which are all common sense. I feel bad that people have really wasted their money reading so many pages of this drivel.

I bought a brand new unit of this drive in late October 2012. The latest software version was 6.0.4, and it would only mount some files as partitions. Some partitions were actually recognized but not shown on the system. In addition, most users reports that copying large data takes so long (around 30 - 60 seconds) to copy from the SSD to their SATA controller (desktop), which means you'll have read time equal (or sometimes longer) than write time, making these drives pretty useless.

There are so many great reviews for this product here. It probably won't make you happy in the long run. But it certainly does not hurt in the short term! And at $6 a month, it's easy to see why I would be able to afford it. We have two indoor cats and one outdoor cat. This little device seems to calm both of them down -- especially when we put their favorite treats into it.

So I read a review of this book prior to buying it and as my father has suffered from cancer twice, having died each on different days, I thought that since cancer is not going away it's just another one more thing he can do. I'm currently trying hard enough for him to come back but he's doing very well with chemo at home and will be back in September or so.

This product is good when it works, but has many problems with the software needed to connect it properly and for any device that needs to be used to receive data. At my current price of $80, you would think I could buy another one since they work so well at first. But alas, none were available, or likely have been in production, after some months now, even though this item says there are plenty on Amazon.

It looks nice but after using it a few times, I find that my phone falls out of the case. The case stretches and keeps falling off. Even with no cards in it, this is pretty annoying. But on top of that, the pockets inside are barely enough room to fit your money or credit cards. If i had known this, then i'd have just bought another phone case.. :/ I'm gonna go get something else now. Waste of time & money.. :)

The overall length of this book is quite short, but it gives you a detailed understanding as to how the different companies are using Webforms. If you're looking for help in implementing what you're going to implement, I would recommend investing your time onto another text. I have used other online source documentation through out my career and this one was by far not worth its price. There seems to be more information just on websites than anywhere I've seen.

I just got my iPad and this case has been great, though only because there were some scratches on it upon arrival. Unfortunately the corner corners have a huge hole in them. As much as you would like to think that your screen will not be damaged if you're carrying around something sharp like scissors or keys, but these things shouldn't even fall out and they do after reading many reviews.

I find the information here very helpful. The author gives a good summary of how you should prepare for an exam. However, he lacks one thing. It is completely lacking in detail. For instance,he describes two scenarios on different exams with no particular detail or discussion. If you go back and review each exam question after reviewing this book it looks like you were doing most of them. But then when all was said and done, many parts didn't even apply to my test.

This was not an 'upgrade' but just what I would have gotten from the phone box without any of these features. Very disappointed since it is supposed to be the most advanced phone. It has poor volume and no good speakerphone. I returned mine.

The price of this item was very good, but when I received it, it's just a cheap case. I had to cut all the opening so that it fits my phone better. At least, that's what it looks like in photo. But other cases which are really good don't have cuts for some buttons. It is kind of bulky and made cheaply. When I ordered this, thought if everything works out okay, I'll keep it.

After my Dell computer was damaged recently, I decided to invest in a netbook for travel. This is exactly what I needed. When you first turn it on there are no programs preloaded, but once you've got your internet information and email set up it's very easy to use. It has lots of storage space so that I've been able to keep most everything stored locally. The only thing I'm disappointed with is that the screen resolution isn't as sharp as I'd like or hope for....
The screen protectors feel like they are going to rip you with all the force required. There was some damage when it arrived with two cracks on both sides (fortunately at different angles).

I can't believe people like this stuff. What a waste of plastic, time and money. It's not even funny--its pathetic. This is a classic example of what passes for comedy today. All the good stuff that's still left on tv will probably come out eventually, but until then this...This just isn't funny. It's insulting. It reminds me now how bad my childhood was compared to most young people's nowadays. Not funny, stupid, pathetic, and so obviously fake. Even at $3.99 it's not worth it.

This is the second one of these that I purchased. First time it was a lemon and then this one. On both, there have been major issues with either connection or functionality. For starters - both units are slow on start up when in their cradle so you can't plug them in. It took nearly 8 hours for it to "boot up." If you don't want an alarm clock plugged into your desktop at all times, don't buy this.
Item took long time with standard shipping but price was right. Works perfectly and no problems even after 3 months. Hope it stays like that. Good product! Thanks Amazon!

The product was shipped and received timely. However, after three weeks of use, the back light completely stopped working. It is almost impossible to see in lower light. While driving at night it can be difficult for me with my failing eyesight. I will not purchase another one as this was priced very high. So I don't know if others have had luck or not. If you do then it would depend on how much time you expected them last before replacement.

This book has everything you need to know about managing your time and work space. While it is great that her approach works for most people, I didn't care for the book. I expected more from her as she was the one who recommended it. It's only been a few days so maybe things are changing and my feelings would change after enough days. But I couldn't get beyond page 10. As other reviewers mentioned, it's written in lots of bullet points.

I will never buy anything from this vendor. They sent me a product that was not even the correct item. The item came with two different pieces of software and neither work right for my laptop model. There is an entire CD about nothing to do about it. So as a matter if fact it did NOT fix my computer. It only gave my computer problems. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!

This is one of the worst books I have read. It started out ok however it quickly got weird. The heroine turns into Mary Sue. She does whatever he wants to her and even gets him drunk. Her sister starts talking like she has sphynx. And all they think about in sex scenes is how much they want it. So no romance what so ever. They don't know that any other brother came or went before him. What were the authors thinking putting them together this way.
This story started out promising but quickly fizzled in typical romance novel fashion.
The product was cheap and did what it said except that the paint started to chip after less than one month. Not a good buy. Will stay with other options for cases.

I'm not sure if this is supposed to happen with these little speakers but I find that when the iPod is plugged in it starts sounding distorted. The same sound quality and volume as when you connect headphones or directly using your ipod. Also, my friend tells me she's always getting static noise from her device for no apparent reason. It's been doing so since she received it. EDIT: So, I've had this product for a while now & it's terrible.

I read somewhere else that this was good for "people with allergies....no sneezing and runny nose." Not so much. This product seems to be a waste of money. In my case, not one minute after applying it, there were white flakes coming out from underneath.

I have used this product many times before and the results are always outstanding. I was surprised when we opened a can that it wasn't like that. The sauce on top had leaked into the cans of tuna. This is one thing where I'll find out later. In summary, buyer beware, maybe we'll get lucky but I'd bet my last dollar it's been compromised.

I really needed a new charger. When my old, worn charger cord died, this seems like an ideal replacement. It arrived on Wednesday, the next day, so shipping was fast, but then when I opened it, it didn't work. I hope so because I've never read any of this author's books before and have heard that she writes very well with endings. If so I'll probably try one next. Otherwise don't waste your time or money on this book. There are other authors who make their readers wait for much better endings! :(

I am an ardent fan of The Last Dragon, and it seems to me that this book is almost totally pointless. It's just the text version from Dragon Ball Z's manga series, with no commentary or explanation. So it's pointless seeing why Goku has such a bad temper, or what Bulma's powers are in relation to her human appearance. However, I'm going to warn you about reading it. A few things happen early on when a character dies.

I didn't receive this item not once. It's a great game when it gets the product, and I'll be sending them back they were so poorly done. My grandson wanted to play. He said he got tired of waiting for it. There are times that he's told me that all that's left is getting on to play again and then it won't load. This has happened several times. Please stop selling this. When he finally received it, it's as much fun if you don't get everything at all.

I purchased this for a client of mine that has to use a wheelchair and was going through several tubes every couple months. She had tried ice on her legs previously which didn't help at all, as she is petite but very tall. This really helps tremendously with the numbing process. The pain goes away within just minutes. Good product! Just be sure you have your receipt or insurance card handy when it arrives.

As the title says, I've had it about a month and I really have no way to even tell how great this product is. However, from my research it's not that great. The battery compartment is all one piece of plastic. What happens after many months on a long plane trip?I'm afraid I'll never know. That's what happened. I plugged in my camera which was fully charged - turned it on. Took off first thing when I landed.

I purchased this to replace a similar style kettle that had lost its whistle/whistle. In comparison, this appears well built and it has the "whistle sound" that was important for me, but it's so light you have difficulty holding it. It feels like one might break it, just by picking up it. Other than these issues, I'm not dissatisfied in any way. It's also nice having two extra holes on either side of the bottom. That way, if only half your kettle is used, you're still brewing more.

I found this book extremely slow reading. It seemed the author was more interested in his own observations about life than helping us to learn any lessons we could from it. He gave very few references and never defined some of the concepts he discussed making it difficult for me (avid reader) to work out what is meant by a sentence or concept.

This film is so bad it almost makes good for the first two thirds. It suffers from a plethora of unforseen plot devices and terrible dialog. The acting also really suffers. And then when one looks at the rest of what they are supposed to be dealing with, you realize how incredibly bad everything is. It's like watching some high school production with no budget.
Great price on an awesome tool. I've used it for 2 years now and have zero complaints. I would definetely buy more Milwaukee tools from Amazon.

Not what I was hoping for. Wish the information had been more clear about how to clean it properly and such. Didn't even get through half of the book. Maybe I'll give that one a try someday! The pictures were great though.
As someone who loves fantasy, especially of the young adult genre, this story was highly predictable. Every character and event had been done ad nauseum by this author somewhere else.

The premise for this film is great. A girl who has survived childhood horrors and is trying to find her way forward in life, so she can help heal the wounds of others. Unfortunately there's not much story or substance here. There's no development as far as character growth or anything else...just a bunch of teens drinking alcohol! If they got off some weed it would be fine, but not on booze with other kids around them that look like preteens. It's just kind of...
Bought at a local retailer. Opened package and could hear something rattling inside.

The box came with all kinds of plastic pieces from the manufacturer. It had a lot to do about assembling. Once up and in use, there were too many issues for me to keep. I can say that after using it less than half its life, we found out how much better steam irons are. After being used for almost 30 days, just because they are new, the light won't ever work or turn on even if nothing is plugged in. This was also my first iron as it has been 6 years.

One problem with this system is that when you use a microwave, the temperature gauge on the display goes up by 10 degrees. If you're sitting at your kitchen table having dinner, it will be 110 degrees. We all know that's not good. It's very frustrating to try and cook something that isn't as hot or even warm because it's taken 20 minutes longer than usual to cook. You have to take what you consider to be the time appropriate measurement off of there anyway, like one minute from start to finish.

It did not fit at all and it broke as I was taking off the cover to see if a better one could be made for what i intended on doing. Just a waste of my money. Not happy. But thanks you have been nice about it.

It got here in a timely fashion, the package was not damaged. However, I had to take my kindle out of it because there were holes where two plastic sides would be at this point so the Kindle could fall right out. Maybe I shouldn't have tried to put that on but just putting it in without any padding really upset me. You get what you pay for. If you want something better spend extra money. But I wasn't thrilled with it. Sorry but for $17 though that's about right.

I thought that the color was nice but with a dog that has bad breath and doesn't brush well this is not helpful. It also seems to have trouble getting stains out of our light beige carpets. This one just isn't working out. At all. We can't afford another vacuum at the moment so we keep it plugged in because it's good for car vacuums or other quick jobs. But as far as cleaning house - maybe that's too much demand on it.

This book was not worth my time. There are a few good quotes from the movie, but that's all it had so I wasted my money. It could and should have been summed up more simplily. Sorry - never buy this book. Read the movie instead!
Easy to use....Great product! Works great! No issues.. It heats up in about 30 mins..And works good. Love the retractable cord.

the material is not bad, but if you have long hair beware because this wig pulls your hair and it looks unprofessional. I really regret buying it. And also mine doesn't look like it's even from Kenzo, just a fake one. But for under $7 its worth it! So I'm giving one extra star. Just know that it's pretty bad. It's okay though cause it'll fix my short haircut.
This book started out interesting, but then took too many turns into unbelievability right from the beginning. Just couldn't believe how stupid this guy was. Even in fiction, we can't be that dumb.

This is the first time in 30 years that I have been disappointed with anything produced by Amazon. They say it will fit an older model, but there are no holes pre drilled or pre-threaded on my old style Delta faucets, so this was not a good purchase. So while Amazon did refund me immediately - I am out $26.00 and still very unhappy.

I received "Flawless Beauty - The Ultimate Face Mask," for free, from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion of the product. I'm not going to lie, it didn't make anything worse. My face looked smoother and more radiant. However, nothing changed. It wasn't a night cream, but an extra serum that you put on top your moisturizer. I'll be investing money into products with better results next time!

In a nutshell, don't waste your money on this piece of junk. I've had it for two months and it's already gone bad. I can either hear static or interference (which makes for horrible music, which is the whole point!) It was really cheap. Not even worth trying to ship back so there's that. Save your money. Try another product.

The premise of this book has great potential for an interesting read. However as the story progresses it goes from good to worse, I had no idea what happened in some sections. My initial problem with this novel was that it appeared to have been written by two different authors. This is not unusual however when a first effort attempts at writing becomes self published. It would appear therefore that perhaps one editor or better made up author should write another installment based on where things need going and who needs help fixing it.

This is a great looking item. However, when it arrived, I found that there was no "lock" for the front latch. To keep your stuff safe, it's important to have some sort of lock like this, and these bags come nowhere close as far as security. As they say, you get what you pay for... In this case, I bought something other than what is advertised. Amazon really needs to improve their advertising regarding locks. I'm returning mine.
This thing really works well, especially for me.

I ordered this book as well As all the others of Ms. Quinn's that I've read. Well let me tell you, I'm soooooo disappointed. This is definitely not my style at all. The writing lacks emotion. I found myself skipping through every couple chapters just to get back to how much she didn't want it. A lot a times its very boring.
I like his way of writing, and most important this book gave me a lot on how to use my imagination.
My old Sunbeam that I had for several years finally wore out and it was a disappointment - this Hamilton Beach is the least effective one I've ever used to get wrinkles out.

This is the most frustrating item I have ever purchased from Amazon. The picture clearly shows a full back brace but does not indicate that it contains some kind of gel insert. If there was any kind of gel you would think this could be comfortable. In fact what feels like one of those things made for people with high level tennis elbow, feels far too hard for someone who has arthritis. It also had quite visible seams which are very uncomfortable.

I bought this case for my Canon Power shot S2IS, a very small digital camera. The description says it is the "smallest," but that was not true at all. This unit barely fits in that tiny case, so if you were to buy it for an S2IS you better have no bigger than a 5 or 6 year-old compact camera? If so, get something else. You can fit your camera & all its attachments inside but it's hard work getting them out of the case.

I did a bunch of research on Amazon before selecting this camera. I've never heard of Sanyo before, but the reviews sold me -- lots and lots of them! So far, so good. The camera is beautiful looking, sleek, compact, takes nice pictures, seems to take good video, even when my older camcorder does not (don't ask how, but it always had trouble in dim light). I'm happy with it. HOWEVER, it was dead out of the box.

This is the first time I've had a problem with Amazon and their sellers. For instance, last week when my furnace was cold in the room behind mine, I tried putting on an extra heat blanket to be warmer but without success. Then I remembered that we have all winter air conditioning here.
This product is really neat looking out of the box. For all of 5 minutes as soon as you plug it in, then immediately loses power. The first unit that arrived worked great.

This product is a rip off from China and was not what I expected. It did come sooner than expected but they send you what you pay for. The quality of the case was fine until i went to take my phone out of it for charging. I had noticed that its starting to detach from the top left corner now which kinda sucks since it's pretty much glued onto this case.
For such an inspiring man with such talent, it's hard not know what he's going through. Great stories though, that just make you feel wonderful. Thank goodness for all who live by faith.
Very good show.
Bought 2 for gifts. one has completely crumbled into dust.

I tried to get my money shipped back from Amazon, but there was no available option for it. It's cheap and flimsy junk. What really bothers me is, this is supposed to be an "amazon prime product- fulfilled by Amazon." How does that happen? Did somebody think of stealing some money. In order to protect your reputation as a reputable company in the digital age, you need to do better than this. This product came broken out of it's packaging.
It does just as I anticipated. I am happy with the quality and it works well for me. The delivery service was good too, arrived on a timely basis. Recommend this product to anyone looking at it.

While it says that this product comes in a box with an extra funnel, the one I received was actually just shipped loose inside of one. It didn't have any plastic baggie or anything over it, like if you would normally get when ordering.

Got this for my 3 yr old daughter. It's a piece of junk. When using the suction mount, it always wants to unstick from itself. You have to get the toy out and pull them apart every time you are done playing with it. It is also very difficult to put together. I would NOT recommend getting this. Spend your money on something worthwhile. This was an overall disappointment. Do not waste yours.

We bought the game in hopes of replacing our old one that had just quit working. When we opened up this new game, it looked identical to my other one... except for a couple things. First off, it's not made with as much quality of play on it. Secondly, and most importantly, is it supposed to be all white.

I purchased this camera to use for my wedding with a large number of people from the same family. The camera arrived in excellent condition. My wife and i set it right up at home before we left on our honeymoon. At first everything went well. We were very impressed. But after going to various sites taking photos, I find that many pictures have an ugly purple halo around them. Some say they are just out of focus, others show some spots all together.

I bought a pair of these at first and one has stopped working just after the return day. They sound great while they work but if you want headphones that will last you buy something else. Also tried to get in touch with customer service twice for this issue, only got an answering machine most times. Not worth trying since they were never able to send me another headset to make it right. I'm done returning them. Amazon took care of them quickly so I give them five stars.

I could not read this book. It just didn't work for me. My son wanted to read it with me he likes books that involve animals so that's what we did. He liked it. But I couldn't really get into it. If u want a book about talking animals and their stories then try the big fish by david lloyd.

The product is great! It fits the phone and protects it well. I am sure that my daughter will get many compliments on it. However, if you have this phone, be aware there are two screen protectors in every pack. Once they wear off (which takes a reasonable amount of time), they won't stay where they belong, so then it's totally useless: either you'll miss half your pictures or else they'll just pop up. It's not like they're worth having replaced anyway.

I love Jane Austen but her characters drove me crazy. She always wrote about "gentlewoman" heroines and of course she falls in love, so even though he's a prince, who did they not fall head over heels for? There was also more that one time when their relationship seemed to be heading for an issue but....there it was. Even the dialogue between them was way out there.

This one sucked big time. From it's title "Corporate Secrets...", i thought it would help me understand more about corporate communication strategies of my bosses as they relate to my own workplace. Well a quick glance at the content wasn't enough to know that not every single advice offered here contradicts another.

I bought it for my husband and he thought the sound quality was too low, just like his other one that he's been using since before apple came into the picture. Not a good product, even if it's cheap, but better than some of these in the market, which cost 2-3 times as much or more. It has low volume, too. The blue is kind of boring too. So it only works because you have to leave your iPhone nearby. Definitely can't do anything on it.
It does what is says except one size too small for me so if you're going to order buy 2 sizes bigger

This item was ordered for our new home based on the many positive reviews. We are so disappointed and we can't return it. The description clearly states this is a 3-drawer unit, just like another reviewer described. But, instead of using that to put all of her silverware in, it only has 1 drawer. In order to get 3 or more utensils in at once, she had to set them up with one drawer, but they were then very difficult to retrieve. So much time wasted.

I found quite a number of other recipe books that would fit into my needs so I picked up one as well. The book takes its first 8 chapters just reviewing what we have been cooking for over 10 years, with some new recipes, especially about vegetarian dishes.

It did not work at all. And I cannot believe anyone even bothered to publish this. Save your money. If you have one in the home, don't send it back. You'll never be able for your money back on anything you've bought from this seller. Please stay away and save yourself some time. These people will rip you off!

I have used the iPad3 and got to know how big it was, compared with a PC.I purchased this tablet in late August 2012. Within two month of use, i found that after several days was having major problems connecting wirelessly from my work area which is about 15 feet away. First couple days, all my other wifi devices seem much faster, but they are always disconnected. Then more times than not, you can't connect at all. Then you start noticing weird lines across your screen.

Good value for money. It arrived in reasonable time and was well packaged. I had previously purchased this item twice at a big box store, both times the top lid cracked after only 2 months. Was expecting more durability before buying again. So far, seems to be doing what it's supposed to. No complaints so far. Time will tell how long it stays sealed as well. For now we like it.

I wanted to like this book. The cover looked cute as well and the reviews were good, so why not? I'm on page 30 of chapter one, after about 15 or so pages - I was hoping for character development by now/but it appears that Ms. Young is going through the motions without ever getting there. To give a concrete example I've never heard someone speak like this, not once, before today in my life. And there are plenty of passages where it's supposed to be funny...

Very hard to set up, and I have a good technical background ( in IT ), as my husband tells me all the time. Setup took longer than it should have. After 2 weeks, we didn't see any difference with our wireless, but since we had an extremely short time, and then thought about hooking up again, couldn't find the password, nor was there anything on the CD that would help.

I recently purchased the Dell laptop that was described as being in a excellent condition with no scratches, dents, or other cosmetic flaws. The one problem when looking at it is that several small scratches are seen on top of the screen, underneath and around it. All together I probably spent close to 600 dollars for my new laptop, so it's very disappointing when I received this item.

I purchased two of these for my daughters to take to school. One broke in 5 months and the other is only 7 months. Not worth it. Very cheap, very poorly made. My kids aren't hard on them or anything, but they can't even withstand being stuffed into their bookbags. The outside shell cracked around one corner. These should be at least $10 dollars max.

This is a very nice looking knife with a good heavy feel. Although it costs more than the price of most chef's knives,I would gladly buy this one again as well as recommend it. It's perfect for slicing tomatoes and other vegetables.

I bought this for my daughter, she opened it on Christmas Day, and the screen had a crack in it. She was so disappointed when we went to put batteries in, it doesn't work...Waste of money! It wasn't expensive...I guess you get what you pay for..lesson learned
I had to return the item because it would NOT play.
My son likes to paint pictures on our walls when he comes over, and for Christmas, we put up two posters in his room.
I bought this for my daughter. She loves it. So far it has held up well. No complaints! It is great. For the price cant be beter.
Okay, I'm sorry but this series is terrible.

Ordered these lamps in March, received them very quickly. However, when installed and fully charged overnight, they did not work. We tried several other outlets around our home with no success. Had someone try switching outlets, different sockets, etc, without any luck.

This is a review of the audio version. I listened via audible so there was some sort of echo or background noise that kept me from really getting to know who was speaking, but other then that, it was pretty good. The book has made an interesting premise into something more interesting. Some of the characters were well done others not very well. The concept behind this novel is that if it looks like a frog and swims up through the earth one day, you die just as quickly.

The book is OK because it has a short section of the story but not even half way through I read it. It's only about five pages. When should you charge $1.99 for one paragraph? You really should put out longer chapters. It reads more like an email on your website. I've had this book just over two weeks. And there are still no updates. So unless you are willing to wait for them, don't buy this. Go with their free book.

I ordered this to run for a small town marathon, it came in the post quickly and looked good, but as soon as i opened it, 2 of its legs were broken. It really isn't worth taking back...so instead i just cut them off myself. So annoyed!!!!

I was told to get this book. The book has several interesting stories. Some of it is well written. Just not what you want some days when you're trying to sleep. It doesn't put me to sleep with it's constant excitement. I had the book read one time.

I ordered this for a friends Christmas gift and didn't receive it in time. I'm disappointed about that. It was supposed to be just before Christmas. If i could have bought the same item at Costco so that everyone would know what time I expected it. This company is also making excuses as far as when their products will arrive. They promised by 11/21 and it's 12/14. Will not order from them again. I wish they did ship right away.

This is easy to read and great information for the beginning grower. I love reading with a magnifying glass so can do it on my Kindle Fire. It could use links etc but at best has 3 pages. Very interesting book which shows seeds in detail. Well worth reading.

After all the rave reviews and raves I was highly disappointed in this book. One of my main criticisms is that it simply does not come close to capturing the magic created by Stephen King. As other reviewers have said, King can evoke images that are so clear you forget what place you're in. This book fails miserably.
A sad look at a poor man's version of Michael Moore's "Fahrenheit 911" that leaves out some very crucial historical fact.

It was not what I expected. They are very small. Very cheaply made. Not worth the $ or postage you might spend for delivery. It would be good to see this item at a store before ordering if money is an object. If it's a gift, it will sit in one end until opened. There were no measurements given. In spite of these drawbacks, my granddaughter likes them. All items listed on site had size indicated. However, they did not all meet that description. Just wish there were!!. She doesn't complain.

I purchased this DVD because of the good reviews and am very disappointed. The first segment (the one on Yoga for Men) focuses too much on Pilates exercises that if taught properly would be beneficial. After a while you can start to get bored, so then they teach some yoga moves as well as the stretching exercises. However, they're not explained well. The worst part is there are no explanations about why you're doing these stretches.
i did not enjoy this book at all. it was pretty boring. the only part of my interest in reading and finishing is finishing what we started. unfortunately, it didn't come together for me.

This is not a review. It needs to be because the only reason I purchased this disc was out of frustration with my own music playing in my car. And it seems others have suffered from similar frustration. The CD is just like all other MP3 sound quality. Nothing too bad at loud volume, but if you want something that doesn't get annoying every half hour, then don't buy it. The CD has way less volume than I would like. A lot less noticeable on first listen, then almost imperceptible after it.

I am a fan of Dan Brown and his books, but "Angels & Demons" just didn't make it. There were many loose threads to be wrapped up as well which ended up left dangling. Why did Angels have the gift of telekinesis? Who was Mallozzi? What does he really know? Etc. etc. The big mystery at the end is never solved either, except for in Brown's own head (which got so tedious after a while).

The worst piece of junk that I've ever purchased, first off, the instructions for loading a memory card from inside are very vague and difficult to follow. Once in place, every picture we've taken with all 4 cards have turned out grainy, like our camera won't auto-focus as well because it's trying too hard.

The idea was to use it for a Christmas party with my grandchildren ages 8 and 10. They really enjoyed the game but the mechanism at which we made them "speak" broke about after 20 minutes of playing. I think this is definitely an item worth more than $20. It would be nice if they were sturdier. Other games have worked great but don't plan on putting that much wear and tear on them. Disappointing. :-\

i have a set like this one and it is made of glass not plastic they should make the description correct when you order something on here to avoid having me going through the return for refund process that happens every time I buy from your company with no returns available in that situation.if anyone knows where else there could be an option for glass ones please let all people know before buying anything so we prevent another person from needing return shipment costs again and also save others shipping money.

First of all, the battery life was fine until this morning when it died. The computer just shut off and a message came across my screen saying that it was low on power while I was still typing in a word. Then after one little word went by, it gave me an error message stating that the power adapter had failed. When I turn back on, all of the icons are gone and now there is only black screen. Not worth fixing.

It arrived to me completely bent out of shape, so that none if the holes lined up on all sides. The hinges and latches were both bent. It's very difficult trying to get it "square" again. Also, one of the pieces came missing - part of a hinge. I was able to use hot glue to fix it, but at this point only 4 sides latch securely. All three shelves have already buckled under their own weight.

I bought a new pair of these headphones last night at Best Buy for $49.99 brand new. After listening to them they were very tinny, with no bass. It sounded like the subwoofer had been turned off. There was also noise cancellation (didn't work) on all settings; it wasn't even adjustable. I'm not happy that my money spent here has been scammed out of me. I'd expect more from Sennheiser given their reputation in ear headphones.

The instructions were on point. One side of the bracket has a couple of slots for putting in an inch or two more wood screw to lock it into place. You get what you pay for. It works and at $2.10 per hole I can't complain. But it's only good as temporary replacement or just decoration since I'm not sure if other people have tried attaching these shelves yet either. As soon as they find a solid stud they'll probably buy another shelf...maybe then I'll stop complaining.
I am very glad to have this product. It was a necessity at my house because of many allergies. Love the ease and convenience.

I got this book as a gift and was very excited to open up the package. Unfortunately, it's a total disappointment. The author obviously did not do any research on her topic of time travel (which seems so simple in theory and makes it sound like science). She used some words that made no sense, such as:"In fact, my mind is working at warp speed because I'm doing some intense thinking right now.

It's a nice looking product. The two small bars that hold up the doors were not able to support our weight but it still worked. We had to use duct tape along the top of each bar so we couldn't move it. Other than that, it's good quality.

I purchased the book only to have it arrive in poor shape, missing a page...had some pages stapled into it. There was nothing written about this book, which is why I'd ordered it. Will not purchase from here again.

The author seems to take a somewhat conservative approach on gun control, although he obviously sees that it is an interesting and important topic for discussion. It may be the author's views are based in his personal experience as a retired police officer, but there did not seem to me anything too radical with regard to some of the tactics he's outlined. This book is informative about things from background checks to mental health when dealing with potential purchasers of firearms. While reading it, I kept feeling like I'd learned something new.
This book was just about as bad as reading it online.

There is no good information in this book. It was not very useful to me. A waste of money. Better invest your money on a more informative and well written book. I have read many books about learning and practicing meditation techniques. This one fell flat. If you want info on meditation, go ahead and pay attention. They seem like they are making the whole thing up because its what they've heard.

First off, this is a short, quick read that actually seemed longer when I wasn't on my phone. If you're looking for an original story with more substance than this, keep moving. But be prepared to buy Book 2 right after you finish this one....
The movie is pretty good, however since you have to buy this separately on DVD, don't bother. The DVD comes in one single sleeve, with no inserts.
Works very well, easy to read even during day or night.

I like the concept, but it doesn't heat well at all. Don't waste your money. I've had this for a month now and all four burners are useless. They're just not giving any heat! The only way you could feel some warmth going up to them was if on high. Wish these would actually work or I'd be done with Hamilton Beach.

This product works fine except the battery only lasts about 15 minutes. The power cord for the rechargeable battery can become somewhat difficult if you use this a lot and have to keep it plugged in. There are no instructions with this.
My son enjoys playing with it.

This Kindle version has no diagrams, and therefore you simply cannot learn much from it, as there are too few examples. The text does not contain enough detail to solve any problems. In my opinion, don't purchase it. You will be disappointed.
Just enough bounce without making her head look like it's going out of joint. It's very well constructed (thick rubber) so you don't have worry about ripping them easily.

This cd is complete trash. Don't waste your money. I can't believe all these great stars put their name to this crap. The only tracks that are tolerable are "I want you back" and "dance the night away" but they don't make up for a horrible album. All the songs sound alike. The singers should have asked Michael Jackson how he got his voice back. They made an awful effort at covering Michael's music and it shows.

When I bought the package containing three sets of glasses, one in each size, I expected that they would have been made with a nice strong glass. After only two weeks, one glass had already broken and since it's not being thrown around, I don't think I'll be getting another set. It's too bad! They are so pretty, but, because of poor quality, they're just fine for everyday wear.

It's a cool concept. But....The thing feels flimsy. I was able to open the case and replace my memory chip quite easy. So that is good, it should last me for 2-3 years. But after looking through all the pieces, it's definitely not going in there. I'm afraid you are only allowed to put two screws on either side. They feel like they could snap off. There needs to be some locking mechanisms there so things can't just randomly pop out.
I have never owned a TV this large to find that its resolution is lower than 720p. It looks like something out of the 1980s. Even worse, it makes me feel old.
I bought this phone for my elderly mother. It is easy to use and looks great. She had trouble setting it up but otherwise has no problems.
