My daughter received this for her 3rd birthday and it was one of the absolute worst christmas gifts. The sounds just didn't come together. She loved to take turns being Minnie Mouse or some other character. That lasted 1 day. I would have returned it, but we threw away all our packing material, so, we're stuck with it. It has very good battery use - my daughter's play hours are mostly car rides. If she likes anything, it's playing with it. So what do you do.
This item didn't cost much and doesn't last very long.

I am a huge fan of John Cusack. My wife and her friends have watched this many times with me so I'm fairly certain that we aren't the only ones who love this. But, as others noted, there is no excuse for poor quality transfer to disc on this DVD. It's just not acceptable in 2014. This movie was shot digitally 20 years ago! It looks absolutely awful compared with modern movies. Do someone out there, please do something about it because I'd really like to see my husband watch this again.
It's kind of hard to know when a product is going to turn out horrible as mine did. I was hoping it would be worth trying, so I made it. It turned out...

It's OK but not great. The cover and binder is more than adequate for what it is. As you insert a CD or DVD, the top edge of the box slips off the binder, exposing the CDs or DVDs inside. Not worth it. I would NOT buy again. I'll go back to my original boxes: those can take abuse from everyday use and still work. This one can't.
I haven't used it yet, but the delivery on its arrival was very good. It's a handy tool to have in ones car or home. I just need enough time to use it.
This is my first bread knife, especially as this is not the type of design that will appeal to many. The size is ideal - just right width for breads such as pizza rolls, rolls, shortbreads.
This coffee maker makes great coffee, but I've gone through two in less than five months.

I'm a big fan of historical mysteries, but have found the best ones are usually those which set their books in current times (although these can still be very good too), with plots based on current events and characters who might live today, so there is much to learn about them. The Last Templar was just too unbelievable for me.

There are few bands that know how to make a band live sound like crap. I mean when were ever in life were really into what you buy and take them off the shelf for a while just because of that. Well now i have this record called " F**k What You Want" by these horrible musicians. This album sucks as all hell. Do not waste your money.
After waiting several weeks to receive this, this does NOT work. At all...It's just more of yet another. Very disappointed. Wish we'd read up on other reviews before ordering.
Bought this as an upgrade for a new HP printer and it works great. No problems with installation or function. I would recommend it.

I guess we were looking for more. The writing is fine. The story was good but so many times throughout the book we get pages telling us that something happened instead of showing or showing. You had to read a bunch just to figure out what happened. Then there are other places where you didn't need it. In fact, as far as I'm concerned, this series is done in an awkward way. It's too short, and not enough details were given about some people.
It's too bad that some people think the Bible is to long for today's technology.

I used this drive less than an hour before it completely broke. After that brief use the USB connection would not acknowledge anything. There was almost no vibration when inserting it into my laptop, there is a slight humm in the plastic housing as well. All of this with very low use. My laptop cannot properly power on without this unit plugged in. Obviously it's just poorly made. I'm sending mine back for a refund. Do yourself some favor, spend your money elsewhere. Or better yet, move to another manufacturer.
This movie is a classic for good old American values. The acting was excellent as well as very moving scenes. Well done. Kudos!!!

While the packaging is impressive, and in comparison to other brands like this, it does not seem reliable. The battery failed after about a dozen uses. I just tossed it. It is too inexpensive for me to bother returning it, but would have cost more than half as much or less even given its poor performance. Look elsewhere. For me, there are many others that will be of far better quality. I've had two Garmin GPS devices and never an issue with their batteries. There may be some manufacturers doing things differently, though.

Don't buy this cheap garbage from China, not worth 10 cents. You will be disappointed. I am going to try and return it. My guess is the manufacturer has had a run of bad units. Just go somewhere else with your camera needs. The good news is, it takes standard SD cards (I use SanDisk Ultra 8GB cards), which are readily available all over. That way you can take pictures where ever without worry if someone steals them- just get another card.

This is one of the weakest movies in this set. It was interesting at first, but after a point it just got boring. I recommend looking elsewhere for your WWII movies. At least most are available on DVD.
this book is not going to provide much help in the areas that are being taught. Also, it uses very old equipment. I suggest you save your money.

This movie is too cheesy for words. Nothing happens and all you remember from the plot is: an alien being enters a home to kidnap a teenage girl, they run into each other and get together, she then dies? And that's it. The premise of this film sounds interesting. However, watching it was just excruciating. It sucked so badly. Don't waste your time on seeing this. There are much better movies out there, but I suggest everyone stay away from this one. Trust me.

Very slow and hard to get going, was hoping for more mystery with it. Could not wait till the end of it when a surprising event occurred. The author tried too much on trying to create suspense in it by telling you where this is going and making sure that at least 50 pages goes into each chapter. This book would appeal mainly to women. If your looking for an easy, light read, then read it, its just not worth wasting any time reading it. There are better books out there.

It's hard to find a novel of this type and I was very disappointed. The prose is too good when compared against other authors who deal so much more with what it means to love someone. What does she love? He loves her. Can the truth ever be revealed? That depends on someone else. Who do we need to believe? This reader lost track of most of them.

The author wrote in a very casual style. He uses too much slang. For the record, I'm an english major and I read lots of non-fiction. That being said, this book just annoyed me because there is no sense or reason behind any of it. Very simple with poor story line. I'd be surprised how any college educated person could find it interesting enough to read. Don't waste your time, there's nothing worthy of you spending time.
This remote was exactly what my 2 year old son wanted for his birthday.

Although it's not a deep book, it's worth the effort to read it. I found it interesting and thought provoking. The characters were likeable, even if their actions would have been considered selfish by today's standards. I like how he included the spiritual aspects of love within his novels.

It takes a lot of strength to take my vitamins with all the pills and liquid. I just bought this at CVS in their vitamin section. It's more than twice the cost. The taste is pretty bad. Maybe some people like it, but it does not appeal to me personally. I've also lost faith that anything good or natural will actually work for me. I'm going back to pills. You may love these, though, if you are one for chemical concoctions. Or maybe a multivitamin. This ain't it.
This was defective sent back. I didn't hear anything about how well they worked and returned them before using them. Sorry. Not good.

I enjoyed the book. However, it was obvious that all of a sudden he wrote his last 3 years. He is not giving credit where its due. So I really wanted to give this book 5 stars for what it was. But I just couldn't. If you read other reviews they are saying there were too many stories about him and not enough on his life without God. That pretty much sums up my thoughts. But if that's ok with you, then it should be fine too.

At first, this was a good product. I had to return it twice in 18 months, because the hard drive would not mount up. The last time they sent me a new case, and made sure my unit worked. Now it's been four months with no response from them. Very poor customer service. There is some discussion on their facebook page, but that doesn't help. It has gotten so bad I'm having serious thoughts of never buying any Seagate products again. They don't seem too concerned about quality anymore.
As the title of this review says, it is not as funny as I thought it would be, but good quality movie.

I have to agree with the majority of those who reviewed this book. It's a pretty bad book; if you are interested in reading about an extremely dysfunctional relationship between a mother and son read The Glass Castle. The storyline is just plain depressing, not romantic or sweet AT ALL. There's constant name-calling ("dirty old whore", "sick bitch", etc) and then we get some sort of happy ending which goes nowhere. This book really isn't well written at all.

A good book of this kind always has a few moments when you may wonder "what is the point?" This book certainly had those moments, but that's really to be expected. All in all, some interesting thoughts, as well as some very real examples presented with compelling prose. The downside for me was that it often didn't seem like Mr. Gladwell's point at all. Most often, what he wanted us to think about was either not a problem or just wasn't worth worrying about.
Not sure why some reviewers were disappointed with this product.

The idea of this game is good, and the premise good. But so many elements are just poorly done, it really does feel like some random group with little or no experience decided to make a game. For instance, there's a bug that lets you switch characters on the fly mid-game, after you've beaten all nine bosses. You don't need to, but it'll be nice not to. I also hate how sometimes certain areas have an invincible force field, meaning I can't access said area.
Ordered two of these adapters from Amazon as replacement ones - the first worked beautifully, but the second, which lasted less than three days when plugged in, refused to make contact.
Interesting story. It had an unexpected ending. Made you wish there could actually still be. Good historical fiction. Read it.

This unit looked like the perfect solution for my car stereo. I have a 2004 Mazda 3. It was very easy to put together, but you know what? After installing it, it sounded horrible. No matter what station we set this one on, there were static sounds. We are sending this back and just bought an AUX cord. We spent around $30 more. Not even worth it. My husband says he will take it, if that's all they have!
Very well written short story about two people trying not make each other fall for them. When you read it, you'll find out why.
I was looking for a story about the end of history and instead got a detailed account of WWII. The writing style seemed awkward but could have been just my bad mood. It didn't grab hold either.
It's a cheap book and it is nice for my kids to look through. It helps out with learning the states as well so that you can learn about them from reading it. The price was not too expensive either.

We purchased this battery for our daughters Asus Eee PC 1000HE. She is very happy with it so we're glad that we chose this vendor. You can't beat the price! Only issue encountered was shipping charge of almost $9 per battery.

THIS HAS NO BASS. the speakers produce too much treble. not worth it. would you buy these if they were free? i sure wouldnt as ihave no use for them. this is just junk of crap. waste and money. in my book JUNK.
I've always loved reading all these stories in order and this anthology does that well.

I bought this to replace the OEM filter in my Acura RSX's cabin. The factory one was worn out, but it came with a good set of filters. When i first replaced it, after about 3,000 miles, everything seemed OK. But now, at 6,000, it's making all kinds of noise... And not just idling noise, when there isn't anything on it. Turns out that there's a bad gas cap in the system. If you're interested in saving a few bucks, buy this. Otherwise, save your money. 
 Rating: 1.

So this is a good size and fit my dogs quite well, she didn't mind wearing it very much at all. The material seemed to be of high quality though, I loved that. After just two days the zipper pull came off. Now we have only one button for her harness now so she'll never zip up even if there's no pull. It was an obvious design flaw that shouldn't happen with the amount of money they charge to make these things.
Like some others...
THIS WAS REALLY DISAPPOINTING. I HATED THE PLOT AND JUST DID NOT CARE FOR IT. I'M GLAD I DIDN'T PAY TO SEE IT IN A THEATER!

I am a huge fan of Dr. Seuss who writes children's books. There has never been any book by this author that was not wonderful. This title for the first time, disappoints. It is definitely written more at an elementary level than one would expect from Dr. Seuss. My children did find it humorous. After using the reader in class as instructed with our second grade students to demonstrate how the text read, they only made a few minor eye contacts. The illustrations could have been better.

Did not like this one at all. Poor writing, bad choice of subjects but that doesn't make it a good story. I got half way and had to go on. Waste of time. A book from a more accomplished person might do much better. I'm giving it two stars because I've started reading it, maybe I'll be able to finish it.
I use two of these in my Synology DS1012+ NAS. One is used as the primary boot drive and works as expected.

I bought the new version of this cd and was pleased to see that it had some tracks by artists from my favorite music group, The Beatles. However, when i got it, it would not play at all. It makes me wonder if the people who made it even bother trying out CD players before selling them. I've only ever gotten faulty items but i'm amazed it happened twice! For those folks looking for a Beatles cd, be very careful about buying this one.

This case looks exactly like it does in the picture. That is a good thing. It feels very light and cheap. The plastic screen has almost no resistance when you swipe. I would probably not use this on daily basis because of all this problems. Also, you have to take out your phone from cover every time, just for charging. No good. Definitely returned it. Hope mine was an exception!

A great book about a fabulous story. And now you wonder why I give it only one star? Because if the story was told here instead of being written like this book, you'd get an entirely different story. If you've decided to write your own story, then please, go ahead, but stop with the literary devices. That's the thing in my opinion. It is not a bad idea for most writers now, when they do their first draft, just to try things. But that doesn't mean to ignore these things in writing.
This is only for students starting out with college who need examples that would help them get started. It will definitely make you realize what your professor has glossed over/missed or failed to.

The book is ok. Not the greatest writing but good general information. All in all a decent read. But what bothers me most about it (at least I think it's him) is he doesn't do any research to discover anything new. He simply states the facts and tries to spin them into an opinion. You are not really told of who or how many times some event was done this way or others were doing these things that way.
I don't know why it would cost $7.00 to charge $2.99 for this item.....If you want my money I'd be glad to....

I ordered these bulbs and they put the wrong bulb in, now i have to return them. This is very unsanitary & a horrible experience. Do not place orders from this company if u dont want your package tampered with.

I read everything this author has ever written, and it's all gone downhill since the beginning of her work at Harlequin. First it was Twilight, a bit dated today, but very enjoyable then. Now this. It feels like she's just not cutting it. It's obvious that Patterson put his name on it, thinking readers might be interested in what he had to say about women in fiction. But there's simply no new or deep insight. He seems obsessed with female writers - which is totally fine, for him, I'd think.
The best tool ever made. All my problems are now taken care of.
After waiting over three weeks, finally received 2 days ago. Neither side works, which means unless you use your fingers to remove back cover it's useless. Do NOT waste time or money as i did.

I use it primarily as a portable audio unit for my MP3 player and my cell phone.... very good speaker system sound great on both levels' usage...I'm happy with this.. the only reason I didn't given an 5 star is because of the volume control, which might be difficult to hold in your hand under heavy use... but still worth it! Thanks

I actually got a good laugh out of this book. I'm usually not into ghost & vampires stuff, but I enjoyed this! It really is creepy and makes you wanna have a drink & chill! Good summer time read!Can't wait to read more from this author! Very good!! Read it!

The only good thing about this book is the price. This collection of essays was published in 2005. Most likely we are already looking at a new edition that has been edited by Mr. Aldrete. After reading these essays, I can imagine why our President went to war,he can't bring himself not to. These articles were written while George W. Bush ran for president.

I had high hopes for this book but it's pretty much useless. There is a lot of talk and very little action. So if you are looking to learn advanced martial arts go elsewhere. It makes no sense what so ever as far as the storyline goes and that's even saying something. You have all these various characters who each come into contact with someone in their life that has died yet they don't really seem to care about them.

A little bit bigger than my phone not snug fit on the phone, just falls off in you hand. It did come from Hong Kong but that doesn't bother me. The company could have done better by including what is pictured, a clear protector film so your phone's screen would be free of finger prints.

This game is not what it claims to be. It is very difficult and also frustrating. I found that you constantly need the "help" manual when trying to play. Save your money. Its not worth even giving away in a garage sale. Try something likeRock Band - Bundleinstead. That one will give you hours of fun that will actually get you ready for work each day. Now that's entertainment!

This is a basic unit that provides adequate capacity without any frills, and at very reasonable price. The only negative comment I have would be the lack of user replaceable battery. It can stay connected in an open situation, but not if you put it on a shelf for a few weeks, like mine did. It should either go with batteries, or make sure to mention this limitation from a beginning.

I had some issues with a set previously but these were easily exchanged/replaced. My only complaint is no other reviews for this. The sound in general was noticeably better on these. It might just be personal preference though.
Doesn't have N capabilities as claimed. Tried contacting the supplier for clarification of what it actually does and was told they haven't yet released such a firmware.

I'm amazed that such poor books are published from the university of Washington. The material presented reads as though it has been produced by some student project -- one that's obviously not up to academic standards. But worse, it's printed on poor quality paper, so it looks cheap.

This book was a bit disappointing in that the characters did not show true feelings towards one another. That just didn't ring true. The two leads went from bad to worse and I finally tired of reading about how much hot sex they had. It only makes you hope for something else - like real love.
If you're looking at just how cheap these were (and why anyone would do that, right?) then don't even hesitate. At $2.

For the price, what can you expect. In fact, I expected more due to all of the positive reviews. The plastic parts seem cheap. However, for my use (my child rides on it and drops stuffed plush animals in it), its fine. And like other reviewers have already noted, it's not at all high enough off ground (maybe two feet). It barely goes over a door threshold, so you'd better be sure your baby is safe if they put that toy away somewhere.

Although it had a cute premise, this film just couldn't make up its mind, in terms of, what, or who. There's no real character development with any of these characters; there's so little there to begin with, that you start rooting for them. By midway through....well, by then you've seen every line of dialogue.
It arrived on time in its retail packaging. Great price, easy transaction.

The product seems like there is some variation that can cause it to not charge well with most power cords. However, this happens occasionally on all the batteries I have so far and works better than ones where you need another type of charging cord. I've charged the battery several times in my laptop now. Just make sure your charger says for iphone 4.

I really did not like this novel. The description had the potential to be good. However, it just doesn't deliver. Not sure what happened here. It starts out slow, and a little boring, but then takes off with some good action. Then you get to have fun in exotic locations (I hope....). But the ending is sooo predicatble, its almost insulting that no one else got it. Very unsatisfying! This author seems to be trying for something big on her next book.

I was very excited about these but then upon putting them together, my excitement quickly faded (and even melted to some degree). Most of the wood came cracked in several places. It really does look nice once built, which might be why it's so easy. There are a few gaps here and there that aren't noticeable unless youre looking for it, like I was, or because im over compensating with all those little tiny pieces.
My cat loves these. The problem with them is that they are extremely hard plastic, making no amount of crunching sound like kitty toys should make.

I bought the book to try to have my dog use the potty. Although it has worked alright.. he still had accidents a few times and now it's two days. So not an exciting book... but I'm using it. P.S. This is coming from about five feet away with all of his potty books in front on him so that everyone else can see.... when they see him/her...It's ok for what you pay though (< $0.
This would cost $20 in Petco or Petsmart stores.
This will work for light to medium weight items. If you need something more sturdy, however, I suggest looking elsewhere. I'm a happy customer!

I've tried a few different flavors of Crystal Light water in various sizes and this is by far my favorite flavor. It tastes like water with carbonation added to it but without any weird or unpleasant aftertaste. Also, because the beverage is packaged in a bottle, you can take some on an airplane or leave them at your desk (without worrying about leakage).

First let me say I am a huge fan of the whole genre and think that this is probably one of my favorite books until now. There are so many things wrong with how Anita Blake became who she is. The first one being her inability to recognize where her own true power was. The second issue not to mention just about everything else in this final book but I'll get into that.

Very unhappy with this product. Product is described as new when I received it the screen cleaner was missing!! The battery would not charge at all and i had another brand on hand that was charged in minutes. Sent back to seller, got my money back. Not sure if it happened during shipping because I only purchased one but will consider buying from amazon directly next time unless this problem can be rectified promptly. If anyone has any information please let me know. Thank you...

Don't waste your money on this. I purchased and returned it within 3 days. It was bulky and didn't really work well. You couldn't find a good angle for the phone so the audio kept cutting out. My son tried it. He is using his iPad without earbuds. We will buy some quality wireless headphones, he said. I'm not buying another one. This one isn't worth wasting my time. The headphones cost about $30. So even if you don't need to be out running, these won't work. Do what I did.

This book is a series of short but very good articles. The subject itself could be explored for much longer. I was hoping to find more about his spiritual life and this is really too short. Also it's hard reading. It needs some organization or editing. Most people can't read like they can write.

I don't know why people were so excited about this book, since I've read them all...well, except for all the other books that had nothing to do with cats. This book was very boring. The only reason you would ever give it more than one star is because of your loyalty towards the characters. It took me two days (yes, 2 days) just to skim through a couple chapters. No offense Angela...but this story did not hold my interest. Thank god Amazon has return policies.

I got this to plug into my wife's car's auxiliary outlet. She keeps her music player inside a small travel pouch at the rear of passenger seat for easy access if needed and it looks like when she plugs in her iPod nano this is exactly what she'll need. Now we can all play songs from our phone on long trips. Works just fine with no problems. No complaints. Very good quality item.
My daughter was very happy when she opened her gift. It is warm with good pockets. Would recommend this product. A nice gift.

I received this as a gift at my baby shower and use it everyday. It is wonderful because the basket easily folds down into something really not too big for one person to carry, unlike some of those umbrella type. It works well when I'm out running errands.
The Contigo Travel Mug-18 Ounce does its job.

I got this and thought it was a waste of time because the book did not go very indepth on anything like what really has to be done in order for your dog get better. And why do you need so many words required - really? Just writing an essay or some crap that doesn't mean anything. A lot of useless information about diet and exercise. You will learn nothing.
Good product...

The unit itself is great - works wonderfully as long as it works. And since the battery life has also declined significantly, one must wonder whether this will continue. One thing at a time. I have not contacted Coby to see if they offer an alternative. At some point, even their own products need more than 20 cents worth of work in order for them to sell them. This should all be taken into account before putting out faulty products.

I had to buy another power cord! This is the perfect replacement for my HP DV6000 laptop. The battery life on this cord was amazing! It took me over 5 hours to charge from 10% when it came out of its package. Very happy with the product!

I was very excited seeing the price and after having read reviews about this phone not lasting as long i took a chance. While it worked for a few months, my only problem was that all three units we purchased have been giving error after error. It also randomly goes to voicemail. This is our 3rd v-tech phone. They are always expensive but worth the money. All of them still work. These however seem unreliable. Too pricey when they aren't reliable. For what its worth, we're now looking at other options.

While the overall story was quite predictable, I found that characters and dialogue were very amateurish at best. As an example, how many different ways can you have a man get into bed? What sort of fantasies are they all having?And what exactly is this big secret about one of the main female character's parents that she keeps from her father? That doesn't fit with his character.

These pillows feel very hard. They are not soft for a body pillow, that is the only thing in common with a body pillow. We returned them and still have our original pillow made by down so we can return these. The first time my husband used his new one, he was waking up 3 times as many times each night before going to bed.

The item itself appears to be well made and is what I was looking for. Unfortunately it arrived with one of the plastic pieces that holds water in place broken off. There are screws holding this piece together so its not a problem but I'm giving up on having this thing work. It's obviously defective from how they pack it.

The concept is great and there are some nice games on it but when I got the device, it froze with a black screen and then rebooted saying I had to install an update. I tried repeatedly until I gave up. They should work more diligently in fixing the bugs. This thing really needs work. Very frustrating for my kids.
These were excellent disks.
This product did not meet my expectations. I have used this type before,but it was much lighter weight. Would purchase the other one next time. Thanks.

Do NOT waste your money on this product. We bought two....one for our house and another in the garage. I am sending it back. The light is extremely dim even though they are both brand new. As far as not working at first, that didn't matter. It was useless. One thing that drove me crazy more than anything else is how annoying it would make my daughter (who uses it) when it's plugged in.
Well written and it kept my interest. I don't mind reading about abuse so I do recommend it. It left me hanging. Guess you have to buy the part 2.

First of all it will not play in my DVD player and as far as the CD I have to say this is the worst excuse for music that has been written maybe ever. Do i need a review for that? This album sucks big time don't waste your money you get about 3 good songs out of 16.

I was very disappointed that this came packaged like a bootleg. It looked and smelled terrible. Maybe the seller thinks people only care about looks, but I was looking for a quality product. It is a cheap imitation. Not happy. But now after reading negative reviews, it seems to be something with this seller. So buyer beware. I am returning it. Amazon makes me do all shipping charges, so I'll find one somewhere else.

I ordered a pack of six filters to replace the two that came with my Brita, which is about 10 years old. They looked just like those original ones and when they came, everything was fine, but within a week one of them had cracked in three places. In addition, the plastic coating on each filter has peeled. They don't look nearly so good as an actual Brita. What was really disappointing was their customer service at Sunpentown, who told me they are no longer carrying these filters.

At the beginning of this review, I'm going to try and be as brief as possible, mainly because I don't want to give away anything important about the plot. The novel is narrated in first person, both by Harry himself, but also through a female character named Tess, who was conceived after having an affair with Harry.

The book was very informative on what the authors saw in Iraq. However, I would not recommend to buy this book. They are way out of date with things like how expensive it is for Iraqis to be killed by American soldiers and soldiers. But most important issue that they don't cover at all so far as I could find out. Their biggest sin must have been when writing this.

Not very comfortable or great for wearing all day. Could stand to be just a little thicker. Not sure it is worth the extra expense. I love everything else Ecco shoes.. they are wonderful. They do make some really nice looking, durable, well made shoes. As much as this company wants to show their pride by calling these "leathers" I'm afraid that when looking at them there is no leather.

I can't say for sure if my dog likes this product. She loves peanut butter and the beef flavor. But they both require some serious stirring on a regular basis, so it is hard to shake enough of those bad boys into their favorite bowls. If you're looking for something that you can throw in the kibble bowl, I'd pass up on Wellness Core and use Taste of The Wild or Orijen. They work wonders together without them being as expensive.
i did like it.

I was under the impression that all books were included as to why we read them. And the reasons for a book series can be varied! Not so with these. Just 3 of six were in this collection. No where did it say who wrote what. Don't get me wrong, it's okay if you are just reading them because YOU love them, which is what brought them across my path. But if your looking only for romantic stories, these ones may not suit you.

I really liked the concept and bought 2 of these, 1 black cartridge to replace an empty one, also from Amazon. Both cartridges were faulty with leaking. The black wouldn't work. After removing it looked pretty dirty, but since we only had one Black ink, we could easily just exchange it, so not a big deal -- or was it?Well, my wife went with out ink for almost two weeks...when her computer finally started working again.

This piece would not work on my Dell computer- a D2720n running Windows 7.. I sent email for assistance about returning it. However, none was given as far as I am concerned. My mistake. It will be returned.

Like a lot of his music this was one where I like the album but did not end up enjoying it when given time. The album got better after listening to it, and it is nice but that has been happening way too often lately. If you are looking for good rock music, there really aren't very many options out there besides anything from Rush or Alter Bridge. Good luck with your choices! I think you'll be surprised.

I ordered this book after reading the reviews. A few people said for $29.00 it was worth spending and others stated that they returned it. Personally, when i recieved it, in a different box type of container, I only got 1/2 full bottles. There are many reviews saying there were not even 2 oz. You can tell where these bottles have been opened prior to selling them.

Too many unnecessary twists in storyline. No way could I get into it and kept waiting for the story to wrap up. But this just left me feeling as if there were no conclusion. It seems like it dragged on forever with out any real story. Don't waste your time.
This keyboard is not at all what they show and if I were you would do more research because even on my computer this does NOT have a backlight on keys that are the size of my actual fingers
The product is well built and very durable. I have used it for many years without any problem. Its good stuff.

While I really like this game, not worth buying because most of the games you can use on your 3DS that will download to it are $5 or less. For $10, there should be a lot more available with it. Not very satisfied and pretty disappointed. But if you're super desperate for some new games, go ahead, buy this. Don't let me deter you! You may love it too...just wasn't meant for me.
Not to bad for this type of movie. If you like Vin Diesel movies, then you'll want to see this. Nothing better than some more action.

I had high hopes for this product from all the reviews. Unfortunately it proved to be a dud. It only works intermittently with my Nexus 5. My other charger connects and charges fine when connected. All devices plugged into that are either 2 year old phones, or Galaxy S3. So I'm not sure what happened but it's going in the trash as soon as possible. A bit overpriced even if you got free shipping. Returning it.

I tried to play it with multiple players including ps3 & wii and nothing worked except the first level where this thing actually made you lose some of your progress!!! The graphics and story are fun up until that point. For me though, it's not worth 60 dollars. And even though it's very hard to get a pass on this, I'm going for my money back since I don't think they should sell this crap knowing how stupid we are. They need to be ashamed to call themselves gamers.

I bought this because all my other chargers broke and thought it looked cool and would be easy to use on long trips. Well, the first time i used it, when i plugged in a device, It fried the socket in my truck. And now, it's completely toasted. This product is not worthy of being sold. Do yourself a favor and don't buy it. Buy the real charger from apple. Spend $30-40 dollars with Apple directly so you have that confidence you'll never need a charger.

This product was very misleading to be honest! I was told from the beginning that this would work with xp and it doesn't... don't waste your money on this! 
 Rating: 1.0 "Adapter for Microsoft Internet Explorer" which are NOT included in Amazon listing. So you need to try a lot of third parties which may or may have problems (e.g. ActiveX, ActiveX control, etc).Once this software is installed, there were several issues (please read further at bottom).
What a waste..! It took me only one minute to figure this out... It's really the stupidest book i ever read..!!! I don't recommend reading this.. :((

I bought this book for my sister who needed it to help her get the job she wanted. She said the author did not make any sense. He was very negative about how we live our lives. I can only say that he should try writing a self-help book or something, because in his own words it's terrible.

I love this product. It is nice to know that you can get a product of such high quality and good value. Very happy with purchase. The packaging was good, no damage. No leaks. Fast shipping from Amazon.

I bought this player at BB for about $100, it has performed ok, but the major problem is that it will not read many DVDs made a year or more ago. No one else seems to have similar problems with its DVD player, so obviously they just got lucky and there are fewer defective ones out there. It does play other movies though. Don't buy this player. If you do it, look around because if Amazon stops selling them (and that's a big if) then you'll never find another.

I ordered this bed to be used in our vacation trailer to rest on after an overnight trip for a dog to be treated there and the dogs have always loved sleeping on memory foam beds. When they wake up in my room, they're immediately all stretched out. This was not the case with the Invacare Memory Foam Bed we have...Our other bed, which looks identical to this, has both of these features as well but seems much firmer when you lay down or sleep at night.

This is so old school I don't understand it, if she didn't put this on the radio and make it a song, how could we have known about it. Then you try to listen closely because it's not anything really new or original...just recycled sounds heard before in one of her previous songs. There's very little originality, I think she's trying too hard to be different, but what she's actually doing here is, she's playing around with her sound, nothing new, that's all.

Very good quality, especially for these price! Used them before couple times, and no damage after using for two times. Nice grip too. My old brushes came from China in about 10 years, so cannot compare with these. But they certainly seem to be very high quality brush already. And not expensive.

One star is generous and it does not deserve to be. I bought this book at the bookstore in a hurry without reading any of the reviews. The characters are shallow stereotypes that come across as cliches. There was no plot - there was nothing good about it. It started out bad (and I mean bad). Then suddenly took an interesting twist so you wanted to find out what happened. Well except from when she did that. She was just annoying all throughout.

This book was so boring, I kept putting it down and coming back because there had to be some exciting things going on but nothing ever happened. It took me FOREVER just to decide if I liked the characters, or not. To finish this book, you don't want to waste anymore time with it. The ending made no sense - what happened? There were too many characters that weren't developed properly. One minute you're liking who they are then suddenly they're all gone. I'd give this a 1/2 star if I could.

This book is a fairly good and well researched discussion of the role of women in Christian thought. As an example though for what this book could have been like you take away from it that there has never been (and will never) be equality between men and women. The idea that female Christians should remain silent at public worship services, where they are not permitted to speak, is ludicrous. Likewise with regard to other matters.
Bought 2 of these little books.

Well, it's been well over a year since I purchased this CD as well as the follow up - which we both hated so much. We like to listen while driving but have never actually found one track that made it into my head. What was she thinking? Even in an age of "rap music" there are people without talent. Do not buy this-stick with hip-hop and rap. It's good music plain and simple.
Not very secure. iPad fell out several times, have tried putting some rubber/glue behind it but then the whole case began looking terrible. It was nice for about 2 weeks though.

I wish we could have reviewed something that actually worked...It didnt. Save your money. The company made the best of it by having me pay for return shipping when I told them what really happened. Maybe if they paid UPS to come do a pickup, then put their own postage on it and send us another one, it would be different. But as with so many things nowdays, it's all about big money for some company.
This is definitely an interesting perspective from both a male & female perspective.

I bought this in February when we added 2 kittens to my household. I've had it for almost 4 months now and the kittens are still not using it. I'm not sure what they mean about being able to adjust the height. The lowest height was perfect for two kittens, but the highest is high enough that even one of them can't stand on. There's no way to lift these up easily to allow a cat to go on top, so they just don't like it.
My daughter had been so into this series and I couldn't find the book any where -- until finally looking thru Amazon.com. The price is a little high but worth it in our opinion.

This is a very heavy duty pan and it has performed well since I purchased it. However, just like several other reviewers, the coating of this pot came off at the edges after two weeks or so. It must have gotten to me before they were made. They need a better finishing. We will use if when we think that our current one gets too scratched up, but cannot afford another set until either the finish is improved or the product becomes more robust. As a result, I give it 2 stars.
i gave it five stars because the service was quick which makes me feel safe when giving my feedback to the world thank you :)
I'm so bummed. This book does not have any pictures to look at from an artistic standpoint. It looks like most of the designs are made using straight lines.
It does its job.

I ordered this for a small room to store the cat food and supplies. It works ok but doesn't go full circle. The bottom is not leveled. This would have been fine if it didn't wobble when you pick up or move it. There are two other items that sit at right angle to top which cause problems as well. We had them on each side of cabinet door so these three pieces together don't fall off. One may be a problem if counter space available.

I bought this book under the impression that it would contain a lot of recipes on making and serving healthy meals. While there are certainly some healthy meals in it, most seem to be for fast food or processed food. There is plenty about how much better these foods taste than other forms of food, but rarely does the author give any specifics as to what kind of cooking you'd like with such recipes, if any. The pictures all take up half your page at once, and many appear very small.

This product does not work with the iPod Touch 4G. The ad shows that it does. No where on the package or the packaging is this stated. If you have purchased a touch 4G and need an accessory to convert your dock into charging, this will NOT do. You must be able to plug in another cable which doesn't come standard when purchasing one of these ipod docks. Amazon needs to clarify what products support the docking station feature, especially since other reviewers mentioned it.

i didnt really like this product after getting them, the plastic felt cheap and thin to me and there seems not enough of them in one packet. then i try one out on my face it actually hurt a lot when putting them on. for some reason they didn't work for me. might just be that they dont fit right. I would probably buy something different next time because most likely ones are going back since I wasted money on this.
You have got to be kidding me? These look so cool but when you receive them they are not at all what is was pictured as being!!! I'm very disappointed!
Really liked this. It was an easy read with interesting characters.
Works good but could have done without the instructions. Very easy instructions that show you how to use before applying product.
My mother wanted this.

I think it could be better. The book needs to offer more ideas and strategies for overcoming the financial barriers. Also, people in their 40s and 50s who are at a stage of life that they would like to improve will not finish reading this as quickly. So if you don't have time for it, you'll probably move on. If you're already getting serious into managing money, then this book might give you some useful information. But overall, there isn't much content that's groundbreaking or helpful. Overall, though, a good read.
As my dog says "It's as tough and durable as gold!" He has ripped up every toy or plastic thing we've given him, but he hasn't destroyed these yet.

This was a good introduction but, for some reason, it wasn't as riveting at the beginning and got boring towards the middle. A lot of the characters were not developed to any depth in terms of description which I thought took away from that part alot. Other sections seemed rushed, too many events happening within one day. But on a whole, it's an interesting read if you have little knowledge or interest in what happened before 9/11.
My cats won't touch the stuff. They know better than me. Oh well, back to their nasty little pellets, which they gobble down. Thanks for nothing. :-(

I'm so disappointed with this product. I did the research, read up on various coffee makers, made them in different sizes, ordered one and it seemed really great. So when my husband got sick last year, he bought a brand new one, as he's hard of hearing, but kept his hearing aid plugged in, too! Well, once again, after 2 weeks of use, it started to beep/ click over an hour later about 20 minutes!! And, like another reviewer, it's now leaking water all over.
I like the product but it doesn't hold up. It has a short wire and wires started disconnectioning. You have to be very careful with this wire.

The product seems to be pretty simple but you can't use the phone if you don't have your charger connected, that is why I bought it in first place! It charges up great and does exactly it promised. But without a cord there are no calls or texts!! Not very happy about that! Also when using navigation on app like google maps - my GPS constantly drops off. This happened with both the car charging port so now I'm just carrying around an extra one I guess.

Good quality product. Fits nicely on the iPhone 4s. The screen protector has this weird rainbow effect. But other than that it does what it's supposed to. I would buy a similar product from Tech Armor.

This Card was for Dell Dimension 4000 with Windows XP. I bought new to avoid a lot problems later on when upgrading XP or doing other hardware upgrades. There were two problems. First, it would not mount at all.
My wife likes it. It looks like new even though it's over three years old. You don't want your iPad to get wet.

This was probably the first in a series of short stories about werewolves that I have read. It would take you only 30 mins. to read if you're not into things like that. The story is fairly predictable but enjoyable all the same. I've noticed some other reviewers are rating this poorly because they didn't actually finish it or don't believe in it. I'm unsure why this makes them so angry. Personally, I liked the book and am looking foreword to what happens next.

I didn't have this very long, but it already developed a crack on the bottom. This is the first cover I've had that wore away like this....for no reason. The only reason I'm giving this one star instead of none is, well, it's in my car and does its job so far! Just wish it hadn't cracked. Too much hassle to send back, so I'll just toss it.

I don't know what to write here, this product didn't work at all for me. It was a complete waste of time and money. I tried it on one eye first, the light did not affect my eyeglass frame or any other part of my body whatsoever. To conclude just dont buy. I will probably never be able to find something else that works. Save your money - there are plenty others out there. I wouldn't suggest giving this little cheap thing even 1 star but you have to.
This is a great coffee maker. The only negative is it doesn't have auto shut off. A very good pot at this price.

The sound is terrible and the connection breaks way too frequently. Mine lasted a year, until I plugged it in one day to find my PC speaker having died. :( I'm very disappointed with this. If you are looking for cheap, these speakers may work OK but if you're an Apple fan who wants something that's long lasting, definitely look elsewhere. Don't waste your money like me. My other complaint though would have been that this product requires 4 AA batteries while it's rated at 2 amps.

It's ok. Just not as good or exciting compared to the other books. It is a pretty short book...you can probably finish it in one evening. A disappointment if you've read all of her books and enjoyed them.

I was so disappointed in this book because my 9 year old son asked me to read it over a weekend and said the same things that other reviewers have said. For instance, on pg 11 he quotes an anonymous girl as being "so pretty". Really? That sounds like someone who has no idea what "cool" or "in" are, but that's another issue. On p. 5 there is a picture of two girls with blue hair and blue eyes holding hands.

I would like to say that The book was good or even very good. But just imagine the author did not read his own book. They changed characters name and they were all in one place. What happened? It was almost exactly same story line as second book! If you are not in the mood of reading the same, don't do it. My suggestion is to make a 3rd book on this subject please. We need other points for comparison. And please stop editing it! Please let me proofread it at some point.

This is a great concept, but the execution leaves something to be desired. I really enjoy using my old Braun with it's variable speed control and easy cup design, so I thought it would work as well on this new machine. It doesn't. You have to make 3 or more cups of coffee in order for enough hot water comes out (and who only wants their coffee warm?) to cover all your cups. That means making 4 cups, or more, if you want HOT coffee.

The reason I give one star is becasue it didn't work for me or another person i knew. It was a waste of money. So I really don't like that at all. If the price could be lowered then would get a better review on this. Thanks Amazon. And thank you. &# 128540;

It is really small. I did not know when I ordered it that it was so small and hard to find a good place for it. For the price of it, there are much better ones out there. If you have little space, then by all means, buy this table.
Not exactly what's it takes to be an American. After losing his family, one man goes far from home.

I love the first 2 books, but this book just plain irritated me. It's like watching a movie you knew from the start wasn't going to be as good that your friend had wanted for weeks, and it gets better by the third installment. The way he made out with her was just so unrealistic (not even worth mentioning), and also how he always makes everyone seem so nice yet never gives anyone any money. He just seems very unloveable, like he's some sort of con man.
First it is an okay book and I did finish it. It is not one of his best but the story line was ok, if you love to read bad sex novels then this is for you.

Well, it's nice that we have a new game system but the games are not compatible??? How come they can't sell it with all of us who don't live in Florida so this could work? Just make sure you do your homework first and then buy it. Or maybe I'm missing something because I am having trouble loading up my older games. Not happy.

The screen protector is not clear. There are many bubbles after it went on. It may be me and when the directions mention wetting it down I was trying to apply more water than what they said. But my son tried putting this on without any luck. Too bad, because its suppose to help with glare too. He gave up in favor of some other type of screen. We would have gone through a couple more. These do stick well but thats about it.

I really wanted this to work for me. It looked like it should have been the perfect size for what we needed. We were making a little play yard and needed a barrier around it. First of all you cannot pull out the plastic sides that make up most of these fences. You would need two people and quite some strength to put them back in with the top on. But if your going to do that, why not just stick on double sided tape instead. This seems kind of pointless.

The battery does not hold a charge as long as the original. I don't know if this is an old product or if it was just poor quality. Either way not happy with it. It now holds for 7 hours and only gives me about 1 1/2 hours of screen time before having to be plugged in again. Really disappointed. Buyer beware! Read reviews on Amazon about this product, they will let you know that you get what you pay for. This thing cost almost $30.

Started out ok, but the story lost interest and ended really bad. Could have used a different way for book 2 to unfold. The whole ending was anticlimactic after two books. Sorry! Did not find this series appealing at all! Maybe next book? Still love Sherrilyn Kenyon's writing.
Not as good as the others, and it was quite predictable. If you want a light beach read, get it, otherwise pick up one of her earlier books. Just don't read this in public or you'll regret it...

The book really didn't hold my interest. Not one of Grisham's best books. Hard going at times,and almost nothing on the death penalty. Too many things that did not make sense. Would have been better if he had concentrated on just ONE murder.
The first time we washed these they fell apart! We never would have put the dogs in them if it were not for that! You get what you pay for!

For an item that should be a life saver, this is not. I really liked being able to take the cup with me when camping and having warm water anytime on my way home. After less than 5 days of use, no longer would turn on. It came back on, but never warmed up. Very frustrating!! Would not recommend at all :-(

These don't work at all. When my computer tries to detect an audio device the product does nothing, which makes them completely useless as advertised. This is in no way due to their faults: both units malfunctioned in exactly the same way.

I didn't buy this from Amazon, but you can bet I'm going to before it goes out of print. This is the second novel by Charles Higham that I've tried and they have both been disappointing. There are some interesting parts about Nazi Germany here, but overall these books don't offer much more than a rehash. In fact, it's downright boring, at least compared with previous books, which were lively as well written if somewhat less dramatic.

This book seems great for those who love to have a fantasy come true, but the plot is slow and the heroine becomes annoying. I read it in one day, so perhaps this was my fault, since I'm not usually inclined to finish a book. It's an easy read, though. The author sets her story against Christian fundamentalism that is represented strongly, including caricatures of George W. Bush and Paul Ryan. There were many stereotypes about Christians as well, something that bothered me.

I love the look and feel of this product, however it was not constructed as well as my other similar products. The top piece doesn't latch to hold together without help. It broke after only about a month of use. Not worth sending back. So disappointing. But the style is great if you don't carry very heavy items; which I don't. Really cheap construction!
The unit does NOT come with the HDMI cables, so if you need a cable for your playstation 3, this is not for you. I returned it.

There are some nice ideas and the recipes sound good, but for my first attempt I'm still looking for an easy cake cookbook to cook without a mixer. I tried two recipes that turned out very well, so maybe it is me who needs help. Not worth what seems like quite an investment. Sorry.
You get what you pay for. The product is cheap for sure. Don't buy this. Waste your money...............!...........................................

I got this for my 9 year old son. When he opened the product, there was not a picture of Darth Vader standing tall and proud. This thing is tiny. It could literally fit in one hand. If you thought that you were going to put these on your dashboard, think again. A waste all around. Do NOT buy. For $15 it would have been okay, but they are only worth $2 or less!!! Look elsewhere. Not recommended.
Not as complete as they claimed but adequate. A bit lacking in some features common among modern lexicons. Very handy.
Didn't work. Tried it with 3 different phones and same result. The mic worked only when held in front from ear canal, that's not how they were advertised.

We have used the TomTom one for a year now and loved it, but thought it was just perfect when we got married two years ago...well it took us over 10 minutes to drive from our home in Oklahoma City Oklahoma, to Kansas City, Ky, which is where my wife works. For us, and our first few travels around Texas were great. However, if you take an exit onto State Highway 6 before heading east, you'll be getting stuck on I-35E/Business US 75.

These are really fun as a stocking stuffer. Very small - about 2 1/2" x 3". They arrived packed so well that the box was damaged. I think they get better with age or if kept in an airtight container, but only time will tell ;)When using them to bake cupcakes, you want something on top, however, depending upon what you're baking, this may not be ideal.

A truly awful waste of my time!Don't take this book seriously if you are even slightly religious. The story line is predictable and there were many plot holes - not worth even 99c, let alone 3 or 4! It was free, so I didn't mind too much but, don't bother. My time can't be wasted. :D

I purchased it because the price was great, but once i got it the quality really sucked. The volume is so low that even right next to my computer you can't hear what your playing. They should rename this product "crappy headphones!"

We were able to get one channel to work using this antenna, only 2 stations and not very well, but the picture was clear when no weather is present. Once we turned on an outdoor antenna (different brand) in our attic, which also receives 8 channels all day long for free, more than 100 channels, including a couple from about 4 states away, crystal clear, even though there are trees in between us.

There is no way this movie was made by Steve Martin. Even his friends didn't think he had a good time making this. I don't care how many times you tell the same joke with different actors, it still doesn't have to be funny every time. Just show us some laughs. Nothing at all in my opinion. As far as I'm concerned, Stephen King should sue because there aren't enough laughs in it! Very disappointed. The one bright spot about this film were the actors and actresses. But beyond that, not worth it.

I received this book as a gift. It is a cute idea for kids, but don't buy it to play with if you're wanting something that isn't going to break. We got 2 of them and only one was usable by my son. The other broke almost immediately. My son did love the idea, but can't use both. I'd rather have just found some plain old magnetic tiles. He liked playing with those, so we'll be trying those next. Too bad because I do like it.
I bought this as a gift for my husband, but have already used it. Easy to use, easy clean up. Definitely recommend.
It made my teeth yellow. I went to the dentist and all of her work shows that the gum inflammation is not caused by bacteria as with this product.
This product does what it is suppose to. Easy application.

I've used these kind of cases before and this one was not the best. The case slides open too easily - I have to tug it open. Other times my credit cards would slip out from under it. It's a cheap case, but you get what you pay for.

The product works well but it is very cheaply made. However I suppose the price reflects this and if you plan on only using for a few months then its fine. Not as durable or rugged looking as an OEM one. It would have been nice to know that upfront. Hopefully they improve their quality control in the future. Overall for the price, it's worth getting when there are no other options like this! Will get at least two years out of them which was our goal so far with these.

I bought this a week ago so i could use my kindle during travel or when on the go. Unfortunately it had two problems, First was that there is not power button, and second i tried to charge it, as usual, by using the usb cord from wall AC plug, however, no matter where you lay it down, the light turns off. It came with 3 different options (battery, rechargeable cable & computer plug adapter) but only 1 worked.

This is a very poorly written book, it reads like someone's first effort. There are too many grammatical and spelling mistakes which causes one to wonder if English isn't the author's second language (which I doubt, as she writes in English). Not only that, but all of her "stories" start off by showing how bad your child is, then tell you that it's OK to yell at them for doing something they were "not supposed to" do.
This product shorted out on me after one week of use. We had to go buy another cord immediately. VERY disappointed!

the price is excellent but this machine does not run as smooth as my old one even tho it has a much higher price. It bogs down on some pots and other pots. The lid handle gets pretty hot also. I would look at another brand next time. My previous pot had no lid lifter and was simple to lift open lid. Not sure hown that made this coffee makers design better. I'm not happy. :(
I'm a fan of everything about this show. It is entertaining and makes you want to see what will happen next.

I love the sound of this little portable speaker but mine started acting up after 1 day. It wasn't until that day when it would sometimes play music then randomly stop and make a weird popping noise for about 2-3 seconds before starting it again (which defeats all purpose of using these at all)! I've tried different charging cords, chargers, adapters etc without success. Do not buy! Not even worth what they are selling them for.
I have not yet finished the first bottle. It seems like it helped me get a little more energy while taking it. The taste is good. Will purchase more. No side effects. Love it!

I bought this product in mid November. Worked fine when you put a flash drive on it, but the next day it is dead. No power,nothing, no light. Doesn't matter what usb port or hard drives, it doesn't work. I'm returning it. Stay away. If they are still around buy something from NewEgg. But be sure to check that before you plug anything in. The item may not fail after one week, and the company is very nice to work with.
Easy to put on for those worried about fit and function. Only a couple of areas where you can't move the covers around easily but they are minor. Great product over all.
The story was an OK one to watch on a snowy and freezing day outside. Not as spectacular or fun to view as, say, Lord of the Rings - Return of the King. However, it does help pass time.
Not as good a book - in my opion. The idea is interesting but the story line didn't really hold any interest for me. It was very predictable.

I've had this case for a little over 2 months. Within the first week, I noticed it was cracking. This only made me think that it would have continued to become more and moreloose around that perimeter as time went on. As other reviewers noted, most of thestones fall out after just 1-2 weeks without using it. My old case, which iscovered in gems, has lasted at least 3 years with hardly any wear. Save your money on something else. If anyone knows, please let me.

This product was very cheap. The first time it fell on our tile floor while sitting still it broke. My son only uses his phone when running, so if you are constantly moving your arm it's not going to last long. It did have a nice design though.
I really like this item. Although the shipping took a little longer than it should, my wife still liked it. She loved how stylish it was.

This is not a novel - it is just page after page of dialogue in which the author states his opinions rather than painting scenes to make them interesting. You have no idea what he sees into each other - you are left with only that they want sex. The heroine has no redeeming qualities and even at her best she comes across as a stupid child. I can't understand why this book won any awards. It was just really plain boring.
My husband put this together in less than 30 min. Looks very nice for a low price!
This wasn't my favorite book.
Great read. Lots of drama. Will look forward to the next book.
Very pleased. Great for the price. I got this at a great price and it came quick too. Love this item.

First of all, let's talk about the packaging. It's nice and compact. The box comes with a very informative instruction sheet that will tell you to install on most surfaces - which is good in principle but it's not practical when trying for your car as it won't fit well even if you're planning doing this indoors. You have two ways get started. Either keep the sticker stuck to itself or try to press out all air pockets before application.

These spoons really are great, they feel solid, and the colors on them make it easy to identify which size is which. The only thing I don't like about it is, as some others said, that you have this tiny indent in each spoon; it's a little weird and feels out of place there. Overall, these will be good for parties - so many sizes.

A nice easy read with a lot of common sense tips. I like how she wrote to keep the reader entertained. Definitely would recommend this book as a quick and informative read. Also, if you're an avid golfer, you'll enjoy his stories about golfing experiences from different parts around the world. Great job Bill!
I'm glad I purchased this for my Samsung Galaxy S3. It comes with everything you need to install and it was a perfect fit. I would recommend it!

I was really looking forward to this book having read all of the other books written by the author. Unfortunately that excitement only lasted about five minutes. The story itself started out promising, then went downhill pretty fast. It feels as if he has taken and old fairy tale character like Cinderella from the 50's or 60's put her on Facebook and in a post modern fantasy world for two hundred years. If you are going to be original at all, don't go over fifty years old with your story.

I ordered the product based on positive ratings - which was a big mistake. My husband worked with both types of products and never heard anything about this product. He tried it one day to give him relief after being in agony for several days and could not tolerate either one. Perhaps we received a bad batch? We will be returning them.

Great tool with lots of good tools. I highly recommend it. I have used a lot of different brands but this one is the best. It may not look fancy but then again it did cost 1/10 as much. The blades are razor sharp and last forever. Very well constructed. I'm sure there more expensive knifes, but they will be too difficult to use. This set has everything you need at your fingertips for any job. Thanks Stanley Bostitch!

I've been an admirer of Steve McQueen for a long time. I first saw The Sand Pebbles as part of the series on TV when it was broadcast in 1974. As soon as I knew he did not have anything to do with making this film or writing it, so much as directing and producing, it became all about me.

this would be a five star product except that it's one of those cases where you buy it based on what other reviewers say, instead of doing your own research and reading the reviews yourself....i can see why my friend has had trouble with his unit. we have to set our radios in direct sight so both units are being used, but for us at least there is considerable static from all three units..no matter if they're on, or off.
I like mysteries but unfortunately didn't find this one particularly good reading. It felt very amateurish.

I was shocked to read how many 5-stars it received. This is what the mainstream media thinks of us today. If an author wants my book money, they should tell me why something in this story made sense, rather than simply making up a plot line that makes absolutely no sense. As for the characters, even after spending some time with them, there were very few likable ones. The premise and sub-plots don't make sense and feel forced into place.
Very easy to set up. The only problem is that the power supply seems a little cheap. But other than that, I'm very pleased overall.

They are NOT "leather." I could tell by looking at a sample that the inside of the jacket (the part where you put your arms in, not on the back) is paper thin and very cheap. Even if they did match up to real leather, how would it protect my iPhone?The armband works well.

I bought this printer for a home office. The wireless feature works well however after the print job is finished it takes 5-10 minutes to print/be able to do any other operations - basically all it's good for. Wireless setup was easy. Quality of printing documents and photos are nice but not great. forever Printing envelopes taer. If you aren't using photo paper you need two sets which in my case ended up being about $40 per set so that's another expense. Print speed could use improvement as well.

I couldn't make heads or tails out of this book. When reading it to my children, they were confused. There's not enough information for a child and the pictures are boring. The cover says'read aloud as your child' which is why I bought this, but no way. For that purpose, there needs to be more words on each page. I've decided to return it. Bummer. It was great when we had all things animals. But they're making them in bigger sizes now, so I'll just stick with that.

My son has been drinking this smoothie everyday for about a week now. He seems to be doing great since he started them. I have had no complaints like some other reviewers have. It even smell good coming out the bottle. I hope there are more flavors that they offer in the future. Also all of their products come from small family companies which is hard thing when you see big name food items that use large corporations like NutraBullet. The taste comes directly out his mouth.
I received this item and the blue color had been replaced by pink. The pink was faded on its surface. However, i like my order because of its fast delivery. Thanks so much.

The author writes like a first grader wrote this book. It is not worth reading. I read half and had to quit. Too bad the book was such crap. Don't waste your time. There are many other places much better than this.

I bought one in Feb. It quit working 3 weeks later. The repair kit does not work on the unit. The manufacturer had no info to tell me how and when it would be fixed. As a matter of fact, none was available. Good luck if your unit stops working. Update. I've learned my lesson. Don't buy Panasonic. Their TVs have been cheap for far too long. They should know better.

I'm sure they are great headphones, but the product I got was defective. The sound went out on one side when plugged into my Sony MP3 player, and then stopped working altogether. Very disappointing! Sending back.

I think that this book could have been edited down. There are quite a few parts where one can see the author repeating himself. Although some of his ideas were good, overall it seemed repetitious and not well researched. On another note - did he even read the article by Brian Regan on his father which appeared in the magazine Sagebird? It is mentioned twice (and only twice).

This case is super cute and my daughter loved it the only problem we have with this product would be you actually can't charge your phone using that side of case..there are no openings in those directions for charging. Other then that.. Very Cute!

Okay, I'm an extremely passionate fan of the original Star Trek series and was thrilled to see they were making a movie sequel. As long as you're okay with not having any special effects this is your movie...but just for fun. It's basically been done before - including Star Trek's first movie. I only saw it in 3D, so my experience might have left me confused on how some action scenes work.

the product does not work out why because when installed it was working as soon I powered up then got frozen on a loading screen. so no signal could send to tv even though this has something wrong with it.will return this. but it's been more than two weeks now.

This album is absolutely horrible! This album, which could be mistaken for a total waste of time, has only ten tracks and an average length of just over twelve minutes. The first song starts out with some sort of weird electronic noises that sound like the sound effect from a video game. It sounds somewhat good to me until I think about it, but maybe that's because this track makes no sense. After this, you have two fairly simple songs where each person repeats the same line of lyrics.

As reported this is sold by someone who had tried to pawn the DVD over for $2. This poor excuse of an item arrived in its packaging all ripped up. That being said amazon does return them for full credit. Thank goodness for Amazon they do stand behind their products. A lesson learned from Amazon.

The characters in this story are one dimensional and flat. And you start wondering how many more times can she get herself into trouble. She goes from place to place. They think she's nuts. They're clueless.

I am an AVID music lover. I'm a musician, producer, songwriter, and record producer. This is simply not worth my time. Do yourself both justice by either checking out this band's earlier work like their self-titled album, or even the live cd/ep. It does sound better in that they got to be themselves rather than try too hard, just good old rock music.

The mouse does not work with the new PC. After several attempts to figure out how to program, it was not even close to working. My grandson had no interest in returning it, so, I gave it away as a gift just for something to occupy my hands. Sorry Amazon, that is why we buy from Amazon!

I purchased this item after reading the reviews based on the claim that it kept your beverage very hot and cold. When you are drinking out of it, your drink is luke warm. So, with this in mind, DO NOT buy this item. Also, the straw part doesn't come apart well either. It keeps falling apart. This isn't anything like a thermos. I'd say go to Starbucks or any place where they sell thermoses, you'll get more for a lot less.

After receiving the product I was very pleased with it until only 2 months later when there started to appear a black streak on all corners of my screen. The film would not fully cover my iPhone but instead covered the silver line that is supposed to cover up that. In addition, once removed it left streaks and marks down most sides so now my screen has a visible white tint. Now I'm trying to figure out what to do about this product.

i tried to open it but they don't come off with out an epoxy...no matter what..now what is that?? I am going back and hopefully have better luck for the next time that we need some glasses.. as far as the glass goes... They are good so far!! just will work on removing them from my glasses before doing their jobs.... thanks again amazon...hope this helps:-)

Its an ok book. I mean its ok. I've no issue with buying books to read once and forget about. This one is a decent read. The story could have been developed much better than it was. It felt like it was just over before it started. But then again since this isn't the first book of yours that I read, I won't really hold this as any type of standard. I enjoyed reading it. Not saying you are wrong for it, but I'd recommend it.

Was not what I was looking for. Not sure how you can call it a book when it's only 4 pages long. This is one of the first things I've ever returned to amazon. Save your money. If it had any kind of substance at all - don't waste my time. There are way better books out there than this.
I have been using the product for 2 years now and it works just great. Does not affect my skin. Will continue to buy this product.

I have never owned such a small headset. The sound is fine but the weight of this thing really annoyed me. Its like someone wrapped my head in lead and left weights on it to keep them on. Maybe if you wore heavy gloves under your ears or placed ear plugs in. This just made sitting at my desk so much more painful. And I wasn't even going to work out wearing this.

I gave this book a 3.5 star review because it felt like I really wanted to know how the characters went on. Unfortunately, I couldn't get past all of the grammatical errors that would drive me crazy if there weren't at least 2 or 3 in every chapter. Some sentences just didn't make sense and I'd have to read over them multiple times before they made sense. Also some words with two letters ended up ending together which meant it was kinda weird having both ends saying "the" instead of "he".
bought it. Opened packaging only to find an empty case. Not worth returning. So basically I just wasted $30+.
