This was much nicer than another one i ordered, but the clip does not stick so hard and can easily fall off. Also there are other designs available. Overall I'm happy, just wished it stayed on.

Not very pleased with this product. The first one I received didn't turn on, so for the second one, it would not even power up. I'm returning them both...at least Amazon is easy to do this. It took only 2 days from ordering until they arrive....Thanks Amazon!! They don't even deserve a star!!!
The top was way to big for my neck size so I had to give it away because of that but then you cannot adjust it.... not what I expected :(

The product was shipped in a small envelope. When I opened it, there were no instructions on how much of the oil should be put into this oil. There seems to have been an error with manufacturing. My husband could not get it started running.

What a waste of time and money. Poor acting, lousy story line, bad directing. Save your money, save yourself some time. I can't express how much it sucks to be involved in this type movie or read. It was very unrealistic. I love scary movies & read books about the unknown. But come on. Not only could one never imagine being abducted by aliens, they hardly seemed like aliens at all. They talked and acted, well, alien. So do other movies. And this one did not help either.

This CD has some great songs, and it's worth buying any way, even though it does contain more covers than originals. Some people complain that there isn't enough original work on here, but for a greatest hits collection, there's plenty here. A couple reviewers here are complaining about the sound quality, which I don't find to be quite at all bad. The quality overall comes across nicely.

I saw this at a show years ago. It has good music. The video quality is not the best in my opinion. But it's the band. And there aren't any other bands like that. There was more of a rock band, or punk. Maybe even some reggae influence. Overall, they were quite good. It's worth having if you're thinking about checking them out. Don't get yourself into it too much. If you really hate it, send me back your dvds. For now I can live with it.

We purchased a used DCR-SR41 camera hoping that we would get lucky and not be locked out of our computer access due to using some old version software. The manufacturer does tell you how difficult it is for security users but they do NOT warn people about what can happen when trying to work with this camera. We spent hours installing software on two machines in order to try and make use of the camera, only end up having to reset them twice during installation.

These things make you feel like crap. Nothing like the real thing. Don't waste your money. Go straight to the dollar store. If I wanted something that tasted bad I'd take candy. My friend bought these thinking they were as good, she only put them on her face. She said it tastes like licorice. Oh well.

I am amazed at the low ratings for this product. Although it may actually be a good product if you are interested in hearing voices, as others have suggested, or some way to modify your music, its capabilities have been well documented by people who tried this. The biggest problem is not so much that it's hard to get working, but instead of being intuitive there appears to be no easy method of getting from one mode to any other.

Bought this for my niece and she wanted a hard case, not rubber, would rather have gotten an otter box, this was advertised as hard, not rubber but the only reason I gave it one star is because there wasn't anything to choose from....

My title says it all. I just received this and have not even had time yet to do any test taking. I'm very disappointed. It looks used, all the page numbers are torn off. It arrived in terrible condition. You can tell its been used. And of course there is no receipt or invoice. They will need one if they expect Amazon to take my money back.

I cannot be more disappointed in the product. Upon receiving it one screw was missing from the base and could not use it. After installing it, found out 2 of the screws that hold the head to the post were also missing. Now I have a stand with several very noticeable holes but no screws. Not even worth returning for such a small purchase, would look at this in person before buying.
Ok if you didn't know anything prior about this topic.
The product arrived in perfect condition (no bends).
A bit too heavy and bulky. Has everything you need except the charger with a USB cord. Well worth it for travel.
It fits perfectly to our grill model which is what we needed it for. Keeps out rain from going into grills or burning house down if not covered.
Not a very good read. It was ok but I couldn't really get into it and it definitely wasn't one of her best.

This is one of the worst books I ever read! The writing was bad as it seemed to come from a 15 year old and there were many misused words. If you want to read trash that will make your eyes pop out like those movie stars do then go for it!

Just got and installed this light. Installing took about 20 minutes. The lights seem better than the OEM which were broken off and cracked. I really could have repaired them by myself but in hindsight I'm glad it was just an assembly. Overall, a good buy if you need some replacements. The only down side (not sure what to expect on the color temperature range), there is no blue tint like my original factory lights. These replaced the yellow ones though.

A total waste of paper...even my Kindle can't fix that. It's no longer about the story, it's all just sex with people other than the characters you've spent so much time developing. Don't bother buying it! Seriously disappointed!!! If you liked this book, or have read some others, then don't bother, not worth wasting your time.
Poor quality.

My LG G2 is only a couple of weeks old. I've not been rough with it, and yet already it's peeling off in pieces. Don't buy this case, spend your money somewhere else, like Otterbox. They are more expensive, but they last. I'm very unhappy. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned...
This seemed like an interesting premise but just didn't go anywhere.

I bought this for my daughter who has a huge music collection and loves to listen to the radio, play her MP3's and charge her phone. This product is exactly as described. It comes with all of you need cables for different phones (micro USB, standard usb, etc). The radio works really well. And you can use it plugged into AC or car. What makes it better would have been if this charger also came in black. It's not expensive so that's probably why its not. Overall great product.

I love my new case. It looks great and all of the buttons work well. The only thing that bothers me is when you are playing an app or taking a picture it makes noise as if your trying to take something with one finger too many times. Other then that, i am very happy. :)

I ordered this for my daughter's Ipod 4th generation because it is supposed to be the "right" size and make her happy. But right out of the package that was shipped from China there were scratches on it. It doesn't fit perfectly but does cover most of the screen. Also shipping took several weeks. If you want a case with some bling then you will like it, just not if you're wanting something functional which it clearly states.

It didn't work. It was missing the battery and all instructions that should have been with it. In fact it came apart as I tried to get batteries into it's compartment and ended up causing minor injury. If Amazon had not included instructions in its shipping package this item wouln't be working at all. We tried everything we could - even went out and bought another set of new batteries.

I bought this in January of 2013. Now, it is July the blue rubber band that keeps the battery cover closed fell off and no longer stays closed. The leather case has gotten very dirty on several places around the edges as well. I've also noticed a small piece coming lose from the inside but it's still intact. Overall, just OK. For $20 you get what you're paying for. I wouldn't recommend taking mine outside to throw it. With that said, I'd buy another one because if dropped, it'll protect your phone.
Good value and fast shipping, fits snug on queen sized mattress, however this is not waterproof. There are no waterproof zippers, which made me concerned in case there was leakage.

One of them doesn't work properly. The other works ok, but the connection is kind ofloose and it makes a weird noise when I plug my iPad in. It probably cost me enough to return. Not worth it. Get in a real apple store. You'll be much happierto get one that works. No more cheap ones from this company.

I hate that I spent what was necessary of money. This book came into my mailbox today. I'm so disappointed. It has been listed at the top if many lists and this is not a good thing. It's an absolute rip off. There isn't any story in it whatsoever. All about nothing. No one is mentioned until page 100. Then only two sentences. A girl goes out with her mom to see some friends. One thing leads to another and she asks to go back home. Her dad says okay.

I wanted to use the camera with a Nikon D700 and was told that it would work but when i plugged in everything and put batterys into every thing and nothing worked no matter what settings my camera.....DONT BUY.... get an expensive one so u can watch your cam. And as far as quality from another review yes its not HD but good enough for the price of $20. So save up some more money...spend $40 extra on a better one.

This is the second one of these I've bought in this price range. It does it's job, just wish I could see into it with as much clarity as my prior model did. That's okay, because when I'm at home and I need it, I'll still find another use for it. It's not perfect, but if you don't mind having to adjust or zoom in/out, then get one. If your vision isn't that good and all you want are basic phone features, go ahead & spend a little more.
Love it! it is what I want for my baby to sleep in. They last the whole week and they are very well made.

This is very heavy and takes a while to dry. Even though you put it in the dryer with high heat, as instructed (on low), it'll take more time than others I've used that are not so heavy. The size of this product was great but I had to return it, no fault on Amazon's part. It just wasn't what my husband wanted.

It is the perfect size for a small space, which is where ours is. The problem I have with it... right out of box it only worked once. When plugged in and turned on, there was not noise or light, just NO power to unit. After 3 days all lights come on so it's ok, but who cares when one has no power!

As I mentioned in earlier comments, this is not a "review" as per the usual rules governing these reviews. Please see my profile for more. My review would simply have been to report that if you decide to spend your $15 (and possibly more) on this, save yourself some pain and read anything but this.
The product I received was just as described and arrived earlier than promised. It worked great with my older Kindle Paperwhite. It's the correct replacement for a lost adapter. Very satisfied!
These work great for small areas. They are so much faster then the cheap ones. My family of 4 loves them. I love them too because no fumes and clean up is a breeze. So glad we bought these!

I have purchased items from this seller before and the description is accurate, BUT they are getting too difficult to trust. They stated it would be here in 2 - 3 days. Today was Monday, I got an E-Mail saying shipping will take over two weeks, which obviously means there won't even arrive until October! I ordered these as a surprise for my husband who works shifts so that when he gets home at night we both know exactly what it is.
This has been a great item for out new puppy and even works as an extra barrier from her running through bushes.

I had this for a few months now. It's not too bad but the design of it makes coffee spilling when you are pouring out your coffee. I've learned to pour slowly so as not to spill over on my stove top. Also, if I'm ready before all the water is boiling, then putting in coffee grounds seems like it's taking longer than waiting until everything's boiling. I'd say it gets hot enough though. All and all, good cheap kettle. Does what its supposed to.

Like many others, I've been playing with this thing for 2 days as I wanted something that looked cool, but offered the performance of a "real computer." At less than $200.00 there are few other options to consider. With some tweaking, I was able to get it running Windows 7 in about an hour. Boot to desktop takes only 30 seconds. The device is light and very portable. Most devices don't even include CD drives, so you cannot just install software...

This was an interesting story. I have never been to New Orleans, but this book has given me a better understanding of what makes the city tick. As for why it took so long to catch on to Mardi Kras. I think he needs to give those in charge of these festivals enough time. It may be hard now, but you won't lose money if your visitors don't see or understand what's going on.

These were very expensive for 2 pens. They don't write as smoothly at the Zebra Mech Ball Grip Roller Ball, which is 1/2 of the price or more! If I am going to pay $2 per pen, the ballpoint version would be worth it. The only thing that makes these pens unique (other than their low price) are they have a cap on them. Don't waste your money like I did. It may work out for some folks, but it isn't working in ours or anyone else's household.

I bought this to replace the last one and so far it seems better, no problems with opening cans without using our hands anymore but we have only had ours for a few months. Good product would recommend if you don't like those electric can openers that always leave us holding them down when they open a can.

Bought this cable to connect my Roku box and a new TV for the bedroom. It works great, is long enough (about 20 ft.) Good price compared with cables I had seen. Great picture quality. No problems. Highly recommend.

It doesn't matter how hard I try with using this adapter to my D700 the pictures have a white border and they start looking yellow by itself when it comes in focus. The reason is that either there are too many photons bouncing back from its surface or somehow there are too few of them. If you don't mind having bad images on your expensive lenses - don't waste money here. You get what you pay for. I'm going back to Amazon Basics USB cable.
These are awesome. You have to cut them small but that not a big deal. I put this in my little black bird cage and it looks adorable. The color is awesome too. I'm super happy with it.

My wife and I are not avid coffee drinkers but we tried this out with our kids as it made a large 12oz cup of coffee. Not impressed by the quality or flavor... It has almost no foam to it. You can see through the water when you pour it... Would not recommend. Wish i read these reviews before buying it.. Waste of 10 bucks. I'm back searching for another type of coffeemaker..
The DVD would not play at all in my DVD player. Had to send back because I could hear the motor running while it played.
My sister bought my kindle fire hd for me as a birthday gift so I am using it in a few days. Today I woke up & found out that i only paid 8.99 for this with everything else she had purchased.

They are cute. However, they were much smaller than my previous set! I can only fit three eggs in each pan. When making a larger pan for four, it becomes very difficult to get them out. Very disappointed! Also with the red on them, food sticks VERY SLOW. My son does love that they match, but he has learned not take out his cookies and such immediately after working at keeping everything together. I've had to put foil over it.

The book was very disappointing. It had way too much unnecessary filler. I got the idea of one character with Asperger's, but then there were numerous subplots that did nothing to advance this story. It could have been condensed a hundred percent and saved more paper than it wasted. I'm sorry i bought it. Just another "feel good novel" from Ms. James. If that's what you're searching for, go for it. Otherwise, don't bother. There is far better out there.

My wife and I gave up on the author early on. The writing reads like a high school student's creative project. Not enough character development and plot was just an excuse to go back in time while he describes what our heroine is feeling. And then there are some major editing issues. This will be my first "freebie...I shouldn't' buy it! Too much 'filler' material not developed well. It could've gone a lot better...

I love the idea of what this product could do. The technology is great. Just wish it did not stop working. Got about 4 uses before one day it would not even power on. Customer service said they didn't see any other reviews in the return portion either. When a device was defective and you cannot get to customer service, that tells me there are some bad apples out there. For a price like this, I'd expect better. This will be returned. I'll go with Apple next. I sure did. 
 Rating: 1.
Poor parents make poor food.
A must read for all YA fantasy fans. Even though most of this series isn't part of what you would consider "young adult," there are definitely some great messages in these books.

I had this on my wishlist for months and finally decided to buy it in September so that we could have some winter holiday music with us all of the time. My boyfriend bought me a Christmas tree, but not one album or DVD. So this will go perfectly along with it!. And now I've been able to get around the house listening to these amazing songs! :)

The unit that you plug into a standard wall socket will be 110/220 in the USA and 120/240 with 220V in Europe but not all of these items are listed so do this before buying. We tried on several different appliances for countries we weren't even in or had power at all.
These are cute to look at, don't they? But that's about as far off as my opinion goes because they never worked well in my experience.

After the first 2 chapters or so I thought my kindle is not working right. The characters just don't grab me. So many books are coming out like this these days where there seems to be no care and concern for making great story lines. If you want good clean romance with some real depth then pass on this. There will probably only be 1 if ever may people reading this review. Read at your own risk, I am sure they have better reads than what I just got.

This heater looks great in our kitchen and works well so far. Easy to install although the instructions are a bit confusing about drilling into a brick or concrete--not an issue if you have experience with wood but there is no mention of where it could get scratched by screws that go through walls.
The design was cool enough, but after the second use of this one became extremely warped so much that its unusable. Not too big a deal really, just annoying.

The product does absolutely nothing. Don't waste you money. It doesn't make my water crystal clear, or anything. Nothing at all. Absolutely not worth a penny. I went back to doing it myself. Only took me about half as long and was twice the price. It's all in your head. Spend your money on things that actually work. This is very expensive junk. I'm going to be throwing mine away. They are very small. So they should really list them. Mine don't lay flat either.

This is my second one of these bottles. The first one I had for 8 years and it finally wore out (I dropped it, the tip got loose, so it leaked). My only complaint about this bottle compared to other bottles I've had, which have different functions, are that you really cannot take advantage of any kind or heat setting at all. So, if you're in a car with windows down, no heater on, put hot water in, then turn on your heater, you still don't get anywhere close to boiling enough.
I used this only five times, then there wasn't any sound transmitted via it. Would be nice to have it replaced with one that works. I've emailed Amazon three times. Very disappointing.

How much is this going to cost for an e-book? Who knows!! Does anyone know if a paper version will ever come out? Any idea as yet on whether these things can still be downloaded and listened too? If someone has any information that would help me, please post. Thanks!

When I put in some time at the local library, I decided for something to fill my time. I didn't need it that much, but if you want an inexpensive book about this topic, I'd look with a microscope first. It's not very well-written. The writing is stiff and lacks charm. Also, there's no indication or discussion of "historical documents."

As a professional cook for 35 years, I have tried and used many spatulas. This is the first one that I really dislike. It has no rubber bottom to help hold it in place on my stainless steel pans. The handle does not seem heavy enough as well when you try flipping something with it. My old cheaper ones were much better than this new one. Sorry to see that they are now made out of cheap metal. Too bad because otherwise it's a very good kitchen tool.
Great music!!!!! Love Jason Wade
Nice product. Not as strong or heavy duty as expected but still is just fine. It's easy to use. Wish the handle were shorter.

I found this product to be too expensive when you can buy the same amount for less money in any drugstore. You don't want a ton of capsules and these are way more than what was recommended. Do yourself a favor and save your money. Your health is worth it. And that's about it after all this. It didn't upset my stomach so it's all good there. So why one star? Well they really only taste like gummy.

A great deal seemed to be made of the title role in La Bohème. However, I was never able to take it. Instead of playing a tortured and tormented young man, he seems more like a shallow cad who would rather have his money than his girlfriend. The music was outstanding, however. Unfortunately, this movie had zero direction. The singing was terrible, even at the opera.

The unit worked out of the box. My wife had no trouble installing it. This is our second and only time it has failed. I think a person should consider how many times they actually plug and/or unplug. With this device, plugging and un-plugging are often required. On both units, one port works for 1 hour or less at full brightness. So you have to be pretty aware when plugging and unplugging.
This is an excellent product. Much better than any other brand we've used. We bought a second one after the first one.

It scratches easily, has spots of glue on it, was pretty hard to get on, and overall cheaply made. Save your money and buy something else. Not worth it! Would return though as shipping would be more than it's worth.
Having owned most of the books in this line over the years, I'm always delighted with their new ideas - no matter how obvious they might be.
the product is extremely poor quality. i put it on...within 30 seconds one of the clips came off. don't waste your money. you are better off trying something else. im very unhappy with this purchase.

This is truly a horrible game. Very similar to the NES version where you run and tap buttons. However, as stated in the previous reviews, your cursor shakes uncontrollably from time to time. To make matters worse, it freezes constantly, so if you are not running or tapping, then you will be forced into just tapping random buttons until your progress resumes. The only good news was that I purchased this game for my DS using Amazon.com's money-back guarantee.

It feels great, the only thing I'm not happy about is that you have to take the iPad out of it's holder when you're using a dock because sometimes there's interference. But other than that, a great product. Would buy again. :)
Like the "fashion" designer this book uses women as props instead of real life models. And these 'fashion models' are all extremely tall and thin.

They seem nice enough. However, within two weeks one of them already cracked due to no rough handling. They would also be better if they were dishwasher safe like it claimed. When you hand wash them, food seems to stick up in there even more.
I have been on this brand for years it has caused lots of digestive issues and now will not purchase again, as is there are so many other good brands in the market.
Not much to say about this case. I bought several different colors and got compliments on all. The case is not only functional it's beautiful. Highly recommended for any iPhone owner. Very stylish.

I was quite disappointed in this book, which made me curious to read the author's work before considering any other books by him. The book is written more like a journal than an actual novel, and while there are many interesting stories of life as a Jewish girl during Nazi Germany at the time - particularly with regard to anti-Semitism among Jews - much of it focuses on her relationships with others. Despite those issues there were some interesting insights into how people were living just prior to, during, and following WWII.
Protects your device, stands vertically or horizontally.

My wife ordered these for my 4 month old Cavalier King Charles Spaniels after seeing one of her friends' dogs. Unfortunately neither of our 2 dogs, who normally take an allergy pill as a treat will eat them. Even when they smell them, if not lick it off their paws, they won't touch any kind of treat.

Good idea bad quality. You have to take it off & put the Kindle in. You can't use while its still in a case. The only good thing about this is protection for your Kindle. I am not going to recommend it. It was inexpensive but don't wasted time or money with this. Also very tight fit, takes some elbow grease to get on.
Purchased this after my original stopped working.

I have used a similar scale for years but mine quit working. So naturally i went and purchased the one my sister had gotten me at Costco. This is terrible. There was no on/off switch on mine. When it worked if you touched the handle to turn it off like a car alarm when brakes are coming up or any of that, you could read it. It didn't mean that it turned off.

This is more of a pamphlet than a book. It took only 10 mins to read and I was disappointed as it had such great reviews. The book seems like most other books you might find on the topic, but very short and not worth paying $6 for. There was only 5 tips which basically boiled down to, "You don't know until you're tested!! Don't get in an accident if it's possible," so basically that sums up his entire opinion.

I tried to do a little research on this camera before spending the $500 on one. This one seemed like it was the right choice. Unfortunately when it arrived and we plugged all three cameras into our home network none of them worked! So since there are 4 hours left in the return period I'm just going to have get stuck with another product that doesn't work.
The product delivered was in new condition. It came with everything needed to install. Great quality and looks good. I would recommend this product.

It's not what I needed but that is my fault so if I ordered it again would be nice to get something with more options though. If you're trying to use one of the products listed then that's probably all you'll need out of this kit so it's a good buy.

This was pretty good. If you ever went to high school it would make u laugh, i guess. I mean sure not for EVERYBODY but at the end of each chapter there is a bunch of facts so that makes more sense. But some jokes didn't get as good reviews as others and are better than others.
The battery fit perfectly in my laptop. My computer now runs like new. Excellent price. Very happy with this product

This is a cute and unique case, but you get what you pay for. The case did not last long. In less than 6 months the paint started peeling from around it, along with my cell phone. It was quite disappointing. If you're willing to have this in one piece then go for it. But if you want something that will hold up on its own, don't waste your money. And make sure it stays closed! I tried gluing mine closed, which worked until all of those tiny chips became exposed.

Having owned this laptop for several months now, one has to say that it's an okay computer. When you're working with computers all day, you definitely want a machine that can handle some video editing, photo processing, and music playback. My Dell Inspiron 5330s was the first computer I ever had when it came out, nearly ten years ago, and my current Compaq Presario CQ60 is the second computer I've owned.
i wanted my daughters kindle fire hd 7 inch.

The product description does NOT mention what regions this DVD player works in. They don't advertise anywhere. I'm sorry I wasted money. I'll know more when I take it back and they refund the full price (including shipping).
It did not work. I am sending it back. The product appears to be made of thin cheap plastic. There seems be about 50% chance that the plug will not go in all the way.
Very happy with this set. The knives aren't that sharp, but are easy to sharpen. We would reccomend it for anyone who wants something cheap and very affordable.
The product was not very easy to use, the pictures are hard and not so clear in low light situations. I would not buy this product. Not a good deal.

I was surprised this didn't come to mind. The audio and video are not even close to HD quality. It is a total rip off. I've seen better in grade school productions. I'm going back as soon as i get paid. All three videos had some sort of glitch in them. You can see the pixelation on the screen. They were all scrambled by random lines across them at one point. This also happened with part three.
While it looks nice on my fridge, I am concerned that the sticker could become detached if someone were careless with it.
I love this movie alot.

I purchased these lights for the winter to help illuminate our property on cold days. The install was very easy. However when they come on, only the left light turns on. And yes, my wiring is correct. This has never happened with any other LED lights, and it is really annoying that you can't tell if your lights are working without turning them off. When this happens, you'll have a great view of what happens but won't know anything about it.
This is a great product...not only does it taste delicious, but my hair feels healthier, shinier. I will keep using this.

This album is complete and utter cash. Its the same formula as all his previous albums only that he seems to have gotten lazy. No substance here. I'm glad I bought this on sale for 6 or something because if not I'd feel like a sucker buying this. It wouldn't even stay in my player. Save your money people, stick with any of his old music you can find cause this isn't it.

I am trying to get a replacement but when you purchase it the box is sealed at all times and in new condition- it was sent without any packing materials. so the product has been tampered with before they got it. Amazon needs better inventory controls that prevent things like this from happening.

This book did not have much helpful info. It was basically about getting a horse to do anything. She had way too many tips on how to train your horse. There are ways in which all three children can learn. I found myself skipping over those parts because the information was nothing new. Not worth buying.

First off, the title and book cover make it seem more like a YA fantasy novel, but it's actually a very dark psychological thriller. The premise behind this novel had such a strong possibility for me - a teenage girl who lost her dad at twelve years of age as she was attacked by aliens. Now, in 2012, she's now thirteen and has to live with an extremely overbearing mother whose sole interest is punishing her.

This book has very little usable information on starting a blog, and less guidance about how to create one in it's own right. The authors seem more infatuated with Tumblr as an example blog page than they do using WordPress for a new blog. Since I've been doing blogging myself since 2002, I really doubt that this post was written much over six years ago.

I use this in my business and at home. Love it for all over home use. Easy set up right out of box on both PCs. Batteries last quite long. Keyboard light indicator looks great at night. USB port works well with wired keyboard. Logitech's products seem to be made well. No regrets here. Well worth $100.

After reading the reviews this looked like a cute little book for my 3 month old. However I find that many songs are annoying and sometimes it starts very boring before moving to actual song. Not impressed with all of them at all. It may be good in terms of educational but I think there have been better books out there. I thought he would love it. I'm still looking. :)

My mom bought this printer for me when my old HP 932xl finally decided to burn out. I thought it was a great printer at the time, but after using my new Canon MP490 I've come to realize how horribly outdated its print heads are and why HP no longer makes inkjet printers. To say that these prints look "off" is probably an understatement. It takes several hours just to produce one print, in fact, before printing out anything. This thing also goes through tons of ink.

Do not buy this product. It literally falls apart like a piece of junk. I bought it in December 2009 and it's only been used maybe 5 times. Just yesterday the sound no longer worked when trying to turn on or change channels. This is horrible for anything besides show sound. Also some people who posted reviews said you couldn't use an ipod. You can't. Apple did screw up making that feature completely useless by adding this adapter instead of supporting it. When buying it, look at the price tag.

The book seems to be well put together and is great for quick reference. However, I need a book like this in order to plan my journey from the point of view of someone who travels constantly as an engineer or technical consultant. There are several things missing that would have improved this book, including:- More detailed information on the history of aviation (pre & post war)- Less focus on aircraft manufacturers- Inclusion of some maps detailing routes across country with specific stops along those routes.
I don't know why but it doesn't seem to really work for me. A little pricey. Maybe someone else would benefit.

The screen protector works, however there is a small bump between the speaker and home keys. That means the buttons push against something. Once I'm used to it, no problems. Overall, it was good product for its price. I'd recommend it. It comes with 3 protectors. One of them has started peeling on one side. Only time will tell if that happens or not. That's not why I marked off 1 star. So, all in all, this was definitely worth it! You do get what you pay for.
Purchased one as well as several friends at x-mas. We all enjoyed our movie nights in style with popcorn which we now make ourselves...thank you.
Works fine in the car, I use it every week.

I was disappointed in the book. Although I gave it a rating of 2 stars, there is little substance about what makes the Amish so different. Most books on this subject include their daily way of life or how they live. However, while Mr. DeMoss does cover these topics, and that he clearly wants to make an impact with them, reading the book becomes more annoying as time passes because you keep thinking his comments are just not true. Also, the information seems incomplete.

This book tells of a boy who loses everything from his beloved mother to the things he loved in life. His father is killed by a drunk driver. He must keep up his family and himself together until money can be obtained for the funeral. The author has an interesting way with words that I will most likely reread. It was also very sad at times, but showed how important it is when you love someone. Good job! And yes, I'd read another one if there were one.
This product work great for my laptop.

As I said in my review, this is not an album that deserves 4 stars. It needs work. Maybe it's time to rethink your sales strategy, and make the kind of music you put out, more like what people want you to make. With the right direction from you, these guys could have a fantastic career. Hopefully it won't be too long. I still admire their talent, but please don't take yourself out on us with "filler." This CD would get 0 stars if I'd been able to.
The premise of this little story was quite clever - a small town girl with an imagination and talent meets up with the charming prince. But the execution left much to be desired.

Got this book to teach my daughter how to write her own story. However, I found it so boring that she was not interested in writing with crayons. She preferred me to take pictures of what we wrote. So there was no point for any art work. The book has a lot of interesting information, but only if you are reading about the history behind these creatures. Not much else at all here. My husband is even bored by it. He loves science and really thinks everything should be explained well.

Bought new in a sealed box from Best Buy. Works well, the suction doesn't hurt my carpets and it cleans up real well too. I wouldn't have spent this much money for something that works better than others I've seen. But it's very cheaply made for a $350 vacuum. The hose is coming off. The plastic handle popped out when adjusting it, and there's dust all over it. Just bought another brand (which I'm happy with). This one's back at Walmart... :( Oh well.   Rating: 2.
This is really nice product for our little pool. The price was reasonable also. It has been used for over a year, we are still happy with product.

Really pretty. Does not fit perfectly over top fingers and does slip around quite easily. Do they add extra holes to create this? I'd like that. Otherwise, love them. And also love how quickly shipping. Ordered Monday, got here Wednesday. Good quality for price. Would buy from seller again, just maybe in different styles.
It doesn't come close to holding charge longer than 15 minutes. After all that time on battery, it's still not charged. So disappointing. No quality control. Would expect better.
They sent me a regular one instead of the correct one. So I did not get to use it. The picture here is very misleading.

Don't waste your time or money! The characters are shallow, the plot is predictable, and there really isn't anything redeemable about this book. A good book doesn't have to be filled with cuss words (lots of them in this book). This one is definitely not worth reading. I hope readers don't fall for this. It was just awful. I'm very disappointed. It's a shame too, because it has an intriguing subject matter. Just wish they would've stayed on topic.
This story gave me some information about John Paul Stevens that I didn't previously know. The first chapter or two may seem slow, but stick with it. What follows will surprise you.
Really not worth even reading. Glad it was a free purchase. The writer should have saved his time if he had done any research on this subject. Very poorly written. And a very unconvincing story.

The CD was purchased with some excitement because of my great admiration and respect for the composer Richard Strauss. This piece will only be added to his huge catalog as a musical disaster. It is utterly devoid of drama or passion. No passion at all. I would say more about this but Amazon just won't allow me to. One can only presume that Strauss's music did not inspire these performers who should be ashamed of themselves. This really shows poor judgment on behalf of Amazon.
The songs on these cd's are wonderful.
Although it is not the quality that our original one was, this new item works perfectly and was very reasonably priced. Quick service and a great value! Thank you!

My daughter used this book for a class and so we have it at home. I was amazed he really wanted it. I know my son read other books now but not in english. The colors are pretty but hard to read. Maybe if it were bigger type would be better. Overall good price. No scratches on the inside of book. Good seller too. Shipped quickly. Thanks

I have loved this book since it first came out, but the new translation and style don't reflect what is actually written in The Lord of the Rings. It reads more like fantasy than story with some odd word choices thrown in. At first, even though reading them one after another was difficult, they were a fun escape read, which the author did well by giving each character their own voice in his writing.

The whole movie has been one big joke from the beginning. Why do I give it 5 stars? Because its one of those movies that is not as stupid as some other so-called comedies. Its got laughs and a plot. If you want to see something fun with funny situations, then go for it. Otherwise, just sit back and turn off your brain. It's so well written that it's hard get it out of your mind. Great lines like "He really had me fooled" in this movie. You cannot miss it.

The product did not work in our Panasonic TV or computer at all. So much for the "smart" features. I returned it and bought a Sony instead. It works! My wife wanted a smaller TV, but the screen on that one was too big from edge to edge. We have an old 42" Sharp Aquos which works great, with minimal glare. The sound isn't great, but you can add external speakers if needed. The Samsung is fine as long as your monitor supports HDMI.
What a rip off, don't waste the money! This one is cheaply made and hardly works. Not worth it! There are so many better ones than this!
the unit that I purchased only last 1 month and 2 days...never will be able to order another one from this dealer..very disappointed..

This book should be called "The New York Times and the rest of Hollywood vs. Silicon Valley." The stories covered are either too complex or just don't apply to business or technology. I would much prefer more analysis from a former newspaper reporter than an author who isn't particularly good at presenting stories. The only real value is in having some hard numbers on the power of big companies without paying attention to what kinds of people run them.

The product was defective right out of the box. It wouldn't take a charge. I plugged it into my computer to try charging but got "Not charging" flashing on it. I ordered another battery from this company and that one arrived quickly after ordering which has been fine. I've had no problems with any other Anker products so I'm hoping the replacement they send works for me. For now just getting by until Amazon finds me a new replacement is fine though.

i used half of the amount called for. after 6 days, my eyes itch alot and burning. not sure what product to use. if you have oily eye then this is for you. I also use contact solution which help a lot. maybe it needs more oil in ingredients. i will add oil.

I agree with other reviewers who state that this book could have been so much better. The plot was rather thin and, though the characters were well drawn, it wasn't very entertaining. But what did save this books for me from a 1 star review is McNaughton's writing style. She has such an interesting and creative world building style where she's able to show you quite clearly what's going on without ever speaking to you, which makes her a truly unique voice in fantasy writing.

The book looked like the one in my old library. I just was very excited to read it. When did they take it out from libraries. It's a sad state of affairs when we cannot find older books anymore. Why don't people start reading them anymore--then maybe they'd care. This is not a novel. It has no plot, no interesting characters. Just lots and lots of sex - nothing more. If you're bored with your life you may enjoy this book, but that's about all it's good for.

My son wanted this hat for his birthday. We ordered it 2 days early and when we opened up one package - there was only 1 hat. So they sent us another one. We got that in less than 48 hours. On top of that, it doesn't fit right. It's really small. He can't see out of it....looks pretty bad. Don't waste your money.

While it looks like a great concept, and the price is right, it's simply not worth it. The ink bleeds through to the other side of your print -- thus making every single letter look like crap. I put them in for printing job #5, which had several hundred pages, and by page 6 90% were smudged or faded.

I really like the writing style of this author, but what about proofreading?? Spelling mistakes, missing words, extra words from sentences where you didn't even think it should be there, etc. It was very distracting... The characters weren't too bad, not great, and nothing great. A pretty thin plot, a little on the unbelievable side. Not that it's written in any way poorly, just had my attention drawn somewhere else. And now to see if there are more from her...
Not only the battery that comes with it sucks.. It didn't last very long. I charged for like 8 hours and still took about 2 hrs. to get my laptop fully charged. Don't waste your money.. Save it! :(

I really like the story but was a bit disappointed in how it was translated to kindle. Not sure if they converted it from print to ebook or what. There were many words that did not come as obvious and had me going back over my read twice.
It is rare when I've been totally disappointed in any book from Dean Koonz.

I bought this item for my husband. He had another on a larger scale. It broke and he could not find another. So when we were at our local mall his was stolen so this is just what he needed. Great service and great product. We are very happy with it :) Thank you! Happy husband! :-)
At first glance, this seems like just another fluffy romance, with all cliché plotlines that remind you of every other 'chick' book, right down to the fact that she's an only child.

The movie is great! I enjoyed every bit, from the plot, to the settings, to the music and choreography. However, when you watch this movie, know that all of these elements are in fact only part of what make it!What makes it not as great as others have made it? My main problem with it, for me was its lack of plot. In fact, if a plot had been included, even subtly, then everything else would be perfect.

We were so disappointed by these cups. They are not microwaveable and they smell musty after you wash them. I even tried putting them under running water to get rid of the smell. There is still a strong smell, but we don't drink out of them. We have washed ours several times, dried them, boiled them. Nothing works. These cups will go in the trash since it's more trouble than it's worth. I had also decided on ordering two sets of tumblers as well, hoping for some good news with those.

Just to give you an idea, I am in my early 20s and have had no previous experience with this kind of thing. I've watched plenty on the subject but never read anything from either side before. I'm not sure how anyone like some reviewers here can claim that what she writes is "well-researched. '" This book was simply written by someone who does know the history of women's rights issues, just a lot more watered down than one would expect.

I ordered this product in November and I'm still waiting for it to arrive. You can only track the package through USPS which will take you about 3 weeks, but not 1 month. It's very frustrating. Do NOT order, just get it from a store close by. The actual product is of high quality though. Hope this helps! :(

Fits and works great. Keeps it protected from scratches. Wish there were additional colors though (mint green, navy blue, teal) to enhance readability outside. When you have light on in room, sometimes words are hard to read. Would definitely recommend for any Kindle owner.
The product was sent fast. Although I have not tried this yet i am confident it will work well with my camcorder. The price and quality are both very good. Thanks for the service!

Not easy to use and I found the results not very accurate! You need a good eye for such details when you are taking your blood pressure. Also in order to get accurate readings one needs to watch one's pulse. If you take this type of device with an expensive equipment than it is wise that you go there first if you're new at using it. A great gadget!This unit was probably a bit older or something, which is why it had problems.
it was the wrong size. I didn't try to return them because they weren't worth my time and energy. Don't care for them. Maybe someone else will have better luck with them, but not me.. oh well. :-(
This book was not well written. It left me wanting more. I did enjoy the ending though. That's about all there is good to say about this book.

I expected this to be more interesting rather than a review of basic ideas. The writing was not all that good, in addition, the ideas are just common sense. In short, I guess if this is what you want it does provide some good information on how to use different social media tools, however, there must be better books out there. I also thought the price was way too high. It only cost me two dollars, but with free shipping (Prime), it's worth at least five dollars!   Rating: 2.

It looks and acts like the original, but after about two weeks, it started to malfunction by dropping my connection. I would not recommend buying this cable. Buy something from a reputable brand instead. This is just what you pay for with cheap quality. Spend your money elsewhere.
This is just not music to spend time with. The beat does little to set the mood.
Awesome quality, especially for the price! This is our second one that we bought in a year! I highly recommend!

I needed an inexpensive tripod to shoot at events and this one did the job. The only complaint that I've had is not with the tripod, but more so due to my own expectations for a low-price item. It does tend to shake pretty easily. Even after tightening it, it moves very easily when the wind blows against it. Overall, I'm satisfied enough with it. For less than $30, you can't really expect much.

This is almost the only movie I've seen with a black cast...but it had an excellent story line. I thought all the actors were great....especially the kids! They certainly stole some scenes from those little kids they dressed up. What else can you say???? It was good, very well done. Very well done!
The picture looks exactly as described, however once i opened it there were many pieces missing (like 20 total) so that in total no instructions or anything came with it.

I love this author. This book was a very slow read. Too many characters to remember who is married who. Lots of boring history about all the other characters. Not enough plot for my liking. It needs more action! Maybe the author will write another. But don't waste your time. If you are looking for action pick something else!

I have owned a Krups espresso machine in the past that worked great, but this one, although it looks great and works wonderfully, makes terrible coffee. It doesn't get hot enough to burn my hand after brewing 4 cups of coffee or if you let it sit on top for 3 hours. And we are only drinking two cups.
As soon as my first pair broke off due to being pulled out after one run, I saw all these bad reviews. For 10 bucks at Target, those were awesome.

Bought two sets of these tea sets for my granddaughter who is in love w/Tinker Bell. They're beautiful, bright colors & sturdy, well-made products. Very pleased especially since it's a hard item to find on sale like this.

This is a great product! The product has all the ingredients described in the ingredients. I love it, and would recommend it to any one who wants to maintain healthy. It's also very easy on your budget. Thanks for allowing this to be sold. Thanks!
It broke before i even got it! :( i am VERY unhappy with this product.dont do it. Dont buy it. & lt;3 NOT A GOOD PRODUCT AT ALL!!!
These are my absolute favorite little candies. Hard to find. Love these and will keep coming back for this delicious treat. Thankyou so much Amazon. Love it.

I was very disappointed with these speakers. They were cheap and the sound quality is quite terrible. However, if you are a child or small person who enjoys throwing things out, then they might be ok. But for real stereo speakers don't buy these. We bought them so that my daughter could have some music by her when she plays outside in our backyard, but because of how cheaply made these look it will just get tossed out. For $20.
I've bought these from a local store that has worked well for years. Purchased 8 last time. All of them seem defective.
This is not so easy to assemble. It doesnt look as nice on your wall.
We had trouble with the product. When we put batteries in, they did not power up at first or turn on. Once turned on, all that came out was static.
This is one of the better coffeemakers, especially for an inexpensive model. It heats up fairly quickly, and it's easy to clean. Overall, I've really enjoyed this coffee maker.

I tried to read this book. After about 3 chapters the story did not engage me. Too many characters, too much description. I found myself skimming and then stopped. There were times that there was no mention of one character or another, it went very quickly into yet another story. Not a good read.
A quality product at an affordable price! This works just fine without any problems. The only thing necessary with Kindle Fire HD 8.

I am a big fan of the series but really lost interest or respect for his writing style in this one. There were just too many characters being introduced by far to keep up with and they often made no difference to any particular storyline.
I just love the songs in this soundtrack. Anyone whose ever been lonely will recognize all they feel.

The material feels soft, but it wasn't that great. I guess you get what you pay for. This is probably better fitted for teen girls. Not good quality or durable. Just an average towel. Would not buy again.
the unit was dead & not worth attempting to replace with it. I have had 2 replacements and these were just as bad.

I tried this on a Dell Inspiron. It seems to be fine, but the power cord is too short. Not enough length for my desk. The original has been long enough that it fits with room left over. There isn't much else about this new charger to complain about. Good price. A good alternative when you're not ready to shell out almost $30 for an officially licensed replacement.

These look very slick with red accents, so if that's what you care about go for it. But they're absolutely useless - terrible sound quality and an extremely poor design. There's one major problem though: the wiring has been rendered useless.

This is the lowest price I have found on a genuine Canon ink cartridge. However, it would be much cheaper to buy an off-brand that does not leak and has only a moderate capacity (I use it for documents only). My printer works great with this cartridge but will NOT work at all when there are other cartridges in it. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

I received this book to read while commuting on my Bike. To start the story is written in first person from one of two main characters who both live or work in Ireland. The other character is an American (yes, I'm American!) and she works as a freelance journalist, doing "interviews" ( her words) for foreign countries. However, it appears that there are three main countries they must report on.

I gave this a star in order to post this, however it has nothing to do with the quality, but the fact that they sent me 2 different sets. Not very happy about that. Also, if you are using them for your dog and want something sturdier, these wont last long, because even though my dogs aren't overly rough on them, they will not stay on. I've only had one fall off since they've been on, that's the only reason I was able to give 1 star.

Please check on this before spending money when you can find this information elsewhere and save yourself from wasting your money. I'm having to write my professor now because she used this text for one of her online classes.
It works fine. Just make sure you have enough inputs before ordering. That way, your receiver will be set up for 5.1 so you don't need this.

When I recieved the package, it was like they put in a used dirty package that someone tried to clean. There were scratches on two of the corners, and it's impossible for me or my fiancee to take them out without scratching them. We can't even see very well because there are so many little dots. It's kind of disappointing. Also one of the shelves came damaged, not broken.

The first copy of this book I received from the seller was so stained my boyfriend nearly had to rip it apart when he got it. It also took over a month just for him to get it. When we opened it, most pages with writing were rubbed off. We have yet to be able to use it due to it's condition. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! Wish shipping wasn't taking forever! This is ridiculous.

I'm a professional audio editor, and I've owned the HM-50 for about 5 months now. At first I was very impressed with these headphones. The sound clarity and noise canceling ability made my music much more enjoyable. While listening to an NPR news show, with their powerful broadcast of traffic around Boston in 2009, it became clear that this was my favorite headphones on the market. For those unfamiliar with FM, Boston's Traffic Radio is free over our wireless system because they can go all day long without interruption.

These are very handy in the fridge. The only downside is that they need to be washed by hand.... They tend rust if you have hard water as mine does. I love how easy these clean though. Just spray with dishwasher detergent then rinse. Very worth the money. :)

These are cheap and don't work well at all. I gave them a shot, and as some of the other reviews stated, they do work, however there is no noticeable difference when you turn or activate them. The button must be depressed in order for it to work. Also after about 30 seconds into using them, my hearing was still muffled.
This phone system has met my expectations fully. I would recommend this product because of its ease of use and low cost.

First off, let me start by saying that I am an extremely huge and devoted fan of Steven King - particularly his horror masterpieces, Pet Semetary, Christine, Dark Tower, The Stand, IT, etc. Having said that, if you have read these classics (and they are classic, folks), don't bother with this DVD. It is, in my opinion, a cheap attempt at capitalizing on Stephen's popularity. Don't buy it unless you're prepared to be disappointed, then go right ahead & watch it.

I just read this for the first time and while it was enjoyable, there were quite a few glaring issues/problems. One, we find out that in every generation people have had their hands up since childhood. This would be totally unacceptable to anyone today who is an adult. Secondly, I'm not entirely sure if we're told what era but they seem more like Victorian times. When reading other reviews about the language, etc., I can't help but thinking how much we might improve with modern techniques.

The product did not work as advertised and did what it said nothing else. I have tried several times to try again but so far no results. It does take about 3 days after pill to work. Then they don'thing! They don't show on the blood test. For a diet that takes more than 2 weeks toactually work, there is only one solution!!!! Don't buy. This item was shipped fast, however. Just never worked. And in case you want to, all products are under review.

It was difficult to read what he meant, and I found it to be just a bunch of random ideas with no practical application. Not at all like anything I've learned. Do your own research. Don't follow his examples. Save your money. I'm so glad Amazon is great about returns.

This book is about a little girl named Anna who can hear spirits. Her sister Violet has died of the measles and her father left home to come live with them. To keep up his reputation as a doctor, he must stop patients from going into convulsions and dying before Anna's father. Then they start seeing apparitions for no reason. I think Anna is a great character because she goes through things that you wouldn't normally expect someone should go through. She gets herself in some interesting situations and learns so many lessons.

Well, not a good movie. The plot just kinda jumps out. I love some Sci-fi movies but this one just makes me wanna barf. It's like watching the movie in fast forward. Not worth renting sorry. You will see what I'm talking about. And then there is that. No ending. Which sucks. A definite pass. Buy the book instead! MUCH more enjoyable.
I have been looking for cat doors like these for some time.
My son loved this - great for a birthday gift or just to have around the house and it arrived in no time at all!

I received a used one, not new as they advertised. The box was damaged and scratched. It did have some marks and scratches in it. I called the customer service department but nobody answer me. It has been for over three weeks. This is really bad service. They should check what happened before sending it to customer. Not satisfy at all after 2 weeks using it. After 3 weeks, one side of remote switch stops working. We are still waiting if we can get another one.

This is a great product. It arrived on time and was packaged well. The product itself isn't as good of quality though, but for what I paid I can't complain. Great price so worth the money to me. Not bad at all in my opinion. And it looks just like the picture.

I have purchased many headphones and ear buds from other manufacturers in the past. The only ones that worked were Monster cable brand. After my purchase of a pair of Turbine Ear Muffs for $300, there is no way I would pay anything close to $400 these things are terrible. They did not fit well on my head, they just hung off because even when you adjust them it still looked like your ears had an overfull muffer. It sounded terrible as well.
Like many others, my IPHONE 4 fell from waist height within five minutes of installation.

When using the bluetooth feature, you cannot make and receive calls while wearing this. Also, to use it, you must remove your case from around your phone. This is inconvenient since my belt clip has broken as well due to cheap metal design.
These are cute in my daughter's room, it gives a cozy look to her room. I would definitely buy these again.
I am unable to review a "collection" of works because there are many, many volumes. There is no collection here except the works by Lovecraft which exist outside his own work.

We bought 2 of these bulbs last night. Both were defective. One arrived already damaged to the point of not getting a replacement from Amazon- the glass base is cracked and broken into pieces. The other bulb came broken, it broke at another part as well. This one will eventually work properly, but I was disappointed that they both arrive damaged. Amazon has awesome customer service, sent out replacements pretty quickly, so this gets 3 stars for Amazon.

I bought this as a gift for my wife. She likes it, but the finish is not great. It looks like it's been used and returned. This was very disappointing, plus it arrived without any box & instructions. Amazon customer service didn't know much about it. They told me to call Amazon, so we did. We were directed to contact seller. Seller responded that they don't have any. So then again we are being told now by both parties to call.

This is one of the best little products for your car that I have ever encountered. It works exactly as advertised and I've had no issues with it. The suction mount holds my Motorola Droid Razr Maxx securely regardless of bumps. There are only two downsides to this mount, but they can be easily remedied.

Not a good read. I can only read about 10% of one book and sometimes it is hard to go back in time. If you are going into this series for the first time then try not to. The characters aren't deep nor likable. There just isn't enough. You are suppose to be getting hooked on the characters. But they have no real development until after half way through. As far as I'm concerned I'll skip straight through to Book 2. A little disappointed but will keep trying.

The product description does not make this clear. It is written on the page above with a huge photo of a baby in swim gear, and then after you click purchase, it says "See additional photos to decide" When I received it, there were no photos and a review was missing so obviously someone thought twice before they bought it. As for those who commented that it's cheap and plastic - well, it isn't. It's made from glass. If you're looking for something pretty but not too fragile or heavy, buy this.

This isn't really necessary so take my word for it. This is a great tasting tea. Good value and quality. I'm not sure why it costs so much here, but the tea itself deserves it. I love tea!

I am trying a new brand. The quality of this item is not good. For the price it should have been made better. They just fall apart. This type strap holder may work for most people. I bought these because of the great price, but what came was a lot smaller than other items that looked similar. For $5, it wasn't worth going through all this to return them.
