This is a useless book. There is nothing on the art or history of the subject. I bought it as an undergraduate and found little use in it.
When we got it there was two small scratches already but not big deal. A must have if your going anywhere. Takes excellent pictures.

I thought this book was a joke, it is not funny. I'm sorry to tell you but there isn't anything funny about that. She needs some new material.... This lady can write better than this. It's no wonder people have never heard of her. Her books are the reason all these writers don't get noticed. At least Diane Feinstein would be out her door if she wrote something this bad.

This product is fantastic. I bought it for home use as opposed to my work laptop. My lap got a bit warm, not burn but, on the verge of getting hot. With this cooler, while using my laptop at 100% power usage, It dropped down to around 45%!!! Its so cold out that im in heaven. My friends have even commented about how amazing its looks. And I've actually had some jealous comments from friends, and they can't believe you can get such cooling capability for less than $30.

To be fair, there is a lot of information on the actual material contained within, as well as useful examples and examples. BUT, I was expecting this book to provide you with an easy way through all those seemingly endless ways to do something you want (or should want), so that when they show it at school, it's immediately clear why this technique works. Sadly, that's just not the case here.

Very interesting show that was never on any list of best shows. Great characters with good plots all centered around an alien who can actually speak human languages and communicate with people. The episodes are short so it's great for those marathons. Worth buying to watch before you go see Terminator Salvation.

I'm a huge fan of Robert Altman and Henry Hathaway so I was looking forward to finally seeing this movie. They really let me down on that part. The movie seems like it lacks a lot in terms of humor and heart but is entertaining none the less. It just didn't touch my heart even though there were some funny scenes at times. Don't get me wrong, its not horrible.

This book is not about the lives of everyday ordinary Americans but the private lives of a few men and women living in the 1940's era - one man named Henry Miller who gets involved with an attractive secretary at work called Marion Davies. Miller's sexual encounters are described as being mostly about sex but also involving her mother, his brother, and other women. The author makes the point that these affairs make up much of Marion's life and to a certain extent Henry's too.
I ordered two, 1 didn't last long, The other would work from time to time when the switch is turned on.

I bought these to supplement my old work shoes when running errands with them because they're very comfortable, yet supportive at the same time. The last two are also a size smaller than what is on their tags - so I'm going to have to've go find one of those, and try again. Very disappointing. My previous pair were similar that were made by a different company, the only difference being that those had some traction as well. I'll just wear tennis or other non-slip sandals now...
I really enjoyed this book but the ending was too predictable. It's a good read and I would recommend it to anyone who liked the other books in this series. You won't be disappointed. :)

There are many good books on this subject - this is not one of them. A very confusing and poorly organized "history book." It goes all over the place with just too much irrelevant information. I don't understand why a book claiming to be about a topic have so little reference materials in its index. Don't waste your money - skip it. This review process gives you no option but to write at least twenty words. Here they are:Disappointed. Will never buy from Amazon again.
While the game has been a hit with my children (4 and 6), we got it on sale at WalMart for $20 - I feel cheated.
I like the movie and it is good to watch over the weekend. I recommend for a Sunday night movie.

It was the same as my review of your other products - nothing different here. What you do is take your great product and try to screw it up into something it's not supposed to be. And that's exactly what they have done. I've now bought a few things from you and I only wish I'd spent time researching this before making an expensive purchase and still regret it. This will be next. Sorry.
Beautiful choice of traditional carols. Very beautiful music, even during hard times. Hope you enjoy playing and listen often. Thanks, Kathy J   Rating: 5.

The concept is not what I expected. Instead of a book that teaches the language you get "notes" how it should be learnt. So if your looking for something that's going to help teach this particular language. Or maybe it's just a good book but like reading notes. Either way don't waste your money. There are MUCH better books out there. As one reviewer pointed out..there IS also Pimsleur which I learned from.

I really wanted my son to love this. He is a huge Thomas fan. After purchasing the battery pack only to find out it doesn't provide enough power so that there will be an annoying hiss whenever he plays with it, we discovered other problems. One, his wooden tracks won't fit onto this and two, even after putting pieces on from various sets, all of them don't fit securely or stay together. You can get two trains running in opposite directions but that's not very fun.

We bought this to replace a battery powered blower and weed eater. What did we find? An inferior piece of equipment. It does not run continuously as the ad says. The speed controls are so poorly designed that you will likely need two people at times just to keep it running. After only about 50 continuous minutes, all batteries were toast. On average for five minutes or so, I can get 3 hours use out of 2 batteries. A real pain in the butt when you're working far from an electrical outlet.

The product showed up in a damaged box with the cord missing from one side. I was able to use it for 2 days before returning it since everything that seemed loose or defective when i got it. It only worked ok on my xbox, but could not even connect properly with ps3/wii. Even had difficulty connecting them through a single wire as mentioned by other people. My advice, spend your $60 at best buy and get something of better quality. I've contacted amazons seller, no answer.

Don't waste your time or money on this movie. If you're reading this, you know how it ends, so no need for me to try and convince you. But I don't think I've ever seen a movie worse than this. From the first shot, it's clear there was no budget, just amateurish special effects, poorly executed acting, bad script and poor directing. Not even remotely believable, in any way shape or form (and that usually doesn't happen).
It looks great with the rest of my kitchen appliances. It's functional and attractive at a good price. Buy it - buy it. You won't regret it! A very nice product.
Just like having the original to enjoy over and over. I watch it every Christmas season. My mom loves them too!

The first few pages of your book, I just couldn't stop laughing. After reading the whole thing, it felt like someone else had written it. My favorite part was when you mentioned that a certain character is named Joanne. Good God, why didn't we get to see that? It seemed so out there and almost laughable. Don't waste my time, but if you're really interested in this memoir, read a copy at the library.

I tried to install the battery correctly and it just wasn't that intuitive. On top of it, there is no light indicator, so you don't know if it's charging. If there's a charging symbol, then the battery shouldn't be dead. The only indicator here are LEDS at night time which change colors. It appears that, in this application, they put much less effort into creating an easier user experience for consumer.
These lights are not that good. The price seems to come down quite a bit and now I don't trust them. If the light is actually working as intended, you will be better off buying something else.

I am not a religious person so this is my review. It sounded okay, read the back about it being based on facts from true history and what not. But after reading several chapters,I wanted to scream. The first few chapters were quite interesting with new information regarding these particular women who did such horrible things but then they seem like just another fairytale story. This book might appeal to someone that was in 8th grade or something but, for me, the story is very weak.   Rating: 2.
This product had me up an running as it was extremely easy to install and started right away.....Highly Recommended..... A+ rating in my book.
This does nothing to make an old Panasonic DVD-VCR obsolete - this seems more like a "scam". Don't buy it, spend some money and get something that works.

The music is wonderful. Really brings back warm memories for anyone who lived through that period. Even though it's from 1973, there really wasn't any profanity or other material like you see on some DVD's.

The cord is a complete waste of money. There were many negative reviews on here about it and I was not impressed. My suggestion to you is, "Don't buy it!" It is cheap but that will tell you something right off the bat. At least Amazon allows returns.

This does work but I couldn't get my dog to use it. I tried training him and now he just sits with it on his head staring at me while he's in his food bowl. It's a cute toy for the price.....nothing fancy. But that's about all it's good for. So be careful what you buy especially as pets can chew through anything. My dogs have chewed this thing up pretty well already! All that said I'm thinking of trying again since we're so happy with some other Kong toys.

I have to admit that the first 2 books were not all that terrible. The fourth had me hooked. But here comes an ending where a series is given up. You can only do so much, it seems. This was a huge slap in my face and left me feeling really cheated. It was just too bad. And even though i like this genre, this was poorly done. As much as you read the series, its one of those "you gotta finish it" kind of books.

I like a little romance in my books. Not as much sex. This book is not it. It was to graphic for me. Also at that point it felt more of an old fashioned romantic love story. When two people fell totally in each other. He even helped her run into the bathroom because she came out when he got her?! Seriously!? That guy really needed some therapy. No no no! Just no. You don't just give your heart away.

The book is written as a series of vignettes. I was looking to read about the life and development of an individual who overcame adversity as it relates to her family. This seemed like an interview from one person with just that personal experience to base the rest off of. Not enough meat to really make me interested in finding out what happenend or why. If not for lack of time I'd have given up very early on when this first story ended.

While the material was comfortable, these sheets are too big for our 13" waterbed, so we really could not utilize them. I would recommend this product only if you have a huge mattress in a king bed. The elastic is great and they seem well made. They came from China so it took about three weeks to arrive, but worth it. I believe that most people looking at this product, even though they claim on their site, that there are other versions of them, will be disappointed.

I bought this book because of price and the excellent reviews on it...and even paid for next day shipping.....but what a letdown....there is nothing in the book, you could find online with much more detail to help guide in actually using an iPod touch to the fullest... I'm sure if you're already looking at this, it will be just fine......just don't think it's going to help me out of my comfort zone when coming up new stuff or getting things done.
I enjoy reading this book. It gives a lot of practical information. I would recommend to friends and family.

The first thing I noticed about this album when it came out, was how much the lyrics were based in sexual imagery and fantasy. This is nothing new. What a few reviewers here claim to find exciting or intriguing about songs like "Sweet Child O' Mine" by Guns n' Roses and "Dirty Sticky Floors" by Led Zeppelin did exactly that. Then again, not everybody liked those tunes. You just can't make everyone happy.
This is a Great CD for any age. The songs are all original and fun. Kids will like singing these songs! A must buy for music lovers of all ages.

Not what i thought it would be, the plot was so slow going, I found myself speed reading to finish it. The main character is suppose to be this big strong man but he came off as weak and unable to take care of himself. That alone made me hate him throughout the book. All in all, not a good read. Just boring. Waste of time.

Like the reviewer before me, I received this charger on 3/18/2013. It is not quite as "solid" in appearance as my original Samsung charger. The cord that attaches to the plug at top of charger, which connects into phone seems a little more flimsy and less secure. Since I had been searching for an additional charger because one of mine broke while driving when the cord flew off the plug; so, I'll keep it but I'm afraid it might only work 2 years. Would still like it, though.

It is a book about the battle of the Alamo and how difficult it was for Texas to defeat 250 men in 12 days. Very interesting as far as I am concerned, particularly what he wrote of Andrew Jackson's march on San Antonio with his little army. But there are better books out there. It seems that when writing history, Mr. O'Reilly goes by what's been written before - whether it's historically accurate or not.
The story was very predictable but I still enjoyed it. A good light read if you don't have to think too much.

The quality of these goggles are very poor. Poor fit, poor eye seals, no real protection. They leak from around your eyes on every run. Do yourself a favor save up for good goggles, or at least invest in some decent masks before throwing money away.

I don't know what happened to this author, but it appears she is no longer putting out good clean mysteries. The characters are caricatures and the dialogue insipid. Her previous efforts were much more enjoyable. Not recommended. She seems to have put some of her old fans off. I'm one also.

The author is very knowledgeable, but she tries to pass herself off as a great storyteller. Not true. What I read was her attempts at being funny. I'm sure I'll give more books by this person the oppurtunity since, like me, they were free. However, anyone who sells their work for any price obviously doesn't believe that we are going to. So save your $3.00 and visit another website.

It was just as cute in person and I thought it sounded cool having a frog theme on my car... BUT...two times the front left side plastic cover has snapped off leaving that little clear ring exposed. I've always loved Zoobles products but this one fell short, especially given how much price they are usually asking. I'm now looking for something new.. But if you like it, be careful or you'll get into my cars seat covers too! ;)
First I'd like to say - this item is an absolute must if you are shopping in Amazon.com.

I was so happy to get back my favorite tea. I use it every morning. Then I used 2 bags and the tea came out almost clear. They were old, stale or something. Very disappointing that we can not recommend this particular brand. :( On top of that, it's a hassle if you have kids who drink milk from their cups. The only choice is one brand that's cheaper at the grocery store.

Just got it out of the box and put to use first try. Very happy with results. I had been searching for a good tool for this job but could not find one. This is easy to use, quick and clean. Great product at an unbelievable price. Thanks Porter Cable. As always, great prices Amazon. Always satisfied service from Amazon too. Keep on Truckin. David F / Dallas, TX
If someone wanted me interested, they could write about my life for me, but first let me know why people are interested.....
Just a little bit of honey with my oatmeal every morning, makes things taste like home with out them being too sweet. It's very expensive but at least now when we run out, Walmart has it...

I'm happy I borrowed this from a friend who didn't have to fork out the $35 for it. If it had been an $25, or maybe $25 as some of these other reviewers are, then yeah...it's well worth it, but that's not how you sell things. The entire book is just another sales pitch with no real substance. And if he does say something original about being happy, I'd like my $5 back and stop wasting it on this. A very average self-help book.

I got this for my son who is learning how to ride but I'm not sure it would hold him up safely. You sit on the handle which isn't terribly comfortable as well. The seat looks super flimsy and like he could snap off when we take a good turn either. Also, be aware that it's way too wide so you look very awkward taking turns with it. My other kids all have 2 wheel scooters which they prefer over this one.

Bought this to use primarily for bread making in my kitchen. Worked well until recently when it has begun squeaking quite loudly. The squeaky noises have stopped working and we've tried different lubricants with no success. I wonder if there is a quality control issue as we've heard this complaint before. So disappointed. Hopefully there's some type of warranty. It won't break the bank though. Just an annoyance - but I guess its better than nothing.
This movie is not in english. Not at all. I'm confused and sad about it. I really need a refund. Why doesn't amazon?

I've had this camera for some years now and I couldn't wait to throw out the old one. The problems that come from cheap materials is glaring. It takes lousy pictures outdoors in even good sunlight. But when you try using it inside with flash, or in low light areas without flash.... you'll just want more than one flash unit. Even in bright sunlight...... it's blurry. If your goal was picture quality then forget it.

As I wrote before, if all a person cares for is the sound quality from this product then you can definitely feel satisfied with spending $60 on it. However, it does not matter what type of earphones or headphones one uses, even though these are supposedly'studio'. I'm just glad that Amazon will refund me my money because although these do look cool but do absolutely nothing in comparison to other headsets out there. Stay away from them unless you're only listening for looks alone.

I used to have a black version of this phone which lasted me 5 years. Then it was stolen from my car. I replaced it with a red version. It worked ok for about 2 or 3 years, then the microphone went out. So now what I'm getting is pretty much like talking into your phone... and no, people won't hear you well on it. It's really irritating. Maybe these phones were discontinued by now (?). But definitely not the case here.

This thing worked great the first time out on my deck. After reading other reviews, we were a little afraid that we'd have a problem but no need for worries. It's super sturdy. When it's all folded up, you'll probably never put it back in its bag.

I have a 2 pound teacup cat. The only problem on this product was that my cat refused to wear it. He did not like it's form or its feel. But the biggest issue is my cats weight. My little guy weighs 7 pounds. He's 14 years old. This is an okay product. There are much better products out there. One of them costs $30. You just need to get your cat's size info. and measure. It will help you choose properly.
Our cat goes nuts from watching my dog play tug of war so we bought her a set as a Christmas gift. Her tail was wagging in no time at all when she saw these toys come out of the box.

I returned the TV because it did not have a VGA connection. My son told me to check out my other purchase and the page was down. How disappointing when looking at this on Amazon. Had there been some indication of this. He has his own set now. Thanks for making another customer unhappy!!! I had ordered two TV's from you the same day so hopefully they will be available soon, but he is having a really hard time with this set.
Great way to learn more about what it takes to create an effective email marketing strategy. Easy reading yet contains important information.

The cable from my laptop to the TV works fine. I have also tried with a new computer that has optical output and it worked fine too. This adapter did not work for me, at all. It should clearly be stated in the details when buying an adapter. And there was no indication of this on either page as far as i could see. It is worth paying another $4 or $5 bucks so you can use your regular stereo speakers instead of those awful ones this company makes. 
 Rating: 1.

Perfect for what I needed. It's easy to install. I'm using this in my garage so that I don't have too much of a cable running from the unit back and forth. It has lots of connectors on it which is really nice. Would recommend without hesitation.
the product is just as expected...the color matches perfectly, easy to set up and use.....would not hesitate getting another if needed!!!thanks again!!! :)

The first month we tried to use, it looked promising with no problems. Last week, when I was in the process of using this vacuum for my hardwood floors, I smelled something burning and discovered that a piece had burst off one side and is protruding through my carpet. For me, that's hardly worth spending so much on an unused, non-working vacuum!! At least it's going back, thanks Amazon.com.
This was an enjoyable, quick read. The detective character is entertaining despite being very predictable.
The ad claims that the filters are specifically made to work well on a 1997 Mazda Rx5. Well, they don't. This is an aftermarket product; they are of low quality and fit very loosely onto the carb.

This is an awful game. Not even remotely interesting or fun. Don't waste your money. Buy the app from App Store for free. Then use that to play with a friend. I'm surprised someone didn't kill this piece of garbage. What happened Nintendo? They have been awesome but now they aren't as great like in past titles. Disappointing. So much better than this.
I ordered this to replace the old one which had broken and was easy to install. So far so good it is working well. Hopefully it'll be fine.

Used to carry my cell phone around without needing cords attached to it. Now you don't have to. The product fits right into place so if you want to listen to music, just push on top of holder. No adjustments needed.

Excellent product for the price - perfect addition to my kitchen. I use it every day and have not had any problems out of it. The design is a bit unusual but you won't confuse this with something you'd buy at Macy's, Pottery Barn, or Home goods. For around $50 it's an incredible value on amazon. If you are debating buying this, rest assured that it's going be top drawer. Great quality, very happy customer. Would recommend.

It was a good value but the item had to be replaced as it did not last very long then completely broke down and cannot used any more...... I would recommend buying your own instead of these cheaply made chargers because they don't last. If you choose to buy this charger make sure you check it frequently or it's may die on you. It's just cheap junk....... Go ahead.... order one. I'm looking for something like that now.........

I have loved these headphones for the past few years, and was happy to find them available at such a low price. However, my first pair broke within 2 months. A cable developed a short from one side. Luckily they included a replacement part, but this cost me $18.00.I'm very disappointed in how Sony has treated their customers. Their customer service is terrible. You can go on Sony's web site and look up any problem. If you call support, it tells you, "Sorry, we no longer take phone calls.

It's very cheaply made. It does not have any kind of closure. There is no way to keep the case closed. You also must take your Kindle out for charging. I purchased another case. Although it was less expensive, there are much better cases on Amazon that protects your kindle and you can charge while in case. As usual amazon's customer service stepped up with a refund. They would do business again with this company. Just go into some other company because they make good products & work closely w/ customers.

This is a powerful handheld sprayer for removing stains in stainless. But don't expect to clean any deep dark spots with it. It takes many passes because it's made from plastic, therefore water stays behind which makes spot cleaning. And if you get streaks or other stains, use another spray bottle for that.
These batteries arrived quickly and are good - better than most 3rd party batteries, and they last a long time. So far... no complaints.

I used this product on a couple of different computers and it is not recognized by any computers. I've wasted two hours trying to reinstall software from the manufacturer website; I'm giving up. Even if I was successful, my computer wouldn't be able get internet access as it does with other network adapters. This seems like an excellent product, but, unless you got lucky in receiving one, chances are, there aren't many reviews for it...and, unfortunately, mine will have to go back.
It tastes awful, no flavor. Had it before but couldn't find it.

I recently purchased an eVo mini, and it appeared to connect flawlessly with my existing cable system which provides both cablecard & standard definition broadcasts. Using the DVR provided by TIVO - The TiVo, however, will not receive a signal using their broadcast guide. It appears that Tivo's box is just supposed to provide the live channels offered through their satellite service without any effort from one's part. It's definitely too easy.

I have owned this product for over a year. It is still one of my favorite purchases. The only thing that could make it perfect would be if you can just plug in headphones and don't need to carry the cord with your computer. That being said, it's not really an inconvenience. Definitely something others would buy because they see how amazing it is. Great Product! I'd recommend

I have purchased about 2 dozen of these drives over the past two years. They are fast, they don't make noise, but that's it. I've also had more failures than just plain fails. The drive failed to boot, or a program stopped working. Sometimes it took hours for my computer (brand new in Windows 7 x64) to recognize ANY drive. Most recently after installing Linux on it, it kept telling me there was no disk and it would not boot up. So it was dead out of the box.

This book has very little helpful information. Its a poorly written pamphlet and was not even proofread. Nothing new or useful in this book. Don't waste your time reading it. There must be better books available. You won't gain much by downloading something that is so out of date. Very disappointed. Also found the comments on one review to another reviewer from a different seller disappointing. They all shared an identical comment. Buyer be aware. I learned nothing about any type and model of camera using this publication. 
 Rating: 1.
We purchased this product as part our business needs. It worked well initially, although it took two tries before we got both units working. That didn't last too long either.

Bought it to control my garage door opener. My wife is trying to do some home repair so she will be doing most of the driving around with it. Easy install, but does not read signal outside car. It may have been weather related. I had a hard time finding all the wiring which can easily get confused if you don't know what your doing.

My original order arrived broken in half, the metal hooks were cracked and broken. I sent it back for a replacement, hoping that was just an isolated incident. It came packed well with no signs of being mishandled. The replacement one came out of the box already damaged. Just from normal handling during unpacking I discovered that about half the bars had cracked. It's not hard to see when things are made out of plastic like this unless you first cut them up before putting the glass together.

I ordered this product, it was delivered with 2 plastic lids that were open to the bottle as most bottles of shampoo are shipped with. The package seemed a little damp from contact with water, thus I cannot use it. It is not leaking but if you think about it, when someone fills up a gallon jug and hands them your bottle, they normally turn over the top until its empty.

I am not too fond of the smell. It reminds me of cat urine. And if that doesn't bother you then it does what it's supposed to. But there are a lot cheaper sprays on amazon, so this one is way to expence. Like 4 dollars and some change. That's why only 2 stars. Other than the smell, everything else works great! And with prime i got them at my front door. Very fast shipping. :D Will buy again from them. Just wish they had other kinds.

I've never been a regular reader of science fiction and when this book came up as part of the Vine program I was so excited to jump in. However, after finishing it, which took me two days over my break because it just felt like such an endless slog, is that there's really no point to it. First up, I'm only half-way through at this point, but there are dozens if not hundreds or more stories within the first few hundred pages.
The premise is interesting, but these short stories come across as unedited messes.

I recently had the privilege of seeing John Lennon perform in concert at The O2 Arena and this CD was released before that. The show itself wasn't that good but with Paul McCartney playing so well, it makes up for it a little. It does sound very 'beatles' like which is interesting as their album didn't sound that great from start to finish, not sure if it's just me or not.

Don't waste your time. I read the 2 reviews below and I'm going to get my own review posted in the near future. Just watched this movie today, now on Amazon Prime so there is one less copy that will sit next to a dead VCR with good movies. And if you do get it try not tobuy it. Very poor. Boring! At least he can act. He may be up to his eyeballs inwater, but don't let those eyes fool you.

Got into this as the reviews looked pretty good. Was a huge disappointment. The book and authors seem to be more interested in making money than writing a true mystery. The dialogue is so amateurish it distracts from any interest or anticipation built up. I finished it, though, hoping he would turn it around. I didn't. A few of them got me. Then he seems to want all his characters, especially women, killed, so they will go away for awhile. It doesn't leave enough space for plot movement.

Very disappointed in this product. It was a complete and utter waste of money. I wanted to be able to record shows on my television but with such poor quality it would not pick up any signal.. so all the videos were just worthless for me. The remote came without a battery at all. It should have no stars. This is definitely one product that you get a piece ofJUNK. Don't waiste your money here!!!!!

When I received the package, it was not packaged very well. It looked as though someone had tried to remove and reassemble from somewhere else in some other place. So be careful when you order this product for gift giving or just want one right away. The doll is cute though. My 3 year old loves her. It's small yet cuddly. Great size.

Bought my daughter a new laptop and bought this to go with it. It doesn't even begin to fit on her computer! I had it as tight as i could get but then couldn't close the lid. The design of the case is terrible. There are no straps or anything else holding it onto she computer. Very upset for that alone. Waste of money! I'm going to send right back cause she's not happy w/it either. :(

So there I sit in front of my PC, plugged with this USB powered hub like a silly old man trying to plug a bottle opener. But it just wouldn't fit, and as soon as I unpluged & replugged the USB cable that attached to it, nothing would see what was there. A little disappointing, eh? Well, it doesn't matter if it's only $10, because I didn't even get it working. It's not worth paying shipping charges, so i just threw mine away. Don't bother.

No where in this product description does it say "FOR THE Kindle Fire HD!!!,so now I have a useless piece of metal that will probably cost more to send back than it's worth. If I knew I had a new generation and didn't own the one for my older kindle, I'd get my money back. I'll still use Amazon's great service, but not THIS product. They should advertise these items properly. This was NOT made correctly.
Got them in a timely fashion which was a plus! My son loved it as soon as he saw it. But after only 2 weeks one ear is detached from its base and won't go back on.

I ordered a set of these in the past. The old ones were good. These, not so much. Half would pop off when used. They have changed them and now they don't work. Wish I'd bought locally. Now out $30. Thanks amazon for selling me. I can't find my old ones. These aren't that comfortable either. I'll stick with good ole ear buds from now!
Really good movie, kids really enjoy watching it together as a family.

So that puts me out for a month. What kind of company doesn't cancel orders if there are issues??? I will change this review but until now and unless they do or I get this straightened out, don't know what to do.

I received this book as a gift from my mother to add the music for our choir. It is not very clear and does give you some basic information about music, but has little reference material regarding how these songs work. The cover was also misleading. Although it seems like many of the tunes are similar and have some connection to each other, there aren't enough melodies in an accessible form. Also, much of their notation on which notes work together doesn't always match what they actually do.

I've loved the series up till this point. I found that the first volume was a bit rough, but then they got better. And that's where it ends unfortunately. Volume 2 is really not worth reading. This one takes place in an alternate reality version of The Watchmen where the characters from THE WATCHMEN had to fight against these new versions and prevent them doing bad things to mankind. In order for all this mess to succeed, however, it's going to...

After years of trying to trim my hedges and shrubs around our house, with limited success, I decided that the power head trimmers would have more than enough power. The saw also did a great job. At first, like some other reviewers, it seemed rather hard to get the hang of: pull back on the handles, push forward from below and hold it. After using this product for several months, though, I've mastered it, so it's no problem anymore. You can buy replacement blades too. All in all, worth every penny.

I was excited to get an mp3 player like my friends have... but mine started having problems within a couple of weeks so i returned it and got a refund. You can buy these in stores which i did when it stopped working. the only reason you would want this is for people who are on their phone all day then have access to internet or music at work. Otherwise it's not worth spending money on. :(

This is my 2nd one in 3 years. The first lasted for a little over 2 years then the volume knob failed. I don't put this pressure on it at all but it's just not built right. It's way too soft and does nothing to improve sound quality. Would not recommend. Go with something else. Also if any of you have trouble understanding me or emailing me, I'm here if anyone wants information or help dealing with these things.
I love this product. My hair is not only shiny and healthy but my allergies have cleared up since started using it. A friend recommended it to me. It has worked wonders for me!
Great product! Just what I wanted at the best price! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a new screen protector for their tablet.

Battery did not last. I charged and used the battery twice. After recharging again my machine is dead so now have 4 batteries. Should have purchased more original HP product. Maybe that's why Dell wants these companies shut out. Will no longer purchase anything but Genuine HP products.
If you've grown up with this product, then you'll know why my review of 8 oz. for only $1.29 makes perfect sense. I'll be back to buy more! Great price and great product.

The first one I purchased worked for 5 months before it died. They were nice enough to send me a new one. Unfortunately the replacement only seemed to work intermittently. It would then stop working, or so we'd think. By coincidence we had another storm in NYC which killed my main power supply--now these units don't have AC inputs--even though they appear with an internal fan. So, even though they're pretty expensive, it's cheaper than replacing that whole thing.

Was not at all what I expected, would never buy again from this brand. Product was poor quality. Do yourself a favor do some research and don't be fooled by the great reviews these products have received. Don't fall for it. Go to your local Best Buy or another store like that with better quality items. Then shop Amazon. Your always safe, just pay more money and get it done right the first time. But if you were planning on buying such items in which Amazon is an authorized dealer good luck there.

I love the concept and design of these bowls. When they first arrived my cat was very curious about them, but a month later she has hardly touched them. They are heavy duty, however, that is where their good points end. The bowls don't retain heat nearly as well as ceramic bowls do. On several occasions when we were away from home for longer periods of time our pet would throw food or water down onto her bed because it felt colder than room temperature.

As I'm new to the game, I had a hard time understanding what was being said in most of the game. For instance it says we don't have our own language but there is an entire chapter devoted just on how to pronounce words correctly so everyone can understand them? Really? If that's all this game has, then you get the point. It's not even helpful to let people know it's possible and why its important.
At least two of these came damaged. A little more weight would help - they are not even full.

My boyfriend and I bought this phone because it seemed like a great deal. We wanted the cheapest possible smartphone, but that is exactly what we got. You get what you pay for in all cases. My husband had to call Verizon before getting his iPhone (which was not an option on any Virgin phone website either), and he said when they told him their prices for phones ($20 - $25) there went up by another $20 (I believe).
Very good item, my grandson can't wait until christmas day to get this item out of its box & into play. Shipping was fast and on time.

So I read all 4 books at once this week. Each book was a short novel with one chapter for each couple. The first two were written in the past tense. This third book's only present tense, then switches to other time periods. It wasn't as bad if you just overlook that until about halfway through it. However, when they switched back and forth between past scenes it felt really choppy.
The story was boring & repetitive. There was no real emotion involved. Too many characters. All seemed rather bland. And it ended abruptly.

There is no way to screw this into our ceiling without a separate adapter. Don't waste your money on this. Get something that just plugs and unplugs. This will don'thing but cause problems. DO NOT BUY.

This is a horrible camera. My family and I bought it about 5 years ago. Within the first year, many of our pictures were taken over or out of focus, no matter which setting we used. We had to send in for repairs and they did not fix it. After another year with the same problem, it started malfunctioning. Picture quality was poor regardless what setting, even if you set them on automatic. The picture would be completely blown out.

First of all, if you are like me, that doesn't always pay attention to the ingredients lists on products because I've recently found out how bad most companies do that, and is one reason why I decided not to buy this in particular, but instead, tried a more natural mineral sunscreen product with less toxins in it. It's good, it does indeed feel very moisturizing, however, it did have some weird smell when I first put it on, which made me think maybe it's just me.

After putting it on and seeing what a pain installation was, I thought I'd give the matte version a try. But it looks terrible, even with brightness at all levels (it's way too dark to see anything with this on, and bright is just as awful). Just go for glossy screens, or don't get it.

Was looking for a replacement head and found this cheaper one on amazon. Works great but it should say it is not the original one in that you do need to replace the front bezel part with the new head. This can be done by replacing screws at bottom of screen. Be careful not to drop it. It was $45 shipped from Hong Kong, so make sure you have patience when working install. Looks like OEM. But will definitely buy again if screen ever needs replacing.

I just ordered this product, and although the description said it would be good for a 6 oz. glass of water to take with you on camping trips, I took my own advice based upon other reviews that have mentioned how difficult it was to drink out of. When pouring, your mouth has a tendency to dribble water, which goes onto whatever surface or container you're drinking.
Phone can not support 3g at all.

I'm just an average sized dog lover, and I do love my dogs - particularly as they mature. So when we got a puppy last January, we thought the name was perfect for our little pup. However, she grew up to be quite small (4.5 pounds at 7 months). She's now 13 months old (6 pounds) and, sadly, is quite bony too. But she's not yet arthritis. We bought her this supplement in early July based solely on what seemed like impressive results from other reviews.

This is an excellent product for the price. The item was delivered fast and I couldn't be more pleased with it. My only recommendation would be: make sure you have a heavy duty extension cord. It does use quite a bit, believe me, but it makes such beautiful hair if in my estimation, worth it!
My favorite group of all. If you are true fan then this cd is must own in yourmusic collection.

My son loves puzzles and was excited to receive the puzzle. However, we were very dissapointed with this puzzle. The "board" is made of cheap paper like puzzle pieces but really big pieces. This isn't even a regular board. It came loose from shipping and had creases in it. The bottom piece fell apart within 2 days when I picked it up off my son's floor.

Product seems to be good, however the packaging was pretty poor and when it arrived one of my tubes had busted open. This caused me some trouble since I'm out about $17 on shipping in addition to having to run back up stairs to return what looked like just another tube with broken glass.

Not the best read, especially for someone who has not worked with these types of people before. Seemed like there wasn't much to it. Very repetitive. A bunch of stories about other people's experience and how they work as well, so there's some value there. Worth a read if you've been doing this awhile. The section on online dating definitely puts out red flags though.

The only good thing I can say about this product is it arrived in a timely manner. It came brand new sealed and unopened. What a waste. There was no ink included as stated in the description. Also there were several loose threads hanging from both sides of what looked like white thread. On top of that, once placed onto my tablet, all I got was an indication that the pen had been installed correctly, but it still would not work. Total dissapointment. Don't waste your money.

This was my daughters favorite when we were little girls (it's how she learned to walk). Now that we're grown, she finds these songs just as fun now (she said "it's a bit slow but at least they're singing!" We sang them along with her every day for months afterwards.
A great series that can not be said for a lot of shows. It has good character development and fun story lines.
The bulb went out within 45 days with minimal viewing.

I ordered the set of two twin bed rails for my daughter's new bedroom. The description says "with included drawing" What show is this? If you don't have a dresser or headboard to put it on, then what are we supposed to say? All they did was make the frame without any kind of instructions. Then we got home and found out that no instructions came with the bed, there were none on their website.
Did not work out of the package. Poor quality as to quality. Looks ok in picture, actually looks like junk. Do not waste your money on this cheap item.

Doesn't taste even close to coconut. And there are ingredients as well. No way it could be remotely healthy. I threw away the first bottle because my dog would eat it. Won't buy again. My own fault, should've read better...

This is a book by a guy who spent years trying to live life his way. Its message for anybody with any sense of humor is simple: Stop worrying. Accept that money sucks, and get over it. It's what I did. The advice in this book has been summarized many times over. There's much useful information here if you can be bothered digesting the writing style. It reads like it came straight out of someone's dissertation. If you're into getting up early on Saturday mornings, go ahead and read this.

I have enjoyed using this knife so far. Works well on small fish as well as larger ones. Great cutting edge, feels very comfortable in the hand. It is a bit hard to get clean, and not really worth putting it back together, but you should be gentle with it. Good for boning fish. One side of the blade has been chipped, though that part seems sturdy. Overall I would recommend at these prices even if they had some design flaws. This thing rocks. Buy one now.
i got this item because its small, compact, very simple and..well easy enough for anyone who wants it...

The only good thing I can say is it's really cute and would make a great gift for any little girl. Unfortunately mine arrived broken so my review might not be accurate on the item. It did come in its own package though.
I have used Nexxus products before with good results so when i saw a suggestion on one of my online email accounts I thought i'd try it.
This piece fits perfectly into our living room! It came right out of the box looking gorgeous - very easy assembly.

This was a huge disappointment. My son loves dinosaurs and read the previous books to me, but didn't like this one. He says it's "just not very interesting." Maybe he would have liked it better if he'd finished it. The story had some good points, of course, about living in primitive times, etc. However, as an adult, I found that many parts were quite boring ("eat a few bugs!") or unnecessary (don't make fire with dried leaves, don't bother searching for things under your bed -- etc.).
Works well in conjunction with Dr.

I am a fan of Jack Reacher books, but this is the worst one. Usually he doesn't bore me as much with long winded dialog that takes up pages, and this time not even close. The last 20 pages or so were pretty good when it got to actual action. Not recommended.

One of those movies that I rented from Netflix because everyone was discussing its quality. The writing was terrible, there were so many grammatical errors, but most importantly, it doesn't have any story or character development. If you liked the first, don't even waste your time watching this movie.

I was very disappointed with the design of this phone. Not only it did not look like a vintage phone but most importantly, none of my friends could hear me. After all the time spent on research and review, we thought that the Nokia 2070 would fulfill our need for an old fashion phone - especially since it's made by Nokia. Unfortunately when we tried to use it, we found out its real flaws. We ended up returning it. It really is useless.

I ordered this book for a class and was not very pleased that my favorite poem was, by far the least, in it. The poems were great but there is only so many of them. For students who want the poetry as well buy this, because that's what they need. If you need everything don't order!

This book is a collection of two books, so you basically get the first half for free and have to buy the second one because they are not in order. This makes me quite angry. It should be stated immediately that this isn't just an inconvenience. For example, if I want to know some information about how to implement data encryption with Mailvelope, I'll look it up online using [...] first, then try again by finding the URL with mailvelope.com/learn? And that's it.

The item arrived quickly and was what it said online. I've been using this type of shaver on all types of beard from back to head for a long time. I ordered the item as part of my father's Father's Day gift, which he did not open due to some kind of illness. He didn't care about how well the product worked just that IT WAS HIS FAVORITE KIND SO HE COULD FIND IT IN A TIME OF NEED.

I loved this story until the ending. What a waste of great characters. I'm glad it was only 99 cents so even better. This book is too short, ends abruptly and feels extremely rushed. Definitely an author who should take one more week to finish writing it. The main male character's love for his fiance comes across as childish, yet very shallow.

This product is so bad, it didn't work for my dog! I am very dissapointed. The shampoo smelled awfull and he broke out with bumps all over his body. He started scratching the worst of that product. And this was not a new product, because we had to have gotten a defective batch. Don't buy it. If you want your dog happy, use anything but this. We are never buying products by Pet Armor again,. It's too bad they dont give refunds.

This looks okay in our living room, but its materials are a bit cheap and it feels very cheaply made...We found others cheaper that just look as good or even better than this, for MUCH less. My husband had this installed by the local handyman guy, who was working on installing some decorative stuff to his house, so while he was putting down screws with a magnetic screwdriver set, all we saw were pieces of metal, not wood. If you need something nice, get one made well.

I am still trying to get out the last bottle full of this stuff after I've bought it from Amazon for ~$13. It's been about five weeks- it's supposed to expire in 6 months, but even if you wait six months to use the product, I'll never buy it again.

This was one of the most boring movies I have seen in a long time. Don't waste your money unless you like watching cars roll down streets and buildings collapse. Even if all doors open at once, no matter close or far, it is boring, repetitious. The acting was bad, the lighting could be better, cinematography terrible when we are supposed to see planes gliding from tree tops...etc, etc.

Did not fit my computer very well did not snap in well. The back cover would come off which could be a good thing as it might help prevent the cracks that were developing on mine from moving around. I also bought a hard case with keyboard for this computer. Which works much better. And cost less too. But if you have an older laptop than mine.. You probably need one of those cases to protect it.

I bought this for my daughter and she has been using it but the keyboard falls off very easily. The other part you set your ipad in is nice, its all that keeps it together. It would probably be good if you were just going out to dinner or waiting at a doctor. My advice was to spend more money on something better, like buying one from Apple! Or buy one from Target since Target sells them cheaper than Apple products. This case isn't worth it.

You can only take so much of the same thing over and over. And to end with this ending, it really was just pointless. I would have liked if the ending did not leave us wondering. Also there were times when i realized i had nothing interesting on my mind, but reading these pages made me feel like someone else wrote it. So sad.

The plastic is so cheap that even with the adjustable legs, it does not stand up straight. And mine arrived broken. When I called them about it, they offered to send a replacement if I'd return this one. That just pisses me off. They're ripping off customers. It was pretty bad quality. Not what you see on tv or in stores. Plus since there are no directions and it's very hard because of the size, you'll definitely need someone who can help assemble it. There were tons of parts as well.
This did not work as it was intended to. Don't waste your time or money on this item. I don't know why the cable doesn't seem to even fit properly into my Kindle. What a joke.

Bought for my 3 yr old, and she's not too sure of how to use it yet. The only thing that would make this 5 star is if the light could be turned off so I can keep her happy in bed reading at night. No idea why the manufacturer couldn't just put a switch on the bottom of it. All other LED's do have one. Overall, it's cute & works well. Great idea.

Not to be too harsh but this movie was awful. I had a hard time understanding what everyone was saying and the actors were all over the place. Save your money and watch some of those other Chinese martial arts dramas instead or find an American production instead. The fighting scenes may appear authentic compared with movies like Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, The Forbidden Kingdom, or even Gladiator but they are no where near realistic. If you want high quality look at Jackie Chan as Bruce Lee.
The shower head works well and doesn't drip when taking down shower.
Very cheap quality. Poor design. Should be removed form Amazon. Only suitable for display as it's useless. There ought to be mandatory language warning before purchase.

This book was too technical for me. I'm still seeking a better introductory text that gives the average person something to get started on. It seemed to me this wasn't it. The author tends toward academic sounding writing. That does not mean it's bad, mind you - just didn't keep my attention because of what it looked like. I also wanted more hands-on information and tips. Maybe if I'd read the entire book, I'll have different thoughts. As is, I found little help or new ideas in this book. 
 Rating: 2.
The material is cheaply made, not even worth $12. I could of made something better myself using scraps. Don't buy this junk

The sound was horrible. Like the other reviewer said the vocals are really low. When they speak then it just sounds like noise. They also have to change your speakers when this game is on because most controllers aren't compatible. If I would of know that before buying this game, i wouldn't have. Maybe it's not my TV or something? But I thought hey I'll buy one and see. Same with me for those saying you can talk through TV.

We received a new Sony TV from our son on December 24th and the remote worked for about 5 minutes then just gave up. I looked it up online and there were numerous complaints. It was returned 3 days later with no explanation. A local seller replaced my defective remote, but unfortunately that did not fix it. Now 2 weeks after we took back the old replacement, this one is doing exactly the same thing! If you hold down a key for about 20 seconds, like suggested by others, it works fine.

This was ok but in my opinion I wish the book would have gone deeper. What happened to him when he grew up and where her people were living from his mother's point of view. The ending left me with too many questions.

We love this toy, but, the paint scratches off very easily,as do most of the accessories. So we are looking to replace it now. It also gets stuck alot, when they try and play on carpet. But, overall its great. I wish you could find new ones, but they dont seem available. Very difficult for a two or four-year old.

I bought the "original" which seems no better, it is difficult to move and very unstable when standing up. Don't waste your money. It might be better on an older model tv. Not sure why they would even bother with this one. You have had a tv for years so you know how good these should work. Waste of money!
I bought this book because we have made dozens of recipes from her website (the other one with a different author has been removed now.

When I recieved the package it was not what I ordered. But they refunded 100% of my money and made sure to send me another one for free. However after just a little over a month with this case its starting to turn black in spots like I'm using it. Don't get me started on shipping from Hong Kong which took all these extra days that were supposed to have been saved. Overall good case, but bad shipping. Oh well :p
This is one of the best series I have ever seen. It portrays very true to life experiences which makes it even more interesting.

I found this book disappointing. Not well written, not that many insights. Would only recommend to friends who want gossip for friends. Do not expect insights from an experienced detective. What you have here is pure fantasy. Sorry, but the truth hurts even if we are just having fun. If you're looking for a light read, go ahead and try it, you'll end up depressed. But in terms of a serious insight into how serial killers think, plan, act, etc. then pass it by.

I recently went to the local mall and picked this dvd up for 19.99 thinking it was a good deal but once i finished watching it, it's pretty darn stupid. Even though Jackie Chan is in this, he's not very good. He's just going through some routine and you can't really care about him. There's more talking than fighting. It's like every fight scene consists of Jet Li fighting people. Then after awhile its actually funny because there's all these guys running around with their faces covered from various diseases.

The story of the rise and fall of an amazing man who loved to sing, dance and play. I especially like that Billy was able to come out looking great after his surgery. This guy had a tremendous gift that unfortunately would be passed on only with many health problems. I'm sure he will touch your life in some way. He is missed. God Bless you Rick!

I bought this because it was cheap, but its quality is so poor that I'm afraid to put anything on it. It says it's a binder, which means you can easily find out there's no binder in there. That's kind of false advertising. There isn't really any way around it, really. I'll upload pictures. It's quite sturdy, though. Update: The rings are coming apart. They also look like they're going to fall off completely. Buyer beware! Very disappointing. Update #2: I've uploaded some pictures for reference.
This product came in handy after we broke our tripod. The price made me think that this would be cheap stuff. Its not. Very durable, very sturdy. Great quality product.
Bought this collar to use on a German Shep. First time using it, she reacted by shaking her head or back tail as if she'd been shocked.
Very cheaply made doesn't close all the way. Not even sure if it's water proof.

I didn't receive the item shown in this picture. The item pictured is a black holder for the headset. The one delivered to me has the silver hook that hooks into my ear. No way am I keeping that. Disappointed. :(

I really don't care for this at all! If you have any sort of a back problem- look elsewhere, if not. It heats up only half way then cools down so much my backaches almost hurt!The massage feature isn't very good, either.

It's got a lot of great reviews but I wasn't quite prepared for it. It was so loud it ruined everything in the room that I have no clue what happened. Needless to say my wife called me and took care of that. We can't return this item because it's flammable material! So unless you like hearing explosions, please stay away!

The product arrived missing its main feature of a cover and with the plastic broken leaving me to believe it was used. That being said, after a week the screen cracked, which caused a few problems in playing games (had I opened it, maybe this wouldn't have happened). But you know-- my computer is too new for problems. I've decided I'm going to try again but now will not order from them online anymore. If I get one that works properly I'll be very happy though.

This is the first time I have been left completely unsatisfied with an ebook from Amazon. It was a very short story, and most of it has nothing to do with any characters in her other books. Even for $1.99, you shouldn't be getting only one chapter. Unless this was some sort of special offer, I'll not make that mistake again.
Not what I wanted to read when my kids ask for stories about dogs. Might not look so bad though, just didn't hold their attention. :(
I purchased these cables to split between my two surround sound systems - one for the tv and another connected to the xbox one. The wiring was good however all three did not function properly.

Bought 5 units for the office. The quality of these devices is far below that you would expect on a consumer level. All have become erratic within less than one year. I can't even recommend them to use in client offices. They are made quite cheaply; very low quality. You get what you pay for!UPDATE: After owning 8 months, 10 out of 7 monitors now don't work.

I bought this to replace an older similar model and was horrified when it arrived. It's tiny, looks like children's tea pot on the counter. No excuse for that! So much plastic, it's almost like someone just cut out a piece from some old box of cereal or something. And, why bother? It doesn't hold one mug/glass properly, it tips over. In short, so cheap, in every way, I'm embarrassed my husband has purchased it.
It looks super nice and stylish, but also feels cheap. The case could use improvement of better material. That being said, it's really cheap!
i ordered the disc and instead of that we got a copy with no cover. how can you do that. the cover came in a plastic case was in shape just doesnt look great to give away as you cant even see it.

First of all, this novella was so short, it's barely worth calling part one. It ends mid-scene, and doesn't even take up an entire chapter. Secondly, one reviewer has said that he wished they would have just described what happened after their relationship went to hell. That isn't true.

The item I received was defective to the point that it could not get any power at all. I'm returning it for a refund. The light on this item appeared dim when plugged in. Upon first powering on, there were weird clicking sounds and an orange ring around all four corners. At first, no one came out of my PC and nothing worked with it. After switching USB ports, Windows failed to recognize anything connected via USB.

These speakers are a total waste of money. They can't even compare in sound quality to stock speakers. Don't be fooled by the product description. DO NOT BUY! You will regret it too. Also, beware this seller. I have ordered other products from them and I'm never going back. But the speaker system that arrived was an old edition product. No longer sold so you are basically buying something someone has stored for 40 years and forgot about. The box showed up already opened.
Bought this case for brand new 13" aluminum MBP and although everything fits well, the upper right corner does NOT close flush. It leaves an "opening" about 1/16- 1/4in x 1/2in.
A typical John Sanford book.

When I placed an order with a total of 4 batteries 2 did not fit my camera - so i was sent another set and the same problem - but this time it is on their end instead if mine, they decided 3 were the ones that worked! All of them will take about 30 pictures before needing to be recharged. Not happy about this product at all! Would never deal again with any one like this.
Like many people, I've only had this razor about two months now, but so far I'm satisfied with its performance.

I think a lot of kids will feel the love they need reading this book for school or something like that but even my sister hated it. The book is just to boring and there's no real action. It all revolves around how cool it would be if people had powers and some girls are mean to. It's not worth your money. Get Harry Potter: Hogwarts Diary. This is one that really didn't do anything special. Oh well. Here's hoping J.K.

These seem like fun toys, but they fell apart very quickly and you can easily pull each one apart. Great idea if only these were made well. For what they're being sold, it's ridiculous that you're basically paying $1 per toy.
The battery does work as expected. It has been very helpful to use at an odd time, like when school is out in winter.
Best coffee ever and it is much less expensive than at Costco. I have tried other coffees but none are better in my opinion. Try it! Worth every penny.

This product was purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband. We were both terribly disapointed in how this book is printed. Several of the pages are almost unreadable, we thought it should be more hardback like other books that we've purchased.

I enjoyed this book as a first effort, however, there were way too many characters to keep track of and an annoying plot. It could have been so much better though. All in all, it was okay. I'll be more willing after the next one comes out. Just not my thing. Maybe it's written for teens. I'm an adult. ;)

I was sent a different product. It didn't match my laptop. The adapter is useless. In order to return it for credit, I also have to pay almost $8.00 more for the same product that i originally wanted. So basically, I'm paying both shipping and handling on this product. This whole thing makes me angry every time when things like this happened. But that's really not Amazon policy anymore. It's Amazon policy. You make mistakes and then your customers complain about you.
I'm not sure what people expect from one of these.

To have a story with zero morals and no real character development or depth is about all I can say for this book. I'm glad it was free. Just don't waste your time. This book could be written as if someone just sat down one day and wrote something that has only minimal writing skills (that's what they call writing). I'd take the time to write better stories using my imagination. At least some of them make sense. But not THIS one. Take advantage before they're gone.

This is a good game and quite a lot of fun to play. It took me about an hour to finish it. Not sure if I lost interest. My 10 year old enjoyed it as well. Overall I'd say its pretty much for kids who are at least 9 or older. A few words with little ones will bring you up short. If your looking for something that requires no thought, just simple gaming this seems like the best game. Good price too. Enjoy!

I purchased this book to help me get back into reading for a while. I'm glad others had different experiences than me, but from what I've read on Amazon, there are just too many mistakes in the text. You have to believe that they spell all of their words correctly, sometimes it's hard to tell. In addition, at times when I see errors, I wish he clarified whether or not you can make them yourself if you're unable to find another speller. He doesn't even list it anywhere. My advice, don't buy it.

I bought this for a friend. She had been using my old HP Photosmart C6280 All-in-One Printer, so far works well. The photo prints her very nice, and the color in photos is awesome. It arrived promptly from Amazon, however, they failed to deliver any paper or paperwork with it. When you call customer service there are two choices, one that takes up hours, which results in long hold time, another to put someone else through the same frustrating process.
First let me say that I don't know if this book is any good, but after a few pages in I'm pretty sure I'll never be able to finish it. Here we go again.

For the most part, I enjoyed this book. It was a good story, with some pretty interesting characters and subplots, an interesting premise, but it got too complex for me. In fact, as others have mentioned, I sometimes forgot about what happened in Chapter 7 (or vice versa-see below)-and, honestly, had trouble keeping up at all after that. One of my favorite lines is from chapter 6 (which you can read below), where our hero says, "I suppose if you're gonna be shot at, shoot 'em all.

Great price for 4 HDMI Cables not including shipping. These were all of good quality and I am satisfied with the purchase. Shipping was fast also. Would buy again. Highly recommend this product. Will order from them again.....................

This book was disappointing. I found the first few chapters interesting and engaging, but that seems to be a fluke. The rest of the material seemed repetitive for me. If there is any part 2 it needs a lot more editing!!!! It's not worth your time or money sorry......
This case is made of VERY cheap plastic. It broke while I was trying to get it on my ipod. The plastic breaks easily and can be taken off. DO NOT BUY!!!!!

I didn't like it. The characters seemed too implausible. And the story line dragged at times. I almost gave up several times mid-way. But then picked it back up and finished it. It wasn't a bad quick read but not as good or gripping as some of his other books. He should have stopped here.

This was a good movie, but it lacked a lot of the originality that I thought would have been present and had its own feel with something missing in it. It kept my attention even though some parts were hard to follow. Its got a very important message behind it, though. You can learn from just the same bad experiences as the main character did.

I ordered this for $19.00, and at that price you can do better yourself. It is only about 2 inches high which does little good if your trying to keep your drink chilled on a hot day. The metal clip has bent already, due tot he weight of the cup from being tipped over. A piece had fallen off, it still worked but who needs something already falling apart!!! This item is totally overpriced, especially since it's made in China.

This book was not what I expected - maybe it's just me?I'm looking to learn German for about a year. The grammar of this book left me thinking "what???" and that made it difficult to learn. I would have liked some more explanation for how the sentence were formed.

 Rating: 1.

A classic example of how the film industry uses an unneeded soundtrack to add action and suspense. This is not music that fits in with film. It goes against what was meant by a Bond movie. Excellent read, informative for all ages. This reads like fiction but is not. Anyone wanting more knowledge on the subject should read this book.

Not a good story, not really romantic, even when they found their way back to each other. I had some trouble finishing the book, as it seemed like you either love them or hate them. The cable connection to the power plug is so very fragile and does not stay on after 4 months of using it every day. This is a major design flaw. A good idea gone bad. I called their Technical Support line which appears to have been closed since July 2011. They claim that this model has had problems with breaking when used daily. To me that's complete balderdash. The reason why my camera continues to work at 100% is because of the cord. That's it.

This product is useless. It's cheaply made it didn't pick up anything even though I tried to clear a spot where we had just cleaned with the Bissell PowerShot 9300 Spot Scrubber! If used correctly, you cannot get under low furniture. Don't waste your time.

I bought the case for my iphone 4s thinking it was going to be a little easier getting in and out of it. The rubber is like a cheap material that causes lint everywhere. It covers up an important part (like your button) when you try to press it. The charger broke within minutes after use, so not only does it don'thing but charge (mind blowing), it's also hard plastic. This can lead me to believe this isn't the most durable product at all.

This battery was a great value, but didn't last long. I guess it made good backup power, when I wasn't out in the cold. Also, you had to get right up next to an outlet for power supply. Not exactly ideal for hiking or back packing. Maybe better on an automobile.

this was just ok. it took me to chapter 3 before i had any answers. when I did figure out "who dunnit" that information got spread around more than they should. the book could have used an editor (or two) in my opinion. no one ever speaks about what is going on without explaining what's happening. there's a very minor detail later on, but still not explained. there were so many loose ends and dead ends. sometimes it's good when authors leave you wondering.

It was hard to stay with and predictable. And I found myself rooting for the bad guys more than I did the good guys. A lot of characters were only marginally interesting. There is potential here, but it's not there yet in this novella. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't try it, it just means you're aware that what little writing you've come across by author John Connolly tells a great story, even if no one knows it. You might like his stuff better than I did.   Rating: 2.

After spending some hours in the field and a couple of hundred dollars for Nikon equipment, I have learned quite a bit about this equipment. In short, there is no such thing as good gear and, with today's cameras even the best. When you spend over $1000 and your pictures look worse than those from a pocket camera, it means that either (1) you went cheap, or (2) you've got all the bells and whistles, not real world quality.

I really wanted to like this book but in the end it just couldn't do it. The premise and world were fun at first and had me hooked for a few chapters until all of sudden the author has everything wrapped up so neatly by chapter 20 you wonder when you've reached the end. After finishing her other novels that I've loved I'm not sold on how well she's been able to develop story lines and characters into full novels.

I read this book from front to back last night and only really enjoyed reading parts of it. It is a little sad that the author put out this book. Maybe as he writes more his stories will improve. However, I didn't like it that much, although the plot was interesting. It's not something you would usually come across but it's what some people call "true love". It's also written in an interesting way. My advice is, if you're interested buy it.

This book is not what I thought it would be. The majority of the information provided is already known, and much of this info can be garnered from a quick Google search. Nothing really here that I haven't read before. If you've never heard anything about it, it's okay, but if you have, pass on it. I gave 2 stars because it lists some good info, but there's nothing earth-shattering. Disappointing.

I liked this book very much. But I must say that, although it's a good read, it was NOT for me. That is, if you are searching to understand Islam better; there were so many references that came from the Koran. I'm not opposed to reading about religion, but I'd rather get my information without being bombarded with Bible references. So I went back and started over.

I bought a pair of the Koss KSC75s, with my goal being to get them out for use at work so that I could listen remotely while working on a laptop. While they fit very comfortably into the ear canal, within about an hour or so, I was tired from taking their weight in my ears. After around 10 minutes of use, and no matter which size plugs came out, I just couldn't take it any more. There is simply nothing comfortable about how these headphones feel.

I like this product. It's a great idea, but it was so complicated to use - very time consuming for the amount of work that actually needs done. In my opinion I'm not worth taking apart and redoing my toilet seat all over again unless it's something really important, which if that's what you want, save your money. This didn't meet my needs. It also doesn't clean as well as other methods I've used (like vinegar in a spray bottle - same result with more elbow grease).

This was a disappointing choice. Some parts are helpful though like when trying to get information through online applications. However, other reviews led me to believe there were some useful facts hidden here. Most all the data in the appendix is easily obtainable online.

I used this product in my dishwasher to remove stains and some baked on grease from food that had stuck to a pan. After running the dishes through 2 or 3 times, about half of them did not come out clean. As such, I started soaking it with vinegar. It made no difference whatsoever. A waste of money. I'll stick with Dr. Bronners liquid soap which works great. I've never purchased anything other than Dr Bronner's brand for dish-washing soap, but after having this experience I'm now seriously considering it.

I'm a big Michael Connelly fan and this one was ok, but not great. I had heard good things about it so decided to try it. The mystery is pretty good, but with all the technology advances today, how someone could get information that they needed at least an hour earlier (days away) rather than 30 minutes later, just seems unbelievable. I've read many of Connelly's books before, he always has great character development in them and keeps you interested. This book did not.
The color and length were perfect for my needs at the time. I would recommend to anyone else. Very good product.

The charm is cheaply made. It breaks pretty quickly. You get what you pay for. Wouldn't recommend it. But since we can't see them online you have to buy just one. Wish they were real beads like the others. Really bad buy.

I've had these filters for about a month. I can notice an improvement in air quality, but no changes regarding our overall health. However, we use the filter everyday, so it's not like we're breathing cleaner air. This isn't to say that there aren't other better ways of providing clean air, though. Still, it seems worth it and we love being able to feel good knowing that we're doing something healthy with our money when using this..

This is clearly a defective model if it can fail so quickly. I've bought two and had problems with both.
