The movie is great but the disk won't play. I am a little dissapointed. Is there anything to do about it? You have been warned.

I have to say that this movie is pretty terrible. The acting wasn't all bad and the action scenes aren't too bad. What ruined it for me was its attempt at a psychological thriller with an obvious "twist" involving the protagonist. If you want to see how far you can push a plot point, then by all means, go ahead - that's what I've done so far, having watched about half of it. But if you, say, want a good movie, you'll hate this.

I have really liked this coffee machine and the way it tastes. I've tried a few different kinds of K-cups with both hot cocoa (in my tea bag) & coffee, and love them both. The water reservoir is large enough to fill our 8-cup mugs, too. My only wish for improvement would be if they made an iced latte. But since that doesn't come in Keurig packs, that's probably not going to happen.

The title of my review pretty much sums it up... I just recently got this book and there were several pages missing from it. It was extremely obvious that someone had run the books through an OCR software program before sending them to a publisher. Some areas in this edition were more than readable, other parts not so much. I've ordered many textbooks online for less money and have gotten better quality with them.

I must say, it would be easy to get stuck with a book that doesn't work properly, but this is not one of them. For the price, you don't expect perfection, right? Well, I'm sorry to say there's something seriously wrong here. As other viewers noted, there appears to have been little care put into it. There are numerous typographical errors, spelling mistakes, and grammatical errors as well. This may just be how it was "scanned", and at $17.95, there should have been no reason for this.

For an actual book, there is a total of 8 pages in this "book." It's just over a 100 PAGES long! I didn't expect much at $3.00 but thought the story line would not be so bad. After all, it's written by a famous author! NOT!The book ends abruptly. No epilogue. Just like that. You don't learn what happened to any characters. It was as if the author stopped mid sentence then realized she couldn't continue. She simply got tired and stopped.

I've had much better quality from the company before. When this time it was delivered to me I noticed that there were several pieces damaged in shipment. As luck would have it, once we finally got around toputting it together my son loves it. However, it's a very thin piece of particle board,not even cardboard, really. It seems like if you look at just oneside, one thing will happen and when someone accidentally leans into it...something cracks.
Item did not fit, was too big and would have broken my phone, which it was. It said this would fix a galaxy s3, but it didn't, very disappointed.

This one seems to have been written before the author got his head screwed on straight. That has nothing to do with being a Christian, that is what I get from this kind of book. Why not be honest and use your common sense and try to find out who this person's father was. I'm sure it would give everyone else insight into our culture.

The instructions indicate the base of this feeder will not fall over but ours did exactly that. We are sending it back to Amazon. Do NOT buy it and please don't waste your money on it. This is a horrible design that falls apart in no time.

This product is definitely cheaply made. The sound quality was not good and the mic only worked one time on me. I ended up sending it back. Don't Waste your money like me if you want a decent mic. Spend a few more dollars for quality...get something that will stand up.

I don't normally leave bad reviews but this really deserves it. It's a great price and has great features as far as audio plays go, however mine was broken when we got it (literally)! You have to fiddle with the cord of the jack in order for any music to play through it. It also makes an annoying humming sound that goes away quickly even if you turn down the volume. The shipping box wasn't damaged, so I guess it's just defective on our part.
It definitely makes your PS3 controller look great. The price could be cheaper than what you can get it for.

Don't even bother. It took all of a minute for me to realize this was a waste of money. I won't be trying any more products by these authors. This 'book' is about as long or longer than one page with some blank space at either end. If you want information, just go find it on the web.

While it looked cute on my car I noticed after driving up a hill that the top left corner was cracked and falling off. I didn't send them back because they were only about 2 dollars(or would have cost me more to ship then what the case cost), but wouldn't recommend them. :( :( I love how fast these came in though, so just know you're going to get something that's probably not great quality.
Not easy to use even as an adult, because only one side of each page has to be used for each word.

I will admit that I finished the book, but it was mostly due to my compulsive desire to continue reading. However, despite all of this, there were not enough laughs in this novel and so much more could have been done with it. The premise is good, as are some elements of the plot, particularly a possible solution for our hero's problem when he discovers his brother is gay. But I found that most of it is just predictable trash. It's really not very realistic or even interesting. I'd recommend something else instead.

I just don't understand why anyone would rate this book better than 1 or 2 stars? It's nothing new, and there are so many great books out on the subject of "how-to-be" with little to no substance. My favorite title I've read recently is "The Magic Touch by Dr. David Wilcocks", which explains clearly what it means for you to be your magical.

This book is very poorly written and organized. The author should go back to graduate school for creative writing, or else get a new job. While there are some gems in this book, all that good stuff happens off stage.

This book came highly recommended, but it did give me some food for thought. However, if you are looking for a scientific treatment of life in space, this is probably not going to provide it. It also gives brief excerpts from other sources that were available at the time of writing. There was little new information, so there wasn't an exciting crescendo.

This movie is by no means for the kiddies. The special Effects are pretty poor and there is nudity. Not recommended to children under 14 years, even then I think it's a bad show since there's too many nudity scenes. They should have left out most of it and cut down on the violence. If anyone would want a good action movie let them buy Total Recall or Ghost Protocol. For those who like horror movies...try House Of Wax instead. That one was really good.
These "cutesy" bunny ears are just plain ugly - there is no comparison to how pretty pink rabbit ears actually look on me.

I had read another book by this author, which was good, but not great. This one is nothing like his other works...just plain stupid and unexciting. Sorry, John Grisham you are a one-trick pony now...go back to what made your name in the first place (legal thrillers), instead of churning out these poorly written, amateurish novels. To top it off, there seems to be no substance on any of the characters at all.
I've had this item before when they were made and loved it. I ordered two. They arrived today & unfortunately are NOT what I'm looking for. It appears to me now they've changed the product.

This battery was the right replacement to fit a Toshiba laptop. Great price, great product, but unfortunately it did not solve our problems. In the future if your computer requires these types of batteries, we suggest ordering them separately.

This is not even a book. I finished it simply because I've been invested more than reading anything else. The book does provide good insight to the current legal climate regarding this particular topic, but as far as quality goes, it's quite lacking. This should have sold as a pamphlet or booklet.

I'm sorry. I don't want to write too many bad reviews, but this book is totally and utterly unenjoyable. To have these characters so poorly drawn, it's hard enough to imagine them as two people. There's little effort put into them, which makes the whole plot seem all wrong. They're not likeable even for teenagers. It seems they were written by somebody else, because it looks like there wasn't a lot of effort.

For an "official authorization," this one is not very good. My college instructor required it for a research course, as did my fellow students and I who took it. There were errors in the book even before we had studied most of it; there was, for example, a question that stated "How many pieces can be shown to lie at an angle between 45 and 60?". Um, the only piece you have right angles 60 apart was supposed to look like half a square.
Unfortunately within hours of opening it the wires that hold each side together had broken making it totally useless, waste or time sending them back. Very disappointing.

Nice size, easy to handle, and makes great hot water. I was hesitant at first because the price seems high, but well worth it! Now my mother can brew her favorite tea by herself. I gave it a 4/5 only because its difficult to determine how much water is needed. Also, you have to open one part of this pot each time after brewing (not very convenient) which does not make me love it any less. Overall, though, really nice product.

Bought it for my wife -- had no experience using one before. This is a good quality product but just couldn't get it to work with her iMac. It would be nice if the instructions were better detailed. I have had two of these things for about a year!! Other than that, its great because thats all i use.....and this thing is SUPER HOT! so much so, i don't really even need my case with it.

I got this for my cat who is a fan of catnip. He loves it. When it arrived, the first thing he did was try it. But all things considered, he just loved this, went crazy over it, so that's good.
I love this pot.

I wanted to like this, but it just didn't do much for me. Maybe if you were living in a different country or have no other way to get a lot of fresh air, might help you relax. Also, the "pillowcase versions" aren't particularly comfortable or easy fitting either. This is kind of an odd design.

this isn't a book it is not an account of her life at all. there are stories and facts but all i got out of it was the author did do some things that you can find on youtube if your interested. I have ordered this many times thinking it would be good quality and great as the other ones I have. Unfortunately they just don't make them like they used to. You can see from some of these ratings that is a common problem with them. While the book is well written and certainly provides an interesting twist on his story, it just doesn't have enough substance.. I had assumed that as this was written by him that there would be some insight into why he chose to go against what everyone told him. It's like if you were a celebrity in Hollywood who said "You can't sing, but everyone else thinks so". So much for your credibility.
