Well I will make this very simple. When the game first came out it was a great game. Then for some reason they messed with it. They added in too many things that should not be included, then cut down characters from 8 on to 5. This is just one of those situations where EA ruined something great. It would have been so much better if most people playing had all the same level (eg: 16 or 64) and everybody played with one friend.

I picked up this book after reading the title and thought it was worth a look. It had been recommended by an old friend (Jane Eyre) who said it is about an orphan girl with psychic abilities that she finds while at the home of her aunt on Christmas morning as she stumbles around to find something in one of the closets which has obviously not been emptied for centuries. After this, there were references to a couple people in later generations but no other names.

This book is written in the style of writing found in textbooks many years, perhaps even centuries, ago. It reads as though you are reading some long forgotten ancient document transcribed verbatim because no one bothered to edit it. In trying my best (it's only 84 pages long) and with my best lighting available, I could barely make out any words.

I would recommend this product to anyone. Very easy assembly and the price is reasonable. The chair is so comfortable it has become my everyday furniture. Perfect for a smaller person. Nice recline position as well. I am 5'8". This chairs seems perfect length wise. It fits nicely in a standard size coffee table. Only reason not 5 stars because of price. But you get what you pay for. So worth it. Shipping was great.
Very disappointed with this product. I have a large hand and it's very difficult to use on your back. You are expected of pushing the trigger rather than moving it over your body.

These things feel very flimsy and thin. The plastic feels almost disposable in comparison. I have only had them for 6 months and already one ear bud is not even working. I've never used the buds at excessive volumes but when it comes right down to it, they just don't last. It would take me a few weeks tops before these were no good, let alone 2 months. It's too bad because i really liked them.

I bought this based on the first reviewer. I have never had a problem with an electronic product. This one, however, is pretty bad. Not sure why, because it's only $30, but it doesn't even work. I plugged it in and got nothing out, nor does anybody else here tell you. Do not buy from this. Maybe they sell them through Amazon, who knows? Anyway, I'll post that somewhere else.

This TV has pretty good picture and it is a great value. Amazon delivered with this product as promised. The only drawback I experienced was that the stand came without all of its parts, so we have to find some hardware at Lowe's for about $40. Fortunately, our other television is compatible but there are no speaker options on this model. All in all, though, very happy with it.

My husband and I have owned many pairs of Oakley glasses in the past, having always been pleased. Not this time, though. We were so excited for these glasses, but when they came in, both his lenses fell out on day one. Both sides are no longer attached, just like most other brands. Also, one side constantly fogs up! Very disappointed that we now own 2 pair with damaged lenses. Too bad to be expected from Oakley. The product info was not helpful when I bought them. I would advise against buying these.

This charger worked great out of the box, but on day two (had to use for work, since laptop wouldn't charge) I noticed that when plugged in, sometimes my touch pad would not work. Sometimes if you move slightly while charging, nothing happens...

I was looking forward to using this when my dog barked a lot at everyone in the house. Didn't work. Still barking. Maybe it will work with other dogs or people but wasn't for us. Not sure why there are so many good reviews on this. If others can use it, that would be interesting.

i saw this movie when it originally came out and wanted to see again as I enjoyed it so much. Very entertaining, the end kinda leaves you hanging though?? It is a must see-movie!!! Highly Recommended!!:)
Well, not really, although it's got decent pictures and is a bit larger than most of our other books so I guess you can't complain too much. But there are two things wrong with this book.

I bought this for a party - used about four times and the motor burned out. A new motor costs over $400 with labor. So instead of having $450 I'll probably have to spend $1k fixing it. At least I'm only out $200 in parts. I'd never bother buying anything from Sunpentown again, even if it is just a broken light. The light itself may be great, but since that can't reliably work right what's there to say anyway.
It's fine but very cheap. It won't fit in a standard book. You have to remove some pages prior to putting in.
I should have listened to other reviews and not wasted my money! Do Not Buy! Broke after first use. Cheaply made. Cheap material. Horrible horrible horrible!

The item was delivered with the box looking a bit beat up and the pieces were in one large bag, no outer box. I opened it, put all my stuff in it to try out and discovered that there are 2 right side of the chair not even covered from bottom part so if your legs touch them by chance you might get burnt...So needless to say, would have returned but my wife is like that... But for this price, seems OK just can't use it.

I have used this for years, and cannot tolerate it now. Too strong. My local grocer sold it. What a disappointment. Why did they change the formula?? Don't waste your money. UPDATE- 11/25/2011This product is now being marketed under the name Neuro Natural brand but has changed back to Clorox. That means that as far as I am concerned their new formula has not been reformulated.

It is a shame that this DVD has been released. Most fans of the original recordings and video footage don't mind paying extra for additional material which are also available separately in remastered form on CD or DVD. Not only that, but it leaves them wanting to see what happens from start to finish with every song. All they need now after having spent hundreds upon thousands of dollars was one shot with a single shot.
Bought this product less than 2 months ago. Started leaking after only using once. This product failed before it was even half full.

This is a great little flash drive. A very handy size, especially for travel. Only gripe is...why did they put a loop to tie the pen drive to? If it were attached magnetically, I'd never lose my Flash Drive or pens. It makes an adorable gift! It's got plenty of room as well. It also came with a tiny microfiber cleaning cloth. I didn't expect it. :-0

I bought it for two reasons: (1) to use the iPod as a GPS, and (2) to connect an iphone with good quality head phones into it. My expectations were not only disappointed, but they would have probably been surpassed by its main features, given time spent trying out other options. Firstly, let me say that my unit came from Amazon, so of course there was no hassle about exchanging it. Secondly, when used as intended, you are left scratching your head.

The book has a very basic writing style and the title is misleading. The first 25% of the short story was written to convince you that your daughter needs her own room. She wants one, but she already has one. However, it says they are not getting married, so there isn't going to be more than one girl in their dorm. It's a nice try, however if this would have mentioned at least ONE guy you'd want on your side I wouldn't see why you're getting angry when another girl walks away.
These were a waste of money. They would be ok to keep the bugs away during a zombie apocalypse but are very cheap for how inexpensive they are! You get what you pay for!
One of the discs was not recognized at all. I had to buy a different brand from another vendor. It wasn't worth returning it. I'll take my chances with something that is supposed to work.

This is a great way to protect your ipod by only adding about half an ounce of weight per device. Plus it's more stylish than those cheap leather cases. I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to take on the protection and fashion quotients of their ipod. It can be folded in half which makes taking photos much easier.

I have had these for a couple years, and now the ear buds are completely shot. A set of Sennheisers that lasted me 3-4 years is more durable than these. You get what you pay for, which is why I'm giving them 2 stars instead or 1.
Love love love!

When I first heard the music of this movie, it was a bit too corny for me. The score seems to work better with the action than without (it's not as bad when no songs play in the movies either). But, then after seeing it, my expectations were set even lower so they still have stayed there. What really turned me away from watching the movie was the way the kids were acting.

I would never buy another book from this company. First, the title and subheading are misleading; there is only one book in this package of five short stories. Secondly, they did not send to me. Three books were sent but both had a cut at page 5 where it overlaps with an earlier page. They told me that it's been taken care of. The first two stories made me, or rather my husband, very happy and, for that, we thank you -- a few times over.

i was very disappointed in this book which was to be a gift for my daughter. She had bought a similar story from you and she said it was wonderful. I didn't want her old version of the story, so I went down your site after not finding it, only to find that it too is a good story. Please put that one back on line. It has wonderful artwork as well. thank you. Judy McWilliams

In The Land Of Oz the Scarecrow and his friend friends find themselves unable to escape from a horde of moving ants. Then they meet Dorothy who offers them advice regarding their quest. She tells them that it will take several days for all the ants to reach Emerald City as the way tunnels are built allows for movement in all directions. Also she says that once the last ant leaves then there is no turning back.
Great buy at a very fair price. I love this product. Works perfectly, and looks great on my phone. Recommend it highly.

I wish i could afford this album and take it out into the woods of Alaska with me somewhere for some quiet introspection. It would do wonders to improve my mood. Thank you Bill Frisell's solo efforts. Now come back to us old folks. There ain't much going on. Update:Just finished a few tracks through "The End is Only The Beginning" - if your interested in getting on line at Amazon search "Bill Frisell & Friends.

This book read like it was written by a young teenager. It could have been an interesting story but I felt there were too many descriptions about things that did not add anything meaningful to the plot. There wasn't much of an explanation or development in this story, rather if you skimmed it and knew what happen next you didn't need to. What is weird is that when I'm reading a book, I enjoy some details that enhance my sense of place.

This was the first time I tried the "easy to read" style of diet cookbooks and for me, it's a big drawback. The book is very small so when you have pages turned to look something up, it is difficult to read because light from my Kindle Reader would make any page hard to read. It seemed like if there were different colors on each page, then maybe these would be easier to read, but they didn't do this either.
This thing sucks! I've had two of them already, bought for my kids, both would only turn on.

i am having so much fun decorating the house with them, the colors are great,. The look just like they do in picture. They are made out of cardboard. I bought them for my grandkids to play with, hopefully it will be great help on christmas eve. There are lots and lots & lots of patterns that you can use for all kinds of occasions. For me anyway; I'm sure I'll save allot more for gifts later.
They didn't work. I'm pretty disappointed with my purchase of this product. I have another pair that we like just as well and it cost less.
When used in conjunction with a new water filter i no longer have to replace my Brita when we change filters. Very easy and fast to get the water flowing. You can switch them out more then once.

I bought this DVD expecting to find an easy way to help my children get introduced to the Bible story of Abraham. Instead, it is boring and repetitive with NO entertainment value for a child or preschooler. It simply seems like you are repeating about 1 example out loud, over & over, rather than actually showing Abraham and his family at work in their field getting into trouble! My kids lost interest quickly.
Very yummy! My fish gobble this up, and it's good quality! Will order again. The price is more than fair. No fillers, but real seafood!
This was cheap crap and only lasted about two weeks. Not very happy at all.

The title says it all: I bought this for my husband to carry to meetings. He had an earlier model (which he loved) and was quite excited about it. This new version is much lighter than the older model, yet seems flimsy. We haven't used it once.

My kids and I have an affinity for the old cartoons of yesteryear, so we were excited when this one first came out. But the quality was bad. One episode would play fine, but the next day it stopped playing. If you hold down all buttons on your remote at once, it'll get stuck in a "freeze" state. The second one, however, had several episodes. We returned it, got another, only to find that there was already at least 20 or 30 minutes of missing episodes from each disc. Very disappointing.

i was looking so forward to this new movie. my favorite thing about the original movies is peter cushing as luis. he did alot of great stuff in them. But after reading reviews its clear what happened here, they decided change it when that doesnt fit a particular plot or story. The only good character from this movie was played by celly hudson. but she dident do much.

I have a small yorkie mix who LOVES her dog food. One thing we didn't like about it was the smell. It took me many months to find one that worked well, but this is it. She likes being out in public all day, and with this bowl, you can leave your door unlocked at work knowing she has extra water while you're gone. Also, there are no seams or places for food particles to get in.

The book had some good tips, but wasn't formatted well for Kindle and the pages were jumbled with text missing. A more complete description of content would be helpful. I found much information in other books that provided better detail as well. However, I was glad to finally get a reply from Amazon, which is rare when trying to return something. They even offered my money back or another book. If you don't want it, contact Amazon. They know exactly what they don't like most of all - bad reviews.
The main male character was ok, the way he handled what happened to him seemed odd and over dramatic, I read it thinking there would be a different outcome, never did. It got annoying after awhile.

I had been planning a trip to the Galapagos Islands, and this guide was required reading by the tour group guide. The guide is thorough, providing information of interest and useful for all travelers traveling among islands, but the format of this book severely detracts from any pleasure of seeing them. There's an interactive CD-ROM provided which allows you to see photos that were previously in the book, but not the whole trip. Additionally, there are many grammatical or spelling errors.

I would recommend this movie as a good one night entertainment. Most of the story seems familiar, but it still has plenty to keep me entertained until the end. The DVD quality was good. Overall happy with my purchase.

There is great information on the book and in some ways a good intro and reference for someone who has never used an Android phone before. It doesn't go into deep details - more like the typical introductory text I might read. The photos are poor quality (some black out areas throughout which really reduces their capability). Unfortunately all this makes reading it very difficult as there was barely any explanation of how to use specific features. This isn't a guide book at all.
This cable has an excellent build quality and works as specified. The price was well under what BestBuy wanted. Very satisfied with this purchase.

I was disappointed in this book when finished. Very poor plot and development and a very unlikely protagonist. The writing is passable but not superb. This could have been a good mystery, with the hero at least interesting, but just read the reviews (thanks!) to know that I'd be disappointed. In fact, I'm pretty convinced there isn't too much mystery left here so let's move on. Not for me.

I tried it on before putting clothes away. It does smell good but it's like that white powder you add to your laundry detergent. The one size fits all makes sense. My complaint is, as other people say, the smell. It's bad. But hey, if you're looking for something with a pleasant scent, this is it. It's also hard to launder clothes. You have to use three times much soap because it's not absorbing.

It has everything I need if needed. My husband used the screwdriver to open up our IPad and it came with all of them he needed to take apart his Ipad. He just had to use that bit on the tool included in the package. A great little kit. I am sure we will have no problems using it. Thanks for this item! :D

I purchased this for my husband's birthday. As he is an electrician/welder the tool can get hot and a mitt was needed to pull out of hot oil. The mittens have large fingers so it works perfect for him!

Have tried other brushes out there but this one seems to be holding up better than all others. Don't have any issues with it scratching dog fur or carpet as has been stated on some posts. Would definitely recommend this item.

When we got this vacuum at a store it was easy to put together, and worked pretty well for the first six months or so. However, the switch that turns off the brushes doesn't work so there's constant brush burning. And although it's nice having such small size, I can only clean one room before it's full. A bit disappointed. We're shopping for another new vacuum because of the above problems. The good thing is customer service from Hoover. They replaced it right away by mail.
This is a cheap knock off of the real stuff… I found it to be totally disappointing and not worth any price.
This is truly an awesome product. You get two great massagers in one unit. My wife really loves it.

This is quite possibly the worst book I've ever read. I read about halfway through and was tempted to throw it in a fire. I'm not sure I'd want anyone else to think that this books deserves five stars. Don't waste your money. If you're really desperate for something decent just go look at some of the old movies from long ago. At least there you'll have something worth reading even if it's trash. But don't bother with what Mr. Patterson has got to offer here.

I just received my Kindle 2 in April and after reading the first several chapters found a number of inaccuracies -- from references to British terminology relating to aircraft as something with wings to descriptions showing two British men standing together.

The item was a lot smaller than what it appeared to be in the pictures. Not quite worth the price. I gave it as a gift so i couldn't give feedback on actual quality. Shipping and packaging were great.
Very bad book!!! I've bought this book as a gift and I got two bad books like in other reviews here in amazon :(. The pages are dirty already!!!! Never buy from here!!! I'm very disappointed.

I bought this game for my kids ages 9, 7, and 4 - to play together. The little one just wants it to go on forever because it's her favorite princess movie. Unfortunately, the graphics are not as good a those in the Disney films. Also, the music is terrible, most of which came from Disney--too bad. We stopped playing after an hour due to frustration with what we couldn't do.

This is a horrible product. At the time of writing this, it has not even been one day, and my 3 month-old puppy had chewed through this product to little pieces. The fabric was shredded where she got her paw in it, which caused some minor cuts. My dog doesn't chew much, either, so I'm quite certain that she's NOT teething. I immediately contacted Amazon Customer Care, who suggested washing it.
Well written, easy to read. Interesting book on an interesting subject. This is my only review, so I'll let you know that this will be my last one.

I am an electrical engineer and can easily understand all the instructions. It is worth every penny that we paid for it. The only bad thing was that this was not a Christmas present, it had to arrive by Thanksgiving Day, but thanks goodness our grandson opened on Thanksgiving! Merry Christmas!!!

I ordered these for work because they are the perfect size and color to match my brown office chairs. They arrived today, opened one bag of them up only to find that there was no fabric or padding in this package whatsoever!!!! What a rip-off! My husband is going to have all his Christmas stuff shipped back! I'm so disappointed and frustrated! Hopefully I'll just eat this loss and won't order anything more from amazon. :(

the seller was great, it came sooner than i expectedand that is really important.however my problems were with this dvd. yes it plays good when its on but if you dont like silent films then dont get this, because every second of it was completely censored!!!! so all in All i would give them a five star, they are very helpfull. However beware of buying a censored version for sure. I recommend watching from a different source such as amazon.

This camera is really good for the money, but I have to take it off when I'm taking pictures in low light. The quality seems slightly better at night, where light has yet to be a problem. If you're going camping, make sure you bring batteries because with all of that power this thing gets, you'll probably run out fairly soon. And also, be aware - after about 60 photos or so, your picture will start blinking every 2-3 seconds and no longer show up on screen.

Bought this on sale. Didn't expect great quality. Very cheap, thin plastic. Won't last. Looks like it will break even after a short trip. Just too poor of quality construction really. Buy another brand. You may want to consider buying the larger size. This one is pretty small. About average length for a standard tripod. But not good if you intend to move it. Would look into something much more substantial if carrying any kind of weight. Not recommended at all.

I bought this from walmart a year or two ago to hold my large coffee cup, and it was fine until today when the plastic base warped so much that with moderate pressure on the cup, you couldn't even support it. Don't waste your money. If you're looking for an over priced caddy to use once in awhile, buy this. But if you're buying because it's going to have long life (like years), look elsewhere. Now I'm out $40 bucks.
I was looking for an inexpensive book with nice pictures. There were some good and useful things in this book, as well as many not so helpful ideas.

This charger is a complete waste of money! It has the shortest life between charges. In less than a month it stopped working. I would not recommend this to anyone. They could have at least made one in two different sizes. I had to give 1 star, otherwise I wouldn't even write this. Stay away from anything from PowerGen! You WILL just be tossing your money away. Never again! Don't buy it... Go and get a name brand instead. Save yourself a headache!!!

I bought this printer a couple of years ago (newer). It was okay, but after awhile, it started making random noises and then just stopped printing altogether. The troubleshooting guide didn't help, so I'm going to buy another laser printer, since I've had enough trouble with the one that came w/ it. Don't spend your money on any epson printers...at least not these ones. One star is much too good for them.
Bought 2 one went back cause 1 side did not work. 2nd has problems with audio. Don't waste ur money.

I got this for my nephew as a birthday gift - it had not yet arrived when he went to bed. He turned 3 and we took the batteries out of it, but before putting in fresh batteries, it stopped working. No matter how many times you push or push again, all it does is spin and spit. So disappointed because it's so cute. A waste of his precious time... will be returning immediately.

This is the worst cookbook I have ever had to work with and I'm a cook! While most of it would probably be good for someone who never cooks, if you were looking for a healthy diet cook book that has some basic recipes, steer clear of this one.

This is one of the most poorly made items I have ever bought. At first it seemed fine, but later that same day my laptop would not work at all. It just keeps cutting out and making weird noises. My old power cord which broke in 2 pieces, didn't do anything like this. Stay away, get something better or even cheaper.

I recently bought this book on the strength of another reviewer's review and thought I'd better see what Mr. Moore had to say for myself. For a short story (or novella, if you will), this was far longer than most other stories that I've read. That's okay, I guess, given its setting in medieval Europe, but then it's not really clear why he chose this subject.

I bought these to use with my tablet so that when i go somewhere like a hotel room where the wifes not in bed and its too cold for me to use, i can put them on myself very comfortably. I keep one at work since I'm often cold. Love them. A friend told me about them; then decided she wanted some. She loves hers too. They really do help get things warm or cool.

Bought this product with the intention of saving space. The unit I received would not power on. Had to send it back. Amazon worked well on sending me another replacement, and so far haven't had any issues yet. UPDATE: Second Unit DOA as well. Same problem. Power light just flashes for a second then shuts down. No more OCZ products in my house. Returned it and bought an Icy Dock instead. It is also much better than this. Avoid if it's going behind your entertainment center.
We expected more from this shower curtain set than we received. It looks okay, just not what I expected. Probably wouldn't buy another.
So excited about this! When it's full I can carry it around by the handle.

I don't know if my unit is broken or not; however, there are numerous problems with this camera. Many people had the same complaints but they either never wrote a review to warn others of what was wrong in their units. What really turned me off about the camera were the many times it seemed blurry. When video started playing, I can see where someone would be walking through an area and everything looked grainy because the image wasn't clear.
Product is as stated. This product allows me to charge my iphone with no problem. Love the way it works and doesn't get too hot when in use. Great product. Will buy again if needed!
Great product for the money. Would definitely buy again. Bought these to replace a set I had that rusted out. Just what Iwas looking for.
I bought this for my daughter. It did not work at all. Tried to charge it and nothing. There should be a way of returning it. I will never buy here again.

i have bought 5 of these headphone now and every one are terrible the bass is very nice it does get loud. But not for long just a few weeks after its like listening to music from miles away what has happened with them that so many people in this reviews love theses but mine broke within 1 month dont buy them. They sound great when they work.
Very pleased with how fast shipping was. The Anker Astro Mini 3000mAh Portable Charger does everything advertised.

I've been a big fan of the Star Wars saga ever since I was 10 years old when Episode V came out in theaters, and recently purchased each one individually. With that said, this soundtrack ranks right on the shelf with the original, especially as far as music goes.
This was a great purchase, very high quality product compared with other sets on Amazon or at a much lower price.
The quality seems a lot less than what we had before but still good. For being in another country there is no problem getting them. It's like they don't want you to.

I have always used WD HD's, however there has been an inconsistency at the time of purchase and quality to date...they are either DOA(Dead on Arrival) or barely worked. This one was bought as a backup for some old photos so that if anything happens this would be back up. Unfortunately, when it arrived - not only did my computer recognize it, but also Windows 7 recognized it just fine. So, I went ahead with uploading them to it. But, everything seemed perfect.

I loved the whole set. Great picture and nice sound. As usual with Samsung products all of them functioned properly. Would have been 5 stars but as others mentioned, for some reason it's difficult to adjust the volume. I'm giving 4 starts because of that. But overall, a great tv set - excellent price ($500), you can't get anything better at this price. Very good value. Amazon also shipped it out very fast.

These are cheap, light weight plastic lights. Not at all as pictured. There is a big difference between these and the metal ones that I have seen used by professionals. The only plus to them being cheap was there were more of them.

What can I say. After reading the reviews, it was a no brainer that this book would not be worth my time and money. I'm only on chapter 3 but like many others, found myself losing interest. The premise of the story is intriguing. Two high school students who both have an affinity for serial killers. There are so many. Each with their own distinct way in which they kill people, each with his specific weapon. To me, each one has very similar mannerisms from early childhood through adulthood.

I had the opportunity to use this on another vehicle. It's great for finding a leak. I've saved probably hundreds of dollars in labor from these guys alone. They have some very useful video and info about how things work...and if your going to spend that money you might as well take them with you. Buy their products before they sell out! :)

This book had very good reviews but I was extremely disapointed. It is written from a view of being an insider to the Bush White House... there are no actual stories or stories about real people at work in this book. The information provided lacks any substance. It seems almost like someone wanted her to write it so she couldn't do anything else. A waste of money. If it were all true, I'd have given it negative stars.
Don't buy this. It's cheap junk. Mine doesn't work at all. This junk cost $7. At least that's what you can get.

If you're looking for just an easy read that's more romance than realism, grab this series. Otherwise, keep looking, they're all pretty undeveloped. The stories are like Harlequin Presents without the sex. Some spoilers here:- For some reason you only get two brothers in each book...

First time i tried using it the part that holds the ball fell apart. It has just a clip with no way of keeping it attached, so now its useless. Also on my first use there was some kind of oily substance in it's eye. Its pretty much unusable. If you have to take a picture during use, make sure your face is mostly clear and dont get any oily or oily. Also, if you do end up buying this, DONT buy more than one because sometimes they stop making them.
Bought in early August. It worked fine. Had a great price. By mid November it died before it reached 12 months.

We just received the item today and were so excited to have it in our bathroom. I filled it up as the instructions said, hung it, then turned on one of two fans that we purchased at a big box store. They both ran for 5 minutes then stopped turning. All they do is oscillate. I've been looking into buying an electrical timer switch but now that I think about it, you shouldn't need to.
These shoes were very stylish yet uncomfortable. It looked like a child could wear them. They did not have good support for my plantar fasciitis. My feet kept hurting.

I'm sorry, but I really wish this was another book by a famous person, not an autobiography. For one, there's no "interview" with Elvis. In fact, it reads more like someone looking into history and writing down facts they found along the way. How is that any different from being Elvis Presley? So for two bucks I'd recommend that instead we give him some money. That said, let me focus on how bad this autobiography is. First, there are several inaccuracies.

I do love the way this makes coffee as stated but it is a VERY slow cooker. It takes about 4-5 hours to cook one pot and after that you still have 2-3 cups of warm coffee. Not what I expected at all. But when you are looking for more than 2 people in your house who want coffee, even if they work hard their jobs get done by then so it's ok. That's how I use my old standby Zojirushi.
this is my second set for these replacements. They last about 6 mos. if not washed or dryed by time you notice problems.

It lasted 10 minutes and the zipper broke. The leather is too stiff to slide your hand in. I love amazon - would not buy this bag if it weren't a replacement for my previous one. This one sucks big time, but I don't have time & patience with it. I'd only recommend that people look at their other bags before making a purchase. I used to think buying from Amazon was a safe bet, so why did they screw up this? They screwed up, that's why.
Do not waste your money on this item. The rhinestones are falling off and its so thin that it bends very easily. Ive only had the case in my purse since May 1st and already they fell out.

This works wonders for my 7 pound mini-poodle! I've used it on two of her mats and they have noticeably gotten a little softer. Both mats come out in one go since I'm only able to use the large end tool and keep going so this small blade takes care of all sides with ease. Great product that I will be buying!
The binoculars came in only to find out they were broken! I can't tell if I can return or not. My daughter was excited about them.. But now she's disappointed!! Wasted Money... :(

This album brings back memories when music were fun not like now... But it always makes you want too see them live.. So if your not happy with today's pop try this album! They are even more awesome live then on CD.

I can't say this product was horrible because it wasn't. The reason I'm giving it a bad review is the poor construction. My son has only had his for one week and he already said that after opening it, "its been in here half an hour" Its really not made very well. Also most of the time when you go to take pictures they seem blurry. The flash seems like my kids camera lol. And lastly It does NOT have any shutter speed option.

What is there to say? It's a charger. It works just like it should. Doesn't get any simpler than that. I used the USB port with no problems, as well. I only wish they would have provided some kind of indicator so you know when it's really done - but that seems pretty typical at this point. I've been using mine for about 5 months now and haven't had an issue yet. The product is made well enough. I'm not worried if someone accidentally touches it.

I just bought this thing after my laptop charger fried when it fell into the drain. I'm not sure about some folks' experience but mine worked great, right off the bat. No problems whatsoever. It's got an unusually short cord, though, so be careful if you want to place your computer from further than 2 feet away.
I've purchased this adapter for 3 months; just yesterday, while plugged into our charger, an arc split from one side about 5 inches long down.

When I plugged this device into my car, one red light came on. The second time I did this, all lights went out. This was not good because when I turned my car back on, the indicator showed that it had shut off. But then, minutes later, everything from there is no longer working. Since I waited months for it, I'm very disappointed with this. It's been working nicely until now!!! It should at least last half a year.

This is a great product and very high quality. Not sure why the price went from $120 to $100 in two days. I would say that it is still worth it. My only complaint was its size. It's larger than my average key chain, but not really a space saver. Would definitely recommend, especially for those with many keys you need access to. Very good quality product. However, if the seller had offered an open box, I'd have gotten one just like it, or even something smaller instead.

My daughter and I watched this movie on VHS. She loved it so much we needed to find a replacement DVD. The picture quality was perfect for our small TV. This is my favorite version of Pride & Prejudice. It follows the original story well, has wonderful actors, especially Colin Firth in one of his best performances, and has humor you will not see anywhere else besides Austenland.
THIS WAS A TERRIBLE PRODUCT. VERY STRITTY SMELL AND DID NOT WORK AT ALL. WOULD ONLY USE ON SKIN BEFORE GETTING OUT THE SHOWER. ALSO, IT MADE ME PERSIST BAKING BREADS SO THAT IS REALLY USELESS.

Bought this to get air into tires when traveling. However, I think they used cheap plastic that would not keep air from leaking out. One tire blew up within a few minutes. Both deflated by the time we got home. We returned them immediately. Don't waste your time.

I bought two sets. The first set had a problem with one of the earphones. After trying all kinds of tricks and tweaks on my iPod to make them work, I've decided it is not worth returning them. So, after much research, ordered another. This pair sounds fine. The problems are they fall out too easily from time to time. Sometimes when I have some weight in one ear, other times not. They also seem very thin and cheap. Not a whole lot here at $20 per pair.
Love this product! I drink a cup of tea in the morning with my husband and now we are enjoying our own teas! It came right away and seems to be very durable.
I haven't found a better one yet. It is easier to carry with you. Wish they made them for the iPad mini retina since most of us use this.
Just what my wife needed since she started using the Juiceman J8006. She loves it. Seems sturdy, even though it's plastic.

I think the story is good. The writing a little too simplistic and it could use some more descriptive paragraphs to help the reader visualize his surroundings. He does make an excellent protagonist. My biggest issue was with the first few chapters. Some things just don't fit in that timeline. Also, at first, his character seemed rather naive.

When her husband dies, she is left with nothing aside from debts from his large art collection. This is only the beginning for her. A new man arrives in town. His name is Matthew McCade. She has never met him, except by chance at work, but he comes along while she's working because his uncle owns the house.

This was a Christmas gift in December 2012. The only thing nice about it is the color but I really think its ugly looking. It doesn't match our kitchen at all although we have white furniture and appliances so it's not supposed to. It works fine from what I've read though so that's why 2 stars. My son who is an electrician recommended putting duct tape between it to help with electrical issues. We used for almost 6 months now and are looking into getting stainless steel.

I had ordered this item twice from Amazon. When it first came in, the box was a bit dented but not badly enough that we could tell what condition it was. However, when my dad opened he saw there were holes in it, so apparently somebody tried to remove it. We put batteries in. The mouse itself stopped working after about 5 minutes and then just went dead. It is VERY cheaply made. Not to mention now Amazon wont make things right with me or refund my shipping.
We never received this item. It was shipped one way, then sent via carrier pigeon. Very disappointed! Did not bother returning.

The author talks about her experiences at the age of 15 to 20 and is surprised that she wasn't sexually assaulted or beaten for daring to go by herself. To do so in this day in age? No. I'm not going through a time warp. My point here is an 18-year-old girl from Oklahoma was raped. For what reason? I feel like there must be some real deep reasons behind that. She also gives very weak examples where she says when people have been raped before they realized who did it.

If you like reading long books about nothing, with many characters whose story lines are so unrelated yet so intertwined and interactive, then you'll enjoy This Present Darkness. However, if youare looking for something more involving or realistic, avoid it.

It looks like they use a laser to set the color and that is about it. The white part of it has no depth or shine which makes it look cheap. They tried to make this "pretty" but there are better choices for the same price at Wally-World. You get what you pay for. For an inexpensive case I paid $3.00 with $4.95 shipping. You may want your moneys worth.
Just received this case in June 2009. By December, both latches already broke. As another reviewer mentioned, I'd say look elsewhere.

this product is good at keeping your hand from slipping into the hot pot but it seems a bit bulky also needs something between thumb and palm to keep fingers clear of the heat in handle. I ended up using silicon pads on both hands just for added protection with more absorbancy. This would be great if you cook over low heat. Other than that it served its purpose.

When this game came out, I think the reviews for it were pretty strong. We got a Wii in our family and started off with some games that we'd already played once or twice. My 5 year old son really wanted to play "bowling" with dad. He has always been fairly good at Wii games, but he was getting frustrated...the ball kept missing from his shot, etc. So, we tried out several of the other bowling games. This one is okay.
The ear loop fell apart.

Was not as well thought out or written as I had hoped. It was a waste of the money in my opinion. Could have been made better by leaving out all of the "filler" info. Would never purchase another book from them.

I tried using this on my MacBook Pro and while it appears to be functioning properly, every other program that uses the Apple Display Adapter simply does not recognize it. This may well only ever work with a Mac but if so, why is there no mention of that? Seems like common sense -- just let the adapter plug into the thunderbolt port and everything will work. So when buying it, you're taking chances in case you have an incompatible setup. Otherwise, good product, very cheaply made.

A little disappointed with this book. I ordered an MP3 version of the audio book and when it was downloaded on my computer my hearing aids don't work anymore. So now it's too late. They won't give me another one. :-(

I have been working on a system for over 5 years. These cables did not come close to meeting the required specs. The image was too fuzzy and full of lines. Do your research. Try another product. This is made in China. Look else where. You will be disappointed. And Amazon should remove this listing as it does not meet their standards.
Very short, and unimpressive. Seems a bit over written as well.

This book was horrible! The first chapter starts off good and has great charachter development. I thought the rest of the book would be like it. The second chapter is great. The characters in that one are well developed so it doesn't affect too much what happens around them. Then all of a sudden they decide to go to war with each other. And don't even get me started on why they were planning on going at all, except for the fact it's easy money. Just very un-likable.

This is my second purchase of this filter kit. It was easy to install and it has improved the air quality in our 2000 Jeep Grand Cherokee by 1000+ percent. I had just bought a new car so we have been using that too. I can definitely see a difference going from having less than clean fresh air. We are very happy with these filters.

I didn't finish this book as it was a little too much like what I'm afraid of, something that really happened on the show. The main characters are extremely likeable and the story is very well written.

this item did not work. i put batteries in the light and tested it on several different type of batteries. they all lit up but one was dead even though my remote sensor indicated a full charge. no matter which battery or what brand i used, the unit would not light. it cost me $11.00 to ship back something that should only be $4.00 in cost. lesson learned for me. hopefully others here have had better luck.

I read the first two books, and then gave up on them. A second one, with the same author, had me even more frustrated, until finally giving up, as well. No character growth, little to no world building, not really an interesting premise. And while other books have this problem (I'm thinking specifically of The Name of the Wind, but it's been a while, so maybe not), none of them ever become bad or boring, just very boring because nothing happens. Not my cup of tea.

The product looked great at the beginning and it made a terrible noise as soon as I tried to use it. I've only used it maybe 6 times total. Now when using it, it's actually spitting out water... It sucks. If you like wasting your money buy this!! DO NOT BUY! You will be dissapointed too soon.
This should be more than an $18 speaker system. You will waste time and money.

This worked well for about 4 months. I have only had to re-charge it twice... but now the charging light goes out every time they are charged. Bummer, and disappointing. If this unit would actually hold a charge, I'd give them 5 stars, as they seem like great headphones. But given that you can't simply put new headphones on these when they need recharging, not really worthwhile. They do still sound good, and work just fine if their ability to be charged is worth more than that.
This product wasn't what we thought in color or style. Will give to our young son he is looking for those type of costumes on Halloween. Thanks again,fast shipping nice product.
not very warm - but it's small and cute so I'm satisfied.

i tried the product on a few different phones (samsung) and it's difficult to get the shield clean enough so no bubbles. In order not to, you just have to deal with lots of air bubbles that get caught when installing shield. It was frustrating because there were many streaks left after cleaning the screen. They did give me 2 protectors but I gave them away to another one due to their inability to clear lint with included cloth.

It's really hard to find good looking aprons for girls that aren't 'cheesy'. The fit is perfect, and I know my niece will LOVE it. HOWEVER, there was a small tear when we took it out of the packaging. I'm not sure if this had anything to do with shipping, or not. Either way, it'll get tossed as soon as she washes it, no big deal though. She can use hers like any other.

I love the color and thought this would be perfect. It is too small for one person and my son doesn't feel comfortable in his chair at all. We haven't tried to wash it yet, but I'm not sure if we will.... If you have room in your kitchen for a chair, then look elsewhere. Don't even bother with this, unless you're an elephant. The seat cushion feels more like plastic than rubber, so you should expect that. It's fine though, it's made of really good quality.

What can you say about this product. It did feel good when it was new and in a perfect place after surgery but now its just sticky to put on. You do get two protectors so thats nice. When applying make sure your screen is clean. If there isn't any dust or lint then its too much.

This product was not the best. At night my dog just didn't like it as I could smell his urine. For me after having an underbed system for years and wanting to try a pet version (have yet had one) this does not work at all. If your looking for odor control buy "litter master litter" its cheap works great with very little odor. The "large" pellets that come in it are more expensive then buying fresh pellets.
These cookies make you feel as if you're eating something sweet.

I don't have this phone set myself but was recommended it to my sister. When she received it, we looked through the instruction book in a few minutes and thought it seemed easy enough. We also compared some numbers on caller IDs that are programmed into our phones. We found out those number were not in our cell phones? We did ask her about these two factors regarding our cellphones as you can only see what is reflected if you open 2 or more pages.

The case and belt clip are not that great. As a result, its been dropped once in over two years of ownership. That should tell you something about the quality. There is no protection for any part on my phone. If there were this thing could be used as an "elite" type protective case. Too bad, really disappointed. Get something better like OtterBox instead. Its just easier.

this book is one chapter per chapter. and it says each chapter.its only 10 pages long. don't buy! waste of money. i want my dollar back amazon! if you can't get any better than this! shame on you! no wonder the price is so low! it sucks so much.
My husband got this and another type from another vendor to use with some chocolate filled chocolates I made before Easter. It worked really well.
While a good read, it did have numerous mistakes I found to be distracting. One of the more glaring errors was where they use either "there's" or you're instead when referring to person and place.

This didn't work for my Dell inspiron 1525. I found the instructions a bit confusing, but maybe just because they were translated from another language and have no english label. As far as the keyboard itself, it was okay. When typing fast you notice that there is an echo, or buzz, when typing. And this can last up to one hour. It seems like something would be built in for this...I probably won't buy this product again.
The concept of these shelves is nice. They are flexible and can adjust easily as desired based upon my needs. Problem is, the welds that connect both ends are weak.
Love it. Great bag, works very well not difficult at all. My daughter loved it!! Very sturdy and came promptly.

I bought this book with some high expectations. After being a fan of the series for several months now, my expectations were high. However, although I feel that they got to be too high, these books are much darker than in earlier ones (I think it was about the fifth book, "Midnight Riot") and that's hard because as others have mentioned there is nothing funny here... Well, just read the first pages, it's all dark already. It really gives you idea how dark this new one will be.

I wanted some kind of light and portable speaker for my iphone to use in the shower. This seems perfect, but it does not work. The unit lights up, plays music, etc. But there is no suction or pressure on either unit, so water simply drains out as soon as air bubbles get into it. If you put a small bubble under it, then push any part of your finger gently against a portion of these tiny bubbles, you'll hear nothing. Really disappointed. Would have been really useful if only one worked.

Great product that seems well built and looks to hold up really well. I was hoping this would eliminate the ugly shower hose clutter in my shower/tub, but it does not. Still, a great buy given its performance - no leaks or problems, easily assembled, looks nice, sturdy, good price. If you're looking for something decorative, you may not want this, but if you're putting any real strength behind your shower, it's worth every penny.

I was very excited to get this, it looked so much more impressive than many similar products. When my parents and i got it, the box it came in looked like it had already been opened, all of the wires were undone, there wasn't plastic or anything with a place for screws but only the metal. All that is not really important, since its working and all, But when you screw on 4 screws, one by one. The bolts don't thread through them, they are just straight through.

This was a really fun little book! I enjoyed reading it, and it is quite unique for its kind of story. Not only was Ms. Roberts able to draw the reader in, but she used her characters' voices in such an honest way, especially Julie’s, that you wanted more from them. You also felt like this read could've been a short story had not enough time passed between scenes.
I thought this was going to be fun but it is very boring. After buying it, my daughter and i spent 30 minutes just playing it. Save your money folks!!
Great product, with only one con - Windows 8 has yet to recognize them as an available device.
My wife bought the smaller one, which is quite small, because it just seemed more portable.

It's very well constructed, especially considering how low price. If you need a case with all your phone needs, this really fits the bill. You should get one ASAP! Good product! :) Fast shipment! Highly recommend to other buyers! :)

This was the cheapest looking thing that I have purchased on Amazon, and then got one of those "item may not be new" type emails to say it. The paint in most areas has a flaw or an area where it looks like someone spilled something on it, which they did by running their gloved hands over it. Then there is almost no room so my kindle barely fits. You are supposed to slide your Kindle into these slots but you can't do any other way unless its sideways.

This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old granddaughter. She is fascinated by the solar system, planets and the moon. We all were enthralled with it. Although our daughter wanted to spend hours upon hours, she needed help in reading along until she could understand everything. The quality of this item seems very good as well. My granddaughter said we would enjoy it again if we had more time. Definitely recommended! You may also consider a starter kit! Great product at an excellent price.   Rating: 4.

Great product! I love the quality look and it fits my phone perfectly. My only drawback to this item is that you have to use a screwdriver or whatever else you can find to open up your case. If not for this feature I'd give 5 stars. But other than that, it's awesome! Thanks! The pen is cute as well.

The book was informative and very easy reading as all the other books written by this author. If you are considering starting your own business, go ahead with these books,or any of his others they will give good information. Mark

I don't need any help getting my brain juices flowing, with or without another person doing it. Why else would someone write me about it? If I'm thinking of buying it, it's because other people also purchased it and like it.

I enjoyed the writing style and storyline but felt like it was a short story in itself. Didn't really get caught up with much of anything except her being at this bar or doing that. She wasn't that likeable, she needed more depth. Overall okay if you never read it, just my opinion not to be taken literally, I know many other people love it and feel it's very good, some are even 5 stars. Just not me.

I have purchased this product before and it tasted fine, however, the last two times, something was not quite right. And sure enough, my third container also left an awful metallic taste behind it. I gave one bottle to a friend who had similar problems, then decided that we should throw them out. That is what I did. Too bad because they are good tasting.
i bought this item about three weeks ago and its terrible. only worked half time without any problem.

The maps look really cheap in color. Don't know if they are supposed to, since this was not clear from the picture, but after looking through them once, all the colors looked pretty much washed out, even on my PC monitor.

Don't waste your money on this garbage. I could have made a better video myself, from youtube, and deleted the "funny" part. There is absolutely no story, acting, plot or point to this. It actually seems like half of these people are trying too hard for laughs even though there really isn't any. The special effects would look good if they were hand drawn, by someone with an actual art degree, not computer generated. This movie had more potential than it ever realized.

I love this author's first book A Little Bad Magic and this one was a disappointment. The heroine is almost unlikable for the way she handles situations. There were many times when it felt as if everyone around her knew what to expect because they had met her before. How can we forget that in all of their meetings with other witches everything seems perfectly normal except not for her. It always seemed like she deserved whatever trouble came into the next room. She never learned how to take care of herself.
For what it is it's pretty good.

What the heck is up with this cd? I know they can do much better. Is it just me or am I missing something? This album sounds like a lot of other artists (well, most bands nowadays) trying to be Incubus. Not that it's not good. But, come on. It's the sound and songwriting style as good as, if not better than, incubus, at least, compared to say some others.
The device worked great for two days. Then the screen went blank and I could not see anything on it. Returned it immediately! Too much hassle!!
The mic works great after a little adjusting. It only comes ready to use on one side but the sound quality is great.

i just received my new kindle fire hd and it came with a defective battery,the battery has been in there an very bad charge all this while,and they shipped me another one so ill wait for that one to come in,because as of now,the battery is working correctly.
It just works with no problem. No fuss, no muss. I've tried a couple of other versions before and this one is the only one I would recommend.

I was very excited about this product. The look and the reviews seemed promising. Well maybe I'm expecting much more from a $45 item. But it doesn't work in my home at all. My TV is only 11 feet away, but even so it works pretty poorly. I've also tried moving it, using different locations, changing channels, etc., and nothing helps. So it's definitely not because of interference with other electronics. Definitely returning it. One word sums it... GARBAGE.

I've bought this for several of my dogs. They don't like the taste in any form. I have also heard a lot of good reviews about these. It turns out to be best when mixed with their food. Just doesn't work too well when given by mouth. Dogs still won't lick it even with small amounts that they can eat without difficulty.

My 9 month old German Shepherd loves her kongs. The only problem, they are very noisy when you shake or bang it on hard surfaces. I've used some other toys like this but she goes nuts over these. Just wish Kong would make them quieter since she's chewing off pieces all night..... lol....

A couple hours after plugging in this, our laptop began making a vibrating noise and would shut off if we touched anything on the cord. The only thing worse is that my 3 year old was trying to clean up around this for no apparent reason, but of course, he's being very careful like he should be. If all you're looking for out of a power cord-breaker is aesthetics, I can say I'd get it. But at such low amperage, it's useless.
Love this product. I can cut it and mix with my favorite drink or give a portion to the dogs for chewing

I don't mind this movie, as most action movies are the same from then on. But I feel a little ripped off with how short it was, and didn't even have all of it's own chapters. It was one long scene that goes back to each character. The story seems really weak, especially if your talking about these guys who were big enough in season 1 just playing their part. This is only part 2 in what should be more.

I used the Canon printer because my local supply house didn't have a black cartridge in stock so i ordered this through Amazon. The package contained six cartridges but only 3 would work and they were all for some kind of an older printer. So I'm out $15 dollars to get what should be working in new printers at about half full toner. Now since it's going back i'm sure I'll lose money on shipping too even thought its just packaging. Lesson learned. Next time I'll pay retail anywhere or buy direct.
I'm a long time Zagg user - I've used their stuff before with great results (not an issue with Amazon products, however). As others have mentioned, they are very hard to apply properly.

this is very good. I am a big fan of the old shows and it brings me some good memories. thanks Amazon for helping to maintain my childhood on prime time. no complaints from me...just love the classic show..:) :-) :)
My son had a very hard time getting through this.

I love it for long flights, the sound is great, it's very durable, and a good price. If your on the move alot like we go to Disneyland every year. GET ONE! You will not be disappointed, with this little gem.

There are two things I'd like to know: 1) is this product really any different from the one I got a few years ago, when it was in it's heyday? 2) does anyone else wonder why no manufacturer seems able to come up with something that lasts more than 2 years?To answer #1, yes & no.

The product was defective, and did not work upon receipt of it. This is very poor business to say the least, it makes me think you are putting a good word on your product. I will never buy from this company again simply out of spite. Please have my money returned. Thank you.

The first three books, all were well done. This is terrible. First of all, it seems like it's half done and then never finished. Second, they talk about sex in every room. There are no plot points that move the story forward.

The movie is great. Just don't like that I can now buy it in Blu-Ray, only regular DVDs! Not very efficient. I'm not sure why. This movie arrived quickly, and no problems at all with it. Thanks!It's a great movie! :-D

This book is not for everyone, although most will love the plot. For me, it has too much violence, rape, and other things that just did not seem like a fun idea to me. It is very loud and makes it difficult to hear the music. It's not good for running. I would have sent it back but unfortunately my son broke it. I just threw away the box when he got home. He liked it, though. If you are looking at buying one, i dont recommend getting this. Find something a little bit louder. This one will drive u crazy without music going on so often. Save your money. this was a waist of money. the charger does not work at all with these batteries. it will have to go into my drawer. i am very dissapointed in this. and now i'm wondering why they didn't make them work... :(

I have been using this card every day for months. Everything worked fine until the other day. Now, my CF reader can not read any of it. For three years I've used lexar but it finally gave up. I'm sending in a warranty claim today. Lexar's website says that only 90 days are covered by their warrantly. They also do mention to call them once you find out if there is an issue with your device. Well now they know what will happen next.

I bought this with the hope of being able to charge my Nexus 5 and iPad3 at the same time. The plug fits, but does not provide the right amount of power or amperage for both devices. So it was a complete waste of money. I'm returning it. My kids still have chargers from those old "computer only" days that cost about $2 each, which is what i am paying now. Not worth it! Get something better please.

The author is the founder of an organization called Peace Action, and I thought this was going to be more about a specific approach or how he got in contact with various people around the world who might become engaged by these practices. This book is not about making money so much as it is a whodunit. It is poorly written, boring, and just plain dull. I finished the book, but only because I kept thinking something would happen to get me interested. If you are looking for some good, realistic advice on business, read "Rich Dad, Poor Dad," instead. The difference in those books was night and day. I'm embarrassed by this book. It's really too bad. Mr.

One of the reasons I loved this author is that she writes stories with strong and sexy leads. These are two women who meet on a plane to Japan in 1989 where it turns out they grew up together. In 1992 they meet again years later. They were both married at home but had only seen each other once or twice before that. i was looking for a replacement cover for my cell phone and ordered this one, it looks nice but the color fades from day 1 - very disappointed..

I bought this to run my ipod while cycling (something I'd only had experience with doing in ear headphones). It worked for two months and then died. No display would come on. Great color, fits well and does not slip off! Can easily access all features. Love the pockets on cover for accessories.

The first one I ordered only worked for 3 minutes and quit. Replaced it with one from a different company that has more wattage, which worked. Very disappointed as my cat spends his days getting fresh air. A real waste of money. Do Not Buy!

Well, I received this product as a gift from my mom and tried to plug it into my computer and nothing. The green light comes on but does not connect! So disappointed!!! And now it's Christmas morning so no way I'm returning it!!!!
This guide has great information, especially as related to restaurants etc.

It sounded like it would be interesting, but was not. The book starts with a murder at an old friends house just as a new friend turns up one day. I did not like the book. It was very boring. The character were undeveloped. The storyline just seems to have gone on and on.

I bought this book looking for some help in building a business around the blog. While it had all of that information available at a cheaper price point, there is one thing missing from each chapter. There were several other errors and omissions, but they are minor compared to this. All that aside, you can learn more about basic concepts without buying an expensive book. You do have better alternatives than this, such as my own blog, http://www.mybusinessblog.com/, or your employer's site, http://www.www.biz.

I'm a hardcore horror film fan, and I can admit that sometimes there are bad movies. But, in the middle of his career Carpenter must have decided to make movies to put everyone out for slaughter. While some may say this was intentional, it certainly wasn't. This movie is really nothing more than a rehash of HALLOWEEN III. It even uses footage from Halloween II as its basis (the black girl driving back through those doors on halloween III) yet that's it.
Perfect fit! Works fine. No issues using it. Don't know why you need so many words about a product - nothing more should be said.

To begin with, let me say that as both an attorney practicing civil litigation against the RIAA and the MPAA, AND as a student of law, I find such actions by copyright owners grossly unprofessional, offensive, and, yes, hypocritical.

Just not well made at all. If the company can offer replacement parts, even for their flimsy plastic parts - that would be awesome. I returned this because it did not fit right, and was very flimsy plastic. I'm a bigger guy, so being light was definitely more important than sturdiness of this chair. Not impressed. It is going back as I don't want to pay another $40 shipping plus $22 return on it. Guess you get what u pay for! :(

This battery worked fine in a year or so, but it now will not hold enough charge for more than one hour of run time. Not happy about this purchase. The company should consider some type of quality control process. It really makes you ask if you are ever going to get even 1/2 an hour's use out if it. I do expect my batteries of any kind to last longer than that. Amazon did send me two (2) extra battery's, so that is somewhat appreciated.

This product was received on time, but didn't work. No instructions, no online support, and I spent a lot of time fooling around with it so there is no way to figure out how it's supposed to work. The software that comes bundled in the unit makes little sense and the directions say exactly nothing about how this thing does or doesn't work at all. If you want an item that does, you'll have great trouble finding it.
This AC Adapter+cord is nothing but junk.

Don't waste your money. This device will not last in the real world. I bought one to keep at my desk. By using it as an extension cord-- both plugged into wall and usb--I get less then 30 minutes of power before it is too hot to touch. A total fail.

A funny movie. It's one of the most overlooked movies. I enjoyed it because it's fun comedy which makes you laugh and isn't too heavy. My daughter loved it. One of her favorites. Good clean family entertainment with a lot of humor to recommend it. And of course Tom Hanks is spectacular! You can't go wrong owning this film. It was shipped as promised in great condition. All very pleased! Have no fear. Enjoy it! =)

I like the color, love the feel. However, if you are on your hands and knees looking for a mouse, this is not it. They just don't make them well enough to keep moving my mouse with one hand up while grabbing another to type!
The plot was very interesting but the writer missed a chance to make things more entertaining. It took me 2 days to read it, not because i didn't want to.

It charges the phone like it's supposed to. It's great to keep in your car so you don't have run out battery but that takes up space. It also serves as a flashlight. Very bright light... perfect for emergency situations. Only thing is...sometimes when plugging into charger or charging on phone, it'll shut off while you're taking pictures. Nothing has happened yet however.

My husband loves these, when he gets home from work or on his way back after working at night he's already eaten 2 bars before dinner. He loves having something with less calories than most but still satisfying.

We bought these binoculars after we returned an old set of Bushnell binoculars that were a nightmare. They have no focus, they are difficult to focus and don't have very well focused lenses. And the image is so fuzzy or fuzzier than what comes through my pair of non-digital binoculars! I am VERY disappointed and have even more reason now to regret buying them. If you don't mind blurry images, then go ahead buy these. Otherwise, pass on these.
The power plug fell out within 30 days of purchase with light use. It won't stay in. Had to buy replacement.

I cannot believe the way they market these "brush". The handle is not removable! Even my 12 year old son said it was a little odd. This product needs to go back to the drawing board guys. The bristles on the brush are VERY SOFT. As we had trouble holding up the small bottle of water for about 30 seconds, there you go! We both got quite sunburn. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I'm sure you're better than this.

The description says this will work with the new Toshiba Laptop, but that is not true. I plugged in and was instantly bombarded with a message on screen which read that it does NOT recognize equipment when connected. After talking to Toshiba, and being directed to return, or maybe try another USB drive, there went that idea. If you are looking for an external drive of good quality, do yourself a favor and search elsewhere.
These were too thin to be useful at all. Not worth it unless you like wearing underwear. Oh well...better luck next time. :(
The charger is nice for this price. it worked perfectly fine and lasted me longer than the original charger. Just dont move or touch it too much.

It's my first one of these and it seems to work well on a few different things. One thing I would like is some sort storage space in the base so you can keep your screwdrivers organized. Otherwise I'm pleased with it.

At it's best, this book should give you a bit of information on how the process of writing novels is actually done. But that isn't really what this is. As others have stated, they only give lists and descriptions about certain aspects (characters, situations, etc.). And I guess if you're looking for that, it might be good, but not a whole lot more. If that's all you need, then good. Otherwise, better books exist for that. This one was too basic as far as info goes.
Great price and fits my laptop perfectly. The only thing I don't care for is there is no pouch to hold the power cord. However, that's a minor issue.
These speakers are awful.

I was rather disappointed with this book that promised to offer a true account of the real life adventure of one courageous pilot in the Spanish Civil War. While written very well and quite interesting, it does seem at times like an essay which reads more like history than fiction. The author apparently decided after finishing the manuscript (which includes photographs from his personal collection) about half way through writing it, that he would create a story around it.

I was really hoping that this book would show me more in depth about the author's life and career, but it only touches on some topics. It just left me feeling rather flat after reading it. She talks a lot of talk when really she never does much. It's nice to read about her work at first with all the interviews, etc. But then as you move into the last chapters you're not quite sure how much research she's done.

I have a very picky 2 year old who has been diagnosed with Autism. She was recently put on meds for her disorder, and because she loves to push things across the floor, I decided it would be nice if we could use this type of toy while playing together but with an educational value as well. Well when we opened it, my daughter immediately grabbed it.

This is not the same as what I had in a home school classroom, and should have been described that way. But it was needed for our Sunday School class so there were NO complaints. We just used different words than we would today. The service came very fast at no extra charge.

I would put the worst book in that category ever written, but after reading this one, I've decided to not use it as a reference. First of all, it's very poorly written. It is so badly worded that at one point you don't even get the first part and end up skipping half way through it. The information covered can be gotten for free on the internet.

This is the only book that I haven't finished. It took me too long to read it. The story had potential but it was too hard to follow. Some of his characters weren't developed enough and some were quite unbelievable. There are also a lot of typos in every book. If you're interested in, "A great life for nothing" style read, then this one will suffice. Otherwise, don't waste your time. Even though it's free, I would not recommend.

I have not seen much of the new movie in many years. However, like most people, I've read about some parts of it. This latest version that I've viewed was pretty good. Although it contains a few factual problems, such as using an old Japanese naval unit called the "Yamato" under Admiral Yamamoto, there is quite clearly the modern character and events portrayed. So, on that matter one can still get away with some exaggerations.

This item is not as described in the product description and did NOT work for me. I used it according to instructions that was included. It may have been intended for someone else but not on me! I think it caused a reaction. Did get refund so no worries there. Hope this helps.

This is my fourth chopper from Hamilton Beach, I have two because they last so long an one that we keep at our second home. They are not as big or bulky as some others but perform well and clean very easily. Well worth the price.

I purchased this book on my kindle when it was available. The price made me skeptical... but like always there are people who just know what they want. Well, you won't need to worry about buying this piece of garbage. It may have been written by the author but, alas, not only did he write it, it's pretty boring as well. There's nothing new or interesting here that hasn't already been covered a million times around the campfire and in hundreds (if not) of other books for sale.
This product didn't perform very well at all: The sound quality has been distorted so badly (and only when music does not play loudly), it makes this speaker like a toy with its distortion.

My dog won't use them... They are so hard and not at all worth the cost.... I would never purchase this brand again. It did ship quickly though. Oh well. I will give them to somebody who has a small dog. Very disappointed!

I am not happy with these and will return them they have been used. There are a lot of finger prints all through the book which looks very nasty. This might sound petty. It actually isn't! The quality was good however you could see where pages were pulled back in when it had been written on by the previous owner. They looked bad. We just put the whole unit outside for now until we get rid ofthis horrible book. Very disappointed!!Thank You

We have a very nice kitchen and wanted to do some minor touch-ups under the cabinets that would not cost much. This item only lasted about two weeks before it broke completely apart near where you hold it. Very cheaply made for sure. Not sure how they can justify such cheap stuff from China. Spend your $24 somewhere else if you're looking.

Very low quality and poor workmanship. The metal has lots of rough spots, some spots show rust. It does not fit into the light fixture well. All is fine until you try to install it, then it doesn't fit. There was not any type of instructions with the lamp including a diagram. I would advise paying more money for something better made. I have returned my product and intend on purchasing another from another supplier.

I haven't done any serious studying for my exam. This will be the first time I've ever sat at a exam after watching a TV show and looking all over this book before I go into each section, trying to find anything. I can almost get through it...

It's great for some things but I was looking forward to this book and the first recipe gave me a rash. The author suggests you take an onion with one teaspoon of baking soda, sprinkle it on the food (I use instant oatmeal), place in oven (instructions indicate 350 degrees) at 200 degrees for 1 1/2 hours. What happens when that stuff touches your skin? My tongue turned raw and red, now I'm not eating onions.

This product is great. A little slow getting use to setting up, but works well so far...Have had no problems with the product. Would recommend this printer for everyone. We are a print home company.
