I would buy this again if needed. Not bad looking either. Good Buy. Just wish we could hook up fax and copier too!!!

This is a horrible book. The first chapter about the family and farm was good. From there on it just went downhill. I could really tell by page 10 that this would be a true story from what it's like. He was very self absorbed. To top it off he talked so slow you had to read whole sentences over again in order to understand them. Save your money this isn't worth it. I gave mine away cause someone else thought it might give them insight into my life.
So disappointing. I've never written anything negative about what she's written, until now. The character of Anna is completely unlikeable. She's shallow and selfish as can be.

The product says that this will fit the HTC Inspire 4G and it doesn't. No clue how they are even selling this. But it's not worth anything trying to return it. So now I have a useless part of my own fault for buying cheap stuff. Just be prepared to try your phone several times before you can actually get something out of these. They were so cheap, we can't just trash them. A waste of money. Very disappointed.

These are very poor quality for as expensive as they are. Even at this price point you would expect to find better construction. The screws were completely stripped by both ends within 10 minutes of installing these.

I just recently moved from my home state of California to the east coast and have been looking back at movies of mine that i had forgotten or not seen. This is definitely one such movie. Im sorry it only made a few dollars when it came out in 1981, but its worth picking up now so all those people who want classics on DVD should know this was released in 1981.

I love the way this book is laid out and read. However, to be very honest, these "lessons" are all rather shallow. As a Christian, as many other reviewers have stated, it might really interest just Christians who already believe/practice what they were told, as opposed to someone like myself with no religious background. It really doesn't give you something new that's meaningful.

Ok this movie was ok. I wish that it weren't so drawn out and wasn't just the same thing over again. Don't get me wrong, we all know everything is not quite fair for the man she chooses....but come on! She never did anything to give her child any other chance of life! They should have put more emphasis on his side instead of trying to make a better life for him in America! Save your money unless you can't see past it.

This is a great product, but when the box arrived it was half open on both ends. I didn't think anything of it, kept it,and gave it to my son for Christmas, only problem all he did with it was change out his battery, and now every once in awhile he'll hear this really loud noise coming from it. I can't get anyone at customer service/company respond back because it's Friday now.
It looks like they never got around to fixing this one. Apparently it's not an uncommon problem because other photographers have reported this.

The title says all. If you love hazelnuts. Go this brand. It's always been difficult to find locally as they have become expensive over time. These seem equal or probably better than any other brand I've tried. So glad Amazon carries this.

I was really disappointed, especially considering how much I paid for it. There are barely any pages and there isn't a single recipe. Just random thoughts. It is not what we were looking for. And I'm also shocked to find that it says you must only use organic ingredients. Well, who knew? How on earth do they get around the fact the animals have to be killed?!? Not cool... don't buy this book. Very disappointing.
This isn't anything like Fifty Shades. If you're expecting that you'll be disappointed.
Perfect for cleaning antique furniture. Easy directions make easy work of removing stains. No scrubbing or scratching surface is needed. Recommend highly.

Ordered this after I realized I could not find my original cord. After reading reviews (thankfully many more then mine) about how cheap their products are made - guess what?! These aren't even close anymore.

In the beginning of the book where he talks about his childhood, I was like...is this guy serious? After reading what happened to him at school, I'm really glad that I don't live in a school like that. If you want my advice read something else, if not, don't read.

I love both of these movies. This is my favorite movie, so I've watched it over and over. In this version, the plot doesn't flow as well, nor do we get to know all that comes with being a witch. But what are you going to do? It's not Shakespeare anyway! The acting in the beginning parts was really terrible, but it's gotten better as their characters develop.

I'm disappointed with this one. I really enjoyed her other books. This one seems disjointed and just doesn't go anywhere. At least the plot itself is interesting. I'd rather read a book in which she explores the human psyche. It's so easy to tell us something interesting about what makes people tick that it's very difficult for me at times to get engaged or invested in the characters. There's too much repetition of character actions - they say exactly the thing we're expecting them to do then act totally different.

I am 5'8" about 145 lbs...so this dress has no support whatsoever, especially below where you knees...the fabric does NOT give enough to wear with shoes on, let alone boots....it's like a mini mini-skirt but in length at best.

This product had great reviews before I bought it, but it didn't seem to live up to the hype. There was no difference in using this with or without it. It took 2 months for me and my mom who has arthritis pain while trying to get rid of some bad knee pains after knee replacement surgery and she never noticed any difference. Not sure if I'm wasting $20 a month on an ineffective product. Maybe will try one other product, maybe not. Don't waste your money.
It looks nice.
Interesting book. A bit too much for me, though. The authors spend an excessive amount of time talking about their philosophical views.

Excellent product! I am going outside the box by purchasing this product and saving money. The performance of these batteries far exceed their cost as they seem to last longer! It is very nice having a backup set in my tool bags and at no additional charge.

I loved this book, then again and still do. Unfortunately the writing has been edited down to something like a low grade Harlequin romance. It's too bad, because it's an interesting look into what it was really like. My favorite character is Captain of the Guard Major General John Bell Hood. He made America great not only during his lifetime, but after. But now he sits in one of FDR's White House offices, surrounded by papers on many topics including who stole what from whom. A real American hero.

I was intrigued by the title as a fan of science fiction and paranormal romance. There were not many reviews when this one came out or it would never have been read. Well now that I've read it I know why. The writing style is extremely amateurish with grammatical errors almost every page. Dialogue seems to be written with little thought put into it, sometimes it even doesn't make sense. Everything felt like it had been slapped together very quickly without any real thought.

i love a good fantasy story and all but this book has some of the most boring writing i've come across! first off when she is being attacked why doesn't any one get up from his seat so that he can kill her not call for help as if we know what's going to happen at the end.
What i expected is that you could use any size glass with this.

I've had one for about a month or two, which was fine. I plugged it in and started using it. It worked fine the first few times, but then two days later my drive stopped working. When pressing the connect, no response. The light on the hub is blinking, indicating something isn't quite right with it. It's not worth returning since shipping would be as much to send it back (or replace it) as it's worth. I'm sticking with another product.

Very poor quality product...didn't like it. It looked cheap and not as it shows in the picture. I would have returned it but i threw away all packaging. The description did NOT state that you could use a cover of this brand. The cover is extremely thin & doesn't even lay flat on my bed. Would NEVER buy again. There are better covers than this, go with real silk sheets instead. Don't waste your time or money.
While some of the concepts and stories are helpful in setting boundaries, others rely on old ideas, with terrible results. Not a good read.
Purchased this item in April 2013. By June all 10 items were broken. Very flimsy construction. Had two weeks before broke. Would not recommend.

This book has great pictures and interesting text about the different types of houses found by this author. I bought it for my 11 year old daughter who loves to dig treasure maps out. There was only 1 house that caught her eye. She wasn't very excited when she read it. Don't waste your money. You will be disappointed. Check out other books before buying this..

The first book was ok and kept me interested enough to keep reading. This latest one has really disappointed me!! Just boring! Where is the action that I loved so much?! It could have been a good story if there had actually been any action!!! Very disappointed.

I only give this product two stars because of the way they packaged them. The plastic on every SINGLE one was cracked and several were broken before being received. This is for a birthday party so it's just too bad that it looks cheap. Otherwise the plates are very pretty and my granddaughter will love them since she loves pink. But I'll be sending some to her home in South Carolina (she's 3) and hope for better packaging!

I would have given this a more comprehensive review of my experience if the item had been sent to me. It's going back on Monday. After searching all over Amazon for a similar item with no luck and not wanting to receive another cheap China product that I'm certain won't last or work when you really need it, I decided I could make do without this device. Instead I'll be buying a new one. This one certainly looked like it was well built but how often is that true these days.
My mom had mentioned liking this book since she heard about it. When we finally got around to reading it, there really wasn't much there.

I purchased one for my mother a little over a year ago. The first one died after 3 months. It was used 3-4 times each time it worked then went into eternal hibernate mode, no matter what you did. After about the 5th use that got even worse, and we had to power cycle it constantly. Now it has completely died. What a piece of junk. If you're looking to get an MP3 player, spend half as much money on something that'll die in less than 2 years! 
 Rating: 1.

The premise is great. It gives a great idea and gets the reader interested. However, there are many flaws that make it difficult to finish. There were problems with editing, punctuation errors, etc. For me, they made this book hard for me to enjoy. While reading I had issues believing characters actions. One example was when one character does something totally contrary to their beliefs and beliefs.

If you are looking for a guide of which parks to go to, and what sights exist within those parks...this book is NOT the one. This so-called "travel guide" does not actually help in any practical way. The writing style makes it seem as if she has some kind of axe to grind with a lot of these places, but that hardly seems like it's even close at all.
Ordered my rotor on August 18th 2014.

Didn't really hold my interest at all. Too contrived in my opinion. I'm a fan of most all books that have been written by Nora Roberts. I don't mind cliff hangers - but after reading one like this--well let's just say it was an unsatisfactory ending. The only thing redeeming about this, is the love between Bella and Edward. That's more of her usual writing.

You don't really get a sense of the main character's personality. Very easy read. Would have liked more substance to it. Overall very predictable ending but I like her style so give it a try. Not my favorite by far.
I'm pleased with these pans.

The book is a good read if you are in high school. For me the subject was boring at times and I had to look up different words. Would have enjoyed more details about a girl being put through some things when she couldn't get out of her own way. I wish that it would be an easy reading. Also this girl should not ever have gotten involved with people like herself. Not very happy with this book, but hopefully there will come others before she does end up.
All but 3 flavors were nasty!! The only good part about these are the fact they do NOT contain any artificial sweetens. But other than that, it's gross.

While this book gives an outline of how to learn the basics and make changes in your life, it does not give practical guidance on making these changes. This is basically a pep talk for anyone with delusions regarding their spiritual path, but would be more useful for people who have just read about meditation or something similar. I found myself wondering why I'd bought this, as most suggestions were only general advice based on reading someone else. If you're into that sort of thing, go ahead, buy it, it's free, I'll take it.

I got this little machine to use on a job where it could get plugged in more than once or twice and have enough juice left over that the next time it would be able do everything we needed it to. The charger itself is quite well built and heavy. It has two charging points (A at A with a red light indicating charging) plus an outlet for your car battery/ alternator connection if you decide to run it off that.

This thing is garbage. It worked for a few days but then it never came back on again. I have tried plugging everything in again and unplugging, resetting everything, checking all the cable connections to no avail...still nothing. I called tech support who said there would be an hour wait. In reality you need maybe 15 minutes if that. I've only had this less than 6 months with one person using it.

I couldn't find the size anywhere and they don't come in half sizes. My shoe size is 6.5 1/2 US but because that's a one to a line I'm now trying 9. Still not big enough so I'm sending them back :( Not worth paying that much if you can't get it exactly right on your first try. Really bummed! These seemed like they'd been made really well... But sadly they're not. The length was okay.. The style looked cute..

It was good first two to three chapters. But then it seemed someone cut and paste the pages around a bit without even making any sense or editing it properly. Don't buy it. Spend your money on another book at least you could read it cover page through before this one is so displeasing...

This thing was a complete waste of money, and I am not even an "audiophile". It didn't take long to see that the quality is horrible for this price. My headphones are better than this. The sound sounds distorted all the time. I've never seen such poor volume with my portable speakers, let me tell you, they may have been cheap, but it does make you question paying $40 or $50 dollars for it...

It was too short. The description of what she did with the characters in the beginning sounded so enticing that I had to get it cause everyone loved it, and then its like 1 chapter long, not even sure why a short story needs to be this small. You never hear about who her husband is or what he did for her, just how he treated her. Its very hard to read because she has no character, doesnt show any emotion except when they have sex over and over.
Bought this for Fuji Finepix S9100 -- works great. Also allows to charge the battery in an external device. This unit came from China so expect it takes awhile.

I am sorry that Mr. King had to spend his time and write this book for money on it. The first half was ok, but the second half, although a continuation of Odd Thomas, left me more disappointed with a story than anything. There were too many characters, especially minor ones, like Sookie Stackhouse. He also spent an inordinate amount of pages giving other people's POV (ie. Sam/Billy/Angel), instead making any important character's point as well as describing scenes going without dialogue.

I have been reading books on the Holocaust from one or two people each week. Usually about 20-40 are published by different publishers annually. The other thing of note is that it takes a great deal of time & effort to do this, and only those who actually care enough in their lives for it. And so this book which cost me over $200 at my local bookstore, was what we decided would be most appropriate.

At first glance, it seems like a good product - has all 3 outputs including an input jack. And at $13, it's definitely worth buying. In fact, you get way more value in that $10 than if you'd buy similar products with single outputs.

The product arrived on the time they said that it would, all were included as promised, it was a great price, and we have been enjoying them. We received an additional pair of glasses with our purchase, and I am very happy with my purchase. Thank you once again Amazon. Very Happy.

The book starts out with a very interesting concept - that people are now beginning to age at different rates than they did in earlier times. There is the idea of time travel through time, and this leads to several possibilities for how long someone can actually live during an historical period. The history between young William Holden (Gavin Doran) and an old friend from his childhood (Daniel Emily) begins as flashbacks to their boyhood days spent together on holiday along the coast of Cornwall.

I used to give this product a good rating since it did the job well. It was then discontinued, so my husband and I have become "users," meaning we tried them out for about 1 month. Now they are all gone or really expensive, and we've found nothing that's as effective. My husband has tried other brands in his quest to find something even remotely comparable that actually works but none of theirs do. They're expensive too.

This review is only for the dvd itself, not the movie. I love this movie, and have waited years to be able to replace my damaged one, so please don't waste your money on this horrible version of "A Christmas Carol." There are 2 problems with it:1) The black bars that prevent you from seeing all parts is awful. They go across both sides but there also are a few bars in the middle.

After watching the movie, I was interested in finding out what happened to this story. This movie will not disappoint. It is well written and you learn a lot about Native Americans. What some did for others who were discriminated against, but they never stopped loving them. Very exciting movie. Enjoy! Highly recommended by me!
I'm disappointed with the taste of the coffee.. it is not really smooth nor does it have a strong chocolate flavor. I would advise to stay away from it.
Not as good after the second book. More sex than anything, nothing more. The characters are no deeper. Still entertaining tho I might go back and read the first one.
THIS WAS A PAIN TO REWIND AND TRACK UP WHAT MIKE SVETTAVIC HAD SAID.

The camera had a horrible autofocus system. It took time for my shutter speed increase to take the picture and still didn't track where I was focused. Then when zooming in pictures they were not sharp that day. This happened with all pictures. My Sony cameras have awesome focusing capabilities but this one is so low quality you might as well put your money into a good point-and-shoot. On a plus side it would probably be safe if dropped. They say waterproof up to 2.
If you are into metal this band will disappoint you, however if your an idiot enough to think that the singing makes anything worth listening to, then get it. Also there name is stupid.
I've purchased several of these. If you have an older B&D;, these batteries last forever.

I gave this a 1 star because the title really fits my review. The "gift" is about like what you would get in one of those paper bags that they shove inside every Christmas present, but it didn't cost much! A total waste. It's cheaply made and looks it. It takes 2 AAA batteries each. Don't even bother.

I expected more from the book but did not get it. It's an interesting short story about a time traveling family and their experiences with one of several future Presidents that could be elected at any time. The authors give very little to back up what they write - there is simply a statement without anything substantiating it besides the possibility someone in this past will hold office for another decade. This isn't a compelling story, rather it's just a lot of conjecture like others written by others.

Was this book written by an amateur? I really believe it is. For me, it was very difficult to finish the book. It's been a few months since I've read it, but I'm still reeling from its inability to hold my attention...

Although the story line is good, not enough was said about the characters themselves. There were very few pages devoted to their back stories. Many of us like more detail on what we are reading about. If it doesn't take too long and they aren't being killed off as much there could be another book without all this time consuming back-story. It feels choppy because it's chopped up into so many sections. I hope part three can fill out some background info. This wasn't my favorite series.

While the book has some interesting facts that can be difficult to put into practice in everyday life it is just one opinion of where we as a species are headed. I was hoping for more discussion on what to focus our effort and time on. Maybe someday when he has kids they will understand better why this world cannot continue. This was an ok read, especially if you are at all interested in survival or environmental matters. I wanted more.

Purchased this battery for my Galaxy SII, which I use to keep phone on as standby in the car all day. This was the only place that sold a replacement battery, and its been working great. Holds charge well even with constant use, though I'm no longer using it heavily at all. Highly recommend if needed.
It's okay but not sure if its gonna last long. I am also afraid someone will steal this from me. And there are some weird wrinkles on the back of it.

We loved using our old one, but this one came with holes on the fabric that are supposed to be attached so you could hang these items from it. Instead, once there was about 5 lbs weight in it, they popped. I'm assuming some other parts were broken and put into place by mistake.
Not much more to say really, except that this is a quality product and does exactly what it should. Highly recommended.

I bought a new HP Pavillion Laptop and wanted a wireless mouse pad. The picture shows one pad while the price said it included one. Well the pads in the photo are only 1" thick. These guys are liars. My mistake. This does make good coasters though. Just beware people. Don't believe the picture!

I bought this as a gift for my father who has been complaining about how hard it is to find his favorite brand in stores, so I'm happy that Amazon.com had them. The bottles were wrapped properly and look fresh. Thank you!

It worked for a month, I can't complain. The first problem was that my new monitor would not pick up the signal, so i tried several other sources before calling HDE support (which takes 3 days!). They said it must be some kind of interference etc. So all i needed to do was return the whole system and get another since we were getting no signal at all. They agreed to refund my money. Well that's when things got really bad as far as customer service.

Was nice enough to carry the food with out a mess but it gets too difficult and annoying for my cats while it's on their nose - they just lay down instead of trying get up to go. Maybe if I put something inside as an "aid" then they'd like it. They are in fact able to reach the top which is why she did so well when using this product. Good quality though overall for how sturdy it is.

This has been available on sale now for quite some time & you would do much better to buy it that try to justify paying full price if there was a lower priced version as well. If you want this DVD, just wait till it's on sale then purchase it. There are lots of other good films out that actually deserve the HD treatment. My recommendation is pass right by this. It isn't worth your time. You can find the same quality info in countless youtube videos.

This item was supposed to be new but the only thing that came in its original box and it looked like someone has used it. It had what look liked finger prints on front cover. Disappointing when you read reviews. So much better.

The game is fun and all, but I paid for an HD version download, not something that downloaded more than one frame per second. I'm disappointed to say the least. Very much a case of bait & switch. If you want it right now, go ahead, buy it. Otherwise give us someone who can produce quality products, otherwise this will just encourage piracy. A real shame. :( Now back in town with my money. &# 62;-)
While this unit has decent output for its size, don't let it's attractive exterior fool you -- it DOES fall apart VERY easily.
The size is pretty convenient, not too big. But water leaks quickly and it leaves weird marks inside of it. Not really much to like about this one.

A bit slow moving and I found it difficult to like any of the characters in this story, with a couple exceptions being the two kids. The book was about love which seems easy without needing people who can actually express it. Not sure how close it's to reality. We have had similar family situations so much that we felt a little sorry for them. It just dragged on and on. However, there is always hope. Read the preview before you buy. Perhaps you'll figure out who's making your life difficult.

I did enjoy the movie and enjoyed it very much. My only complaint is that they changed everything. They took out all of the parts that make this version unique from past versions! It may be a little annoying for fans who grew with those parts. But, after watching the whole series, one would expect that. The story was good but didn't follow the books. It's been three years, but there are many people still upset at where things were handled.

This book was a complete waste of time and money. It does not teach anything. Just lists the different ways to cook each dish. If you want a great cookbook, get Rachael Ray's- she is hilarious. My only advice would be if you are going off the grid this will give you some inspiration, but for everyday cooking it's useless. A lot of recipes have more than 1 ingredient listed. Which I found odd. I've never used most of those ingredients in one recipe. Do not buy.

Well, I received it in a timely fashion and that's where the good news ends. To be specific, if you're looking for something to fit over your ear- this should not do it. The head band is too low up on me. It didn't even cover my ears. I had to get another one. Maybe mine was defective.
I'm using this case with an Acer C720 Chromebook.

If you like reading about self absorbed characters this isn't the book for you. I will not be recommending it. The writer is one to watch and if there are other books of his worth reading give it a shot but check out what you're buying. Not some "greatest hits" crap. I'm sure he has some redeeming qualities however it's hard to root for. Sorry author. It's been an agonizing 2 months having waited till now only to want my 2.99 back.

For a 'new' product and not so new, I was greatly surprised about how hard it is to apply the screen. It came rolled up with bubbles! After a frustrating 5 minutes of trying, they finally gave up! On both screens one had tons of dust underneath. Tried 2 more, got frustrated, then removed it. Will buy from another brand. Sorry Fosmon! I wasted $10 on each set...

Did not like these they only use one side as a divider the other you have to put all your stuff in it or just empty of everything and try again. Waste OF MONEY. Very disappointed because they get more than 3 stars. What were they thinking???? DO NOT BUY THESE! 
 Rating: 1.
Got this for my son in law, he says its good.

If I hadn't found this book myself and read another review about it,maybe it would have worked. But since the book is published by a company that publishes this sort of thing, if your looking for real books, don't even buy it. This one isn't. It has just been released in paperback, and while there is some information on different styles or techniques used to make other types of jewelry, they were only loosely connected with each other.

When I started watching this movie it didn't really seem to have anything going for it. The movie is mainly about what it's like when you're in a relationship - no romance or anything. They should make movies/movies that are solely based on relationships instead of love stories. Also the characters were not all very likable. Some characters even bordered on being annoying, like how much they loved their jobs and stuff but yet got so frustrated at having them. A bit childish imo.

I bought this thinking it would be more sturdy. It is so bad that the screws and plastic ends come off when you are trying to remove it. After all of this, not one piece was in tact which makes me wonder if anyone checked before they sent it out. Save your money and get something else... or better yet, wait until it's on sale for $5.00.
I thought the price was to good to be true. But it turns out that my old pump didn't leak and so this one is no use. My fault for thinking there were different pumps.

These are terrible. They don't stick to the carpet at all. I tried cleaning before apply and after several applications there was no difference. Very disappointed with them. The only one that did work great is my cat since he doesn't jump on me but runs around. But don't waste your money like i did. :-(
I chose this rating because the book is not very good. It was pretty boring, nothing new or different, and predictable.

This book offers some great advice about dealing with grief as a child but the author tries to be too cute and ends up making her characters seem like spoiled brats. The plot is weak at best. By the way, if you're not sure whether this book was written for young adults by looking at the cover, don't bother, my middle school kids aren't even that mean. There are better books out there, stay away from "My Life in Pictures" it's terrible.

I bought this to complete a college education project for my daughter as the instructor is a fan of Ms. Austen's works. This book, for me, completely killed it. I don't know what others find attractive, but there wasn't any depth here.

I got sick a few years ago and began to have intestinal infections that resulted from antibiotics. Nothing was ever strong enough for me. This product is just wonderful. It takes away most of the bad effects if you are still suffering. Its also great stuff. There seems to be less gas after using it. I'm very pleased with this product. I'd recommend it to anyone experiencing these kinds of gastrointestinal problems. You'll see an improvement within days. It's worth every penny. The shipment arrived on time without any issues.

We ordered this for my son so that his ipod would not get scratched when he used it. For the most part its a great product - it's just what we needed. I gave him to me one month ago and it cracked today. I'm very careful with things, but apparently if you aren't delicate and don't have any children using them, these break.....oh well.
Bought this on Amazon. It arrived quickly, in excellent condition (I have had some problems picking items like these up) It's quite sturdy but lightweight. We keep ours outside, not inside.
It's one of those things where there isn't much information online. No photo or description.

I have read so many of her books they all start with the same plot and then get better as you go but this book was terrible. It dragged on for almost 600 pages about nothing. And after reading it is just a real pity that she sold out to publisher and gave up her true love writing. She has lost the magic which made some of her past books great! I hope she never writes another book- what garbage!!!! What an utter disappointment by her.

The instructions were very limited in how to change music or display the time without also turning off timer. All I got from the directions is, turn on player, press start. Not much else there, but I'm still looking for a way to make it work properly like my old player did.

Ok, now I know how your first review came out with an "S". Do you even read the book before making a review? You think it is great!!!! If you can stomach all of that, great. But I found this story to be very boring. First off, everyone hates on her because she's in prison. That's probably cause they are not ready for something like that. When are people going to grow up! Anywho, we find them out, so there goes another star.

I bought this book several years ago for a college class and it cost more than $300. It looked very interesting from the reviews so i ended up ordering it. What a disappointment though! The pictures appear almost black in color with no detail at all. Many of them look like they were taken on my old 35mm camera. I should have read other opinions before purchasing it.
The title says it all, my old HP laptop went bad, bought this, installed it, only lasts about an hour, and gets hot too.
This product has good sound quality considering the price and size.

Interesting story but a little hard reading in certain places. But all in all, it is a good read. Not sure if anyone really survives this type of torture. Perhaps only one does. It's quite an interesting story. Recommend reading it.

The battery worked fine for about 2 weeks. After that, it wouldn't hold a charge anymore. I can only use my computer if the charger is attached. I'm looking today again and see that they're now selling this same product under different brand names. If that doesn't tip you off already, don't waste your money on this. You might as well get one on ebay. There are way too many knockoffs out there now. I've had no problems with any other products in this price point. Don't fall behind Targus again.

I had to return the product when it was delivered by UPS. All contents were damaged, some pretty severely. As a result, one wheel would be attached on bottom but not connected properly. I'm very disappointed, as it's not cost effective for me going up and down flights of stairs. The wheels are too small compared with other carts I've used, too. And the assembly directions are horrible. However, Amazon's customer service made all this bearable, so I'll rate them 5 stars in spite of the faulty wheels.

These are NOT professional grade at all. The tips on mine came in several places that couldn't be sanded down. I am very disappointed with this product. Don't use them if you want your work to look like the photos. They would have worked fine for my purpose if they didn't arrive damaged. If it was just a matter of a few pieces being scratched up, I'd deal with it, but these were all damaged or missing pretty severely.

Like some of the other reviewers, I'm having trouble playing this game. The game will crash every four - five minutes. Since many others have mentioned this, I would advise you to check your video card drivers and monitor settings. After a reboot (hard reboot), it sometimes works. Sometimes if I change several settings, it's better. Bottom line, don't buy it.

I have read a number of books by this author. All are good. This one had nothing to do with his usual good writing. Just too wordy. He wrote he wanted us all up on our feet after the first chapter. If I'm in that position there isn't much time or room. Too many characters trying to say something at once. Did not enjoy it much. Sorry Will. Keep writing.....

I was never able to successfully mount this device. There were no instructions or troubleshooting guides, despite claims in the product description that there would be. The card reader itself is of very poor quality. Also, it's made entirely from plastic, not metal. For those who want a small USB 2.0 flash memory, but don't necessarily need it attached to your computer, this might save them money and frustration. I'm giving my copy away as soon as the manufacturer fixes these issues or sells me something equivalent.

I bought this toy as a Christmas gift for my 2 1/2 year old boy. When we opened the box on Christmas, he was SO excited. He couldn't wait to open it. After playing with it once, the remote stopped working. You had to hold both buttons down and then you could get any color ball rolling that made contact with one of 4 buttons. As soon as you touched another ball, the button would go off again or not. It is going back tomorrow.
For those of us who would like to know something really bad that ever happened, there are probably few authors alive whose lives we don't already know.
For a free book this was okay! I like mysteries and will try another one of the books from Nancy Naigle.
These items are way over priced. They don't do anything, and can harm if used improperly.
We have watched The Rifleman, Buck Rogers and Mission Impossible. All of these shows give us hours of enjoyment. This is even better than when my kids were little! Thanks so much, Amazon.

I bought the book on kindle, this was my mistake. The print is so light that at times it causes a strain to read. Not really great but definitely not horrible. But you may think differently. Sorry for that. By the way, I would advise the author make some changes in future editions. Maybe have more pages with larger text, better pictures. Even an updated picture of each of his main models. There are two pictures per page. Of course it depends where or when you want your photos.

My grandson loved the book as soon as he received it. However it was missing pages from page 4. I wanted to return it but they said since we opened it, all of our packaging had been destroyed so that meant just throwing in a box and sending back. Very disappointed! He loves Mr. Bug now.
It was okay. Not as entertaining and captivating as the series. The new characters were not very interesting. I'll likely read more of this.
I got this book to give my cats some variety and excitement in their play times. They are NOT interested in these games, nor do they like them at all. It was a waste of money.

It doesn't work, just gives audio. Plugging into VGA converter causes screen on older computer monitor to come up. Not worth returning. Too much hassle. I'll buy one from local store if this fails again. Lesson learned for me. :(

Very cheap looking with flimsy cardboard that folds for card storage. Will not hold a few photos or cards without falling apart. Not worth the cost of shipping. Look at other options, not these. I would send it back, but it's too bulky to fit into box. Won't be buying anything from this company again. And if you are lucky and receive what they advertise.....that's also junk. I tried using extra double sided tape which was helpful...just didn't look too good. Would like my money back.

The unit works fine... but the instructions for operation are horrible! I had to go online and watch a youtube video from an American who used it. He said he was happy with it because you can see how far away objects are..... which is what we needed on our camper when sitting in close proximity for long periods of time without turning your head.
This product was advertised as a NEW product.

I am a fan of all things vampire and loved "Twilight", but this just couldn't keep up. It was pretty unbelievable when Bella fell down the stairs during her first "encounter" with Edward. And if you like to read about vampires, you'd think she'd have learned not to, right? So what's next - going into war?!! That part would be unrealistic as well. I'd say that Meyer should hire an editor because she missed SO many opportunities for great writing in this book.
This has some of the best photos out there. I will buy more in near future. Nice to make memories at a dinner out.

The book was not at all what I expected. It is more of a text book. My daughter had to take English in school. This book will just sit on her bookshelf. She only uses the dictionary as she likes it. The cover looks nice, but that is it for me. I'm sure everyone else sees this book and thinks it's really cute. You can always find something different. If you are looking for more "fun,quick look ups" - keep looking.

I was looking for something with a little more of an "adventure" and less romance. It was well put together though just not what I expected. Perhaps I'm jaded from too many romance novels. But it did turn the light out on one very corrupt police department. Too much going back and forth. It went through all types of emotions. Just couldn't seem to pull me in. Not sure how long I'll read these books. Maybe I will return later. No great love story there.

I purchased this product to be used with my Panasonic DMC-FS3, but it does not fit the camera. It is far too small. The screw hole pattern and overall structure seem a little off, as well. Perhaps an FS-8 would fit, however, that will require buying one from Panasonic. My own fault, perhaps, for assuming the screws/adapters were interchangeable between cameras.

This one was just a little to much. Nothing made sense. It was a good attempt at humor, but I can see people getting offended by it. But as an action movie it wasn't that bad. If you want something else I'd go for the original. Otherwise your missing out.
My daughter loves this blanket. She says its soft to hug on. It does get softer after washing but overall we are happy with it. Very pretty.

This was an amazing story, how wonderful it must have been. Even though there were some parts of the book which needed to be changed, I still felt that this story deserved a review. I found it incredible and couldn't put it down. Anyone who has read or thought about all these books will definitely find something special in this. Great book!Thank you for reading my comment! :)
I loved the books until they got so long between each new one there really wasn't much plot. The first book is a must read just in case you enjoy them. These last few were boring.

The author has made many errors in her use of British English and punctuation. She also makes reference to a man by an improper name, which is completely inappropriate. I suggest the publishing house correct these types of errors. On the whole, it is only one example of how badly this book needs proofreading. There are spelling errors, grammar errors, usage mistakes, even words such as "you" and "he". You have much better options out there.

this product was a major disappointment. I purchased it to replace my very old one that broke. The item arrived quickly and in great condition, which is why I did not return it. When we plugged the new unit in, however, it would not operate at all. In fact, it turned on, but after trying several times just as described above, nothing happened, so no power.

I like the features of this product, and it takes nice long videos, but mine broke about 4 months after purchasing. The camera died while in use. Don't buy it. Pay a little more to get one that will last. Just didn't work long. It was used only once a week. We bought our first Lorex cam last summer from Walmart for around 40 bucks - worked great until last Christmas when we took it with us on vacation.

This product did not work. I used it exactly as instructed. It was in the water for about an hour and never even worked once. We still have frogs in our pool. Do yourself a favor don't buy this. The only way that we were able to get all of them out went through lots of cleaning but after two weeks every pool had some frogs. If you are trying to kill roaches do what we did. Buy a bottle of liquid steel or something else. That actually worked.
If you want something that will make your body shake and get stuck somewhere deep inside...

This case does not fit in the iTouch at all. Its a tiny bit too small. The front cover doesn't even lay flat and is crooked. Not satisfied. I want my money back. Would give 0 stars. Buyers be aware. It's false advertising! Do NOT waste your money. I'm very irritated on getting this!! If it wasn't for this it's being returned to seller. My son would have lost his money! DO NOT BUY THIS. It will not fit! False advertising.

I thought that some of his stories were going to be about what it would be like if you met God, but really are just stories from random people. He also gives several stories on why he writes and doesn't write, but I'm not sure there's any real answer behind it.

Don't buy these, they don't work or are a complete waste of time to buy. I went through three sets and could only get one to work, even after re-installing them over my speakers. The seller sent me another set thinking it was just defective but the same trouble repeated itself.. Not worth the time, trouble, or effort at all.

This scale does not stay on zero but jumps from 0 to a number that is between -10 - 100. You can't put your item in it which makes measurement difficult. There are no handles for easy hanging. Very disappointed.
The first book was good and then the next two were just ok so I guess you have to read something better I wont be reading it again any time soon I'm afraid
Very happy with my purchase - product was delivered ahead of schedule in mint condition. Great value also. Would definitely do business again :-)
This phone cover fit great. Just what you'd expect from a zebra print. Doesn't add much bulk. Great price too. Fast shipping too :-) Highly recommend! A+ on all fronts.

My son was very upset when the book didn't have pages. I called and received a new book, which also wasn't the correct book. Needless to say it will go in the garbage. What a rip off! They should take out all reviews that are not written by "Amazon Verified Purchase". This has never happened before.

I can not believe amazon would sell a book that the author himself admits contains misinformation and outright lies. This is the most despicable act of deception I've ever seen! You are cheating American citizens out their hard earned money. Do you honestly think people don't have this knowledge or will they trust someone with this?Shame on you!

I bought this from E-bay as a replacement for another one we have owned since 2001. It lasted almost exactly three years. First the sound started fading out gradually, and then just completely died. We took apart to look at it - it's obviously an electrical failure in several places. Too late to return under Amazon's policy, so we'll start looking into sending this thing back.
Very bad control on my son, we tried playing it but too frustrated.

I purchased this item with the hopes of being able to watch videos and browse internet from my bed while i was on vacation. Unfortunately, it didn't work. The wi-fi couldn't find any signal which would have been fine if all i had wanted is a small portable device but after searching for hours reading review and looking into what else I could connect in hope that some one might be more helpful. No luck. My laptop connects better then it did before so not sure where its coming from. Not happy.
For $30 you cannot make any sense out of these CDs. Their supposed help section was obviously setup for their own benefit.

This is a fairly good headset. It does not hurt your ears after extended wearing but at times you feel it in the ear area just by looking back or to the side of what ever you're doing. The controls and voice commands are nice for easy switching between various functions. Battery life seems long considering this type has only 2 AA batteries which seem like they have enough power in them when fully charged - I can get about 8 hours out of them.

These pads will not stay on the pad holder if there any movement in your vehicle. I have a Lexus RX 350. They also are quite sticky and hard to remove from your pads. All around waste of money. I was very disappointed. The cost for return shipping more than half what you pay is excessive. Do yourself a favor go another route. Don't make my mistake. Not worth the hassle or additional expense. Will never purchase them again. Total waste. My advice buy different brand because these don't work well.

This is probably the worst album that I have ever heard. There are some good points though. The songwriting and production are very good. However, it just doesn't sound anything like their previous albums. It sounds much more commercial than all those other heavy bands in there right now. So basically, if you want something better try to get Machine Head or any of Metallicas old stuff before this. That way you'll still enjoy listening to'em.
There were no "secrets" that my grandmother could have written. Just two women being in love at a place where she would never want to be.

These gloves are very cheap and thin fabric that is about like the plastic dish towels you find at walmart...don't waste your money. They didn't even last through my first shower..so save money for nicer things!

After going through 2 sets of these I have thrown them in the garbage. We used all 4 lenses and could not make out what was on them. I can find nothing sharp when looking at my screen. Total waste of money. Bought another brand this weekend to replace these. This is a piece of junk that would be OK if they were 5 bucks. Not recommended. One star for Amazon Prime. As long as you get free shipping, go ahead & try it out. No hassle.
great movie, the movie had some parts that are funny, has action, romance, good music, i would recommend this movie to anyone.

I have never read a book that was so difficult to get lost in. By the middle of it, it didn't even matter if you wanted to or not because there seemed to be no plot which kind of confused me. He writes beautifully, and some parts were very sad, but others just had nothing going on or came off as completely flat (ie - like he could take one sentence about a child's death and turn into something else entirely). Just really hard to read.

I like the case. Very light and easy to work with. I'm not sure its worth 50 dollars though. It would be better if it had more slots on the inside too. For what you get in the package that's all. If your wanting a case that you carry only cards n license, this is good for you. But if you want storage then keep looking because there aren't many. The outside pockets could definately use some. All in all, it works but isn't a wallet or anything really.   Rating: 3.

My dog likes it and the price with shipping was much lower than my local pet store. I ordered a second one. Delivery on time. Thank you Amazon.com for offering high quality items at great prices. I'm an old guy who wants to enjoy life long without having to worry about what or where we can get things like this that are of good quality. Thanks again. Happy Trails. Larry L.
This manual does NOT help ANYTHING. Don't you dare buy one.
The book was exactly as stated and it came in a very timely manner. I would purchase from this seller again.
I couldn't go past the first 15 or so pages. The stories were dull, and uninspiring. While I'm sure some people enjoy these stories, it just wasn't for me. In other words, no me gusto.
I bought this album as a Christmas gift for my brother. He enjoys it. It's really nice to have some of these songs available on CD.

I purchased this for my father who has vision issues. It seemed a little flimsy, but was sturdy enough to be able to see the digital readouts. Good product. You don't need two hands any longer just 1 and 1 is enough.
I purchased the item because of high reviews. Got it and tested on a few vehicles with no success only with difficulty. Returned it. Maybe works in other cars. Just not me this time.

I thought this would be as good or better than the last album because of his old time roots music. The new songs sound like they're recorded in an echo chamber. I'll keep looking for another cd with more country music roots. He did do one song that was okay, though.

Did not fit my lamp, but I'm sure it does just fine for others. It looked like you have 3 choices. When it arrived in a box without any packing material which only added to it's damage. There are bubbles on the inside of one lamp.
This actually works pretty good!!If your using for the first time it takes a few days but just make sure don't drink alot of water! Also try not eating or drinking sugar when taking it.
The quality is not the greatest especially in one area where there are three layers to the fabric. Otherwise great value for what you pay. Would recommend it.

The cover seems to be ok, but the description is completely off and misleading. This book is only about 1 page of written instructions (maybe less) covering several different topics like soldering and building a breadboard. If that's what you're looking for, then you'll need one with more detailed instructions. Also, it's NOT worth your time or money unless you are planning on having it professionally made. As I said, if printed out yourself, you'd get better results than this little booklet.
Do yourselves a favor and don't make the same mistake that many others have made with this product.

This was actually kind of a pleasant read. I found the descriptions to flow nicely. The characters were well developed - but also not perfect. That made it less predictable. The world building is pretty neat and original. Not your standard fantasy fare. It has plenty of romance, suspense, action for those who like that sort f thing. And, as some other reviewers have mentioned, there are lots of grammar errors - which really bothered me at first, because I'm so used to books being professionally edited.

This book was in the bottom 25% from worst to best that I have ever read. I felt bad putting it there. Do not buy this! Its all lies and misinformation. Don't waste your time. Go ahead read a good portion of this trash if you want to. Just don't say you weren't warned. And by the way, I'm only giving one star because I can't rate them zero. If they were half stars, I'd give them zero stars.

Batteries never worked right from day. The company was willing to take them back, but would not pay shipping charges. It cost me over $20 dollars in all for an item that doesn't work. No more purchases with this provider. Buyer beware. They only send new items if you want them. All reconditioned batteries. You should receive new. 
 Rating: 1.
Well made, but not large enough for our big dog (over 140 lbs).

You will go for hours in your sleep. I use it to sleep in. It does not support my head on the mattress but when you lay down or fold them up they work great. Not good at all supporting neck pillow though because I feel as if it's a hard piece of plastic that gives and cannot be adjusted. But this is what happened with another brand of one size fits all. My husband likes it. In fact, he gets too hot while sleeping so we put blankets under them.

The product arrived as described, except that there were no bolts in mine. My husband figured out how they could have fallen out. I'm going back to Ikea. This thing looks too cheap for me. It's very thin cardboard on top of a sturdy box. I'm returning it.

I wish the information about this product was available so that i wouldn't waste my hard earned money. This book is nothing more than a compilation of personal opinions. It might have been interesting to read some time ago, but it doesn't make much sense today. The most valuable part of the book isn't mentioned - it's only after the chapter "The Secret Sauce for success" do you find anything useful in it. It's mostly common sense. Not good enough for me considering all the great reviews which inspired me.

I found this at the local drugstore around a month ago and loved it there. Great for those who love garlic but can't get over to buy some because it's too expensive or too often in limited supply. I've bought 2 since then, one as gifts.
This worked like a charm.
Not well written. Good plot, however all of this can be found on the internet. A lot could have been used with an extensive writing class. Don't waste your time.
My biggest problem was how you hold it. It's heavy, awkward, takes two hands, awkward and just awkward. And it's really loud.

The description of this was a complete waste of time!This book could have been written in ONE PARAGRAPH.It took me 10 minutes to read, I regret purchasing it. There is absolutely no information on the actual "stuff" you need for doing anything with your kindle fire, and it is hard to use because there are just too many parts not mentioned or explained before making purchases.
I bought these for a gift and they look great on the person. They came in a nice little box so that I could wrap it. Perfect size but not too small. Great quality.

I received this battery from Amazon.com before it arrived here in Mexico. With the first recharge after 2 weeks of use, which gave me 5 hours using Firefox to check email, write letters, and browse the net. After my fourth charge, however, 3 days later, not even an hour on any program, but with a full screen view, all went downhill, fast. In 2 weeks, 10 times, at 90% power, I've gone thru three cycles charging it, then I'm done, so no new battery. This is a bad product.

This book is a bad example of what we can expect when reading erotica. It reads like it was written by someone who never experienced sex before. We all know that there are no limits or limitations on being sexual, but the way this story went and the language used, I honestly believe it's only aimed at older men. For any younger woman in your life try something else.
I love this book. The way that it was written just made me laugh. Loved the characters. Would like to read more of his books.
The story of life after death as told by an extremely gifted and insightful spirit guide. I will look for more books from this author!

Don't buy this if you are a Mac user and don't want to return it. It is very limited in what it can do. I had an older version that was much better at reading video files. Do yourself a favor and go with something else... I've learned my lesson.

I only read 25% of this book. It was so hard for me to read. I'm still trying but I find the characters so immature that by chapter 50 or so, my head is spinning and it feels like reading a script written about teenagers, with no adult character involved. If you can make it through, that's fine. As for me, it's in the recycling bin. My husband thinks it's cute just to watch the kids run around acting crazy.

I was excited to see the sequel available, especially after reading all 3 prequel books in one weekend. The problem is that this book feels more like a novella than an entire book. What could have been written into an interesting story, gets lost in too much detail and does not answer any of my questions. It doesn't matter if you believe some things never happened, or are part of his imagination, he just ends with a little "what happened?" That's it.

If you really love the music, don't buy this book. The music doesn't even tell a story. Just take your picks from these songs and get them to sing them. It will make for much more interesting reading than this. Not my cup of tea. I can't comment on other books, but if you're looking for an awesome musical play then find yourself one that tells a story, or enjoy some great music! The play has nothing in common with the classic story line except that it uses music.
I have enjoyed this show very much. It was interesting to see how the series evolved from episode one through four.

While I found a great deal of useful advice and insights in this book, there were lots to wade through. The book is written more as an outline than a cohesive narrative, so it took me several days just flipping back through the pages trying to find relevant information. Some sections are fairly short - you could read them easily if you're on vacation but want to make sure the topic wasn't something you'd already covered.

I found nothing of interestin these pages. It seemed like the author went off on some tangents and would not leave me with any clear picture about her life. She was a very self absorbed person. Her husband should be ashamed he wrote this.

The seller was very fair and gave me a discount on my next order for their poor quality control. They were in the box when received but fell apart with the slightest handling. Even though they where packaged only two plastic bags held them together during shipping,and neither bag seemed to contain any glue at all for assembly. So disappointed I will not buy from this vender again. The one that seems to be assembled does look nice, just wish it could have worked.

Cable arrived faster than estimated...well packed. High quality cable, feels like they could have been $20 a cable! Very satisfied with thisproduct! Will not hesitate to purchase other cables from this vendor. Thank you, keep up the good work!!
After years of dealing with this issue, my husband found a solution to the problem and it was easy to do. I highly recommend it.

Great price but when I received it I did have to replace the fuse and wire harness. Easy fix. Took about 40 minutes from start on time to finish. The reason why I'm only rating 3 stars is because there are some wires that come soldered down so you can't run a separate wiring loom through this box. There isn't enough space between them to let them go past each other or cross over. But it wasn't too hard as long as you can fix that.
I loved the first book " The Mist". Great read. This sequel falls short. It was hard following with no character development. I'm confused about what is going on.

The original had a hard bottom but this has no bottom, it's just fabric and tears from the pressure of squeezing through narrow cracks. This stuff would never work for my purpose because I need to take care not to put any pressure on tight cracks or seams. The product photo shows a stiff plastic ring that fits around the top opening of your gas grill, which is much easier than trying to squeeze out a tube without using such harsh materials. You won't like what you get once it arrives.
Too many people involved in some kind of trouble. A waste of time. No surprise ending. Just way too drawn out.

I found the movie a bit boring in many places. The writing had good potential. It needed to move faster and build it up more. There are some funny scenes, but none of them are terribly funny. My favorite parts were when they first arrive back from their trip around Europe where Jack is trying to find out what happened to him. This part was just so good. When his dad goes missing, we all think that he's dead too. I thought this film could have used more comedy.
First book from this author which I loved and then couldn't put down.

I thought that this cable would support 1080i output. It is only compatible with 720p output, which defeats the purpose. My TV accepts all other resolutions (ie 1080 and 480p). Not sure why it doesn't accept 1080i.
This is the only way I would buy dog food. If you don't care about the quality, that's fine with me. The food comes straight to my door which can save me money over time.

What a huge disapointment it was when I received it. My husband would think about Christmas morning before he went out for the mailman after we gave our grandson his new toy. It showed up with no packing material. Only two CD's in flimsy plastic.

I ordered this with some hesitation because of the price. When it arrived I was a little worried about installing them, but they were easy to install and seem like good quality. However, after about 18 months one stopped working completely, so now I'm on Amazon looking for another set. For $25, they should last more than half that long. Don't waste your money in these, you can find higher quality bulbs elsewhere. The reason these burn out is mainly due to thermal inertia.

I cannot express in words how utterly disappointed I was with this book. From the beginning it began to frustrate me and then ultimately just made my head hurt. This book is basically a "fantasy book" of sorts. Like many others have said it's like if one of those old stories would pop up where everyone always dies but for some reason, not every person dies. It's almost an exact story line of Twilight. If anyone still believes that Twilight has been good literature maybe they should read it instead.

I've had my iPod Touch for just over a year now, and I loved everything I'd wanted in it. But after spending hundreds of dollars on accessories (and getting frustrated with them), it all comes down to how often you can use your new device. I'm usually in one place, which is why having the newest models makes the best sense. With that said, this charger has been really disappointing. Here's why:Pros:+ Has two ports. Both charge at 2.1 amp, but the lower port charges slightly slower.

This story is a bit on the "weird" side for my own tastes which could be that I'm not used to reading about aliens so much in this kind of book. Not a bad story, interesting ideas and good use of language. I just wouldn't go looking out into spaces like they were windows because there isn't enough description at all provided as far as what it looks like. It would have been better if he had described it.

After reading this book I felt that the author did not know what he was talking about. The author had absolutely nothing to say. To begin you would think there would be more pictures of what Mr. Brown did in his time with his friend before he died. In some parts it seemed like he just tried to say so much. It read like an essay or something. This would have helped if he left out those boring pictures. Other than that what can your mother tell you? If she knew how sick Mr.
Very well written book but nothing earth shattering. It did put into perspective what you need in order to succeed on your first trip.

I own two of these and found the instructions difficult to follow. Once installed they seemed very flimsy compared with my older models. The "feet" were actually screws that protruded slightly from plastic brackets. I would not buy another item like this. We will see how long it lasts. I'm looking at returning or giving away. Disappointed in all aspects.
i use it for my iphone to charge when at the airport, works like a charm and with no fuss,,,

We purchased 4 of them at one time, thinking they would all fit in our cabinets. When first unpacked one did not fit....now none work. Have tried other brands as well but nothing works. The design is good, however.

This was a complete waste of money...I don't think I will ever read it again. It was not worth what i paid for. A really cheap book. The ending sucked. It's like an author told her characters "hey maybe you should save your stories until closer to the end, because we didn't have time for good endings. And I'm going to get lazy and just cut everything off at the end." Do yourself a favor skip this one if you're interested in reading a book that you can finish.

While many books can be made into movies, I do believe that this may be one in which a good movie did not come from the book. Yes, it could have been because an extremely talented writer could never write a bad book, but as with all famous authors, who comes up with some incredible plot lines for their other works, and then goes backwards to make something boring, or add more characters than necessary, well maybe no great novel deserves to turn out poorly on film.

The first one was fine, it fit my kindle the way it is supposed to, it's cute, feels like a real book. But this new one didn't have much to it, the leather isn't good enough and after about 1 week of reading it with out anything in between it started smelling funky. So I had to wipe everything down inside because you couldn't smell it. It got even worse when I bought some fabric cleaner to try and clean off all that crap but nothing really helped.

I ordered these earphones in February and was excited to get them. They sounded really great -- clear sound with good bass - but when the first one failed after two months, Amazon didn't replace it. It took them three weeks and many phone calls before they finally sent a replacement. The replacement pair lasted five months. When it failed, Amazon's support department asked me to send back, again at my expense. Finally, amazon refunded me, minus $18. This is very poor service from Amazon.
So far it's working pretty well. A friend used mine and had me order her one. This isn't for heavy use.

I have to say if the product could be shipped by air, which seems more logical, than by ground that would improve a lot. The first time they were sent, there was no packing slip with them at all, other then the shipping label, and both of them had holes in them. It looks as tho somebody may return these bottles again due they were so bent when they arrived and not ready for mailing.
Not really for me I'm sure. I needed more technical detail on how to do certain things. Good basic info. Very short read.

My husband wore this shirt one day and the button on top unclasped while he was working in his yard. The other reviewer mentioned that it didn't have pockets, but mine did not. It is a decent looking shirt, though. Just be aware of potential safety issues.

I chose this rating because it does not have good suction power. It is easy to clean and handle. It's very light. My previous vacuum was the Hoover WindTunnel Animal Bagged Upright Vacuum, UH70210, which had better suction. Now I won't recommend it. This one isn't as powerful but you can't beat the price for getting a pet hair cleaner. The dust chamber seems to expand everytime i use it, so i'm looking for an accessory container that will make cleaning easier.

The unit shipped promptly with all the components. It worked well, for 4 weeks. After that point it would either not recognize CDRWs, or stop at the end of a disk instead of continuing to play. That was really annoying. I called Philips, who sent out 2 replacement DVDplayers which lasted longer than that. These came through after they failed in less time and did as they were advertised to, but only played half CDs when tested on another DVD player, so you had to listen using headphones.
Easy setup...worked as soon as we plugged them in. They came with everything needed including batteries!!! Would purchase again.......much appreciated as they are great for accent lighting.

it just was okay. kinda slow. did not hold my attention as i had hoped. i got bored with the plot line, too slow to read. no excitement. there were some good points though. well worth reading, for its message about war and it's effects on human nature. we would all do well, if possible, after reading this one, to stay away from that kind of warfare.but overall, just a bit long in parts I thought. could have done it more action packed too.

I bought this item to use in my kitchen to store all of the utensils needed when cooking/baking. It works perfect for that. But if you have a LOT of small things, like forks and knives, or even smaller things - not so much. Because they just flop over on themselves, which makes it very difficult (even dangerous) trying to grab them while being stored. And because they're flimsy, everything gets scratched up. Plus, there is no space inside.

I ordered the wrong item. It was suppose to fit my kindle,and it didn't. Now what?. The item does not fit. Disappointed. If you are looking for a case cover that will work with your kindle fire this is the one isn't it? Maybe there needs more details on how this cover works! I'm only sure about what someone else told me. That's probably not going to happen. Oh well,oh well. My bad....no need to return it. Just won't happen again.

It was a good idea, but when you finally get it to work, then you discover that this piece of junk won't work at all, and is very hard to find any support for it. Do not buy this, the price seems too low, but I guess your gonna have a lot more problems than if you paid more. It's a shame...I'll never do business with NetGear again. Their tech Support only has 24 hours a day support. No matter how many times they're polite, they don't know much.

I am on my 3rd power cord. The first one burned out after only a couple of months. Amazon sent me another one. Only lasted 3 months and now has stopped working. This cord also gets really hot. Not sure how this got such high ratings. Wish I'd never bought it. At least it was cheap! :(

I hate how this is not compatible with iTunes. It has many features. The app doesn't give you an option to buy the songs in iTunes like it did before. Even when using ITouch 3G, IT DOES NOT WORK!!!! Please fix this. There were a lot of positive reviews. Don't know if I have just received a defected one but its useless. No reason why Apple can't make apps for their devices! This is ridiculous. They need better apps.

I really wanted to like this book, and from the previews on Amazon when it was first released, many people recommended it. However, after reading it, I'm not even sure why that recommendation existed. As a lifelong follower of science (or other natural science), I have been looking forward to some new things in light of recent advancements in biotechnology. Unfortunately, although there are more than two dozen authors included whose work is very well-written, I didn't find one who offered any interesting ideas.

This product never showed up. I wrote to them about it numerous times in a few weeks. Never received any sort response back from them. So I'm left with nothing. Very disappointed. I've had many orders take 3 weeks or less before being received.

I did not care much for this story. It seemed kind of juvenile to me. The story wasn't that interesting and the characters were just plain dumb. Good idea though but it didn't work out so will be deleting from my kindle file.

i purchased this because of the reviews on it. but unfortunately, its not strong enough for me. it was my second purchase of one and they worked wonders at first, after which both stopped working. so I went with a different brand. don't waste your money here. unless you have very little stress in your neck. then go ahead & order it, just be sure it's strong! I'm going to do that, because no neck pillow is completely worthless if you need something that really works :)

I have just received this product and tried it for 30 minutes. I got up to take a quick shower but then the machine started going crazy. It was vibrating terribly all over my body in some places right out of the box. The whole thing seemed cheaply made, very flimsy construction so i think it's too expensive even considering its price - I should return it. There is no way I'll keep it, there are plenty of other products on Amazon that give you many results with less money.

This DVD was better than expected. It is a must for any fan of the show or music in general... and it was great to check out Michael Jackson doing some live singing on what was obviously his last tour (the one he came home from after). His voice and the overall stage presence were stunning. When I saw this video coming out, I thought he'd be too "old already" but it turned me into one. I really liked him as an entertainer...
Its a nice small handbook, can be read in no time.

This was not at all what I expected. The book has a few different tips in it but nothing that really helps you organize your closet. There is almost no information about how to get good photos of clothes, which are the most important for you. In short, this was very disappointing. If you've never been organized before and want some guidance on organizing your closet then maybe it's worth it, otherwise save your money. For anyone with experience who hasn't seen a real picture book, skip it.
There were many grammar errors. While there are several typos in most books, they all had at least one error.

Got the book as a birthday present. Very dissapointed that it's only 40 pages. I thought it was around 150 pages and way overpriced. There are better books on the market. If you can't find a well reviewed one pass this one. I'm trying to return for refund. Really feel scammed. Thanks Amazon. :/

I got this book as a Christmas gift because it's the only one out that is for dogs of all sizes. My dogs are 7 and 10 pound Yorkies mix. They have plenty room in here but it can barely even stand up- the bottom where they sit doesn't lie flat enough to make laying down comfortable. So, what you get when you buy 2 or 3 books from this company is pretty disappointing. I'm sure my Yorkie will like it, she's already shown she likes it.
this was exactly what i needed. the fit perfectly in our backyard. easy to put together.
This text does a poor job of teaching you how to design an engine. One cannot learn from one example when they should be learning more than one.
This is an incredible product. It has a very strong aroma. My wife uses it in her house and my house, as well. I use this product for cleaning on our vehicles.

I just ordered these lights for a project and when they arrived the boxes were beat up.. The light itself is great so I'm returning it but this needs to be fixed ASAP!!!! If not I'm sure that its something that came through Amazons warehouse already broken or damaged...The only reason why anyone would make such crappy packaging should be a indication of how the lights are made. VERY DISSAPPOINTED IN HOW THE LIGHTS WERE MADE.....

This is a great album. If you like the whole rap game than this album is an absolute must buy. The production could've been much better but what makes it better are the lyrics. Dre and Eminem take on issues that most would not want to discuss in everyday life such as; race, death, poverty, violence, sexual abuse etc. What I found fascinating about Dre's lyrics was how he made you question your own opinions as well as put himself into the role of both listener and antagonist.
Works great, great color, easy to install. I will purchase more for my other bathrooms. Easy installation and good instructions on what kind of screws go where.
Excellent product.... Would highly recommend it..

This CD contains almost all of his old hits in concert. He's a legend and continues to entertain the world after so many years on this planet. His talent is beyond belief. A must have. Love it all. God bless you Paul.
This cover was hard to put on, other than that, I've been using it almost every day. It fits well, looks good, no problems.

They are quite comfortable but after a short time, one side stopped working. My husband tried all the tricks from changing batteries etc., etc and finally gave up. I only paid $17 for them so maybe that's why they didn't last. Otherwise, when they worked, he liked them. You get what you pay for. :(
