I am an avid reader and this book is just NOT funny!!! It is very sad how our young people are getting dumbed down while reading on TV. I had to stop several times in the middle of sentences. Even so it was somewhat entertaining.......until about halfway through when we go back into real literature. This should come with a warning lable.

It took me half way through until they finally explained anything. When I first started reading it I found myself confused when in actuality it just wanted me to understand why something so simple could be hard for them to understand.

This cover is thin & light weight. I've been taking my laptop with it everywhere but there has been no wear. Also the "kickstand' always falls out of place as soon as you lift up or let go because it's not sturdy enough.

I love my dog and want her to be healthy. It has been very difficult for me lately. All dogs are not made the same. But at this price how can you resist. My poor old arthritic husband is enjoying his "treats" now.

I bought this product after my son saw it on The View, but he hasn't found uses for it. It's too thick and sticky to pick up even 1 item with ease. When it's cold outside, you have the problem if its really snowy out. It falls apart just trying to remove one item. He is very disappointed in it. We've gone back to Swiffer Sweeper Refill. You can hold them together better then this. This product cost a lot of money.
It just didn't taste good for me. Maybe because I am new to the whole green tea drinking stuff but it wasn't good.
Let my first reviewer speak for me- it's just an okay movie. The story isn't bad, and some parts were pretty cool. However, the overall acting was horrible.
This product has performed very well.

The sound that comes out of this little thing is remarkable. Love the different sized adapters and am very pleased with my purchase. I am planning to buy another one today. It seems that all these speakers are built in China, but seem well made for portable use. Also want to add, their customer service really is great. After about three years mine just stopped charging. They sent me a brand new model, no questions asked (even though it's been roughly 15 years), and it has worked flawlessly ever since.
This is exactly what we were expecting! Our daughter loves it. And the price was unbeatable, thank you.

Good price. I am using it on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7.0 in lieu of an Otterbox case. Looks good. The tablet is still large by itself, but the thickness gives me something to grab as it bounces around. Also has openings for charging and camera when closed. Only thing that would make it 5 stars:It would be great if there was some form of closure or tab over the screen area. I know you could cut out one with scissors, but, honestly, at this price, no biggie.

I bought this so i would have enough storage for pics....as soon as the first file of pictures turned into my computer, they were gone. All in all, dont go on spending alot if it can do what mine can. Its really not worth it. Just stick to hard drives and pay the right price for each one. Ive had no issues. Never any problem with a WD product...

I guess the saying goes "you get what you pay for" doesn't apply here. The speakers are not very loud. Sound is pretty tinny. Even after a year they still sound like crap. There is no volume on these speakers, that's why my wife told me how there was hardly any bass in them. They were for our 8 yr old so she didn't care since it wasn't loud to her. But if the music isn't playing we wouldn't want it. So we bought her something else.

I gave this book 4 Stars......but the last 40% and some of the first 50%, kept me so confused and frustrated, it got to be unreadable until he finally makes sense a lot more. SPOILERS AHEAD................The part that really threw me, was when he found out she had no money in her bank account, yet continued working for 3 months (well that's what we were told from his point of view).

This is my first purchase of a camera from Amazon.com, but this was definitely not worth it. The box came smashed and one wheel fell out before opening. After the box, I was excited to get going with it. The biggest pain in the butt about it right away when I took it outside because there were NO instructions on how to operate it, either written or pictures - so just by feel I'm very disappointed as well.

I bought this to put my Garmin Nuvi 2730 on the dash of a 2013 Honda Pilot. It installed fairly easily, but I found that the base unit didn't really stick well when wet. After only two weeks it fell off and was lost. Fortunately for me, while the Garmin still works, it now sticks pretty solidly without any tape. In short, these are much cheaper than most holders - even including installation costs.
This product is just not what I expected. Doesn't really do anything when applied and has a funny feeling on your skin after the tan line goes. Good luck!
Great quality and great price. It is well worth the money compared to other ones I have seen. Fit my phone perfectly..

I was thrilled to find an economical replacement filter for my vacuum - after all, you have spent hundreds of dollars on the original one and you're sure your money was well spent. This is almost as bad as that was. The size looks correct, but that's about it. For it not fit, we had to cut off a great deal more than 1/2 inch. Now it's impossible get in or out, so this thing makes cleaning our house very difficult.

I ordered this because it looks really cute, but when i received it, the plastic cover was already broken and now doesn't do its job. Just wanted to say what a waste of money that was, not worth even 2 dollars, so it's going right back...don't buy.

This case is nothing more than a skin for an iphone 4. Nothing more, nowhere less. You can pay $20 on eBay for anything that would be as functional. As said before, don't waste your money. I've had mine since early December & it's already showing signs of discoloration.

I'm not a fan at all of the style which has no pictures throughout but only numbered pages so you don't know where to go from. I suppose I've just read better and worse books, it's almost like one is telling me how cool it is, when in actuality you're reading about some guy who didn't think it through well enough to have good illustrations. It would make for an entertaining book if this could be fixed.
i bought 3 of these. 2 arrived in fine condition but none worked properly.
This is the second one they sent and both quit after a couple of months. Just buy name brand, you get what u pay for.
I bought it to my mom and she's been enjoying it. The battery last for couple of weeks, she has a very large area, but only 2 dogs so it's fine

We used it to make an olive oil and vinegar salad dressing that tasted so good. We just blended together a few tablespoons of coconut oil, vinegar, lemon juice and salt.....in a pitcher for use with hummus, etc. It was yummy!Not too salty or sweet. I would buy this again although there is no expiration date on the bottle. It's like buying a product from the grocery store but at lower price. The bottles we purchased came sealed nicely.

Charges both of my phones at full speed. This product is great. Comes with the cords needed as well. Buy it, you'll like it! ( Don't leave it plugged in too long, though, because this charger doesn't come equipped with a switch).

I purchased this as a gift for someone else. As of yet, they have not heard anything bad about it. The person whom received it seems to love it! It was shipped promptly and came in one piece. All around, very happy with the purchase.

This was the biggest waist of money ever spent. When we hooked it up to our satellite TV in September 2011, within 6 months, the digital tuner died. We had purchased this piece through one of Amazon's marketplace sellers and after three months they would no longer exchange it. If you buy a television from your local big box store, check the warranty before purchase. They will not take anything out even with an original receipt. You have been warned!!!!
Great product, fits my daughter perfect, protects her KINDLE.
This guy talks about how awesome he is. What an ass. He reminds me more then anything else of Richard Pryor as far as comedy goes. But this book makes for some decent light reading.
Just bought this headset and i am very pleased with it. The mic is not too strong like some others and doesn't break up when you put the volume in your ears.
I read the reviews on here before buying, so I can help anyone else who might buy this. Most of these are only partial transcripts from tapes, where they did make it into print.

It's too much for a child to look at the same picture over and over. Kids need fun pictures. They have to learn all new words, colors and shapes. Children may not pay attention well enough or focus on these parts of their learning. Not so this book!! It is boring as well, no color!I will never buy one again. Too much. Very little good art. We put it away after about 30 mins. Wish they would use something other than white paper.
This is really not representative of the work here. The most important songs are taken on acoustic or with very primitive instruments.

Bought this for a friend after we got one to try and was excited she just loves it. Have had problems with other brands in the past not functioning properly but no so here. Hope it continues working out good

The product arrived the first day of estimate delivery and looks great. Although it is an aluminum unit, very lightweight - like holding a can on your shoulder. I did not know that when you buy something such as this that there are no instructions. It was pretty simple to assemble out of the box and get everything set up for use. However, even though it took about 7 minutes per leg, these have taken hours upon hours. As long as my wife does most of the work, I'll be fine.

I like these because they are not made of hard plastic, but very flexible and have a little hole at the top for draining water from them if you leave them out when it is raining. They easily fit in my bird feeders. These bowls were worth what I paid for.

It doesn't stay connected or charge my phone. It's a waste of time and money but i guess thats what you get for cheap. I hope the next one stays connected. If not, I"ll be asking for a refund again. No stars at all! Very disappointing, was looking forward to having it! =/. Hopefully someone can fix it in their review.
Product does everything you need with great fit and good value for what u pay.

The product is not as described. It only has one side of the handle which can move so that you would have to take your pliers with them if you want it closer to you. This makes no sense in a tool like this, unless you plan on using this mostly for small tools.

What can you say about an item like this? Item arrived well packaged as described. Plugged into outlets and nothing. Tried another power strip, still nothing. Returned unit with no trouble. Still waiting after three weeks.

I really like this product it works well. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because after a year the power button got stuck on and we sometimes have trouble turning the TV back on. We don't even use the remote anymore. All in all it's not that big of deal though. It looks great above our fireplace. So far, it's lasted us several years with no problems. It's never been washed or used outside, just inside since it was winter. Overall very pleased.

Bought these to use at work because you never know when some one will need your service. My Samsung Galaxy S4 has an OtterBox defender case. Fits the phones very well however it could be wider to cover top corners.

After I got my order, one of the plastic lids was already opened and put on. The other lid is very small too. Just a normal salad container set or something would be good. No big deal to me but it's disappointing that this wasn't in good condition when it arrived like most other items I've ever purchased from amazon have been. I'm not happy at all. Also as others stated they were received with no packaging around them which makes you wonder.

I enjoyed this book up until the last part. My problem was that it moved so slowly for most of the book. In fact, if you skip to the end, it's not even clear what is happening. There are still some unanswered questions from there, but at least now they get addressed. At least, that's my opinion. I'd recommend it, though only with caution. It has a lot going for it.

This is an amazing CD. Very powerful and touching. I think that each song had me really excited because it was unique. The only thing about this album to mention would be its long duration; the songs do take up most of it. But in general, it's a great album. Good songs, interesting and varied instruments with good vocals. You definitely get your money's worth especially if you bought the enhanced version from Amazon.com. PS: For everyone who's interested in his music, he's also known as "The Voice" on YouTube.

Our dogs don't like this toy. One doesn't even come to get it. The other, she played with for about 30 seconds and then just walked away. Maybe it's better suited for small dogs. Would probably work great on bigger ones…

Good product but if you live in colder weather it may not stand up to the cold. I bought this device because of its size. After receiving mine and using it, found my own solution. The unit works as described; is nice looking, small fits anywhere without being too big or intrusive.

Ok read. Nothing spectacular. It does have pretty hot scenes but just wasnt all that great. Will still look out for more from this author. The book is definitely lacking in details. Like one minute they are all like crazy jealous and the next paragraph everyone just lets things go.

I've never seen anything like it. It doesn't look at all the picture. The picture looks as though there is some sort of rubber pad that comes with it...not in this particular product. You definitely need a different case. And my iPad mini wouldn't fit inside either.
It did not work. Was disappointed in it. Could have been just my computer. Did return it.

I just got off the phone with Canon support after being stuck on hold for at least an hour. Although they claim that this device *might* work using Windows Vista, even their tech people were unable to make it work. Perhaps most disturbing is that there are no downloads available from Canon's Web site and apparently these adapters WILL NOT WORK WITH WINDOWS VISTA. So, although very pretty, it's worthless.

I used this camera for a few years until recently it started malfunctioning...all the lights would come on but no video or photos were recorded. When you turn off the power to it, it just beeps incessantly and shuts down. It is not that expensive of an item, yet as soon as one stops working, it's junk. Too bad for me since I've had two Nikon's in the past. Never again!!!!

I have a Dell Axim with Windows XP. The drive works except that sometimes it is supposed to be plugged in and the computer doesn't recognize it, then later when doing certain task it works, but after awhile it doesn't work anymore. So far only 1 time did not work. But this seems to happen from day 1, there are 2 occasions where i was able to make files accessible on the drive. Also sometimes it fails at times, as if you unplug or try to open folder nothing happened.

If a reader is interested in this book, look at the table of contents. Some book covers don't have even an acknowledgement before being put on bookstores. This cover has several acknowledgments. The publisher claims that there would be another paperback edition out soon by which time I doubt it will include photos or other features worth mentioning.

It does not fit the model I purchased for, and is too long by three inches at it's widest point. I'm just a very disappointed customer. It's also cheaply made. A lot of things are made cheap these days these days. My fault that there was no size selection listed. Now I've wasted over 40 bucks on this useless thing for something I can do without.

I really love the way this TV looks but my LCD and HD channels have a green tint on them. In addition, every channel has digital artifacts in it. Very disappointing. It's an older LG so it may just be quality that varies from model to model. Too bad as I've had luck with their products. : -(Now if only they would fix those issues because of this TV's price...I will return it. Edit: 11/2013 -- This is not what was promised.

I bought this after watching the video for "She Drives Me Wild." The music is a fun song that does sound like it would be good on the radio. This version features great vocals, although I think some of his songs have been better in past performances (for example, he's pretty much stuck to standard rock with no real variation or changes), but overall, the album has lots going - great guitar, bass, drums, and vocals. Some interesting surprises on here too.
The pictures throughout were beautiful however I wish they weren't so big. So many flowers are on display for people like me.
This pillow does NOT hold up well (has ripped already after just over one year using it). Definitely worth spending more money on something that will last.   Rating: 2.
The title says it all. This item doesn't work/was broken. It wasn't worth returning. Wish I had tested before sending as is.

I bought this to do a few simple jobs and just have it around in case the power goes out but as I've tried it, if you put more than one cord into it it overheats. When charging two different brands of batteries that are identical, neither works well or at long charge either. This won't be an option for any serious work done on battery powered items - probably OK with smaller household tools like vacuum cleaners.
Easy to use! The ice scraper is great, but the brush could do with some improvement.
I use these to replace the filters on our air quality monitor. They have done a good job and are just what we needed at half the price that is typically charged. Thanks. :-)
An interesting story, told from inside an unassuming, ordinary middle class family. The characters all have flaws. However, it's a great read. Very well written.

I read the book after its been on my "To Be Read" list all summer and didn't get around to listening until yesterday. Let me say that I'll be sure NOT to buy any more Stephen King's books. This entire reading experience had nothing but bad acting, a terrible script, an overly-dramatic score, plot holes big enough for a garbage truck, lack of continuity, poor use of description, abrupt endings and so on. For anyone who spent money thinking they were getting something good, this just is not good.
These brushes are ok.

I purchased this with the hopes that it would be an enjoyable experience for my little cat. It turned out to be about 10 minutes of fun and then went right back in it's box. My cat likes toys too, but he is not a crazy mouse hunter. But we did try to entice him around once or twice more so he might want this. The "mouse" only has one small section on his back.
When I received my box it was pretty beat up and had a lot of air missing. The company is good they refunded me after contacting them.
It's a good case, does its job of protecting my Kindle; however, it's a little heavy for such a small case. Also, there is no place to put a light. Maybe on their next edition. I'll be waiting.

I thought this product had great reviews. It is definitely not a "heavy duty" product. The frame on one side was cracked and the pieces that hold up the sides are not sturdy at all. Even if it would have been okay once assembled, it's flimsy enough as is! I guess you get what you pay for! However, since Amazon refunded me for it, I'm no longer too upset about it being cheaply made.
If you were on earth during the 50's or 60's the first thing you'll need (besides a bottle of vodka to wash down your tea),is this set.

I got these on sale at Target for only $8.99 which is a great price even if they cost $19.95 normally. The sound quality is very low so the bass tends to hurt but all in all, it was worth what I paid for, as this will work pretty well with my mp3 player when working out. However, there are some cons that aren't exactly ideal about it. First, while its still comfortable around your ears, you do get fatigued from time to time.
This movie has many funny moments.
Bought this doll for my granddaughter.

I bought the Zune HD on sale from Best Buy to give as a gift, and when it arrived I tested it out before gift giving (wanted to make sure that even if something malfunctions in shipping, nothing could happen too soon to be giftable). As other reviewers noted, this unit is clearly defective and you can imagine why by looking at its physical design. When playing music, after about 5 seconds of playback, sound would cut out.

I've given other books by this author more stars so I didn't have much expectations of how they'd be translated. My biggest complaint though is that the book started out interestingly enough but then lost my interest in about thirty pages. At no point did I care why his sister or sister-in-law liked and loved him. That was what made it too annoying for me.

I've had my phone for a few days. I love the feel of it in my hands. It's very light, but it feels more expensive than its $79 price tag. The screen is bright and crisp - that's as far as I'd go with an impressive display. Unfortunately, you can't really tell this from looking at it. There's too much reflection during day light. At night, it's even worse. You'll need to cover up your phone's beautiful back or you'll notice everything reflecting off you.

I bought this for a small dog (about 12 lbs) to keep him occupied while I'm at work. When he started using it, the collar felt tight and wasn't allowing him full freedom of movement, but now we have been wearing it regularly since getting it two weeks ago. He has calmed down so much that he actually lies down. We just got one size up from recommended sizing on our other dog (12 pounds). If nothing else, I will buy again.

I use this every day. My only issue with it is that the handle doesn't collapse like in most other OXO products. This can definitely be fixed by using some of your own strength to snap it. Otherwise it's great! It would get 5 stars, but that's always an option for me. :)

Ok. It's a nice book, but you can easily find all of this information online for free. It's just an extension of what the free web sites tell you. So there really isn't much to gain from it. I was thinking it would be more helpful than that. Most likely not, since most people know about common sense tips like drink lots water or get enough sleep. Well, if that's your case, by all means go buy the book. Or download any of the many books out there.

First read "The Great Gatsby!," loved it and wanted more after that! Couldn't wait to get started on a new classic. I thought this would be like the last book that put me back to reading. Just couldn't make it. Don't waste your time! No one in my group was able to finish it, except for maybe myself. It's slow, boring, repetitive, boring. Can't tell whether it's written by an amateur. Disappointed. Won't buy any more Patterson books.

The battery pack worked fine for about a year and then the charger stopped working. It didn't completely charge it because of that. For that matter when I got it, the charger smelled like burnt plastic. A few months before, it would keep flashing the red light while plugged in. That one probably is just faulty. The camera works well, but it's getting worn out due to me charging with this piece attached all day.

I'm sure my mom or whoever I gave this to loved it but even though there were no markings on the bottom of it, she thought that was gross and disgusting. It did not say anywhere that the picture came from a computer. Not worth buying. My gf likes the design anyway. She has an ipad, and I bought her one for Christmas. I'll have to get two different ones because she's gonna want one. I'd recommend going through ebay first.
Very good movie.

This product had no impact on our mouse problem,which was becoming less and less of a problem. We have been using this for over 3 months, maybe it has not done its job, but at any rate, we aren't convinced. The problem is, mice are attracted to the food in my kitchen. Mice cannot see through metal foil, so what works wonders for them would be useless here.
It's not worth even downloading it, let alone reading! Even if it's free, don't waste your time! Just read online for free. Seriously. Don't wast your money.

I have been buying coffee at Starbucks since 2004. My friend gave me a French press, so when he threw out his new one, I tried his press and hated it. So I've decided to order my own. This is the worst product in history. No matter how little coffee you put into it, it seems to be too strong. You can still smell that horrible taste with every sip...disgusting. Waste of money. :-(
These are great headphones! They look great, they feel good too, only issue i had with them when we used them, one of us would say what he wanted.
This stuff tastes fantastic.

Not a very good book. I will not buy anymore of this series. This was the first of his books that left me saying WHAT? Maybe he has something great in him but you won't know because there is absolutely nothing about this book worth reading. Save your money.
It does exactly what I wanted. Just snap in and the cover snaps on. Easy to hold when reading. Love it.

Very disappointed with these cookbooks. The food in them is bland and flavorless. They are just a lot of filler. Some ingredients such as beans have an ingredient you already put into your body that day. Not really worth it.
This was so funny! I liked how it included the old man and the funny stuff. A must read for all.
I bought these for our small office. A lot of ink was out in a little bit over two months.
Did anyone else notice an smell that lingered for weeks? It's nauseating! I don't know how it could have possibly gotten there, if so many others haven't noticed.
I played a few matches online before deciding that EA made their last attempt at making the game. They have managed to ruin baseball for fans like me.
The information is good and the writing easy to understand, but as a user of digital cameras I found there was nothing new. There were too few photos for me to really relate to.
i could have had a better book for free with links to some web page of the same info available free I feel ripped off!

Awesome little case for my Kindle. This was a replacement of the first one and this thing keeps everything safe in here. I love it! Also, it takes me only second to put down the kindle when leaving or going out which comes in handy since its always on me, so now no more wondering what I'm holding all over me. No problem closing up either. Great product. And Amazon shipped lightning fast! Definitely suggest buying this!

I am sorry to say this is not the same quality as the one it replaced. The plastic on the top was warped and broke within a week of receiving it. Not sure if this had ever been returned but I am disappointed in how flimsy this replacement was.

Not really worth the price or effort. You only get 25 pages of information. Very little detail. The other reviews are accurate, it is a small book. Just don't buy it. Use your own knowledge. It's easy to do, and the pictures are fun to look at. Better ideas can be found online for free. Skip this one. If you want, check out Google Images because you'll find good ones for FREE. Save $16.

The cards are great, but they don't have envelopes included. You can't tuck them under one of your other mail envelopes. Also there aren't any tabs on them. I put stickers all over mine, so you can't see thru them, but it's a really great buy if you're looking for something very cute and girly.

Very poorly constructed and no screws to hold the doors on, just plastic tabs on each door. They don't stay up very well. Also when you open it, I was a bit worried that something inside this box would fall out of place etc. It seems like it would break if we tried opening it. You can get alot better cases for much more money at local retail stores. We really wish we'd bought those cases.

It seems as though the author went nowhere with this story. No new ideas here, just an excuse to have sex for a cheap thrill for everyone. The most romantic book I ever read was "Shades of Grey." This is almost laughable. My copy might turn up in a charity shop. Do not waste your money on it.

I like the fact that this can plug straight into my computer, but unfortunately only one side of the audio is playing. A bit disappointing and doesn't compare to those I've had for mp3 players. Maybe something I'm doing wrong or not installing it correctly. But either way, it's useless to me unless someone could tell me how. Thanks.

The first time I pulled a bag of litter out the mesh ripped right off as well as my arm. We were on our way to clean it and ended up using towels for pooper scooping. Never even got through one use. Definitely not worth purchasing!!!

This was one of the worst books I have ever read. The plot is hard to buy and not well developed at all. It had way too much sex - who cares whether they are a couple or not, really. Save your money. It's terrible.

Exactly perfect for our needs. The light bulb is a little bit pricey but its the only way we could have this type of lamp. Well made. Arrived promptly. Good quality product. I bought this lamp so that my husband can be in bed during the day after surgery. It takes up almost no space and works beautifully. He loves it. We would purchase again without hesitation. Thanks.
They sent me the wrong color. Not just that, I have no receipt or box to send it back in. Very disappointing.

When I finished the third book it was apparent that while all 3 books in this series were well written and edited there wasn't much to them. Like one of my favorite things about the "Hunger Games," this author would like us to believe these children are some kind of special breed that has been chosen by god for war. Really? This is just silly.
This product did not help me at all.......i used them and didn't really see any effect..Not a waste off money but it doesn't work for me....

My daughter is a huge fan of this book, and we were so excited to get it. When she opened it with anticipation, however, I noticed the paper quality was much lower than what I had anticipated (looks like they have reduced the stock from the first printing for that reason - although not all pages are printed on a bad paper).

It was a christmas present. On first use one of the legs collapsed. When I contacted the company we informed them that they were defective....
The response from them:We will replace as soon as it is back in stock. Thank you for your business!Customer Service RepresentativeThis means I have to pay to send this piece of junk back. They don't even give me an option on either sending another but wait for several more days and then return it.

Well, I'm pretty upset about the fact that I wasted my money on this! I knew it wouldn't be great quality, but I'd hoped it'd at least look good and not fall apart! It's really cheaply made. It was packaged like it's going to come in a big puffy plastic bag, instead of being carefully boxed, so when you take out your purse from the shipping box, and see how flimsy this thing is, you'll think "Wow, $50.

A very good and fascinating topic is explored with great depth and style in "The Woman Who Made the World" by Alison Weir. We see what it was like for a British woman to travel around colonial Africa during an amazing era...or rather life. "Life at Zanzibar, 1839-1904" covers a broad range of topics surrounding European colonialism, including many unique details about individual women.

This is probably my fault for not knowing what "decent/good" was before I bought it, but this isn't even that bad- it may be mediocre, or decent, with great acting. It would have been quite boring otherwise. Even a few good lines, of some sort are about all there is. The characters were just too shallow to make an impact. My expectations weren't met. Not only that...

This was an average book. I have read some of her other books and they were a little more interesting than this one. As much as she writes about food, it needs to at the least be entertaining. She should try new things like how do you start your next book without using the "food porn" term when talking about food? The beginning where she tells stories with recipes, doesn't sound appetizing & seems out done here. It really is better than a lot that are written today.

The Good:-Solid feel.-Easy to open and use with one hand as advertised.-Good sized opening that can accept larger items. The Bad:- Not enough weight in the base of each piece for them not to tip easily. This results in dishes falling out when being washed because a small part would drop while holding it, instead it bounces around as you wash it.

I was not too impressed with this CD. It's alright, but the songs could have worked better as long a he wasn't so over dramatic. The song about having sex for money had to go into my car because it is just too much.
Good product. Easy set up. Does exactly as promised.
Does what it's supposed to.

I did not see this one coming at all it was easy to guess what was going on. But that does make the drama much more of a fun time. And no cliff hanger. Thanks for getting my moneys worth as you say. That is always appreciated.

After getting this for free on Kindle through Amazon Prime, I have to say that it was quite enjoyable. I'll get my negative first off... the spelling and grammar mistakes drove me crazy!!! But that's what all books in e-format are like nowdays. It's very frustrating when you realize you're reading an e-book by someone who barely speaks English because they can't figure out how to correct their own work. In terms of storyline, it's fairly interesting with some great twists thrown in.

I was disappointed with this product. On the ad it says that its a 4 inch wide cutting board and also comes in different sizes. When received they are just 3 inches wide. They should clarify what size is really offered. This will be going back. :( So disappointed!!
I bought two of these, one didn't even work. What more can i say. Buy something else.

I'm a professional photographer and use this card in my camera on a consistent basis. Never had any issues with it until i was out shooting at the Zoo while I took pictures of some rhinos. When I shot 4 pictures, half were lost so after reviewing the data from it, I found that every other file has significant write errors. Now i'm stuck unable to open the file. This is extremely frustrating. Don't try these cards unless you're taking them for absolutely sure.
These shoes are cute and stylish but don't stay on.
It was perfect! Just what they said it would be! Great price! We loved it!I highly recomend it.

I purchased the product and did not use it for a few months. Finally gave in to having my carpets cleaned. Today I went over with this steam cleaner and guess what? It just got so hot that there was no way I can vacuum any further. There is condensation on all of the brushes because they stopped turning. The carpet looks like crap now. DO NOT BUY!!! Just spend another $2000 up front and enjoy your new machine.

I bought this as a gift for my husband who loves his wine. This looks great on the counter and was packed very nicely so nothing arrived broken or broken. It has become our favorite decanter. Love it! Thanks Amazon too!

It's ok but not as good as.others out there. Most books are written in modern english. If you have a problem with today's language and use too many words it's hard for young minds to follow. This was a little simpler.
This is perfect size of cable.

You must be a serious fan of these guys to give this anything more then 1 star. If you want some pretty good bluesy tunes that are not as hard hitting like in his last two albums, get the old Black Diamond Band or Joe Bonamassa albums. I have every CD he has done, and there is no shortage oftop notch music there. And most of it with excellent music. This new album, while technically good seems completely different than all those.

It's nice that this product has a wide range on the suction cups, and the size is also large. Unfortunately it will not stick to my textured surface. My dashboard is too smooth, so I had to buy different one.

This was an enjoyable read, but if I were rating this book based on the author's credibility, it would receive a minus one star rating. I'm writing because of what's contained in Ms. Sullivan's book. On page 11, where she claims that Dr. Sears "wrote to two of my colleagues and asked for their help with getting another lab assistant out there, which is what I'd have done." What kind of moronery can occur when a person writes about somebody they don't even know.

I read a few of these novels and they were ok. Not the best, but not horrible. This is one of them! It reads like it's written by someone who speaks in "southern twang" as opposed to English (I'm from Southern California). There certainly are plenty things that just do NOT look believable. Some items may be possible, others questionable. It's all based on old history so we can't question it. Don't buy this one. Read a non-fiction work instead.

I have ordered these bulbs and been happy with the brightness of light. However, at first they burn brighter than expected. Now that my plants are about 3 years old and most don't grow well with just this type bulb, it seems dimmer on a few of them. Not sure if it's me or not, but we were replacing 40 watt lights - so for now, we may keep them as back up bulbs. Will switch to other LED bulbs, hope others help. 
 Rating: 4.

I have used this several time to clear off a ceiling fan with paint splattering. It worked very well. This is especially handy if you need to clean up an area quickly without having to drag out the heavy hose. The hose will not kink easily and can handle cleaning much larger spaces. Would recommend this.

This product is totally garbage. I have it connected to a Windows XP computer and I'm getting very low levels of connection in the other room. That's right -- if you are trying to hook up a router through multiple walls, make sure they are not even 10 foot separates! If you're looking at this for wireless internet that runs behind a desk - STAY AWAY! You'll regret it. Buy another product. I recommend paying more money to get something with better quality.

I have a Toshiba 15.6" laptop that fits perfectly in this bag. However, you CANNOT put the power cord for the Laptop in the bag while it is inside your carry case, as others will not allow that to be done. This leaves only one option, placing the cord out of site and just carrying the case by itself. That means there isn't much padding, so if it's dropped too hard things aren't protected.

I bought this product thinking it would be great when i go camping but the main reason why its terrible is because It doesnt include a carry bag or something to put all of your things in it. It says you get two sleeping pads and 2 pillows. I thought what good if im not able to keep them clean after just one camping trip. This thing is HUGE! Like the size ad said it was a lot bigger than my queen mattress so that sucked big time.

What a waste of time. I should have read the reviews first. This book was written by someone who only knew how to take people's descriptions (the author's own for several instances) and twist them. He obviously didn't understand that characters in movies don't really talk like that. His attempts at dialogue would never even pass as authentic conversation - they were so poorly done he seemed more interested in writing his script than getting it into print. My advice? Don't put your trust in this author.
Its a nice poster, looks exactly like how you see it. However there were two flaws with this product.

The book was very informative, I will still be working with other professionals but the information that this publication gives is just too general to really answer my questions. But that's a good thing as when I feel overwhelmed I'll read through the basics from beginning until end. Very useful

This is not a book of poetry but it's rather the author's opinions. If I had my druthers I'd give this zero stars. He does have some good points, however most are generalizations based on personal experience or how he feels at any given point in life. Not much for new research either. Save your money.
My dog loves it! She is crazy about it. she even goes where we don't go. And when im not watching her, i play with her just like that. Great item! Very satisfied.

I've not read this book, but some friends said it was very good. However, I don't know where they got their information. When my friend and sister called back, after I bought the book she said, "Oh wow, so that's how it's done.". I'm just saying that because people shouldn't waste their money. It's all hearsaid. My friend, who is an accomplished author, also said her editor asked her to tone down the profanity in order for it be passed as a Christian book...

This book reads like an 8th grader's attempt at writing a story. The character development in the first half is almost non-existent, and I couldn't even finish reading it. Also, if you don't want to know any more about this family, read the reviews on the Amazon web site.

The plot makes sense, but the character development was lacking. I felt like they hardly talked to each other at all. And it didn't seem clear who this person is supposed to be. Was she a woman? A teenager? What's her name, please? I'm going back and reading another of his books because he kept me interested all throughout this. But that being said, I'd actually reread some parts to see if I'd missed something, which I'll have to do now. The concept for the story sounded intriguing though.

This seems to work but it takes several days after you put a flea pill on the pet before seeing an improvement. My dog has fleas everyday so we just switch collars when our current one runs out of pills. Good product. Cheaper than buying at vet office.
Easy installation even though there were no instructions. Once installed worked well.

It may have worked fine but I am afraid to buy a new one because the next time my wife tries it out it will break or wear out!! It's not worth it! She used for about 2 hours and that's it. That's all its good for. Now she is having trouble using it at all.

I bought the same kind of adapter from another reseller on eBay but was sent a generic unit and had to return it. This is probably just a manufacturing error as several other reviews have pointed out. I noticed others having problems with the device being able to support multiple USB devices. This has NOT been my experience. As for the vendor themselves, good luck. I've heard nothing back so far, including an email asking where I'm coming from. The product works fine, but this vendor doesn't even respond.
For me, as a fan i found nothing outstanding in this movie - except that the director didn't try much, at all. Even worse, it feels completely unoriginal with all the themes used by other movies.

Very interesting story but I had a hard time reading this book because of the punctuation and word usage errors. There were so many errors that I think it was proof read before publishing. It's like they never reviewed the text or spellcheck. Also, when one character started to describe himself, there would be sentences describing another characters feelings towards him, even though he hadn't acted toward him for several chapters now. It seemed confusing. Overall an okay story, pretty well written until about mid-way through.

It is definitely a unique design. Unfortunately, it does not function well. You have to be very precise with your touch and you don't really feel the brush on my teeth at all. Not sure how else I can complain about something when it's still working perfectly after several months. One of the things that makes this toothbrush stand out is that there is no battery. With other batteries, they inevitably fail or die because they're always sitting around. This one doesn't.

Not very good, not like the ones from back in high school, don't get this one. Get a used copy that will probably be cheaper. This one only downloaded twice before it stopped working properly for me. I was disappointed. Waste of money.
This was for my husband but did not like the smell or taste. We will go back to his original product.

The levels are not challenging at all; very little variety in scenery, buildings, objects etc. I'm trying this on my Kindle Fire HD, so maybe better than others. For $2.99 I didn't expect much, but since games only cost 99c or $1.

I love her and will probably never buy another cd of hers because of this. This is one of my favorite singers. She could give Anita Baker a run for the money, even with less talent. Her voice just goes beyond incredible. This new "performance" by Anita, was pure garbage. I hope the fans of this amazing singer are not as greedy as she seems to be. What do u expect from crap like this. It's horrible. It almost sounds more like an infomercial then entertainment.

I really thought that this was a great price for the amount of product. It does dry quickly too. But, i bought it just to take my dogs outside for an hour in very hot weather, hoping it won't be too much, so that's why I went with "waterproof". The problem is you can't walk through wet grass when wearing it. My puppy had gotten dirt ALL OVER his face and neck due to splashing water all day long.

It has been one year since I purchased my first book on the kindle, and this by far is second to worst purchase i ever made. The information in it seems like it's from old magazine articles, especially around a specific topic that doesn't seem relevant anymore. Save your money, or get something more contemporary as well.

The unit was received defective. Could not change the battery on front of unit. Only have had for a month or two and haven't even used it. The problem is with the product itself. It just seems to be poorly made. I do like my other Nikon items that seem to last years but this one didn't live up to any good reviews. Maybe it has been improved since they made it? My old camera broke before Christmas and then bought another Nikon. Had a great time taking pictures.

I read this book very quickly, which was kind of strange, it took about a day, and wasn't bad but certainly not for the price. There are a lot of typos throughout most if the book. In one paragraph he refers to himself in 3rd person singular - that could be easily fixed by using plural pronouns. It gets quite confusing at times, especially when there is only one sentence per page. Also some sentences don't end properly leading into the next one.
It's basically an infomercial for their products. Most likely won't use the information given here.

When I bought this book I was expecting more information. Most of it I've had heard before and could find very easily at the library. There are a few helpful tips, but overall, not worth paying for it! Unless you're someone who knows absolutely nothing about getting older, then maybe it's worthy - to save you some money. It only takes me 10 min to write my thoughts on every topic in the book.
The USB is the standard size and did not plug into my computer. Maybe they sent me an invalid one? I'm going to just return it.

There is only 1 reason this book even got published. You have to wonder where his editors were when this, the final chapter of a series was being written, if an editor went in and just picked up something that didn't match with what the previous 20 chapters had planned out. Like someone said before, he makes so many stupid decisions I'm surprised it didn't spiral down into an actual story.

I didn't realize how many people complained about the handle getting loose until after it was delivered. So now it's really not so bad but if you're going to be using on a regular basis you'll want to get some superglue. Otherwise this thing is awesome. The weight of the scoop fits perfectly in my hand. If anyone knows what super glue is please comment & tell me. :)

I ordered this for my grandson's Christmas stocking, as it is advertised to be "high quality." You can buy something similar at the dollar store or Walmart. It looks nothing like it does in the photo - if that, of course. One leg has a broken peg on it, and that makes me wonder how long it's going to last. The whole thing isn't what I'd call sturdy enough for a boy over 2. I won't purchase anything from this vender again.

I'm sorry folks, but this book was just not interesting. It is obvious that Ms. Roberts likes to describe sexual scenes - very explicit and over the top. And she has several ways of describing things (words like "intense", "hot" etc.) which means you get to hear a lot about each scene from all different peoples' perspectives.

Failed on 5th month to date. Worked great at first, but then started having major issues over time. Not worth it. Going back to Western Digital. At least they will give you 2-3 years of service. But if you're building a data system or doing any amount of file transfers -- look elsewhere.

The first of the series should have ended after book five. I hate not knowing what happens and will most likely quit this series. Too bad. Ms. Harris really was a great writer. Don't know if I'll get to read any more books or finish what I've already read. Please give up now. You are capable but you need someone who has actually been an author for all your novels. Thank you.

At first I was really excited about this. It seemed very sturdy and had great features. After several weeks the little plastic clip at the top to hold a brush inside began breaking. Eventually, the whole thing flew open in my backpack causing most of what is contained within. Not worth it for long trips either. I'm still looking for something similar but with better quality.
I have not had any problems whatsoever since owning this coffeemaker about 8 weeks.

I'm very disappointed with this product! I purchased a set that was listed on my Amazon Wish List in December, 2012, from BuyItNow.com. It arrived at the end of May. Two weeks later after installing it and waiting for rain showers, another unit began leaking water by one wall of each shower. This has continued through to now, July 2013. The other two units remain dry. Buyer beware, these products will only last about 9 months max. Don't waste your money purchasing anything like this.

I love this product, and was so happy to find it at cheaper price. It works great. The price was a little high. However, even though the cost is high, you get better quality with it. You can see right through the bags of food now without wasting them or having them turn black. This brand is hard plastic which lasts longer.

This was the very first book she ever picked up....and that is how I made it through the entire thing. She also likes reading books to "show" off her vocabulary words.....which by the way, are not even common words in most places. And if you look at her blog, her writing style resembles more a young teen than an adult. It's all over the place. And there isn't a single paragraph that doesn't begin with some meaningless word.

This book is a long winded and quite boring summary of what our future will be like, no clear predictions or solutions. The author tries hard but doesn't quite make it. If you want to know how bad things could get, get this book. It's not the only one, I got it because everyone said it was so much better than 'Ready Ahead', just don't pay for it.

It doesn't really work well. The cover is very hard to remove. I had a problem with it sticking on the iPad because when trying to remove the first time and there was some kind of grease or dust that made bubbles. Second time, after placing case on, still have this problem. Not happy about it, would not recommend it. In addition, my ipad slips out easily. There are two pieces where the magnets are, one magnetic closure for cover, other holds cover.

I could not get the thing to work with my Canon Rebel XSI or any of three lenses I've tried it with. It is probably fine for some cameras and lens combos, but it's useless when you can't get a good focus at infinity focus. Don't buy it. You will be disappointed.
Nice product but the picture shows a large container and it was really small. I guess that's my fault for not reading more into it. Great quality, though.

this book was interesting but too short. I would have like to see more of the story line on how it turned out....there only just skimmed the surface when we got there, then over to the other side. if i knew better i wouldn't waste my time getting it.
The quality not as good as previous version.

I was excited to see a non-stick pan available with this type of nonstick. Very disappointing. It is NOT able t cook an egg without using more oil than any conventional non stick pan. And cooking spray and butter are recommended. The product says it makes eggs "easy". After making two batches my kids said the eggs stuck in many spots and they were very hard boiled. My traditional heavy cast iron skillet fried them like frying chicken. Would not recommend this product.

We have two cats who were not excited at all by these toys. The "frog" is quite small and just didn't hold anything their interest in it. There was only one treat that they found to be interesting. That being said, the product packaging states there are four different chew options for the wand, but I will give you a tip from my own experience with our cats: we don't usually go looking for more treats once we've finished watching the ball roll down it's path.

I hate to say this, but the book started out with so much promise. The storyline was interesting with a female President in an office of power and yet there wasn't enough time devoted to exploring her character. So many times throughout the book, it felt like she could be anyone, except her. It seemed that everything came at us too quickly, not giving me more depth then what I knew before.

I got my book last week. As a person with some background, its difficult to review the material in this book. I've noticed that people have criticized it for missing details, but I'd like to tell them the following:1) When is a simple "check up" not complicated enough? How could you possibly miss that?!2) The author says to use your own methods of diagnosis, especially over those of doctors based abroad.

I have bought this device on Amazon through the seller "SuperGadgets4u. It's terrible. It doesn't hold a charge very long. Battery runs out super fast. The buttons stopped working after six months of use. This is an absolute waste of money. Don't buy it unless you want to feel like you're ripping your hair out. Horrible device. If anyone from'supergadgets@ua.com' reads this, go back and redesign this.

The whole book was a huge disappointment. I had to read it for my Intro to Art class and all of the classes had to do with it, so there were no other choices. However, I'm always open to try new things, but this time all I've gone through is irritation. It just took too long to get somewhere, which makes you irritated along time trying to catch your breath. As much as I'd like to believe otherwise, I don't recommend it.

I usually do my best to always remember the most important things in life. But for one, this novel was so poorly written that it put me right on edge. The author seems confused about whether she wants people to care whether or not a main character is really alive. And I feel like that's exactly what happens a lot of the time -- you get some random guy who has sex with other people, and suddenly he's dead, along with all his friends.
My 6 year old son loved this book, it's very funny. And we all enjoyed reading this together at times. The story didn't have to be read in order. You just skipped around until you got thru it.

Not worth a buck. Would not pay more for this. Was very disappointed. Read the other reviews before buying. This was written by an eleven year old. I have been reading all these years and this is garbage. Very little information about cats.

It took only a couple of days for my cats to figure out how this is supposed to work. They love the little cardboard perches but it didn't last long at all before they decided that there was nothing good inside. I had hoped by buying them something that looked interesting and wasn't totally made in China, which so many products are. Sadly after about six months their attention has shifted from the scratching area upstairs to throwing up on the carpets.
Love it! The top drawer wasn't completely straight out when i received it, but easy enough fix.

I ordered 7 of these chargers for my kids and the charging stations did not work. Even if everything worked as a charger they still come in 3 different shapes on two opposite sides that will only fit their tablets one was suppose to be an inch x 1 1/4, other just about 2 inches x 4 inches.

This is a fine little product. It was very difficult to find this model and I am glad that the vendor fulfilled my order with prompt shipping so the item would be delivered for Christmas. Great seller. Thank you.
This is so delicious i can't stop eating it. So glad that amazon carries such yummy healthy products too.

While the story is good and I like reading new authors who write, it should be noted that they probably had better editors. Many typos or incorrect wording made me have to flip back a couple of pages when re-reading. Overall, for such an inexpensive book, not bad.

So far after 2 years of use it still works fine but what I like the most is its durability. It has been dropped and abused daily. The plastic casing that encloses the phone broke about a year ago. I replaced it with this one as in my opinion it was better quality at first although there are some minor issues. As I've said before it's good for protecting your phone. Some people have noted issues when removing the case to place on their charger.

You just can't get these to stick for anything. And if they are not very sticky why is the manufacturer advertising you can write on their stuff? There is so much glue that this product leaves a white film all over your item. I had about 20 pieces of paper and items of clothing that I attempted to put them on. It was almost like it never dried at all. The plastic seems okay but it's not working right. At least Amazon has a great return policy.
The book was a very easy read. It made you interested to learn what is going on in the lives of this family. It's just amazing.

I just finished reading this book. As much as I was looking forward to it, the conclusion simply fell flat. No closure, no closure. I didn't think it really explored any of the issues that existed at all with these characters. Just a disappointing ending. Now on a different note, I'm glad Amazon gave me credit for this book, because if not, they wouldn't have. It wasn't even worth my time reading. This book sucked.

I bought this item for my wife as a birthday gift. This is the worst camera ever...she had one of these before and it worked well, but like others, hers would not even turn on after just 3 months. So, now we will be stuck with something that doesn't work because they no longer make them. Don't waste your money. Go elsewhere...and don't buy from Target. Their stores are awful about returns at all. A lot more money to spend elsewhere, you get what you pay for, unfortunately.

When the box arrived the outside of it had been smashed by something. The instructions were all over inside and could not be opened without taking apart the entire thing. I ended up putting these things into a glass vase that had never before received anything. Needless to say when my wife saw this she was very mad. Oh well. Next time I,d just go to Target. As the saying goes you get what you pay for. Very disappointed especially since it really looked nice but unfortunately did not.
Excellent video quality. It is nice to be able to leave my laptop in charging dock while watching tv from bed.

The book would be an OK value at twice the price. There might have been some really interesting research undertaken in trying to establish a list of the top 100 movies ever made and their critical success or failure, however, this kind of writing about movie review is very dry. It lacks focus throughout and could certainly use tighter editing. While I suppose if you are writing historical analysis, it makes sense, but for most readers, there were parts here that seemed so unfocused as they ran on.

This was one of my favorite Christmas movies when I was a kid. My children loved it and now our grandchildren. There is probably not that much action in the beginning but as you get into it, it's very entertaining. It reminds me more of Tom Sawyer by Charles Dickens. If your kids like Charlie and Lola, you'll love this movie.

This item is way too small, more for a cat than a cat. And the material isn't very nice. It feels like an apron from when I was in high school that wore cotton but with plastic sleeves. You would think they put these types of items through some sort of test before making them. The neck hole wasn't big enough to actually fit my 5 lb pomeranian and his little tail. He's still small.

It's ok to read but for a book about dog training it didn't seem like there was a lot of specific info or guidance. There is one very simple sentence that helped train my dog, and then it's the same things every week. Glad I bought it used. Good luck if you buy new. But this was helpful in some ways. We have a new puppy right now we needed help with potty training.

At first, I was excited to receive an email about this book as it sounded fantastic. Unfortunately, it wasn't written well - some of the scenes were hard for me to keep up with due to the poor editing (grammatical errors included) which made it seem like parts did not make sense.

I received this set as a Christmas gift and it is absolutely gorgeous! However after about 5 months use the mugs started to leak, which defeats the purpose of buying them. The whole reason we spent money on high quality stainless steel cups in the first place was that they are so sturdy. Needless to say, I'm quite disappointed. So for now we're stuck with these. If you get these, make sure you hand wash. That way nothing breaks off inside these mugs.

These pillows are quite firm and seem to get all stuffed up at once. It's especially noticeable when you put your head down in between them. It gets even worse during sleep as you can feel where you're headed without actually laying down.

It didn't work at all on our Toshiba Thrive Tablet/10.1, so we had to keep it plugged in whenever needed. I am disappointed with my purchase, but thankfully the seller was very polite and will refund me fully. If this item isn't for your particular tablet, or brand of device, you may have better luck than us.

I read the book because it had good reviews but was not happy with. The main character in my opinion is too mean for a real woman. She did do alot to help her friend so that she could be with her boyfriend. But then turned and cheated on him with who ever happened to like her. I don't understand how anyone can think that cheating makes you want more. This is why we have marriage.
This book was ok and had a good basic plot but needed more detail. I would recommend as an easy read to pass the time. Enjoy!
This product is very disappointing. The speakers suck. If you listen too loud or turn up bass, then its distorted. We couldn't even use them in my daughters nursery.

I am a huge fan of the Bourne series and when it came to buying this, even considering purchasing it in Blu-Ray, since there are not enough movies released with this version (the latest being 'American Psycho'), especially from Sony like they did about The A-Team, then I thought that "hey, why not?" Well it's sad but true, no extras, barely any special features, basically just a repackaged DVD.

It is perfect to use on a hot day. I love that I can pull off the bottom and put my arms through so it gets really warm. The fabric has been durable. Would definitely buy again. Shipping was super fast. Thank you! (:

The picture quality is great, but the fact that you can actually read it off the SD card sucks and I will NEVER buy another Polaroid item. So if anyone has any ideas for a digital frame - not Polaroid, of course :) Buy THIS FRAME! or anything else from Sony instead!Also it's so small - about 6" by 2'. But they don't show that!! It's hard to see in this picture.

My wife has read all of DeMille books since they were first released and have loved them all. I too had the same experience with "The Lion's Game" This was a complete waste of time in which to read. If he doesn't do these novels right we will not buy another book by him. We will wait until his next one comes out. Very disappointing.

The one thing about this movie that just seems out of place is the music score. I don'tice a lot of great movies have an incredible soundtrack and it almost always gets me hyped up to see them in theaters because you don't believe these movies, they're actually written for soundtracks.. Well, they are not here. Not even close. In case anyone cares, the music was quite terrible. A cheap guitar or synth with some cheesy, low quality 80s sounding effects.

My only problem with this book was some of the stories were not accurate. One story had a boy in high school trying to run away from home into adulthood by becoming an FBI agent and making millions in Hollywood. His wife got pregnant but he did not. There are many more that could have been mentioned on how his real mother never really existed or if she even existed. He lived under someone else's name for years then remarried after divorcing twice. Also, the names given in the book where different.

I should of sent it back but never got around to it. Don't waste your money on the product. Mine would only work for a little while and then you were just lucky if it would work. Very cheaply made. No idea why this was not in its original packaging. Never worked properly even though they claimed brand new. This is definitely junk!! Save yourself some grief buy elsewhere.

The problem I have with this is that you cannot put many items on it. You can only hang towels or the kind of shirts and stuff from what i am experiencing. And there isn't enough room for that. It was easy to assemble.

I ordered this game to play with my 4 year old. It was not fun for him or me. What is going on here? We both have very different idea of what a child's mind should be interested in and while it doesn't hurt that he prefers Disney Princess games, he also tends more towards the more simple games like Spot it. There are better options than this. If you would rather your child just stare at pictures all day and eat cookies, then by all means get them.

If I hadn't spent so much on this book I'd be calling Amazon about a return. I read the first story and then skipped to chapter 2. This one was awful. The characters were unlikeable (well maybe not the wife). They didn't appear as real people. I can't believe anyone would spend money or time reading this.

I purchased the book in hopes to find out some information on my dog's behavior. Unfortunately, the method mentioned by the author was not helpful unless you were a total novice at training your dog. The tone of her writing is very condescending-it sounded like she had just gotten out of an English class and couldn't get beyond that first "lesson." Some readers may find this helpful... but for us, we found it offensive.

This set of headphones is perfect for my needs. I will be purchasing a second one soon to complete the set. They work great and are easily as comfortable or better than some that I've tried. For the price you really get your money's worth. I'd recommend this product to anyone who wants a decent pair at an affordable price. These were originally priced @ 100.00 dollars. Well worth purchasing.
It does the job. But its big and not very user friendly. I would get a different product if I know what i really need.

This item does not work. We tried it for 1 hour with high hopes. My daughter was so excited to use it. It has only resulted in disappointment. She cried because the product still didn't produce a sound at all. When we attempted to return it, Amazon said they will take no responsibility since their window of opportunity had passed by our receiving this product through Amazon. I would think that amazon themselves should be checking out other products better than this.

I received this book in a rush but it doesn't really give you much detail on creating a blog. It reads more like an article to me. As for the content, it's pretty generic. There isn't any real information here. If you've got some time and cash then go ahead and read it. All in all i believe it's nothing special so don't bother buying this. The author has published many other good books though. But just do yourself a favor - save your money.

This a disappointing book.. No real plot at all. Slow and boring. Was this suppose to be some new twist on a true story? I have read every single novel Mr. Brown has written, however after reading this, it is definitely my last.

This book was very difficult to read, it didn't hold our attention. Had a slow start, if you like reading books that are over descriptive than this is the one for you. The plot did move at times but again very slow. I would not recommend it.
Good fit, easy to install and it performs well. I was concerned about not spending the money for an OEM part. It works great. I would purchase this again if needed.
Have been using the product for years. Really love having it. Now have to use another cleaning product because I can't find this. Would recommend highly.

The book is good in that it focuses on all the facets of being an artist. Great ideas, helpful tips, and simple but thorough explanations. Just one complaint - It wasn't even proof read! There are words spelled correctly throughout the entire book. However, the formatting from page to "page" makes very little sense. Example: I am writing this letter by Page 5 then next paragraph, two different text sections have been inserted before me with no break between. What a pain in the neck.
This device worked fine until it didn't. Battery capacity is low and charging times are long. It lasted only 4 months. Now this product does`nt work at all!

Had a few problems from the beginning, first being that I can't print anything and this message popped up everytime it came out of sleep mode, then when turning on after putting in new ink cartridge there was no paper to be found either so now it's useless, I'm sure some people like having all your stuff ready but I personally don't care if my things are printing wirelessly or not because it's never convenient.
I'm sorry but I don't understand how anybody could give this book a five star review unless they have actually done it. A lot of people loved or at least didn't mind reading it.

There was a little too much "make believe" in the story line for my liking. However, after reading other reviews on Amazon, it looks like this is becoming somewhat of an issue. I won't be buying any more by this author. Sorry.

This thing is terrible. It does not seal well. The air will seep in through the seam between lid and bottle, you can hear it, but then when taking out bottle that smells it's very bad. I'm a professional chef and had to reposition this over 20 times while baking. I finally got mad threw it away after 5 tries.. total waste of time and money. If you get this, look at other brands before purchase.
We had so much fun with board games for Saturday morning TV in our home, that we're always looking for ways we can get those classic feelings back into it.

I bought a 3 pack and every single one of the protectors are scratched. It did not protect my iPod. Very disappointed! Don't buy it.. you will just waste your money. Maybe they send me damaged ones? I'm gonna take it to apple store see how much it'll be worth. :( DO NOT BUY! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
My son loved them while they worked. But unfortunately one speaker stopped working after 5 months.

I have had this computer since November to replace an older HP all in one that had problems from the first day purchased. My printer and scanner stopped working last week. Since they are old products that were not worth fixing, as of today its just a big paperweight. On Christmas morning when my kids opened up their presents he called me and we went through updating drivers. After that, same problem! The software did not recognize there was no USB device connected. Then he tried connecting his flash drives.

This book has no useful information. If you care about what your pet thinks of you, then this book is not for you. It lists all the symptoms and problems cats have, but it does nothing to help them feel better (aside from make sure they eat well). I was hoping this would be a helpful book, but it's not. Don't waste your money on it.

This is an absolutely wonderful movie. I ordered it as a gift for my husband and it arrived in awful condition on DVD. We returned it. We had to go through Amazon reps who were super nice and helpful but ultimately we didn't get another one. They only refunded us the cost AND shipping - more than half of our purchase price originally. In total, this was about $20.00 with shipping. Not going through them again. Just not worth that kind of hassle every time.

This is a nice looking TV if you have access to an open store front. If you're like the majority of us and can't afford the latest models, this might be for you. If your budget is more than half what we currently have, it's probably worth looking elsewhere. The picture quality isn't very good- it feels fuzzy in many parts at times on standard definition, even though I think they're actually just slightly out of date now. It's really noticeable when there's any background noise, or dialogue coming through speakers.

I expected more from a book written by so many people who know how to read well. And just plain old common sense. I'm shocked that some one actually has the nerve to call themselves an English teacher, and write rubbish such as this. This is a truly awful "book" of writing. It would have made me sad if i were Ms. Moore. Perhaps in her dreams she came up with this rubbish. To use the words which are most likely used, it looks like she must be mentally challenged.

This is a great product and has helped tremendously with my dogs' skin issues. I ordered the large first for them to give them some room. Although they are a big dog, it fits perfectly. My 7 lb. toy poodle easily wears this collar as well... she likes it. I would definitely recommend. In fact, I'm ordering more in several sizes :-)

Did not have the original packaging, but was still in plastic wrapping. Item appeared to be used. There were two scuffs on the front of it. Both appear as though they were produced using something other than plastic. The item seemed brand new until I took a closer look. It now looks like it had been used for years and is scratched. It's just my opinion, so you may want to check that before your purchase. I'm very disappointed with this item.

I bought this, thinking it was a good deal. When the light came in the mail, I plugged it, installed batteries and nothing happened. No lights, no nothing. I've put brand new ones in,as well as trying it on two other devices. Nothing. I tried to replace both of my bulbs with brand-name ones, and they still didn't work. It really seems like an inferior product. In addition there's something about this lightbulb that makes some kind of high-pitched sound when it's first on.

I really liked the idea of this product and was so looking forward to it... but when it came in the mail today (well about 10 mins ago) I'm disappointed. First off, there aren't as many stickers in here that were advertised. Second, what does "5" sticker?" Third, my nails look absolutely NOTHING like them in these cute little stickers. The pictures show a different model then what actually arrives at your house. It looks nothing like me.

I bought this unit for my girlfriend for Christmas. Since she has a Honda Civic it had the perfect fit in her car. However, while we were driving down the highway on Dec 21st (about 20 mi.) it was raining out and she kept taking the Garmen. The weather radio showed up but didn't work. We decided to stop at various rest areas along way and there went our garmin. It turned on, then off again. This happened about 7 times... before she finally gave up.

The information is presented in a disjointed and jumpy fashion. It would be better organized with a simple outline for the user - so that he/she knows at least where to get started, and what they may expect to achieve. For instance, if you want to do an advanced file transfer, perhaps some type of spreadsheet work, or more complex image manipulation, this book cannot serve as your guide but could help organize it into chapters rather than rambling through pages listing every task you might undertake.
Very pleased with the size of this item! Its exactly what i was looking for! I would definitely recommend. I'm thinking about ordering more for family and friends :)

Just like the old saying goes: You get what you pay for. My unit went out less than two months after I bought it, so I'm not expecting it to work long term. That being said,. it's a piece of junk. First, they should be ashamed of themselves for putting such junk on the market. Second, why is this product marketed towards those who live in an apartment complex? Maybe they'll all move into one and put up with crappy performance.

Product received much sooner than anticipated and works great. Easy to put together as long as you follow the instructions (use rubber mallet when putting together). Have been using for a couple of weeks now with no problems at all.

I was going to buy this printer for my home and had been working on it since Thanksgiving. Well I'm still waiting now over two months later. They said they would ship the parts next day as per their usual standard. To date, 2/14 no part has come. It's not worth purchasing anything from them at all anymore. My opinion is that companies should have better customer service especially when something like a defective product takes 2 weeks.

The book contains some good and interesting tips, like the tip to cut away from a big restaurant in order not get served up something bad (I have tried this, though never felt so ashamed after making the choice that leads you to do so). I even learned about different options for eating food without meat. But sometimes it takes much more than tips to convince me to eat something. To read this book, you'll need an open mind, too.
Bought it, read it.
Very durable and holds up well. It's been dropped quite hard several times, but nothing happened to my Kindle. And it's stylish.
