I have read several other books by this author and was really hoping to like it. This novel is filled with horrible stereotypes. The father character is incredibly cruel to his youngest daughter, who he thinks does not know how much she would get in trouble if her mother left the home with her siblings. His daughter resents this. To add insult to injury, she moves away two years later to go back to where everyone knows everyone. She returns only because of a car accident.

Was having trouble with my dog throwing up from stomach problems, this was the only thing that would work. However, my two Pomeranians are 11 years old and I have not noticed any difference. They eat this product on a regular basis and had no side effects when compared to other brands. This type is a great product. Hope it works for you too.   Rating: 5.0   My cat has always been finicky about wet food, but she loves it. A little expensive though.

The product did not work. It never charged and i cant use it for my GPS on the car. I do need a new one :(.sorry but that doesn't happen. Sorry so much.. this is my first bad review... maybe it's just me though. And if u have to pay shipping there are plenty of other places online thatl ship cheaper even with shipping too.... just look around! I'm very unhappy at the moment because now i dont know whats going happen next.

I'm not sure where to go wrong with this review. The first time I put it on my Nexus 7. It is too small, but the second time, it stretched out enough that you could tell its there. When you stretch the thing, it loses contact and stops working. Not worth trying again. Went back to Zagg, who also made an excellent product. This one just does a bad job. Save your money!
My wife really likes this music. All his CD's are very enjoyable. Glad that you made available one more CD at an affordable price.

A book about children that goes on and on, it wasn't even funny. And there are a lot of characters - not really believable or fun. Wouldn't recommend to anyone who has kids. Not funny, like one reviewer said. Just kinda silly I think. If your kid is into trucks then this might be okay for them although don't believe all the hype either. Nothing exciting in it. All over the place.

My cat was pretty good with this when he first got it until then all he does is jump off the top if I walk him or sit for him. He's not a fat cat. The second day we put his old bed down he started sleeping on it. So that's now been a long and hard trip to give us peace of mind. And it's too late because he's gotten into our shoes in there trying to use it as a scratcher....

I bought 2 of these radios and at 1st i was happy with them but after a few weeks the sound became distorted (crackling etc) when playing songs or using in stereo mode on FM. You have to turn both radio's off and back on, then they resume normal. Tried upgrading firmware without any luck, tried multiple frequencies still not acceptable. Now one radio doesnt detect FM radio stations at all, cannot scan for weak signals. A poor purchase!

When I tried to install using the enclosed installation disc, it failed and gave a message of "Windows has encountered some problems. We will be back in 15 minutes. Please return your attention for now." The setup disc was blank so no help. They don't even bother with tech support. All they could do is send me another disc. I'm pretty disgusted all together by this device. Not only did you advertise as working perfectly without installing the disk but after 4 calls and 2 emails I've finally given up.

When it works, it's great, but when I've plugged two together for extended periods of time and both aren't charging simultaneously, it becomes quite irritating. For the price, however, this is a good alternative to paying $30+ dollars at an Apple store (and I do mean that as praise) or buying from an apple store.

This is the same type of thing that we see in South America these days. Just put a new cover on and sell it as something special. I want to return this book at once, because it's not what I'm looking for. What am I supposed to do with it? You tell me how much you think Amazon will charge me, that's fine. Will buy my own guide from someone else.

This album is terrible. There are no redeeming qualities whatsoever. I love every song on this album. I can't stand how the whole thing reminds me of his last album. It seems like he just got bored with making music and decided to make a pop record. The only good songs in my opinion are: Stay Alone, You Should Know, and The One. Other than that, it sucks. He's definitely starting to lose it. Just buy one or two great tracks off youtube before you waste your hard earned money.

I bought this from amazon and got another one. The first one came very quickly but the second had problems. There was a lot of static in it. It felt like you were listening to music over your speakers. And I'm talking about when there is no sound coming out it would just keep repeating itself. So if you're thinking of buying this, go ahead try it! At least give an honest opinion.
This cover does not stand up, if put in landscape position as designed. My wife uses her tablet alot, she only works with it in one or two different positions.
All you people who reviewed those stupid two horrible albums on these pages, know absolutely nothing about music, so go ahead & take my word for it! It's as simple as...

Like a previous reviewer mentioned, there is something incredibly wrong with this CD - the audio mix and balance are terribly off-set. I am only in my late teens, but even someone who was born after 1955 would notice that they were NOT on the same playing field at all. If you like quality recordings, please don't waste your money on this! There has to SOMEWHERE be a better collection of these recordings available at such an attractive price!

The micro USB end became faulty within a month of use. It did still charge but had to wiggle it around for it to work properly now. Its pretty much useless right now so I'm getting another cable from somebody else while spending my money elsewhere. Oh well, don't bother with cheap electronics. Find something that actually works

The sound is good enough and the Bluetooth connected great but after a few months they stopped working. I contacted LG for a replacement which was quick to get here with no hassle. So far so good, however, their claim that their product contains "durable materials" has me doubting my purchase. I've worn them every weekend day while work at an office since December 2013 (maybe 2 hours a day, if that) and today is finally the day when one side died.

There are a few things that don't add up here. First, the book states that two of the three women had been married as children, then they all became single and married. Second, the people at NIV apparently forgot to update their Bible translation. Third, some references were simply incorrect for any given chapter in Scripture. I understand what the author was trying to do, but his choice of details is bizarre.
I love this book. It was a great read!!!
If this were not for the review by Steve R.

This is the most expensive piece of junk I've ever owned. It started losing memory after 3 weeks. I called Creative and they said that's out of warranty - it's 90 day parts. I'm not surprised that this was made in China...we all know how cheap crap those companies are. The software isn't even compatible with Win 7. It's just a worthless gadget. Don't waste your money. Buy an iPod, because then you will get decent sound quality. They also have support for video playback.

This item takes 8 hours to charge, so for the price I did not think it was worth it. When you are ready to use it, it's already half charged. So then your phone is dead. It does hold a charge well though but when you spend that kind of money, you'd expect more. The charger would be much better if there were some way to tell where and how long its charging for. At least it has blue lights. Overall, not impressed.
It says its compatible up top.

I like the idea behind this book, and have had positive experiences using it for my own family history, particularly in finding connections to ancestory I've never been aware of, or not thought about before. There are some problems as well, however. The most obvious problem is that it's very difficult to determine which parts of the book relate directly to any particular ancestor. In particular, I'm only interested once a year, so I can't tell whether something was in reference to myself and my husband when his mother passed away.

This product is so disappointing. We just installed the first one and after about 2 weeks some water started to leak. After talking with customer service, they sent me a new one. But same thing happened again at 4 weeks. In addition we have had trouble finding replacement cartridges for this product. And worst of all it came in several large pieces. It also comes without instructions. Which really does not make sense since you are using it only as an aerator.

This is probably my least favorite of her books. The writing style was ok, but the storyline just didn't flow like it normally does. I read over half way through this book without really feeling it. If you are an Anne Rice, get another book. I'm glad that she wrote this, and don't give up on her, because I know that if she gave us something else, we would have loved it, too. We will see how "A Tale Of Two Sisters" goes from here.
This is the worst money i've ever spend on my kindle fire it's so slow u can't do anything at all I couldn't even download this game if I wanted to pay for it.
The only part you can figure what's going on is what she sees from her mirror.

This was a bad buy. It did not work properly and I am very disappointed with it. Not good customer service. After hours of troubleshooting we realized the unit needs to be returned for replacement. Hopefully it will end up working properly.

As a lifelong fan of Jane Austen's books, I was excited to receive and read this set. Unfortunately, all three stories are so poorly written, they're hard slogging through. In terms of plot, it also felt very unrealistic. The main character, Lady Catherine, does very little that isn't portrayed as being perfectly reasonable (and she's supposedly intelligent). She is clearly made out as naive of a young woman, after her supposed traumatic experiences in childhood.

The book is a very short story with no real plot. I was looking forward to getting into the characters and really understanding their feelings but after about 15 pages it all seemed rushed. At only 99 cents, I guess you get what you paid for. On a positive note, although this was my first Amazon experience with them (they have always been more convenient than others) they were easy enough to work with. If you're interested in reading this, check out your local library. You can read it for free from there.

I bought this product to fix some scratches on an exterior brick wall of my home. The instructions were easy enough and it worked as promised. However, after only a month, the finish looked like it was flaking. My paint is fairly new, so I've tried sealing off these spots several times with various kinds of products and sealers, but they just continue to get worse - not better.
This was a gift for someone and they love it! There are lots of space inside and it's exactly what I wanted so it made me happy..

This is one of my favorite books and I am looking forward for more. How do we get an email copy instead of having to read through amazon's "check out - buy now" system each time you wish to buy? Seems like more work added on top of what should only be a free download.

I've bought this and the regular version of it, both are just a little too much. It takes me about 2 hours to drink each cup (about 30 min on one side, then half an hour with another side) so I think I'll stick to the plain tea flavors. I'm really happy because now my coffee is caffeinated whenever we want! However, the taste isn't as good as it used to be, even though it's decaf. It's still great though.

Did not work. Tried everything but it just wouldn't work. Not happy with the product, I had bought several for Christmas gifts and one from a different seller broke right away did not expect this to be any different. Please send me another unit or money. Or refund. Because Im out $23.00 because you sent a defected unit. Will update on refund when return is completed. Thanks.... Karen
The plot was easy to guess what would happen next. It's a fun read. Not too taxing so you can carry on with your day instead of thinking about them. A light read.

The product was supposed to be wireless but I can only use the keyboard in complete darkness. It takes two AAA's, which is very annoying. As much as I'm paying for this keyboard, it should at least have Bluetooth. Not a bad product, just not exactly what I needed. My new Dell laptop now has Bluetooth, so hopefully I'll find a use to this.
My 2 kids were both completely dissapointed by these songs, they're just awful.

I wanted a book written for people with no prior experience in graphic design, and as such found this one was not very helpful. It contains some useful information about computer screen layout, but the content is scattered throughout other books like how to start your own business or what products you can buy on Ebay that are less than 20 bucks. In my opinion, there should be much more material included than this. The graphics were also not all that great, considering that this is an old book.
As promised, these look really cool when installed in our outdoor kitchen.

I have not even received these and there is no way that the items are in as new condition with tags & plastic wrapping on them. If you want something to last for more than two months then spend 20 bucks at your local dollar store instead of $60 for these. The sound quality isn't any better either. They could barely stay attached by themselves without falling out. Definitely would prefer a pair similar but made by Logitech if I were you. These suck!! :( 
 Rating: 1.

The item arrived on time and is exactly what I was looking for. There are many reviews of broken hinges but the one I received had not a single problem. It works perfectly. Update 11/06/13: Since the unit broke down, there haven't been any updates from LaCross customer service. I've spent almost $1500 in shipping to their Laredo service department, sending them pictures and videos, and they never replied and didn't replace it either. So much for buying products knowing that you will have problems if they break.

The charger is a huge disappointment!1. It doesn't put out as much voltage the way that it should, and it's not always possible to get any results when using it.2. It's bulky compared with other chargers I've used. Also, I had hoped that for an induction charger, the plug would just lay down behind things, but instead you have to twist it around each time you want to use it.
Not sure what some of these other reviews are talking about. This is a completely forgettable book.

Purchased this as a gift for my husband who used to purchase and sell "old" antique watches before becoming an owner of his own. He recently went with the new generation quartz watch movement but didn't have any means to actually buy one. This set was inexpensive enough that he was able to get one since you can't put anything in water anymore (yes I know - bad guy just mentioned it!).As soon as it arrived we removed all plastic packaging from it.
Does exactly what its supposed to.

I bought these towels based upon reviews on various websites and a coupon offer from Amazon. They say soft and fluffy which was great, but I've washed them all the same way numerous times with minimal shrinkage after just three washings. All of this has led to lint/fuzz being drawn into the holes in each towel, making cleaning even more difficult.

My wife just bought this coffee maker and she uses it every day for several cups of coffee. The problem is that after only 2 years the unit started overflowing during brewing. We sent in a claim to Hamilton Beach 4 weeks ago about having to replace it. They are still waiting on that repair. Don't buy unless you live in an apartment or have time set aside to return defective products. This has been really frustrating, especially when I am away from home frequently and can't make coffee.

So when I got the battery and charged it, it didn't work. Now I am trying to send it back but can't find a number, this is really stupid from amazon, you have enough problems without having bad products out there. UPDATE:It turned out, my computer just needed more juice and Amazon has some of that in stock for me. I'm getting one now
These sheets were very nice.

It is a lot of fun, the cards are well made and fun to look through. But it doesn't even mention that it's limited edition; just that you can't really get refills. Maybe this was explained somewhere in their description, but I didn't see it. Now we're stuck with 6 games at 10 bucks. That seems high for what they are. Also no luck on Amazon with finding any replacement cards. If we were going to try and print our own copies, there must be better alternatives.

It sounded like it would be interesting. But I found that it was a bit hard to follow and the premise just didn't do for me. In general, though, I really couldn't get into it, so probably won't finish it. Not my type by far. The one good thing about all of the reviews is they have steered me in many different directions, which makes me feel better after reading a book. So thank you.
This thing took a very LONG time for me to install. I work in IT, so installation wasn't that difficult.

The product worked perfectly as if OEM. I used it to fill out all of my printer paper needs. It does look more than 1/2 full. Hopefully it will last for many months. If not, I'll be back buying again.

this book really didn't help me at all to figure out how the world worksit was more of a guide on different countries and cities with nothing else about the life or other interesting facts that could have been related for each one.i would not recommend buying it but if your want just info read the bible then u should enjoy having this.

I bought it about two years ago and after six months the battery died. The batteries are impossible to find so I'm still using it. After only 6 months, however, the touch screen is now not responding at all. No amount of cleaning will bring this thing back from hell. And HP support is a joke. They don't even have an 800 number. There is clearly another model on the market with better performance. Don't buy the NX645DN, as it's garbage technology. 
 Rating: 2.

This thing is worthless. It is not what it says to be. I tried using the power tip and a regular cord - that was worse then nothing. Maybe i got something wrong but I am not happy with it. Waste of money. Do not buy! Save yours for another one.
I've read many books on Hollywood, including Kevin Costner's book, which is well written.

The cover was fine, but when i opened the package one half of it cracked and fell apart. I had hoped that this would be a durable product, not so much. I'm still very dissappointed in Amazon for sending me an unusable product.

I have a 5 year old who was very excited to get this but when we opened up the package and placed on her it just sat there she did not want any part of me trying it on. We still tried one more time with no luck. The top is super tight over her head. To make matters worse, its very difficult for us adults getting her in it. I am wondering if a child that didn't pull at all might be able put their feet thru the holes.

We purchased this item for my son, as he was a bit of a perfectionist. The product turned out to be very cheap in quality, thin metal, and didn't work much better than an iron should. I don't blame Amazon or the Seller. They were prompt with their shipping by standard. But we will never buy anything from this company again. Do yourself & your child a favor....keep shopping. This is not worth anywhere near $100. It wouldn't last more then four days if you actually used it.
Exactly what we needed for our new tablet.

I am completely disappointed by this. The first song has really good drums, but it ends up being a loud background of a synthesizer. It would have been better if they played the same song in it's entirety. There are other mixes that i think also sound great. If only this company didn't suck so bad to put out such garbage.
This watch, when you first get it, looks very nice. It's light, elegant looking, but once upon removing plastic wrapping from around clock, everything falls apart.
Enjoyed this book, lots of quirky fun. It had all over the place. Easy read. Really fun with the wacky names in town.
What sort of publishing company puts out such an appalling piece of garbage? Even worse, Amazon sells it.

These are not a good choice. I bought these to hang on my windows but the adhesive is very sticky which would tear off within two days. They were just horrible. Maybe they work better in a smaller space.
The material makes your feet stink after wearing it. They also run small. You get what you pay for here.

I bought the product in late March 2011 for my Dell Vostro 1500. One month later it started making a loud noise. The sound was so bad that I had to shut down every morning and leave open the laptop bag before turning on my computer. It is now early August 2013 and only time will tell if this noise means premature death or not. Either way, one month beyond warranty period, Toshiba does not stand behind their product. DO NOT BUY.

I was searching for the original version and this is not - it is a Chinese version. It does play on my DVD player but you can hear some hissing or clicks from time to time. The picture quality isn't bad even though there are no special features, it's just not what I wanted nor expected. But after reading other customers' reviews, they say that this seller makes false statements. Buyers be aware of this. So now I'm stuck with another copy so I've learned an important lesson.
I love a good mystery and most of the stories are okay, but this book was terrible. The writing is amateur at best. You could tell that an inexperienced writer wrote this. Don't bother.

This unit worked fine for six months. Just now the LCD goes blank, no picture and will not come back on. The other features operate just fine, as long as you hold down the on button until it comes back! For some inexplicable reason every time I turn this player off my computer loses the connection to the internet. What a waste of money! Don't make my mistake. Buy one from a company that stands behind its products. You can't get any worse.

I saw the movie and knew that it wasn't going to be as great as The Sixth Sense but after 3 days out watching on my laptop, it's just ok. A few of the scenes are really cool or disturbing (like when her body turns a rainbow color before she is dead). It's about two teens who find this book in their parent's attic, which could help them deal with death so they decide to open it. While reading it, something seems off.

These are good glasses but they have several fatal flaws. Firstly, the lenses of these sunglasses do scratch extremely easily. The first pair I wore on a daily basis got very scratched up. They now look fairly bad. So take my review for what it is. For regular use, these would be fine. However, if you need super durable sun glasses, go ahead and spend more because you'll probably end up getting scratches in them pretty quickly. Also, this is the second time I'm writing a bad review for an Amazon product.

This product is easy to use and you can see your oil levels at the top of the tank without removing the cap every time. Easy to read. The needle was accurate enough that I noticed it didn't need to be reset. Love it. Can't wait for spring now when my truck will start running more smoothly than before! My car used 85,000 miles since purchase with no problems. If in doubt, go for it!! You won't regret it! And don't believe how much less money this is.

I was really excited to hear that she had a new album but this one just has too much pop in it. Too bad cause there are some real good tracks, like "The Right Place", and the cover of Pink Floyd's "Money." But it just doesn't keep my interest long.

I have a new Iphone 5s and it does not work. It turns on, but then will no longer connect. Very disappointing. But the fact that someone from Monoprice cares enough to write in their own feedback means more than what was promised. I've already emailed them asking for another one with different connector ends. I'll update when they send it. Just trying to save potential buyers like me. Bummed because I'm very much looking forward to using this.

As I read this book to the end, my feelings continued at once - excitement, love, hatred, frustration, etc etc. After a time, however, I just couldn't put it together. The first 100 pages of this novel were fantastic. The details of everything and the history behind it. The writing was easy to follow, the characters developed quite nicely for being young adults, they weren't overly stereotypical. And while there is love that blossoms from two people thrown together, these two had never even met.

This is a great idea for little kids but, the product doesn't stand up to young hands. It's not very sturdy. The top of it snapped off in 4 months and after just about daily use. I think it's more brittle than it has any right to be. Just be ready when you buy this that you're going have some patience at your child's beck and call. Or perhaps one day they'll start to break it! And I'm really not even sure an adult would feel comfortable with them either.

I purchased 3 packs to use for a small project. There are enough cables now I can leave them on the fridge, because they keep their coils tightly coiled with these cable ties. The colors and patterns allow you to tell which wire is active at any given moment. I will buy more of these.

My cat has loved this toy for so many years! He still plays with it, but not as much because he's getting old, we have to replace it every 12 months. But it's held up well. Now I'm glad to have a replacement....

I love it, even my brother who has a new Samsung SIII phone wants one he is very impress! The battery last for two days and the screen never shuts off so you can watch movies or listen to music without having to recharge

Very disappointing with this order. The book was not in a new wrapper and appeared to be used. There were 2 pieces of tape over the cover that had been removed previously. I contacted the seller three times asking them to contact me if they could replace it. They never responded so it looks like I'm stuck paying shipping to send back this. The story itself is great, but it's ruined because you can't read it. I'd recommend buying books from another company, or even better use your Kindle until Amazon fixes these issues.

this book has a terrible cover and title. so i bought it hoping to get some information on the history of my country, but all that is in italian with no english translation. so not very good for people trying learn spanish from it. just buy another book. if you want info or pictures about our country's history or culture, forget this. also have one page printed up here [...] instead of the first page they do here.

I was looking for a large knife box that wouldn't cost a fortune and yet didn't need more than one knife. Bought this on the recommendation of Cook's Illustrated magazine. It is exactly as described. Sturdy with plenty of dividers to keep everything organized. I'm happy it has extra space above each slot so I can easily fit up to 4 steak knives.

It is very easy to use which makes it easier for young kids. This machine could be more durable and sturdy. My kids liked how the pen worked. They played with it. Then they were not able to open up the case after the holidays. The plastic around the button was too tight. I tried everything to release it, but couldn't. After several attempts at working on this case, I did all that I can. Then the hinges snapped. A couple of weeks later, one corner of the side fell apart.
Although this product was advertised as an adapter to use with my Macbook, when it arrived there were NO adaptors included with it, just a box with no information or instructions.

These cards are just ok. There is a sticker and plastic cover for each card. This makes them look cheap in my opinion. However I did get to use one and it works fine. Also they were not exactly as pictured. They weren't quite a circle like on the pictures but that worked out fine since the card was not what I needed. Just be careful when you buy these because some may not work. But overall, this product looks nice from the outside.

I was expecting the same as I got in a store. But the price is great. It does not leave ur hair frizzy and soft. The good thing about it it's safe to use on people that are sensitive or have skin problems due tot he ingredients inside also since it is only for relaxed hair. Would recommend this product but would definitely shop around before buying. Shipping can be hit & miss.

Very useful to have a single source for all my cookbooks. I would buy this book again. My only regret is the lack of color pictures which you sometimes need in order to get an idea what it looks like. For that reason it got 4 rather than 5. It does give good advice and tips on how to cook healthier meals as well.

This game seemed perfect on paper. Just like many other reviewers here, we couldn't believe how much fun people made playing. So when a new version was released, even though it added more things we'd find in our regular Wii Fit games...

I purchased this as a birthday gift for my mother and it was greatly appreciated. It looks exactly like the picture. There are no problems whatsoever. The packaging was very impressive. One of those plastic bottles comes in this huge box (with bubble wrap on top). If you have any doubts about your purchase whatsoever, just think "if it's made of glass, does it matter?" And don't be deterred by it's size. This thing is much taller than you'd expect.

I bought these for my daughter while she rides her bicycle. What a wonderful product! They easily fit over the glasses and offer great protection from wind which comes in at high speeds. She can now ride freely to catch up on other people's news. It's nice when you have confidence that your child is safe with these on! Love this product!! Thanks so much for providing such quality products :)

I was looking for a low cost printer that would last and not jam....the Brother HL2270DW has been excellent after one month use. My only complaint is that there are no drivers from HP included. There isn't even an option to install the software on USB connected devices. Overall great product but wish it had more features. Like a built-in fax, copy utility etc.
Book 3 picks up right where book 2 left off.

I am not one who can give bad reviews on a movie, but this thing is not even good for what it is.. maybe 15 year old or something... its in the top 5 worst movies ive ever seen and i wont watch again...i could of made better movie clips with a camcorder!! Dont waste your money, just download these videos off you tube without paying money to madd movies....

This is just a review of the book and not its content. If I'm going to read something about religion, it would be easier if I could click on the page numbers as they're displayed. You can't tell what you want by looking at table of contents. For some reason this particular version doesn't include information for Kindle or Nook. That's a real bummer.

The movie could have been excellent if they had just gone for the obvious from beginning to end. You know it's only a matter of time before some crazy guy wants a piece of that diamond necklace when you see him with it. Instead we are treated to, again, and again - some creepy looking guys talking about their sick fantasies in an office full of attractive women. They act like complete morons. Then it has to be explained. That is exactly where this film falls apart.

I'm using this with a new N900 to use as additional storage. I keep getting error messages on the PC regarding "not enough space for backups". I will update when or if it works eventually. Hopefully I'll be able get some useful data off it. Update: Did not work.
While this is certainly dated, It still ranks as one great musical. This film can show you the many side stories going on but the plot lines don't always tie back together.

The main problem is that the first unit was defective. I received a replacement which worked well for about 6 weeks before it died as well. This will be my last purchase from this company. They make a good product and if they can get their quality control issues sorted out then maybe their customer service will improve.

I tried this in my Ford F250. The car sounded like it wasn't starting, the engine blew a bit with rough idle. Then after sitting for more than 5 minutes idle, the light turned green which let me know that there was some transmission fluid squirting out. After spending hours trying to diagnose it, I finally learned from Ford's service manual that when you add ATF (anti-seize) you'll need a torque wrench.

My husband and I bought this printer because it's cheaper than an ink jet or laser printer. The color is terrible on every page. We have tried to clean the print head several times with no improvement. It came when promised, which was great. Unfortunately, it just doesn't work. There are tons of better deals out there for laserjets that don't cost a fortune. Don't waste your time with this.

I couldn't read this book. It was about a dysfunctional girl named Grace (that's my last name, not my mother's) and her best friend who had been involved in an accident (and got herself killed) three years earlier. That's when the story begins, but then moves forward to other characters that are mentioned throughout. The main character, Grace, is constantly wallowing over her death, always coming up with excuses she can get out of committing suicide. As another reviewer said, there were many times I wanted to slap her.
I received these speakers today because they came very quickly even though Im deployed in Iraq and they had to come from Germany.

This was one of my favorite faucets until water leaked at base all over this floor area even though we were sure we'd assembled every possible screw correctly. The manufacturer has sent us two free replacement parts.

This book is an excellent introduction to the concepts of functional programming. The examples are very well done. However, this text was poorly edited and for some reason several pages have extra white space printed on them. It's really annoying when page turns take 5 minutes because you can't read it. So all in all a poor edition. Too bad as I bought it as new but no help with problems solved by my professor or publisher. Would love another edition which has been edited.
This is just as poorly constructed and even worse designed than the "cheap" one we had. I expect better from Cuisinart.

Got the book from Amazon this morning. I was in an emergency so didnt open it but after only reading a few pages of it, realized its a really awful book. Not informative at all. This is mostly fluff with no useful content. You can find all your info on line or free just by googling. Save your money. It will be more than worth it. Don't buy this book. Its way over priced for what you get and nothing that won't help you.

I really wanted to like this - the size sounded great and it's certainly big enough for a lot of spices (and maybe something larger) but it just doesn't work. The plastic cover seems extremely cheaply made, so when you put in your spice or herbs etc, they just fall out as soon as you turn it. Also, even after putting them all in, there was no grip at all! It is very easy to miss that you're not grabbing an item because it spins off too easily.

I didn't expect it to be perfect but you get an old looking vinyl cover not the one pictured in the image and that is probably why they sent me a totally different product. And it's going back so I'm out $14. Not worth my time or effort to return it.

After two weeks of use the sensor doesn't send signal any more. I'm not able to return this item because I didn't open yet. I can't even ask my friend what should I do so that he can give me an alternative gift. Very disappointed with this purchase. Maybe I'll see something better in future purchases.
This book arrived in a timely manner. However when you open it, pages fall out from everywhere. You can't even flip back to read what page you've turned to. Poor quality. Not recommended.
If you are looking to buy this just stop here. There is NO new music nor remains...
This was an excellent addition to our grandson's Birthday party. He will be so proud when he looks at his new decorations. Thanks!!!

I couldn't finish it; the writing was atrocious, and what little plot there was, could have been written by a fourteen-year-old. Don't go near it. The only interesting thing about it is that it's based on true events. Even those involved felt no passion for life, and most of them would feel nothing good to write about. One wonders how their family copes knowing they didn't live long enough to care if they ever did get into heaven. And one wishes she had made more effort with her ending chapter.

I don't really understand how this book got so many good reviews. Did we all read the same book?Yes, there is a plot. It isn't original, it's pretty standard murder mystery/suspense fiction. And some of the characters are more entertaining and fun to follow than others. But where was your editor? There were tons of mistakes in grammar, punctuation, spelling, word usage, etc.

I thought it was interesting to read about the history behind these stories, and I'm sure that many others would enjoy this as well - but there were multiple errors in spelling in it. Many of the names have misspelled spellings, making them hard for me to follow. At one point a character, whose name sounds like "James," refers to herself by her husband's name.
I had two of the original and now a third. The quality is horrible. There was no protection for them when they arrived.

This was a great concept, I think. A quick read with all the usual fun of LeCarre novels. Unfortunately it is poorly written and very confusing. The characters, especially Paul Theroux, are caricatures -- they're not well defined at all in this story. There's no point to the story, just some people who come together for sex. Very disappointing after previous thrillers. I'm giving up on Mr. Rebus now - too boring
This case fits snug on my Nexus 7, while easy to take off. Provides great protection at all angles including propping up your tablet vertically (as pictured).
I had been having trouble with squirrels jumping in my garden hose; this trap is a great solution. It works very well. I would recommend it.

I'm usually able to look over grammar mistakes when they're small, like misuses of words etc. However this book's grammatical errors were simply too much and distracting so for me it's all down. The character development was lacking, almost nonexistent due to poor sentence construction.
The history is fascinating.

This is a poorly written and organized book. The index lists the chapter titles which only sort them by first name. However, I found three main problems. First, there was no organization at all. Each author had two paragraphs of notes, which weren't even linked to one another. They didn't make sense since they all mentioned different sources. The chapters were not listed in chronological order. Second, it seems like every other essay or paragraph contains some reference to, you guessed it, research.

This worked great, the only thing I would change was how it connected to my computer. Not sure i have a computer that needed one, but if your looking for more power on a battery pack look no further for sure. The product has been great so far. Shipping is also very quick.

Not even 6 months and it no longer works. Just out of warranty. I tried to contact HP by email for warranty service but they weren't helpful. For now, I'll shell out more than $250 at Best Buy - which includes an extended warrenty.

It says it is a "heavy duty" product but that was as far as I got. My 12 year old grandson used the hammer to drive in two of my wooden studs. And they are only 16 inches apart. I gave them 2 stars for being somewhat well made and sturdy. As soon as he got home we inspected them with the sledge hammer. The handle on top of the head sheared off...that's it. Too bad because they were cute hammers...

While I really like this case and was excited to get it, it does not offer much, if anything, in the way of protection for my camera. The top is exposed only enough so that you can access all buttons as they are covered with hard plastic flaps which covers them completely. You don't have any options for connecting cables or cords either. It should be a little bit bigger because now it's basically useless since nothing fits inside.

I was looking for a good replacement phone - this fit the bill. Works just as well with Vonage or our old Ooma system - only slightly lower quality sound but you can't beat it for $19.95 per month! Good value & worth it. I'd buy again...
Bought two pairs of these because they look like an elegant pair at first glance. Wrong.
The story is very dark so you should be ready for it. Having said that, this particular edition, while well-bound and printed, has some typos.

I received this book for review free from Waterbrook Multnomah via Blogging For Books..This is a novel based on God's plan concerning the destruction of man and woman by fire with 2 million souls killed. And it's written in the form if what could easily be considered preachy sermons. I'm really not into the modern "Christian" fiction genre but after reading the description I thought I'd give it a try. At first glance, I see why people would like it.

First time buying this brand of headphones. Bought them for running and biking as my old earbuds were finally giving out after several years running. They took about a week to actually get here but that was fine, they came sealed in plastic, wrapped. When I received them, when i checked the box, it already had dust on it! What good is that? The wires are kind of thick where you plug them into your device. It doesn't make much difference though since they kept falling out.

I know that it is the nature of these types of programs to have one or two bad programs, but this was an obvious attempt for a quick buck. The characters are poorly drawn and unlikeable, particularly his female counterpart. My advice would be save your time on this one. Do not waste yours. Even though it's only about 20 minutes long I'll never watch again without skipping parts. It really does not make you want to.

I hate to write an honest review but this book was so horrible that it had nothing else for me to read...except I wanted to! The first half of the story is about a guy who wants sex with lots and lots of different women which seems like all right if you're into kink and fetishes, the second has some scenes which are fairly mild in nature but still steamy.
A fast moving plot with some twists and turns. Very well written and edited.
This doesn't hold large format photo's. It holds about 1 or 2 size 8x10 photo. I put my pictures as is.

I am quite disappointed at my inability to achieve good photographs using this product. The most successful subjects come out looking like a photograph neg. I've read numerous reviews for other products showing similar positive results. Not sure if I'd want to chance it again with the T5i. I'll probably just use an old 35mm slr and go straight darkroom or digital. My experience is that nothing beats traditional film photography but it's time consuming. So, there's that.

I just got this today and did the "1-2-technic" installation yesterday with Windows 7. The computer was up n running in less than 5 minutes, and has been working great! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars rather then 5; I haven't used all that many of its functions, yet., but it's a fast easy install. Can't wait to try more!

What a waste of my time. I've read all the other reviews - as many have stated, it's no great deal and that this is some type of parody. All I can say is "pay attention to your inner self". When you see someone writing these reviews, do you...count down how much money they will make from you?? It's not hard folks. It doesn't take any time for these people or companies like them to make their money.
Bought for nephew who plays it regularly.

Like some other reviewers, I was eager to review this, as it's one of the most famous works by Carl Bark. In fact, I'm surprised it didn't get more attention than it does. It's a real disappointment. The story concerns two brothers, who have been in love for years, but are unaware that the woman they marry is engaged already. There were too many things about this novel that made me give up on it, and that's when I decided there wasn't anything worth finishing about.

My wife was really excited when I gave her this coffee maker. She loves coffee, but it is sometimes hard to make a great cup of coffee. First, the pot has NO carafe. This should be obvious and I'm guessing most people realize this. We have had numerous other Cuisinart thermal machines in our office for many years, and all were fine. The filter basket on these new ones does not seem as strong or durable, so we will probably just use paper filters.
I think that the book was a waste of time and money. It seems to have been written by someone with absolutely no writing ability. Sorry, but it wasn't great.

Just installed this device on my Dell computer. Followed instructions to the letter. Still could not connect it wirelessly. Called Linksys for support and after an hour of trouble shooting, told me to reset everything just as I did before installation. The error message remained there until I was in a state that I wanted the whole unit unplugged from the wall. Returned item today. My advice? Don't waste your time. Go Netgear or Dlink. You'll be happier with the results. 
 Rating: 1.

I have written to the company before and they are very nice people who stand behind their product. The product was a gift and did not function properly. It took me two and five attempts with numerous emails from them and the manufacturer for something that should be simple and work. DO NOT BUY!!! You will regret it. Even though my first one arrived, it only worked long enough until the seller refused to replace because they had already made this purchase. Waste of money!

While the premise for this book sounded good and interesting, I found that I did not enjoy reading about an abused wife of six years. In fact, while there were some amusing moments, these parts are too short to be really interesting. I'm glad it was a loaner. I read it before buying it. No time invested.
I bought this as a gift. It was just what my friend needed. Very sturdy and well built. Would buy again.

As others noted, this adapter will not work with a Pentax K20d. I returned the product and now have two useless adapters for my K-250.The price should be more closely associated to quality. If you're going to sell an item, make sure it works first. For this, it's just very cheap stuff. Don't waste your time!
I didn't like it because they wanted to charge me 3 times the cost to repair it. The battery was shot, then about 2 weeks after that it wouldn't power up. Very disappointed!

I've tried in vain to find a good book on the subject of learning and teaching Japanese. This one is not it. It has no index, so your first stop for any words or notes might have different meanings if you wanted them -- that is, they can refer back to prior chapters, but it's impossible for this reader to find them. No matter where I go through the book, it requires multiple readings to finish all the entries.
This model replaced one that lasted about 10 years before burning out. This new unit worked great for 11 months, then quit working.
I ordered this shirt in a large it runs small i cant even button. Had to return it.
This folding chair came perfectly packaged.
This is the best product I have ever used for cleaning house and car windows. I had been looking all over town before finding this brand. Thanks Amazon!,

I purchased this for my daughter when she was just 3 months old. At first it seemed great, but after only a couple of weeks, the little mirror with the fish on top fell off. She couldn't use it! The plastic is pretty sturdy and would have withstood being chewed on. My advice to you if you're buying it used or cheap - be more patient. You can still get one that functions properly without losing all mirrors or fish. Otherwise, don't waste your money.

I can't stress how disappointed in this album. All tracks are very bad remixes from the original versions that sound horrible! The only good song on here is "You Look Good In My Shirt" otherwise your money is wasted unless you want to listen to people with terrible voices.

If there is a better game than this i dont know about it. You can buy it off ebay for under ten bucks. the graphics are as poor as you would expect for such an old game. But that's what games used to be like when computers were first released 20 plus years ago in fact. The story has no plot, and takes about 10 hours of your time just simply walking between each mission at all times. So save yourself some money and pick up something different.

Works great, just didn't fit for my truck. The description states it will fit a 2012 F-150. But I had to bend the end and get in close. And take off some plastic so that you can attach it. Then work them up into place on each other, then trim of excess wire to reach under back brakes.

I must agree with the other reviewers in that this book is a good idea, but execution falls seriously lacking. After reading it, it is obvious how hard an author has to work for anything approaching excellence. It would be like one of those Hollywood productions where you have an unbelievable star, do something amazing on camera, and then watch them crash after doing the work. You end up seeing two stars fall from grace, while one star rises through adversity, only for his movie flop to sink too.

I had a small amount of trouble applying it as per the instructions on the packaging. But then again, it's just some clear plastic sheeting and my phone case fits over it, so no sweat. I'm hoping it'll protect against scratches for a long, long time.

I bought this for my son it looked great. He loved it, but only used the mouse pad one time and then he stopped using it. I'm trying to figure out a way of having him replace the whole thing. I hope someone will read this. My biggest complaint is there should be some sort of paperwork with how or when it's supposed to expire. Now they want 40 dollars each if you buy 2.

I got this for a friend and the music stopped after less than one song. Very upset about it and would not purchase ever again. This was supposed to be xmas gift. Now my friend has no choice but returning it. So disappointing. :( I'm hoping Amazon will make this right...

I'm still awaiting my refund. I waited over a month to receive this item and the product itself is nothing more than crap not happy at all. Would never order from here again. Also after writing with no response its been two weeks.

It appears to me that this cd should have been entitled "I Want a Hippie In My Living Room." The selections are so awful it is beyond imagining! Nothing but music which sounds like elevator music. Not one track really touched my heart or mind enough torecommend it. Don't waste your money. Sorry for the bad grammar and spelling.
Bought these as backups but only 2 out of 6 seem to work well. The other doesn't recharge at all, so what good are they?
Good movie.

It is not as good or even close to being a true prequel to the Halo series. I think they need to stick with what we love which are the games themselves. I'm also disappointed how short it was and left me wondering where the next chapters are. I'd give this game 1 star, but if you enjoy playing Halo, then go ahead and buy it. But overall, do rent out first, just in case. This was one of their worst games, sadly. I'll probably never buy another video game from them.

I bought this for my husband's birthday and he loves it. The price is right, the sound quality good, it has a lot of useful functions. We got more than what we paid for. Would highly recommend if you are looking but something that will not be mistaken as an expensive stereo system. It can handle many formats too. My husband also uses his MP3 player in it. This unit works with all types of IPODs or players. You can use two things at once.

While the film may have had entertainment value while it was on Broadway in 1971, this DVD does not do justice to it. Too many scenes are cut out of the film, I would guess there were about 15 minutes of footage missing from it, which shows a scene featuring one character talking with and later kissing another person.
It is okay. not as interesting or interesting storyline. I would read other books from the same author. Easy and a good read. Enjoy!

I bought this for my granddaughter. Very very disappointed. You can't do much with it because the camera hole is on top! If you are wanting thisto use as a wallet/purse in your pocket, forget it. It's so smalland just falls apart. This was supposed tobe a Christmas gift for someone now we'll have ta send her something else.... Not happy at all. It also took forever!! Don't waste yourmoney& time on this.

This was supposed to be like the movie I saw in my youth and hoped it would be. It didn't live up either. A lot of violence with little romance or even sexual contact between main charactors that made a difference. Maybe there will be sequels but this was not enjoyable at all. Not worth the money for both movies.
The book didn't arrive until 7 days after I placed the same order for a similar book. I'm not happy with this purchase at all.
Got these for me for Christmas.
First pair was leaking from the top area. Received second pair....they don't leak. These pads do exactly what they advertise...

I'm not going to bother commenting on the content of this DVD, because even I feel it is an insult with all the errors and factual mistakes. First the most annoying error -- he has a group sitting in one room talking about the Holocaust without noting that almost every person who ever worked for or was persecuted by Nazis was Jewish, making no distinctions at all: they were all Jews.

The description said that this would be a light weight plastic bag. I like the fact it is BPA free, but it's just too flimsy. If you want to keep food fresher and less expensive, go with your cheaper grocery store bags. For me, I feel more confident using one of those instead because at least I'm not dumping tons of recyclables into landfills. With this bag, my hope was for something stronger, thicker. Maybe even double or triple thickness. Instead, it'll do until we get really desperate.

I could not even make it to the last 15 pages before deleting it. I'm sorry but that just seems stupid. The entire book is about her dating life and her friends getting married which she says a lot about. It was like trying so hard for things don't happen in their life. And then it didn't happen. She kept saying how much happier he had become as well. But then some random woman from NYC came back with no husband who suddenly died 5 yrs ago.

I tried to return it but they took more than a month for me to get it and then on the last day of that month, my credit card was charged so now i have lost $23.98. It really sucks. So far i've owned three different types and all worked great. This one is too big tho when you clip it. I'm only 5'7 with average sized arms. If you're any bigger than this, don't waste your money. It's just not worth buying this one.

The first one I got was DOA as well. Returned it and just received my second unit. Again, after about 20 minutes of use, the video started glitching out, eventually fading in and out until nothing could be seen. The audio also cut out. You have to really push on the sides into each other while pushing them together for audio, a very poor design. This makes me feel that this is probably not even manufactured by the company or some knockoff...
Worked great for about a month then it just stopped working. It won't charge, turn on, or transfer anything from one computer to another. Very disappointed!

This book is okay for beginners. I have had some great cookbooks (Julia Child's was my favorite) and this one did not bring a lot of excitement. There needs to be more pictures. The recipes are average at best. We got a few interesting tidbits here and there, but overall, disappointed with the book. Don't recommend it.

They are soft and absorbent, but for me, these sheets would shrink too much to use daily. I have a variety of sizes from Queen through XL & they did not fit my deep mattress. They made the bed super wrinkly with no pillow case at all, which defeats having them in any form. If you get these, look up dimensions if your mattress is wider than standard queen size sheets.

It was really good till the end, when I found out what happened. There were several chapters missing which makes sense but there was also a lot of stuff that seemed to be missing. Like things being added without explanation. Especially about this book not ending on the epilogue or even saying it ends at all.

I ordered a white leather folio for my son's kindle fire as a gift and his favorite color is navy blue. When this product arrived, there was no black in sight on the exterior of this folio. There were tan accents but not black. In both cases, it looks cheap. If you are looking to buy this, know that it's more khaki than navy! Buyer beware. It's pretty useless. I'm returning it. Don't order if that's what your heart wants though.

I have enjoyed this author's other books but not his last. If you're going to put all that time into making the ending an unhappy one for your heroine, why can't you at least make her a little unhappy? Give us our HEA without leaving us in tears and wondering what did she do wrong to deserve such harsh treatment?? This was just too much work for me as I'm sure it is most people who picked up on it.

The book itself isn't bad, but I won't buy anything from this publisher again. They shipped the first copy to me with many holes around the spine, and they sent a second one, which was still in bad condition after all this. This is just poor quality control. Amazon has always been good about this, so what you should do at least if it's going to be shipped, get it checked out by another customer who says it works fine.

I'm not sure what I bought this product for, but I've gone with the cheaper options and have been more pleased. The sound quality is good enough if you're going to sit in front of it. There were no instructions included so it's impossible to figure out how much volume or distance you can turn up without adjusting any setting... there are four settings. That's all for the basic functions though - which was why a headphone jack on the back wasn't an option... that's basically pointless.

There are better ways to learn a language than this. This is a bad idea that needs to be addressed and there should be a recall. I'm so disappointed when Amazon doesn't inform customers before selling them.
I'm happy that there are posters like this, however it's too small compared to the poster in my room.

The quality of the movie seemed quite high, but I think this really depends on how much you like a lot of the actors, and especially John Malkovich. It was just too dark to enjoy at all, so I'm very grateful that it had english subtitles which helped. Not as funny is "Being John Malcovich's," by itself. Still worth watching though.

I bought a new Sony VAIO laptop with the hope of getting it up and running faster than my existing HP Pavilon. Well, I was wrong. Just as soon as it arrived, which wasn't an issue for me because I'm at work, I plugged in everything to make sure there were no loose connections etc, but when I turned on the laptop, I couldn't see anything - the screen just said "no signal".

i bought this because there was one in the stores and when it comes to an iPod I think apple is way better than samsung at least. The headphones broke almost immediately but you can't really get into a ipod where they will give you ones that are not so fragile. The battery died before my trip even started and just as soon as mine did it stopped working.

I read all 14 episodes in about an hour, but the quality of both sound and video did not live up to what they should be. It's a shame because this was such a good series even if some things were better than others. One scene involving Amy Schumer looks great but then her face is blown out. It happened twice on two separate DVDs. Not sure why Warner Bros would allow this. I hope Season 4 will be released with much higher quality. This one definitely is.

A fascinating but sometimes tedious read. If you are truly interested in the actual life and times of Joan of Arc, this is not an easy way to do it. I was intrigued with some of what he wrote, as well it should be. Unfortunately, that interest did not, for me, translate into a greater understanding or appreciation on my part for her story. There were so many details mentioned regarding things such as clothing, how she lived, etc.

i love david crosbie, his voice is wonderful on this album! but the lyrics are not that good and at times boring. in some songs he forgets about what he's singing. such as, "you can go all night" or the most annoying "we should sleep together."---do yourself a favor -- if you're going to get any cd don't waist your money getting this one first.

this movie is a major insult to all david bowie fans,most people dont know that.while many of the songs are good,the soundtrack should have been" no good deed goes unpunished" by michael jackson just happens too be on it,so don't waste your money unless you like those songs and can accept that they must go in order.

Sorry, but that's not right. I ordered the print version and it's in black - on Kindle. So, what is it? My mistake, maybe someone else can do better than me with this material. Just give me the book. That's all...... Love them anyway.

I really have to wonder why Mr. Patterson would do this with his readers and in our children's book collection. It seems that the story line has all been done before. The main character was a weak girl. Just because she's from Washington doesn't make her any more realistic. In fact it just makes her more of a stereotype - she can't help how others perceive her.

I will make sure to read all of the 5 star reviews before buying anything this seller sells. These batteries are total crap. Do not buy, they suck. They last about half as long as a real Nikon OEM battery.

I couldn't even finish reading this book. The book started out with interesting enough characters but then quickly became so silly and unbelievable. It made me want to put it down - that's how bad it was. If you like romantic or suspensful mysteries don't bother. Skip this one! I'm still looking for a decent story about Christmas on the island of Kauai. This was not one of them. Very disappointing. But if you're just into romance novels...
It doesn't matter how hot you set it, the tea does not stay warm. I'm very disappointed and wish I never ordered it. :(

I had ordered the black and white one of this same case by mistake, but was very sad to find out it didn't fit my 5c. It is so snug that there is way too much pressure being exerted on buttons. You have to press hard into volume buttons for them not responding. And when pressing power button, you literally must push extremely forcefully with your index finger because it's a tight fit.

The cable arrived and the connectors were not correct. These are not OEM cables. You should know this before ordering. This is the second Mediabridge product I have ordered that was a dud. Maybe it would be worth trying another brand.

I know this is a children's book, but at least it could have written something worthwhile about the war in Afghanistan. The story was dull and predictable, and the plot unbelievably thin. A major waste of time. Wish I'd read these reviews before buying it. Not worth reading. If you must buy it, get the kindle version so that if your Kindle runs out of battery power, you'll be able to continue reading it. Amazon should drop this book without hesitation. It does nothing more than promote violent propaganda.
A good value for a replacement seat. It fit well - it was easy to install. This saved me money over purchasing directly from GM or dealership.

The description claims a DVD in this package but it wasn't there. I was very disappointed that after waiting for almost two months, and paying $7.00, the package was never delivered. This is my second order from Amazon and again, it did not arrive. I'm rating Amazon's third party vendor as "bad" because he made no effort to deliver it. My advice is, don't waste your money! If you get this, then make sure it's going to be new when sent otherwise go somewhere else.

This is probably my 5th Sunbeam electric blanket in 20 years. They last and last but unfortunately after 10 years of use this new one stopped heating. Will return or replace. We will see. Hopefully they do better than previous units because we really loved it. Unfortunately it's not available anymore.

I ordered this for my Nikon D5000, and it fits in the slot with a lot of room to spare, but that is if all your lenses fit, which they don't. It just keeps falling out. As soon as you try get any lens out at all, you'll have an extra millimeter or so on top of your lens. The dividers don't allow anything smaller than 200mm lens. There are better straps available - there has to be some! But then again, it's not exactly cheap.

No doubt that this book is chock-full of wonderful information. It's the same information you can access for free, and for free, on any web page on how to clean your home, including many different websites. The whole website thing is a scam, as I'm writing down every single thing said by Dr. Brown. What makes matters worse -- he's charging money when in reality he isn't worth it. You're best off learning all these things without paying him anything. Just Google his name.
The price ($10.99 plus free shipping) can't be beat.
Very enjoyable game, however many times during the course of playing multiple players start having problems connecting.

Not bad on the whole. Too much unnecessary information but nice to read about other interesting characters from their own series! I will be buying all books in this series. Easy enjoyable reading. Would like another version with more details and shorter stories!

I got this because i heard it sounded really great. Unfortunately what they have on here is junk! The record quality was terrible. It wasn't recorded with quality and clarity. Every part of the song came out very muffled as if someone were sitting next to me. Don't buy this! Go instead for some good old scratchy 45's.

The product is okay. Like the light it's pretty small & can be squeezed in all sorts of ways. It does have a tendency to blow out when I shake it so if you're wanting something for extra detail this will not work as well. For my purposes though works fine. Haven't tried out the other applications but don't really expect them either. This doesn't feel like quality plastic by any means (plasticy feeling actually), and that might get better once you use it. A lot smaller than I expected.

In the future i will not buy this type of product on line because most all can be damaged and sent to you that way a good amount of them are damaged. To much hassle to try to return an item so do I have to keep it. So if order items for christmas look at when they come in. And make sure it is in proper condition before hand. I thought Amazon had good customer service but guess not.

I love this product. The sound quality is incredible and it fits comfortably for my ears. It sounds way better than many Beats headset I've own. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great headset at an amazing price.

It is one season but its pretty interesting. The first 2 are great and some good lessons can also be learned. This series had action drama and family love. A plus for my girls because they like those kinds of things. Its worth your time if you have children that enjoy this kind of movie.

This is the second case for my LG 800G 820. My first one was made by LG; this one, however, is in China. The case does not have a cut out opening to expose camera and other needed areas. You would think they'd spend more time making it. Also, they only give you two screen protectors, instead of three. I found these extremely frustrating. Updating to note that, after about 2-3 weeks the rubber on mine began separating from its plastic case.

I was very disappointed with my purchase of this product. A sample size that would have been enough for my dogs made me feel comfortable but what we received in the mail and more than that, smelled terrible. In fact, it has a really terrible chemical odor. Our dogs, on another occasion were not allowed to play at all due to a car wreck, so obviously they are no longer playing. However, instead of being just as appealing these smell like something your grandma wouldn't put up with. It's truly awful.

This book is about a kid who wants to be the best and tries hard (it's too bad I couldn't give this thing ZERo), but ends up being bullied by other kids with different abilities. It's full of stereotypes, which means that all kinds of people will relate to it. Don't waste your time. Read something better! The author needs to find some new friends - not so many as most readers have now! It was just boring for me.

Don't waste your money on this item! The product was defective. I followed the instructions and installed it correctly. Still could hardly hear any sound. It doesn't even do half of what is advertised to do. Wish I had read all these reviews before buying it. Had no trouble returning it, but not much satisfaction from dealing with amazon.com. Never again! They must be running a business somewhere else now or are making stuff up just for money. Do yourself a favor and buy something worth buying.

this was not good at all. I read so many great reviews and bought it with such high expectations. but the recipes were bland and tasteless. This book is a waste of time to read. just do all your cooking on top grill or in oven...... don't buy it. get real cookbooks. its only useful if u are looking for some basic information. they should call it an encyclopedia of kitchen knowledge.

I really enjoy learning about things that the ordinary American would think of as strange. What made these stories interesting to me was knowing a bit more how those men actually saw things and how they may have lived. It also showed their struggles against nature and other people. The stories were well written though it seemed many times in his writing he got carried away with descriptions or details.

Good value and you get to add a book with the kindle. The kindle cover looks good so when it is closed it isn't bulky. But it seems cheaply made compared with the case I bought 3 years ago. It will work until I find another.

I bought this printer to replace an Epson that died unexpectedly. Since the older one was so good, and since HP generally makes good printers, I went with that. Unfortunately while it's a nice printer it has some quirks which drive me crazy. What might work well for you but doesn't for someone else, like when printing on regular copy paper (matte or gloss) the pages come out all wavy and jaggy. There is also no duplex option despite what the description says.
I was pleased with my purchase. It arrived on time and the person who received it is very happy and so am I.
Bought for 3 year old grandson, when he opened the box, one ear already had paint chipping off. Didn't seem worth sending back, but wasn't impressed either.

This thing has really held up well, especially considering that I've used it outdoors every weekend since i got it! Very easy to set up, very comfortable. And its great at keeping me cool. Really happy with my purchase for the price.

I don't understand how everyone else can give it 5 stars. The story is predictable and boring. The author goes on about the character and does nothing to advance it. It feels like she ran out of ideas or someone told her there was a deadline they need to meet. What a waste of your time this book is. I'm not sure what all these people see in it, but if you're having trouble sleeping, skip it because you won't sleep after reading one page.
Ok, so here's the skinning.
As time passed on, more facts came out that made the story much clearer.

This was a very short book. I read it in about 15 minutes, although I feel that the writer could have added more depth. It is not anything worth recommending to my friends, just something you might be interested in. The author mentions his favorite authors only twice throughout the whole book, which seems odd given how little of them he uses. If you're an established author, this book may get under your skin. Otherwise, look for others out there. I'd keep looking and save your money.

I was excited to buy a book that would give me more background on my very new car. After reading the reviews for this one and others in this series, I bought it. The pictures were nice but some things needed clarification. It didn't help much as far as driving techniques or repair suggestions. I found other books better than "How to drive like you know" which is what it seems like, a quick job by someone who knows what they are doing.
Good for a short read before bed. It doesn't take long and is an easy read. I plan to get the next book in this series. Enjoy!

This is by far, the most disturbing movie that I've ever seen. For an avid horror fan, when all of them come out, even something as bad as, "The Haunting" or "Carrie", it's hard not to be disturbed but also entertained. And yet, after viewing "Flatliners", you will find yourself completely disturbed.

This book has some good basic information on the subject, but does not give enough depth or detail of each subject area to make it well worth buying. It's very basic, so I'm sorry I bought it. I'll go back and get something more detailed when I've had a chance to use this, as it's useless sitting around being passed from one person to another.

Well after a few hundred dollars worth of research on the internet, I read all the negative reviews before making this purchase which is always the hardest thing to do with anything we buy! I have had it now for about 2 years, but my last one was a much more expensive brand ( less than $ 1000 ) and worked just fine, so i assumed these were doing things to limit heat / power or whatever.

I don't recommend this book. The characters are dull, the plot a bit silly and the ending was so anticlimactic that it literally made no sense what so ever. The only reason i finished reading is because it's just easier when you know something good will happen. And then my mind thought "hmmm - maybe its all leading up to something?" but no, there were too many loose ends. Don't waste your time. If you're curious, read it. But don't really rely on the ending.

This thing is a joke. It works when charged but that's all I can say. What else can you say about it? Save your money. You can't afford to buy this and waste even half of it! It's not worth it or the time. My recommendation: if you're reading this: Don't Buy It!

The first version was not a problem and it worked fine when using an apple cord but this one has the same issues, you need to use either computer while it's charging. After reading the reviews I figured I'd at least try one. If they are ever able to fix the charging issue I'll increase my score. Until then, I'm still giving this product 3 stars because of what the other reviewers have said. If you're thinking about getting this, just wait until they've fixed it. :-/   Rating: 3.

This is definitely not worth the price for a simple book. The basic advice that any college student would have already known if they knew how to write an essay was included in this book. It just reiterates them. If you've never applied yourself before, you're probably better off with another book. My biggest complaint about the book itself (aside from actually being extremely short) were random chapters repeated multiple times.

Don't buy. I bought 3 bags of these and within 2 days all had holes on the sides from normal use. It is not worth it especially for heavy pots. Go to HD - they're cheaper and they have much bigger sacks and you can just put more of whatever in there without having as many holes. My kids use them too. It's unfortunate though. Very cute but too expensive with so may hole problems. I'm going back to walmart.

Not a bad product but it is not what I thought the material its made of. If we have to do this every day there has got to be better quality out there. But does protect your tablet from scratches and all that falls on it.

I have had two sets of these speakers. Both speakers are extremely underpowered. If you want to hear a song in good quality, don't buy this speaker. You can get speakers with better sound quality for less that this product. The speaker design is very sleek and elegant though. Too bad the product just plain sucks!They looked great, but unfortunately they didn't perform well. To start off with, it doesn't match up well on my desk top,looks ugly next to it.

You definitely get what you pay for with this product. I purchased it on a whim. It worked great for several months then all of the sudden it went dead. Just plain died. Nothing would work. This was just not worth buying. Find one locally so that there's an guarantee you'll have something when it goes out. Or purchase it as long as it's cheaper. It's cheaper to use Amazon vs Target.
The product met my expectations. Very easy to use.
this little device works. i have an older ipod mini. and it works flawlessly, even with the extra rubber pieces that come in it. great product. no problems what so ever! well worth it!
Bought this charger and after about 3 weeks would only turn on at 100% charge. After less than 2 months it stopped working completely. No amount of jiggling will work.
It was much shorter than I expected, but it showed up on my doorstop pretty quickly & in great condition.
The Clancy Brothers continue to bring a warm glow over their new CD, titled "An Innocent Man".

I have no idea if it worked as good in my car but that is why the product got 4 stars and not 5. Only reason for four was because of the price I paid. So I'm really happy with it. As long as things work well then 5 stars, very happy. Very easy to install. It took me about 10 minutes. Good instructions on YouTube which made install a breeze.
