You can probably find one online somewhere like YouTube.
It looks nice, works fine once it got there. Wish they would charge a little less for this. That's what we pay per month.

The plot starts out promising until it becomes clear about halfway through that author has no clue how human interaction works. He takes all of the main character's quirks and turns them into a joke. Even when he finds some sense in the story, it's not worth reading more than five chapters. I felt like ripping my hair out, especially at where this series is headed - having every character make gross comments on everything under the sun.

This book does not give specific instructions that I could find. It is a compilation of the work and writings of many scientists who have studied the effects people get from certain foods on cancer cells, etc in various parts around the world. The scientific community needs to take it seriously as there are serious risks associated with overdosing. There aren't any good plans here for protecting yourself against food allergies. For all we know, there may be adverse health consequences.
I never got the product....don't know why? But when i called he said that a refund policy wasn't available...that's not fair.. :(..it's going back on Monday. Very dissapointing. :).

I didn't buy this from Amazon. It came in its original sealed package. And when I opened it, out of the box 3 of 5 lenses were already scratched. These are quality pieces to use, but it's useless if they don't stay on. Save your money. I'm not returning them because it would cost me more and since they're heavy enough, it'd probably end up being too expensive. Just go get a cheaper set. You may need 6 or 8 sets depending on how many people you shoot with.

I got all my stuff that i needed without hassle. It does just what its suppose to do! My cat likes it and so do I. So if you have a cat i recommened it to you! Thanks Amazon for being here as soon as u said ya! And the price is great too!
The first time this item was used it did what it's supposed to, however, after that, as soon as you unplug and move it, sparks start shooting out of it.
This book was very easy reading but gave insight into all types of birds that you most likely will never see in your life.
Installed my new screen in minutes after cleaning well with Windex and alcohol swabs. Had no problem removing old screen.

Was only good as my dog kept pushing it, but he eventually got tired of it. After 6 months there were no holes at all. Very dissapointed. Maybe i will try something else. We live in an apartment so if we put sand on top its hard to clean up.

I bought the book after reading some fairly exciting reviews in magazines and on websites. Unfortunately, it seems like Mr. Smith doesn't read up on such things anymore. The science is well laid out for a layman of high school physics so if you're not an expert you shouldn't worry about it. As far as I can tell he presents what we already know. But how that comes from a scientist who admits his basic research did no good really struck me as quite self-indulgent.

This product does not work, and I am a doctor in an emergency room. The only thing this did was give me the runs! If you have some time to waste then by all means but this. Save yourself the money and just get on youtube or something. A good tip is how the medicine looks like as it dries. It has very dark color coming out around where it's being applied. It's almost green looking. You will be very disappointed if you use this. Not even worth giving away.

I ordered one of these and they sent me 3 different ones. Two were damaged right out the package (cracked handle) but worst is that after using it for a few days, it began to smell like burning plastic while charging. It wouldn't turn on at all without being plugged in even if connected by USB cable. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra $20 or $30 bucks and get something that's actually good.

I was using two previous digital thermometers to read the temperatures of meat which only had a dial temperature with an indicator light. The second time I used this product it made my cooking life so easy and accurate. It is important we have accurate instructions for good cooking. The reason why people are having difficulty setting up your device by following the directions on how long the light should remain on is because you must first press and hold both buttons in order then step down past zero.

I was so excited to learn the latest incarnation of Robert B. Parker's wonderful detective series had recently entered it's second season....boy am I disappointed! In Season 2 we get the return of Harry Bosch. A man who may be as evil and dangerous as ever but still somewhat likeable, which is why there is a chance that he will turn out "bad". But Bosch has absolutely no reason for being on this show; at least nothing interesting about him. I don't know what happened here.
The information was good. Too many words were misspelled. It needs lots of editing before release.

This is one of the greatest films I have ever seen. But my copy won't play on 4 different DVD players. They claim that you "may run into a problem with this title." That should be more specific. So if yours won't run, stay away from this film!
For some reason when these books are in hardcover editions with dust jackets, it's a bit annoying because if you try to pick up one, you invariably pull it out of your purse or bag.

I think it could have been an informative book - since I was looking to get some information about the culture surrounding the ancient Egypt for my own personal research. But it's all too often just regurgitated historical facts, with a good deal of time spent going over and re-explaining everything else which he has already covered in any detail that you want to know.

Well I bought this book because it's all in one place and it looks like they have added a lot of extra stuff to it, but now that buying these books, you get tired of them. What is so disappointing with the other books are the same things I've always felt about the ones I've bought. The artwork isn't spectacular or anything and there really aren't any new insights from artists who actually worked on Marvel during this time.

Great sound but not sturdy enough to keep my tablet in the stand without it falling out and crashing on hardwood floor. My iPad 2 has a case so it doesn't fit well either if you are using cases that don't provide an opening for headphone jack. Overall it's ok at best with its problems.

I used these for my wife's hair and they are a big waste of money. They don't curl your lashes. It took several attempts to get them to work. The elastic that holds the lashes was just too strong and wouldn't break free. Then when it finally did come loose from the lash band, one pair stopped rolling back up so the other pair would still try but couldn't. If you roll with this product, good luck getting anything out after applying them.

Very good quality and great to use while baking in the oven. I did notice that some of the mats were not cut well for my bread but all together very good. Would buy them again if needed. It appears they would make nice gifts too. The color is also a beautiful green.

I bought this product on December 5, 2012. However, the battery died already in March 2013. In May 2013 it was hard to charge - sometimes you had to press and hold but by July after 10 uses (I was listening for about 2 hours per day average) It started acting up. The bluetooth stopped working so music sounded like the speaker is blown. So no matter how much I try to fix it, it's useless. Don't buy this!

It took me awhile to learn how it works and get an idea of what could be included in the book. If you have ever had experience working with a GPS navigator... just go there. I'm glad I only paid about $15 for this book, maybe $5-8 would make more sense.

Don't waste your money! This seems like a product that has been photocopied and pasted onto an original copy. The pages are very pale white with several different types of text. Nothing is black or grey.

I felt like the author wasn't paying much attention as so many recipes start with a large amount of meat and/or eggs in them. This didn't appeal to me at all. Don't waste your money unless you can bring yourself to read every recipe. They sounded good, but they were all just too much.
I've been using these cartridges exclusively since I bought them back in August.

Well, I am disappointed with my choice. The quality of the design is not bad. However, it does seem to be made in China and while I'm sure it's cheap, it'll never last the 5 yrs advertised. You would spend more money with shipping this back so that's probably why you're going to.
After 2 months this cover starting turning blue from being exposed. Looks awful. Now I'm having trouble with it staying closed even when it's not in motion. It's falling apart. :( Very disappointed.

I bought this to replace all my old bulbs. They are very bright and white. It's an easy fix for the color of lights in your house. The price is great on these bulbs as well!! Would highly recommend these!!! Thank you Amazon once again!!!~Lisa - Houston TX, USA

I like the design of this case. The back is hard plastic with a rubber coating and there are four holes cut out for camera. On my case, two don't line up to camera lens opening. It also does have some bulges around power button but that doesn't appear too noticable due to case thickness. However, when typing on keyboard you can really feel the flex in these holes. This thing isn't as protective as it looks either.

This is an excellent alternative to the expensive Sony batteries. I bought them for my camera, as I didn't have the money then for Sony's battery. I've had some other Wasabi products that have been good quality batteries so I'll just stick with these from now. Not all of the charge will take place, but I expect this should be true not only in these batteries and batteries, but in the Nikon charger too. All things considered I'm happy buying these. If you need a rechargeable battery, go to Amazon.
This product tastes great. It adds color to salsa, etc. The whole family loves it. I use it almost every day.
I love Coffee People coffee, particularly Donut Shop blends.

No one in my family has been ill with the symptoms experienced by many people who have written reviews and purchased this book. Please don't waste your money or time on any of these bogus claims about "herbs" that you can purchase from a local organic grocery store. I am convinced that Ms.

All this machine can do is shred paper. The shredder blade stops short of the stack every time and you have to shake it or pull out some paper manually for each piece which takes about 5 minutes. The shredded items are always larger than I need even after 1 inch. If you're making a pile over 1" or so, then use your hand since there was no safety guard that came with it. Do not attempt to crush more than one sheet at once, it's impossible.

The only complaint I had was that the packaging did not protect it while shipping, therefore it arrived with a couple of cracks. The product works well and is fairly quiet. It's been on for about 1 week now without problems. Will probably get several years use before looking to replace it. Good value considering price per day.
Good for when I needed a more portable option. Can mount with the base on or off very easily. Does not come off. Sturdy enough.

I just wanted a simple, good looking case with the sleep function, and that's what i got to be quite honest. This could have been a great cover had it been made for the new ipad 3 as advertised. Instead, the sleep/wake function doesn't work when you close the cover. Also, even though I went in and out of this case several times, there is a chemical smell. Not sure if it's from manufacturing or shipping. Will do some touch-up work, but overall the picture looks great.
Well made. Works as advertised. Like all phone cases its hard to get out when using belt clip. For that reason only 4 stars. Overall it's worth it. Can't beat an OtterBox
This is advertised as a product that fits all cars with an original antenna adapter. It DOES NOT, it has to be cut at the end so you can thread in and out. Very dissapointed by this product.

I love this juicer!! I've had it for over a year now and it's still going strong. The only real complaint that I'm hearing from people is the noise. As far as loud, if you want it to be quiet, plug in your own speakers. It's noisy but easy on my lungs :) When using it outside, though, make sure that all windows are closed because the thing will produce some wind noise. You can put so much juice into one batch of veggies with 2 lemons or 1 lemon.

Very informative on the subject and it was great reading about how certain techniques work. One thing that bothered me though, there were some errors in the information as well. For instance, one exercise said to count up from 1 - 15 and then you can ask your partner what their feelings are.
Looks great on phone.

I must say this little guy has some interesting features and looks cool. However, the software provided was very hard to install on Win 7. I ordered these for my son's 7th birthday. He opened his package first, and was totally thrilled. That night however, when he put them on they were too big. By the morning of June 10th we found out that there is no way to adjust the straps! We had just been ripped off! What a rip off. Don't wast your money. I'm going back to Target today. If you are looking at these, don't order them! Waste of $20 or more dollars!
This is a decent little speaker system. I don't really use it very often due to my other speakers. Easy set up, easy battery life and the sound quality is good. Would consider purchasing again.
The quality is great but it's no use to me for the size of my head. I returned it. Would recommend to anyone thinking about buying a helmet. Check their head size. It's huge!

I was surprised at the quality of this book. It looks like it from a good distance, but when you take a close look, there are huge typos. There is even one quote that appears twice. For example,pg 15: "Don't ask for help and don't blame someone else until you've gone thru it." What exactly do they mean? This seems to be about people who have had traumatic events in their family histories, which would include abuse as an adult.
Ordered this for an older Canon A540 IS camera.

This book was a very boring read, had no character development, it kept having the main characters go on and on about how much they loved each other but would never give up their faith even though it cost them everything. Don't waste your money. I hated this book. Sorry that i spent $5.99 for it. Thank goodness it's not going to be one of those 50 shades books which is so popular now because frankly these are poorly written books. Save yourself some money by buying something worthwhile.

Don't waste your money on this item. As soon as I plugged in the charger, it would not work anymore. Now It will cost me more to return than I paid for it. So here we go again. Only good thing about Amazon is that the returns are free. Do yourself a favor and don't buy this. You might as well spend $30 at Walmart or Target because you're going to get some junk right out of there. Just be careful when you take it out. You're gonna need a box cutter.

This book is in the same vein of many other self-help books that include a little bit spirituality and more into making money. I found it to be interesting enough, but not enough depth for me. It was nice at times when you feel like you've been on an extended vacation with no place or people where you're at. You don't get attached too much to any particular character which makes this easy to put down, if that's your thing.

Don't waste your money on this piece of crap headset!! I had to return it two days later. The volume is really low and you can hardly hear what people are saying through the mic. This was also a defective set that I received. Amazon let me keep the one I had. Be warned before buying this!

I think this car seat is great. It seems easy to clean, comfortable enough even when my daughter fell asleep, and the fabric feels good. My only complaint would be that the crotch belt tends toloosen quite a bit as she gets bigger. We are able ot retighten it, but it's usually loose in the car.
The book was not good. I'm sorry I read it but even if this is a true story, nothing could save the story of these people. They need help. Don't waste your money or time. Very disappointed!

The battery does not stay plugged into the computer very well at all. You have to push really hard on it. This makes using the laptop awkward. Would never purchase again. In fact, we donated this one and purchased a different brand from Amazon.

My experience was the same as the other two users that have reviewed this item. After reading the very positive 5-star reviews, I purchased it. When I read my receipt, it said to contact Apple - and then you know why I'm posting this. To top things off, they wanted me to pay a shipping fee of almost $30 on return! Are we kidding here? Amazon is sending these refurbished items out with defective hardware?? They should test them before shipping! I'll be doing the same.
When I first saw these, thought they were great! They're even better than Season 1...
This is an ok book. Nothing spectacular like other reviewers said.

I purchased several of these items for Christmas gifts. I ordered an Asus 10" Tablet, it arrived and was a mini lap top from China, not what i ordered, the touch screen didn't work. So they sent me another one. When it did arrive the new one would power up, then shut down again within 5 minutes. They have NO customer support. Returned both of them for refund, went to Best Buy bought my own tablet with Amazon Prime shipping which works great so far. Don't waste your time, look elsewhere.

I should have known better by the price but I thought it would atleast charge my battery and then some. Instead this will do absolutely nothing except heat up. It is a piece of junk. Save your money. I wish there was a zero star option.. This product will NOT charge my phone if battery is low. Not happy. I love listening to this. It is soothing music. However, the music will not work on my Kindle Fire. This kind of disappointed me.
The story started out well for an erotic novel and got more interesting until the end. It just became a book of sex then love story. So I am in no hurry to read any more. Sorry!

I purchased these as a gift and the person said she liked it but felt that all items needed to be handled carefully. Some were broken which really didn't add anything to what was in here. It wasn't worth returning them because they are such nice quality though.

It was my fault for not reading the fine print before I purchased, but be sure you don't need this type of cartridge. Only fit hp 5520 series. This is NOT what they say it is. This "biography' should only be offered via e-book (or another digital source).
Not one of her best. I am a HUGE Mary Higgins Clark fan. Some other authors are really worth reading.
THIS IS NOT A GOOD PRODUCT IT DOSENT EVEN LAST MORE THAN 5 MONTHS OF VERY LIGHT USE. MAYBE I GOT DIRTY ONE BUT THEY ARENT MADE DURABLE AT ALL. WONT WASTE MY MONEY ON SAMSUNG ANYMORE!!!

One thing about movies is that they make a lot of noise and no one seems to mind. In the case of The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes, we all did. We went home from the theater humming snatches while watching each other. Now those were loud songs. Some fans have complained for years regarding this soundtrack. I had not heard any of these songs before purchasing it and now as more than 2 months later, I can safely say I'll NEVER buy another soundtrack without seeing it.

The sound is great but the bass is lacking. I find that when listening for more then 30 minutes the top portion of my head will burn from ear pressure. Other headphones I've owned are extremely comfortable and offer very good bass. You can still hear other noises at full volume though which makes me a little irritated as I like to have private time while listening. These go back in less than an hour. They do look cool if you aren't overly concerned with their comfort level.
This film is horrible. The acting, story, cinematography, dialogue, and music are all bad. One of the worst movies I have ever seen. Avoid at this price. Very disappointed!!!
This was not a very good book. There are many other great ones out there. I would only read this if it was for free.
i got this as a housewarming gift.

The book was easy to read but the story just didn't seem too real. It wasn't until I had finished that it dawned on me what really happened. And while I don't mind a man telling his secrets in order for us (readers) to see things from his perspective, I don't want to have to go through over and over.

I've used these on several jobs over my 40 year gardening career. For most of them, they work OK although I'm very careful to tighten as much screw as possible but the first time I installed one onto an arborvitae tree it snapped. The teeth came right off in a couple weeks.

I bought this for my son's Ipod touch. It worked a couple months and then just died. For that kind of money, it shouldn't have such poor longevity! Now he has to order another one. What good is that? This was not a case but only about 1/2 the actual sized. I paid for 3 and got to use 1 it doesn't even fit her nook well enough so she cant read at all with it. There are a number of good movies to be made about the British secret services. The movie "Stakeout" is an excellent example since it took place after September 11. The writing was terrible. I kept expecting another John Grisham, but nope this is just a story about the money machine and how easy it is. The plot started to make sense at around page 350 when all of sudden, you find out who the father is. Who knows why, but he had nothing else going for him. There are really no twists or turns in the story. Everything that happens seems logical on first glance even though it's not.

In her book, "Living With AIDS: The True Story of the Man in My House," Betty White does not give an adequate history about HIV/AIDS. If such was necessary, than she could tell us what HIV was. She didn't do that. This book has way too much information for a single person to read, including pages and pages of background on AIDS that did little to further understanding. I think that's why it took 15 years for me to understand it. I'm glad my daughter recommended this book.

This book is very outdated - no mention now of modern technology or even the use of the internet. The most glaring error (and I realize that this isn't a big deal to some) was on page 13 in Chapter 7 when it called for an index listing both books of which I've read. After reading it, I'm not sure why they included this. Very hard to follow along. I would recommend just going online if you don't mind making the time to do some searches yourself. You'll be glad you did.

If you are looking for a fast pace, action, and adventure story than this novel can fill your need. This book kept me awake for about 5-6 hours without putting any effort at all. The details she included give an inside look into the time period of late 1800s England. Not many books that cover so much information do it in such interesting way.

This is a well-made, basic product which fits most standard car headrests. That combined with using one hand (necessary if you take your child from room to room, and thus also making sure they don't get out while you're driving), results in not being able to set this at an optimal position.

This product could just be my personal issue with the way it makes me sweat. I used this as part of a weight loss program and it did not work. However, as a daily deodorant - yes, very good product. Will try again.

I got this for my husband as part of his Christmas gift, so if he had told me ahead of time about its small size, it wouldn't have mattered since we'd already given the product to him. This works well enough, though it's certainly smaller than you'd think from how much is described. The light itself isn't very good, even at max intensity, especially around corners.

This has some great features with its small footprint, good sound, and multiple equalizer settings. However, if you don't adjust your audio settings properly, then everything sounds as though it's coming out of a tin can. And that's how I've experienced it. Basically, when adjusting my EQ settings, one can change bass, treble, midrange etc.

I'm not sure what the reviews are saying about this phone answering machine. I bought one in a retail store and it is very easy to set up. The sound quality that you hear once it's going through the speaker is excellent, so if that's all you're concerned with, then you'll be satisfied with this. I haven't tried any of the other features, but I've had no problems setting up outgoing messages, call waiting times, etc. It works perfectly for us - especially for its relatively low price. Highly recommended.

The battery does fit in the laptop but it won't charge. I thought something was wrong with my laptop till i checked that and a new battery was just the same. so im sending back to Amazon. The book held my interest throughout but I thought it was slow moving at some times, particularly during the action sequences. After finishing this book, I'm not sure I'd seek out anything else by Mr Cussler. It's disappointing because he's an excellent writer with excellent story lines that have interesting characters.

Although the plot is intriguing it really wasn't one of John Connolly's best efforts. I can only say that it was a very quick read and worth reading. Not Connolly at his best. He is, however. At least he had the guts to publish this in book form. However, if you are looking for another thriller like A Talent For War, with action from beginning to end, then look elsewhere.. This is an action-packed short story. Don't waste your time.

I have had my Oster toaster for about 8 years and it was great until the handle broke off. There is a small metal connector with two screws on either side. The only tool you can buy now at home depot replaces these parts which are just what was needed then when broken.

This book is a collection of stories and observations on American foreign policy from the perspective (in this case liberal) of some students attending Dartmouth during the Vietnam War. The title infers that these students were critical thinkers, perhaps even revolutionaries. Although they were, in reality, largely just ordinary liberal pacifists who had little interest or opportunity to challenge either the war itself or US strategy.

It's like the author couldn't get enough on her life before writing this and spent little time developing these characters who then become so important to her. You are supposed to believe that even after the two main protagonists have been together for a couple of years, they still are not getting along, but we don't really see why. I didn't feel much about either one of them. It also felt like the story was written by someone else in some ways. In summary - interesting plot concept badly executed.

While I enjoyed the content of this book, it wasn't as well written and flowed a bit more unevenly than previous novels. It's true he used other characters names to help fill gaps left by not fully fleshing out his main characters, but when I'm reading one of his books, they are supposed to be on my to-read list at least. This is not an excuse to stop writing excellent books. Just something that bothered me.

It took me awhile to get used to, but... now, nothing gets bent. After traveling through two different countries recently, I'm still happy with it.

This tool works well as long as you don't get too creative thinking how you want to use it. I gave it 4 stars because sometimes my coffee is weak, and when this happens, we run the water through again in a few seconds but not sure. But overall, it's still much faster than our old coffee maker. Not sure why all of appliances can leak so frequently. It makes good coffee too. If they could make them more watertight, I'd recommend them. So far, no leaks at all.
This was not as strong as I had hoped, and the odor is still detectable. I'll stick with a different brand.
Pros: Easy to put on; decent visibility; good price. Con: Glasses fog up a lot when driving over 45mph. Doesn't always happen until it's very cold. Makes me nervous on long trips.

I like this product for its ease of use and cleanup. It is a little awkward to store since it doesn't fit in the sink. Other than that it's a quality product. It's good for small jobs. As I'm not using it on hard floors, I can't really comment about how well it works there. For my uses with hardwoods, it's good. You can easily see what you've done. Also great tool if you have tile or laminate floors as it helps clean well. One thing no one here has mentioned.
Great read! Lots of action!! Keeps you wanting more so you can't put it down.
This toy was just what we needed for Christmas. We had looked everywhere in the stores before finding this.
The color was different than expected from what the picture shows. It doesn't look black and white as shown.

You can't really have the fun of trying to guess and try out different combinations with your little one when you're playing this game. For an adult player, it's very borring - I wouldn't suggest buying this. So, for kids under 7, even though you can keep playing, there is definitely not that much fun. It's more like a game that you would play on a boring rainy day. I'm glad it was free, because I'd expect something better from Amazon. That's what happens if all free games cost something.

I enjoyed this book and would recommend it. It's a great example of how to create an American literary classic in a relatively short period using contemporary slang or expressions that relate to the plot as well as some old-fashioned slang. The best thing about it is that it's not full of useless information. It contains all necessary information for an interesting read. For people wanting something very different, this may be your book.

This book is well written except perhaps some repetitive statements about people and situations, but it held my interest through to its unpredictable ending. The characters are vivid enough so you care what they decide next. You may feel like you've met them before. Good entertainment.
Works great good quality.

The author does an excellent job of describing a realistic view on the horror s of war that is well  written and not preachy. < SEP> However, I found parts of this story to be more science fiction than reality. One thing was missing from my understanding, after reading it all through.
This book takes some time getting off track for most readers.

Excellent choice not only in terms of performance but durability too. However, even though its made by k&n, it looks like something manufactured in China when compared to the German originals. A slightly different feel also when installing it. If you have any problems with your original switch then follow the instruction mentioned here.

If you are looking for something natural this is the wrong brand! It seems diluted in its ingredient! But i would say the product does what they claim. The vendor was quick at delivery just not pleased with how it arrived. Will use till completed...

This product performed as expected, and was delivered within only a couple of days with standard shipping. However, the item I received did not have any markings on it showing that it's actually a Toshiba battery. After charging this battery fully, I've been using it for about three weeks, so I'm still unsure if that's what makes it function properly. Overall, since it's such an inexpensive battery, I'd say it's worth taking into consideration.

My son loves these. He only doesn't play with them so they don't last very long but we find that it helps to break them down and put it away a few days before bedtime as the first thing he does is bite on these things :)

I bought this case when it was $15. It is absolutely amazing and does a great job with protecting your iPod! If you have any doubt about the case, then go ahead an buy it! You will not regret it. Not only that but if it's $20 or more for every other case sold on amazon, it doesn't even matter because I got mine for way cheaper! All in all, very good investment! I recommend buying the one by otterbox too. They are both great.
Loved this series when it came out years ago, so happy it's on Prime now! We like silly humor, so a bit different than what you see today on TV, but very enjoyable...good story lines too.

I bought this thinking there was going to be a lot of different patterns and instructions. Instead you get instructions on how to create one or two from scratch and another example project done in beads. There is some good information, but very few projects are included or at least were only shown briefly within the text. A little disappointed.

My review of The Complete Guide To Marriage By Beth Moore is basically positive, although it would have been better if more scripture had been put in. Some books I read are full of scriptures but very few actual life application.
This is really a small book. I just took it out of the package and read about 1/2 so I have not had time to put much into it. But it looks interesting.

I have now used this brand for about 3 years. My pool is over 1000 gal and the chlorine level has remained at a comfortable level. The cartridge that came in my 20 foot round above ground pool lasted me well over a year. So far so good. In comparison, the Intex cartridges last less than 2 months. This package lasts 4 weeks. We purchased another set of these cartridges to make our water pressure even lower as we wanted the pool to stay clear as much longer without making chemicals available.

A solid book overall, but it seems to focus on the more advanced stuff and doesn't really provide basic information. I would recommend a different text of similar size if you want to learn how to draw anime characters. The illustrations were pretty nice which made up for not covering many general techniques. It isn't bad, just nothing that amazing.

I have been a fan of Kate Bush for quite some time now, and this documentary was filmed in 2007 so it covers her transition from the early days when she would work on an album then take a break until 20011 working as a model (and later becoming more active behind camera). It also includes footage from other times (e.g. 2003 at the height of fame where Madonna worked with her) and things that occurred backstage before music videos came into play.
Bought this bed because it was cheaper than other options that are almost exactly like it.
I purchased this as an extra device and loved it. This is my second one.

This was a gift for my girlfriend who had this on her wish list. She loves the design and looks very sharp. I will definitely look here again. The packaging they gave is pretty good also. A little disappointed that these came from China.

This has turned out to be a pleasant product. I've only used it while sitting at my desk for an extended period of time, and as far as comfort goes, it's wonderful. The padding isn't as soft or cushy feeling as you'd expect, but there's enough there that if you sit on one side hard, you'll get some relief. It's not so rigid from top to bottom as to cause your shoulders to feel like they would explode.
Well made product, as described, fast delivery.
Really like it. This was my second purchase and it has an attractive look - would recommend all who needs one or another type of case. Well made.
I'm glad I went with this instead of buying Apple's version. Works great. Lasts longer than stock. No complaints. Recommended. Would buy again. Very Happy. Arrived on time. Thank you Amazon!
I like the book, a perfect size to take traveling. It is a great price and well worth reading. I would recommend this book.
We use this with our ipad 2, it seems great. No problems so far.
